1: Naat poetry for the prophet
Aai Nasimey Kue Muhammad Sallallaahu Alaihi Wa Sallam
2:
Aai Nasimey Ku-E Muhammad, Sallallaahu Alaihi Wa Sallam
Khinch Ne Laga Dil Su-E Muhammad, Sallallaahu Alaihi Wa Sallam

Kaa'bah Hamaara Ku-E Muhammad, Sallallaahu Alaihi Wa Sallam
Mushafey Imaan Ru-E Muhammad, Sallallaahu Alaihi Wa Sallam

Leke Muraade Dil Aa-Ein Gey, Mar Jaa-Ein Gey, Mit Jaa-Ein Gey
Pahonchey To Hum Ta Ku-E Muhammad, Sallallaahu Alaihi Wa Sallam

Tuba Ki Jaanib Tak Ne Waalon, Aankhein Kholo, Hosh Sambhaalo
Dekho Qade Dil Juw-Aey Muhammad, Sallallaahu Alaihi Wa Sallam

Naam Isi Ka Baabe Karam Hai, Dekh Yehi Mehraabe Haram Hai
Dekh Khamey Abroowe Muhammad, Sallallaahu Alaihi Wa Sallam

Hum Sab Ka Rukh Su-E Kaa'bah, Su-E Muhammad Ru-E Kaa'bah
Kaa'bey Ka Kaa'bah Ku-E Muhammad, Sallallaahu Alaihi Wa Sallam

Bhini, Bhini, Khushboo Laheki, Bedam Dil Ki Duniya Maheki
Khul Gaye Jab Geisoo-E Muhammad, Sallallaahu Alaihi Wa Sallam

1: Aa Gaye Sarkaar Main Bismillah Karan
2:
Aa Gaye Sarkaar Main Bismillah Karan
Nabian De Sardaar Main Bismillah Karan

Aamina Da Raajdulhara Aagaya
Khirr Payi Gulzaar Main Bismillah Karaan

Ji Bismillah Karaan
Main Bismillah Karaan

Aa Gaye Sarkaar Main Bismillah Karan
Nabian De Sardaar Main Bismillah Karan

Gowd Wich Leke Halima Ne Keya
Aaja Mere Laal Main Bismillah Karan

Aa Gaye Sarkaar Main Bismillah Karan
Nabian De Sardaar Main Bismillah Karan

Aakheya Rabb Ne Raat Meraj Di
Aaja Mere Yaar Main Bismillah Karan

Aa Gaye Sarkaar Main Bismillah Karan
Nabian De Sardaar Main Bismillah Karan

Eho Dua Mangda Baghdadi Har Wele
Khwaab Wich Howe Nazara Aaqa Da

Aa Gaye Sarkaar Main Bismillah Karan
Nabian De Sardaar Main Bismillah Karan

Madina-E-Paak Da Sohna Chan Aa Gaya
Sajiyan Galliyan Baazar Main Bismillah Karan

Aa Gaye Sarkaar Main Bismillah Karan

1: Aa Jaaye Bulawa Mujhe Aqa Tere Dar Se
2:
Aa Jaaye Bulawa Mujhe Aqa Tere Dar Se
Jis Dar Ki Ghulaami Ko To Jibreel Bhi Tarse

Paidal Hi Nikalte Hain, Masaafat Ka Nahin Khauf
Thakte Hi Nahin Ham To Madine Ke Safar Se

Sunnat Pe Teri Chalne Ka Aa Jaaye Qareena
Ye Abr-E-Karam Kaash Mere Dasht Pe Barse

Zarrah Bhi Lage Gohar-O-Almaas Se Badh Kar
Dekhe To Koii Khaak-E-Arab Meri Nazar Se

Ek Main Hi Nahin Taalib-E-Jalwa Mere Aqa!
Har Ek Musalmaan Tere Deed Ko Tarse

Naamoos-E-Muhammad Ke Liye Jaan Bhi Doon Ga
Ho Jaaun Ga Waaqif Main Shahaadat Ke Hunar Se

Dunya Ke Faqat Chand Hi Lamhaat The Guzre
Ho Aaye Payambar Mere Sadiyaun Ke Safar Se

Jo Shaam-O-Sahar Salle Alaa Kehta Rahe Ga
Aaye Ga Bulawa Usay Aqa Ke Nagar Se

Kuch Khauf Nahin Mujh Ko Kadee Dhoop Ka Amjad
Saaya Mujhe Miltaa Hai Risaalat Ke Shajar Se

1: Aa Mil Yaar Saar Le Meri (Kalam E Bulleh Shah)
2:
Aa Mil Yaar Saar Le Meri
Meri Jaan Dukhan Ne Gheri

Ander Khuwab Wichora Hoya, Khaber Na Pindi Teri
Sanji Bin Wich Lutti Sayiaan, Sur Palang Ne Gheri

Mulla Qazi Raah Batawan, Din Bharum De Phere
Eh Taan Thag Jagat De Jhior, Lawan Jaal Chophere

Karam Sharaa De Dharam Batawan, Sangal Pawan Perin
Zaat Mazhab Eh Ishaq Na Puchda, Ishaq Shara Da Weri

Nadiyon Paar Mulak Sajan Da, Laher Lobh Ne Gheri
Satgor Beri Phari Khalote, Tain Kiun Laii Aweri

Bullah Shah, Shoh Tenun Milsi, Dil Noon De Daleri
Peetum Paas, Te Tolna Kis Noon, Bhul Giun Shakar Dopehari

Aa Mil Yaar Saar Le Meri
Meri Jaan Dukhan Ne Gheri

1: Aaa Gai Mustafa Ki Sawari
2:
Khaliq Ney Apney Nuur Ka, Jalwa Dikha Diyaa
Sab Nuur Ko Mila Kay Muhammad Bana Diya

Aagae Mustafa Ki Sawaari
Apne Ghar Ko Diyo Sey Saga Loo
Dey Rahey Hain Farishtey Salaami
Tum Duruudo Ki Maala Banaa Loo

Aagae Mustafa Ki Sawaari
Apne Ghar Ko Diyo Sey Saga Loo

Apney Mangto Ko Wo Paaltey Hain
Wo Bhala Kis Ko Kab Taaltey Hain

Aagae Mustafa Ki Sawaari
Apne Ghar Ko Diyo Sey Saga Loo

Aap Ko Jo Bhi Sab Sey Hain Pyaarey

Naam-E-Ahmad Hay Jis Dil Ki Dharkan
Jo Hay Pehchaan Hum Aashiqo Kee

Apne Ghar Ko Diyo Sey Saga Loo

Jashne Milaad Ki Barkato Sey

1: Aagaii Jag De Vich Bahaar
2:
Aagaii Jag De Vich Bahaar
Ban Ke Aaya Kamli Waala Nabiyaan Da Sardaar

Kamli Waala Je Na Oanda, Rab Vi Na Koii Cheez Banonda
Sohne Da Ai Sadqa Banya Ai Saara Sansaar

Rab Aakhe Tun Dilbar Mera, Mera Sab Kujh Sohniyaan Tera
Meri Har Shei Da Mahbuba Tu Maalik Mukhtaar

Oganhaaro Na Ghabra-O! Ral Mil Khushiyaan Yaar Mana-O
Dukhiyaan De Dukh Wanddan Waala Agaya Rab Da Yaar

Kyun Na Geet Nabi De Gaayi-Ai, Kyunkar Na Milad Manaayi-Ai
Kul Nabiyaan Da Sarwar Aaya Sunniyaan Da Mantthaar!

Chumke Jaalyiaan Seene Laayi-Ai, Roze Paak Da Darshan Paayi-Ai
Ral Mil Challi-Ai Shehr Madine Aajaawe O Waar

Aahda-Ai Ashfaaqi Challa, Je Karna-Ai Raazi Allah
Pharrh Lei Feir Sohne Da Palla Lag Jaawain G Apaar

1: Aaj Ashq Mere Naat Sunaye To Ajab Kya
2:
Aaj Ashq Mere Na'at Sunaye To Ajab Kya
Sun Kar Wo Mujhe Pas Bulaye To Ajab Kya

Un Par To Gunahgar Ka Sab Hal Khula Hai
Us Par Bhi Wo Daman Main Chhupaye To Ajab Kya

Munh Dhanp Ke Rakhna Ke Gunahgar Bahut Hu
Mayyat Ko Meri Dekhne Aye To Ajab Kya

Didar Ke Qabil To Nahi Chasme Tamnna
Lekin Wo Kabhi Khawab Main Aye To Ajab Kya

Ne Zad Safar Hai Na Koi Kam Bhale Hai
Phir Bhi Mujhe Sarkar Bulaye To Ajab Kya

Deedar Key Qabil To Nahin Chashm E Tamana
Lekin Woh Kabhi Khwaab Main Aaein To Ajab Kya.

Deedar Ke Qabil To Kahan Meri Nazar Hai
Lakin Woh Kabhi Khawab Mein Aayein To Ajab Kiya.

Yeh Nisbat E Shah E Madni Aur Yeh Aansoo
Mehshar Mein Aik Gham Say Shuraein To Ajab Kiya.

Main Aisa Khatawar Hoon Kuch Had Bhi Nahin Jis Ki
Phir Bhi Meray Aeboon Ko Chupaein To Ajab Kiya.

Paband Nawa To Nahin Faryad Ki Rasmein
Yeh Ishq Mera Haal Sunayein To Ajab Kiya.

Paband Nawa To Nahin Faryad Ki Rasmein
Aansoo Hi Mera Hal Sunaein To Ajab Kiya.

Hasil Jinhain Aqa Ki Ghulami Ka Saraf Hai
Thokar Se Wo Murdo Ko Jilaye To Ajab Kya

Aey Joshe Janoo Paase Adab Bazm Hai Jin Ki
Is Bazm Mein Tashrif Woh Laaein To Ajab Kya Hai

Wo Husne Do 'aalam Hai Adeeb Unke Qadam Se
Sehra Main Agar Phool Khil Aye To Ajab Kya

1: Aaj Milaad-E-Nabi Hai
2:
Aaj Milaad-E-Nabi Hai, Kya Suhana Noor Hai,
Aa Gaya Woh Noor Wala, Jiska Saara Noor Hai.

Aankh Walo Aao Dekho, Mah-E-Taiba Ki Ziya.
Asmaan Ke Chand Mein To, Pheekha Peekha Noor Hai.

Tu Na Hota To Na Hota Do Jahaan Ka Intezaam.
Tu Zameen Ka Noor Hai, Tu Asmaan Ka Noor Hai.

Jiss Ne Jo Kuch Noor Paya, Sab Teri Sarkar Se.
Toor Ki Sarkar Ka Tu Sab Se Pehla Noor Hai.

Teri Nasl-E-Paak Mein Hai Bacha Bacha Noor Ka.
Tu Ayn-E-Noor, Tera Sab Gharana Noor Ka.

Main Gadda Tu Badshah, Bhar De Pyala Noor Ka.
Noor Din Duna Tera, De Daal Sadqa Noor Ka.

Jis Taraf Wo Uth Gayi, Alaam Munnawar Ho Gaye.
Main Teri Ankhon Ke Sadqe, Inn Mein Kitna Noor Hai.

Mustafa Ke Noor Mein Hai Zaat-E-Baari Jalwargar.
Mustafa Ka Noor Hi Kahye Khuda Ka Noor Hai.

Aaj Milaad-E-Nabi Hai, Kya Suhana Noor Hai,
Aa Gaya Woh Noor Wala, Jiska Saara Noor Hai.

1: Aaj Muhammad Aye Moray Ghar
2:
Aaj Muhammad Aye Moray Ghar
Dai Haleema Kehti Thi Ghar Ghar

Mehndi Lagau Ghar Ko Sajau
Mai Angan Me Naachu Gaau
Tann Mann Waaru Unke Charan Par

Subh E Azzal Hai Mukhra Unka
Shaam E Awad Hai Zulf Ka Saya
Unse Huwa Har Qalb Munawwar

Dosh Pe Yun Gesu Lehraye
Bheeni Bheeni Khusboo Aye
Rang O Nighat Saara Manzar

Amina Bi Ka Raaj Dulara
Kitna Anokha Kitna Pyaara
Chaand Uttar Aaya Hai Zameen Par

Ankhon Mein Maazagh Ka Surma
Sar Par Taaj Warafa Na Ka
Husn E Mujassam Allahu Akbar

Aao Sakhio Mill Kar Gaye
Apne Piya Ka Jashn Manaye
Salle Alaa Ki Dhoom Hai Ghar Ghar

Rim Jhim Barse Noor Ki Barkha
Aaya Hai Mehraj Ka Dulha
Dharti Aur Aakaash Se Behtar

Banke Shab E Mehraj Mein Dulha
Pohnche Jab Aflaak Pe Aaqa
Naghma Tha Har Ek Ki Zuban Par

Tal Jaayegi Saari Musibat
Aajayega Door E Rahat
Ab Toh Mujhe Dekhenge Nazar Bhar

Anjum Bekass Aap Ka Mangta
Dijiye Bakshish Jagg Ke Data
Boond Hu Mai Aur Aap Samandar

1: Aamad E Mustafa Se Hai Phoola Phala Chaman Chaman
2:
Aamad E Mustafa Se Hai Phoola Phala Chaman Chaman
Aayi Bahar Har Taraf Khilne Laga Chaman Chaman

Shadi Hai Har Makam Me Nakhl Me Sab Kiyam Hai
Daaliya Hai Salaam Me Sar Hai Jhuka Chaman Chaman

Thandi Hawaye Aati Hai Kaliya Bhi Muskurati Hai
Bul-Bule Cheh-Chahati Hai Khilne Laga Chaman Chaman

Jhoomte Hai Shajar Shajar Taaza Huwa Hai Phool Phool
Sabza Hui Ravish Ravish Ghul Se Bhara Chaman Chaman

Kaliya Tamaam Khil Gayi Shaakhe Khushi Se Hil Gayi
Bulbule Ghul Se Mil Gayi Hasne Laga Chaman Chaman

Baad-E-Khizaa Ko Chaant Ti, Khushbu Se Sabko Aant Ti
Phirti Hai Itr Baant Ti, Baad-E-Saba Chaman Chaman

Naat Me Keelo-Kaal Ho Midhat E Zuljalaal Ho
Akbare Khush Makaal Ho Nagma-Sara Chaman Chaman

1: Aane Walo Yeh To Batao
2:
Aane Walo Yeh To Batao Sheher Madina Kaisa Hai.
Sar Unke Qadmon Mein Rakhkar Jhuk Kar Jeena Kaisa Hai...
Aane Walo Yeh To Batao Sheher Madina Kaisa Hai.

Gumbadh Khazra Ke Saaye Mein Baith Ke Tum Tu Aaye Ho...
Us Saaye Mein Rab Ke Aage Sajda Karna Kaisa Hai...
Aane Walo Yeh Tu Batao Sheher Madina Kaise Hai.

Dil Aankhein Aur Rooh Tumhaari Lagti Hai Sairab Mujhe
Dar Pe Unke Baith Ke Aabe Zam Zam Pina Kaisa Hai...
Aane Walo Yeh To Batao Sheher Madina Kaisa Hai.

Deewano Aankhon Se Tumhari Itna Pooch To Leno Do
Waqt Dua Roze Pe Unke Aansoo Bahana Kaisa Hai...
Aane Walo Yeh Tu Batao Sheher Madina Kaisa Hai...

Waqt Ruqsat Dil Ko Apne Chod Wahan Tum Aaye Ho
Yeh Batlaao Ishrat Unke Dar Se Bichad Na Kaisa Hai...
Aane Walo Yeh Tu Batao Sheher Madina Kaisa Hai.

1: Aankhen Ro Ro Ke Sujaane Wale
2:
Aankhen Ro Ro Ke Sujaane Wale
Jaane Wale Nahi Aane Waale

Koi Din Mein Yeh Saraa Oojad Hai
Are O Chauni Chaane Wale

Zabha Hote Hain Watan Se Bichde
Des Kyun Gaate Hain Gaane Wale

Are Bad Faal Buri Hoti Hai
Des Ka Jangla Sunaane Wale

Sun Le(N) Aa’da Main Bigadne Ka Nahi
Woh Salamat Hain Banaane Wale

Aankhen Kuch Kehti Hain Tujh Se Paigaam
O Dare Yaar Ke Jaane Wale

Phir Na Karwat Li Madine Ki Taraf
Are Chal Jhoote Bahaane Wale

Nafs Main Khaak Hua Tu Na Mita
Hai ! Meri Jaan Ke Khaane Wale

Jeete Kya Dekh Ke Hain Aye Hooro
Taiba Se Khuld Mein Aane Wale

Neem Jalwe Mein Do Aalam Gulzaar
Wah Wa Rang Jamaane Wale

Husn Tera Sa Na Dekha Na Suna
Kehte Hain Agle Zamaane Wale

Wohi Dhoom Un Ki Hai Masha-Allah
Mit Gaye Aap Mitaane Wale

Labe Sairaab Ka Sadqa Paani
Aye Lagi Dil Bujhaane Wale

Saath Lelo Mujhe Main Mujrim Hoon
Raah Mein Padte Hain Thaane Wale

Ho Gaya Dhak Se Kaleja Mera
Haaye Rukhsat Ki Sunaane Wale

Khalq To Kya Ki Hain Khaaliq Ko Azeez
Kuch Ajab Bhaate Hain Bhaane Wale

Kushtaye Dashte Haram Jannat Ki
Khidkiyaa(N) Apne Sirhaane Wale

Kyun Raza Aaj Gali Sooni Hai
Uth Mere Dhoom Machaane Wale

1: Aankhon Ka Taara Naame Muhammad
2:
Aankhon Ka Taara Naame Muhammed
Dil Ka Ujaala Naame Muhammed

Salla Llahu Alayhi Wa Sallam
Salla Llahu Alayhi Wa Sallam

Puche Ga Maula Laya Hein Kya Kya
Mai Ye Kahunga Naame Muhammad

Daulat Jo Chaaho Dona Jahaan Ki
Karlo Wazifa Naame Muhammed

Allah U Akbar Rab'bul Ulaane
Har Sheh Pe Likka Naame Muhammed

Roze Qayaamat Mizano Pul Par
Dega Sahaara Naame Muhammed

Pyaare Sahaba Pe Qurbaan Jaoon
Un Se Hai Seekha Naame Muhammed

Bera Tabaahi Mein Aagaya Hein
Dede Sahaara Naame Muhammed

Sheda Na Kyu Ho Is Par Musalmaan
Rab Ko Hein Pyaara Naame Muhammed

Salle Ala Ka Sehra Sajaakar
Dulha Banaaya Naame Muhammed

Paayi Muraade Donoh Jahaan Mein
Jisne Pukaara Naame Muhammed

Parti Durood E Doregi Hoore
Laasha Jo Lega Naame Muhammed

Aankhon Mein Aakar Dil Mein Samaakar
Rangat Rachaaja Naame Muhammed

Ahmed Raza Ke Qurbaan Jaoon
Jisne Sikhaaya Naame Muhammed

Hai Naam Yun To Kasrat Se Lekin
Sab Se Hai Pyaara Naame Muhammad

Saare Chaman Mein, Laakho Gulon Mein
Gul Hai Hazaara, Naame Muhammad

Moamin Ko Kyon Ho Khatra Kahin Par
Dil Par Hai Kunda, Naame Muhammad

Gham Ki Ghataaein Chaai Hain Sar Par
Kar Do Ishaara, Naame Muhammad

Rakh-Kho Lahad Mein, Jis Dam Azizo
Mujh Ko Sunaa-Na, Naame Muhammad

Apne Jameel E Razvi Ke Dil Mein
Aaja Samaaja Naame Muhammed

Apne, Jameel E Razvi, Ke Dil Par
Marham Lagaana, Naame Muhammad

1: Aankhon Ko Woh Pur Kaif Nazare Nahin Bhule
2:
Aankhon Ko Woh Pur Kaif Nazare Nahin Bhule
Woh Din Jo Madine Mein Guzare Nahin Bhule

Bechain Hai Ik Baar Uthe Phir Wohi Ungli
Mohtaab Ko Aqa Ke Ishare Nahin Bhule

Ghir Jaon Main Ji Chahe Mera Phir Se Bhanwar Mein
Aqa Ne Diye The Jo Sahare Nahin Bhule

Islam Ke Gulshan Ko Bachaya Tha Jinhon Ne
Karbal Ko Woh Zahra Ke Dulare Nahin Bhule

Taiba Ki Haseen Raat Mein Faarooqi Humari
Taqdeer Ke Chamke Jo Sitare Nahin Bhule

1: Aankhon Mein Bas Gaya Hai Madina Huzoor Ka
2:
Aankhon Mein Bas Gaya Hai Madina Huzoor Ka
Be Kas Ka Aasra Hai Madina Huzoor Ka

Phir Ja Rahe Hai Ahle Mohabbat Ke Qaafle
Phir Yaad Aa Raha Hai Madina Huzoor Ka

Taskine Jaan Hai Raahte Dil Wajeh Anbasaat
Har Dard Ki Dawa Hai, Madinah Huzoor Ka

Nabiyon Mein Jaise Afzal-O-A’ala Hai Mustafa
Shehron Mein Baadshah Hai Madina Huzoor Ka

Hai Rango Noor Jisne Diya Do Jahaan Ko
Woh Noor Ka Diya Hai, Madinah Huzoor Ka

Jab Se Qadam Pade Hai Risalat Ma’aab Ke
Jannat Se Badh Gaya Hai Madina Huzoor Ka

Har Zarra Zarra Apni Jagah Mahtaab Hai
Kya Jagmaga Raha Hai Madina Huzoor Ka

Qudsi Bhi Chumte Hai Adab Se Yahaan Ki Khaak
Qismat Mein Jhomta Hai Madina Huzoor Ka

Ho Naaz Kyun Na Is Ko Niyazi Naseeb Par
Jis Ko Bhi Mil Gaya Hai Madina Huzoor Ka

1: Aao Mere Nabi Ki Shaan Suno
2:
Aao Mere Nabi Ki Shaan Suno
Nabi Hai Bolta Qur’an Suno

Habeeb Pyaara Nazar Uthaaye To Maula Qibla Badal De
Kahi Ye Chaahat Kahi Ye Kehna Aye Moosa Aana Sambhal Ke
Khuda Hai In Pe Meherbaan Suno

Nabi Hai Bolta Qur’an Suno

Nabi Ka Sajda Hua Hai Lamba Hussain Pusht Pe Baithe
Tere Nawaase Ke Jin Ke Jode Khuda Ne Khuld Se Bheje
Hai Jibraeel Bhi Darbaan Suno

Nabi Hai Bolta Qur’an Suno

Namaze Di Thi Pachaas Rab Ne Nabi Ne Paanch Karaayi
Hai Dekho Kitna Khayale Ummat Hai Nabi Ne Baat Banaayi
Wahi Hai Arsh Ka Mehmaan Suno

Nabi Hai Bolta Qur’an Suno

Nabi Ke Aashique Bilaal E Habshi Hai Jin Ke Arsh Pe Charche
Bilaal Jab Bhi Azaan Dete Sahaba Ishq Me Rote
Bilaal E Habshi Ki Azaan Suno

Nabi Hai Bolta Qur’an Suno

Hussaini Jazba Ubhaarta Hai Ali Ke Naam Ka Naara
Yazeediyo Ko Pachadta Hai Ali Ke Naam Ka Naara
Ali Hai Mustafa Ki Shaan Suno

Nabi Hai Bolta Qur’an Suno

Nabi Ke Azmat Pe Pehra Dena Raza Ne Hum Ko Sikhaaya
Nabi Ka Dushman Hai Apna Dushman Raza Ne Hum Ko Bataya
Raza Se Ishq Ki Pehchaan Suno

Nabi Hai Bolta Qur’an Suno

Nabi Ke Nazre Rahe Ujaagar Isi Se Apna Guzaara
Nabi Ka Saaya Rahe Salaamat Yahi Hai Apna Sahaara
Nabi Ke Kitne Hai Ehsaan Suno

Nabi Hai Bolta Qur’an Suno

1: Aap Ke Darbar Se Khali Gaya Koi Nahi
2:
Aap Ke Darbar Se Khali Gaya Koi Nahi
Hain Sakhi Lakhon Yahaan Par Aap Sa Koi Nahin

Aap Ke Hote Hue Main Kyun Musibat Mein Rahon
Kya Kaheinge Log Ke Mushkil Kusha Koi Nahin

Aap Ke Dohar Mein Dono Jahaan Ki Nematein
Aap Ke Lutf-O-Karam Ki Intihaa Koi Nahin

Jab Liya Naam-E-Muhammad Mushkilein Hall Ho Gayin
Kaun Kehta Hai Ke Tere Naam Ka Assar Nahin

Aye Darbar Dar-E-Yaar-E-Muhammad Aasiyo
Aitaraf-E-Jurm Karlo To Sazzaa Koi Nahin

Kaun Buje Aye Niyazi Dard-E-Dil Ka Majira
Hub-E-Muhammad Hai Humara Aasraa Koi Nahin

Aap Ke Darbar Se Khali Gaya Koi Nahi
Hain Sakhi Lakhon Yahaan Par Aap Sa Koi Nahin

1: Aap Mehmaan Huwe La Makaan Ke
2:
Aap Mehmaan Huwe La Makaan Ke
Mustafa Mustafa Ho Mubarak

Arshe Haq Se Bhi Aage Gaye Mustafa
Jagmagane Lage Hai Makaa La Makaa
Shah Dulha Bane Shamiyane Lage
Shadiyaane Baje Hai Makaa La Makaa

Choome Jibreel Ne Mustafa Ke Qadam
Aur Kaha Ba Adab Chaliye Shahe Umam
Aap Mehmaan Hai Khaas Meraj Ke
Aur Sajaaye Gaye Hai Makaa La Makaa

Aaj Hooron Malak Saare Jinno Bashar
Kya Shajar Kya Hajar Kya Hai Shams O Qamar
Manzile Udnu Minni Pe Sarkaar Hai
Ye Sada De Rahe Hai Makaa La Makaa

Munham Ik Naat Me Ambiya Sab Ke Sab
Aur Aqsaame Phir Ambiya Saf Ba Saf
Zebo Zeenat Bhi Jannat Ki Badhne Lagi
Aur Sajne Lage Hai Makaa La Makaa

Aqle Insaan Kya Samjhe Is Raaz Ko
Waqiya Hai Ujaagar Khirad Se Wara
Sayyidul Ambiya Pohche Is Shaan Se
Sir Jhukaate Rahe Hai Makaa La Makaa

1: Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya
2:
Ya Rasula Llah, Ya Habiba Llah
Salla Alayka Ya Rasula Llah

Wa Sallam Alayka Ya Habiba Llah
Ahlan Wa Sahlan Marhaba, Ya Rasula Llah

Charoon Taraf Noor Chahya Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya
Khushiyon Ka Pegham Laya Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya

Shams-O-Qamar Aur Taaray Kyun Na Ho Khush Aaj Saaray
Unse Hee Tou Noor Paaya Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya

Khushiyan Manatay Hain Wohi Dhoomein Machatay Hain Wohi
Jinn Per Hua Unka Saaya Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya

Ghar Ko Sajatay Hain Wohi, Jhanday Lehratay Hain Wohi,
Jin Par Hua Unka Saaya, Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya

Hai Shaad Har Ek Musalmaan Karta Hai Ghar Ghar Charaghaan
Galiyun Ko Bhi Jagmagaya Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya

Mukhtar-E-Kul Maanay Jou Unhe Noori Bashar Jaanay Jou Unhe
Naara Ussi Ne Lagaya Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya

Jou Aaj Mehfil Mein Aaye Mun Ki Muradein Woh Paaye
Sab Par Karam Ho Khudaya Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya

Ghous Ul Wara Aur Data Ne Mere Raza Aur Khuwaja Ne
Sab Ne Hee Din Ye Manaya Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya

Naat-E-Nabi Tum Sunao Ishq-E-Nabi Ko Barhao
Hum Ko Raza Ne Sikhaya Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya

Jiss Ko Shajar Jaantay Hain Kehna Hajar Maantay Hain
Aisa Nabi Hum Ne Paaya Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya

Dil Jagmaganay Lagay Hain Sab Muskaranay Lagay Hain
Ik Kaif Sa Aaj Chahya Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya

Kar Ae Ubaid Unki Midhat Tujh Per Khuda Ki Ho Rehmat
Tu Ne Muqqadar Ye Paaya Aaqa Ka Milad Aaya

1: Aaqa Ke Ghulamo Ko Ab Eid Manane Do
2:
Aaqa Ke Ghulamo Ko Ab Eid Manane Do
Sarkaar Ki Aamad Hai Raaho Ko Sajane Do

Charcha Hai Yahi Har-Su Kehte Hai Ye Har Koi
Tashreef Nabi Laye Mehfil Ko Sajane Do

Ghar Ghar Ye Charaga Hai Rehmat Ka Ujala Hai
Aaqa Ki Sana Karke Taqdeer Jagane Do

Khushiya Hai Sabhi Karte Sarkaar Ki Aamad Par
Ik Naat E Nabi Yaaro Mujhko Bhi Sunane Do

Payda Jo Huwey Sarwar Buth Khaaney Ke Buth Toote
Anwaar-E-Ilahi Se Qismat Ko Jagaaney Do

Gowdi Main Aminah Key Woh Noor-E-Mujasam Hai
Kehti Hain Halimah Bhi Qurbaan Ho Jaane Do

Hai Noor E Muhammad Ki Sab Roushni Duniya Me
Sab Kuch Hai Basheer Unka Sadqa To Lutane Do

1: Aaqa Meriyan Akhiyan Madine Wich Reh Gayan
2:
Oh Shehar Madina Jad Main Takeya
Mere Thand Pai Gayi Vich Sinay
Othay Main Reh Ke Aa Gaya Sadiq
Akhan Reh Giyan Shehar Madinay

Aaqa Meriyan Akhiyan Madine Wich Reh Gayan
Muk Gaya Visa Tay Judaiyan Phir Pai Gaiyan

Tusan Te Menoon Dar Te Sadeya, Wele Mainu Shehroon Kadiya
Tere Dar Diyan Sohniyan Yaadan, Aaqa Mera Saath Na Chadeya
Nit Diyan Sochan Hun, Jind Meri Legaiyan

Aabe Zamzam Peende Reyan, Do Din Sukh Naal Jeende Reyan
Tere Ghar Di Chaukat De Assi, Mangte Roz Sadende Reyan
Mangiyan Muraadan Si Jo, Chauli Meri Pai Gaiyan

Phir Main Wekhan Roza Tera, Soh Rab Di Dil Karda Mera
Je Kidre Manzoori Howe, Laalaan Othe Pakka Dera
Lakhan Majburiyan Ne, Rawan Wich Pai Gaiyan

Aaqa Teri Shaan Nu Wekhan, Chuk De Kul Jahaan Nu Wekhan
Jere Tere Kol Ne Suthe, Umar, Siddique, Usman Nu Wekhan
Jina Tere Kadman Wich, Thaawan Aaqa Le Laiyan

Jad Main Takya Sher E Madina, Roshan Hogeya Mera Seena
Soh Salaan Tu Wadh Lagda Si Pawein Si Oh Ik Maheena
Sadiq Ghumbad E Khazra Tak Ke, Tandan Mainoon Pai Gaiyan

Aaqa Meriyan Akhiyan Madine Wich Reh Gayan
Muk Gaya Visa Te Judaiyan Phir Pai Gaiyan

1: Aarize Shamso Qamar Se Bhi Hain Anwar Ediyaan
2:
Aarize Shamso Qamar Se Bhi Hain Anwar Ediyaa(N)
Arsh Ki Aankhon Ke Taare Hain Woh Khushtar Ediyaa(N)

Jaa Bajaa Partau Figan Hain Aasmaa(N) Par Ediyaa(N)
Din Ko Hain Khursheed Shab Ko Maaho Akhtar Ediyaa(N)

Najme Gardoo(N) To Nazar Aate Hain Chote Aur Woh Paau
Arsh Par Phir Kyun Na Ho(N) Mahsoos Laagar Ediyaa(N)

Dab Ke Zere Paa Na Gunjaaish Samane Ko Rahi
Ban Gaya Jalwa Kafe Paa Ka Ubhar Ka Ediyaa(N)

Unka Mangta Paau Se Thukra De Woh Duniya Ka Taj
Jis Ki Khatir Mar Gaye Mun’am Ragad Kar Ediyaa(N)

Do Qamar, Do Panjaye Khur, Do Sitaare, Dus Hilaal
Unke Talwe, Panje, Nakhun, Paaye Athar Ediyaa(N)

Haaye Us Patthar Se Us Seene Ki Qismat Fodiye
Be Takalluf Jis Ke Dil Mein Yu(N) Kare(N) Ghar Ediyaa(N)

Taaje Roohul Quds Ke Moti Jise Sajda Kare(N)
Rakhti Hain Wallah Woh Paakeeza Gohar Ediyaa(N)

Ek Thokar Me Uhud Ka Zalzala Jaata Raha
Rakhti Hain Kitna Waqaar Allahu Akbar Ediyaa(N)

Charkh Par Chadte Hi Chandi Mein Siyahi Aa Gayi
Kar Chuki Hai Badr Ko Taksaal Bahar Ediyaa(N)

Aye Raza Toofane Mehshar Ke Talatum Se Na Dar
Shaad Ho! Hain Kashtiye Ummat Ko Langar Ediyaa(N)

1: Aarzooein Kaisi Hain Kaash Yun Huaa Hotaa
2:
Aarzooein Kaisi Hain Kaash Yun Huaa Hotaa
Bu Jehel Ke Haathon Mein Kankari Banaa Hotaa
Apne Aaqa Ke Aage Kalima Tou Padhaa Hota
Ghayb Daa(N) Nabi Ka Eik Mo’jizaa Banaa Hotaa

Aarzooein Kaisi Hain Kaash Yun Huaa Hotaa

Mein Bhi Kaabe Ki Chatt Per Buth Banaa Khadaa Hotaa
Aaqa Ke Ishaare Per Ondhaa Giraa Hotaa
Aur Unnke Qadmon Ka Bosaa Le Liyaa Hotaa
Khaake Paaye Aqdass Ka Hissa Bann Gayaa Hotaa

Aarzooein Kaisi Hain Kaash Yun Huaa Hotaa

Kaash Mein Haleema Ki Bakri Hee Rahaa Hotaa
Aaqa Mujhko Le Jaate, Bann Mein Charr Rahaa Hotaa
Doodh Dohtey Aaqa Apne Daste Aqdass Se
Aaj Tak Muqaddar Per Naaz Kar Rahaa Hotaa

Aarzooein Kaisi Hain Kaash Yun Huaa Hotaa

Eik Chattan Ki Soorat Kaash Mein Rahaa Hotaa
Aaqa Paaon Rakh Dete, Moum Bann Gayaa Hotaa
Noori Aqs Qadmon Ka Dil Mein Bhar Liyaa Hotaa
Unnke Jaannisaaron Ke Dil Mein Bass Gayaa Hotaa

Aarzooein Kaisi Hain Kaash Yun Huaa Hotaa

Kaash Apne Aaqa Ka Na’ale Paak Hee Hotaa
Hamaa Waqt Qadmon Se Liptaa Hi Rahaa Hotaa
Jabb Kabhi Mein Phatt Jaata, Apne Haath Se Guth-Te
Taajdaaron Ke Sarr Ka Taaj Bann Gayaa Hotaa

Aarzooein Kaisi Hain Kaash Yun Huaa Hotaa

Nazmi Tum Tou Bhole Ho, Aisaa Kiyun Huaa Hotaa
Aale Faatima Honaa Rabb Ne Jabb Likhaa Hotaa
Ahle Bayt Mein Honaa Rabb Ne Jabb Likhaa Hotaa
Aale Mustafa Honaa Rabb Ne Jabb Likhaa Hotaa

Aarzooein Kaisi Hain Kaash Yun Huaa Hotaa

1: Aaya Hai Bulawa Mujhe Darbar E Nabi Se
2:
Paigham Saba Layi Hai Yeh Gulzaar E Nabi Se
Aaya Hai Bulawa Mujhe Darbar E Nabi Se

Har Aah Gaee Arsh Peh Yeh Aah Ki Qismat
Har Ashk Peh Ik Khuld He Her Ashk Ki Qimat

Tohfa Yeh Mila He Mujhe Sarkar E Nabi Se
Aaya Hai Bulawa Mujhe Darbar E Nab Se

Shukar Khuda Ke Aaj Ghadi Us Safar Ki Hai
Jis Par Nisaar Jaan Falah O Zafar Ki Hai

Garmi Hai Tap Hai Dard Hai Kulfat Safar Ki Hai
Na Shukr Yeh Toh Dekh Azimat Kidhar Ki Hai

Uske Tufail Hajj Bhi Khuda Ne Karadiye
Asle Muraad Haazri Us Paak Dar Ki Hai

Kaabe Ka Naam Tak Na Liya Taiba Hi Kaha
Poocha Tha Hum Se Jiss Ne Ki Nuhzat Kidhar Ki Hai

Kaalak Jabhi Ki Sajda E Darr Se Churaoge
Mujh Ko Bhi Le Chalo Yeh Tamanna Hajar Kee He

Dooba Huwa Hai Shoq Mai Zamzam Aur Ankh Se
Jaahle Baras Rahe Hai Yeh Hasrat Kidhar Ki Hai

Aaghosh E Showk Khole He Jin Ke Liye Hateem
Woh Phir Ke Dekhthe Nahi Ke Yeh Dhun Kidhar Ki Hai

Ha Ha Raahe Madina Hai Gafil Zara Toh Jaag
O Pao Rakhne Waale Yeh Jaa Chasm O Sar Ki Hai

Waaru Qadam Qadam Pe Ke Har Dum Hai Jaan No
Yeh Raah E Jaan Fiza Mere Maula Ke Dar Ki Hai

Allahu Akbar Apne Qadam Aur Yeh Khak E Paak
Hasrat Malaaika Ko Jahan Wazhe Sar Ki Hai

Meraj Ka Sama Hai Kaha Pohnche Zahiro
Kursi Sai Oonchi Kursi Isi Paak Ghar Ki Hai

Sattar Hazaar Subho Hai Sattar Hazaar Shaam
Yuh Bandagi E Zulf O Rukh Aatho Pahar Ki Hai

Joh Ek Baar Aye Dobara Na Ayenge
Rukhsat Hi Bargah Se Bus Is Qadar Ki Hai

Tadpa Kare Badal Ke Phir Aana Kaha Naseeb
Be Hukm Kab Majhal Parinde Ko Par Ki Hai

Maasum Ko Hai Umar Mai Sirf Ek Baar Baar
Aasi Pare Rahe To Salah Umar Bhar Ki Hai

Zinda Rahe Toh Hazri E Baargah Naseeb
Mar Jaye Toh Hayat E Abad Esh Ghar Ki Hai

Kaaba Dulhan Hai Turbat E Athar Nayi Dulhan
Yeh Rashk E Aftab Woh Ghairat Qamar Ki Hai

Uf Be Hayaiya Ke Yeh Munh Aur Tere Huzur
Ha Tu Karim Hai Teri Khoo Dar Guzar Ki Hai

Arsh E Bari Pe Kyu Na Ho Firdous Ka Dimaag
Utri Huwi Shabih Tere Baam Odar Ki Hai

Lab Wah Hai Ankhe Bandh Hai Faili Hai Johliya
Kitne Maze Ki Bheekh Tere Paak Dar Ki Hai

Maange Ge Maange Jayege Munh Mangi Payenge
Sarkar Mai Na Laa Hai Na Hajat Agar Ki Hai

Mangta Ka Haath Uthte Hi Daata Ki Dain Hai
Doori Qubul O Arz Me Bus Haath Bhar Ki Hai

Jannah Na De Na De Teri Rooyat Ho Khair Se
Iss Ghul Ke Aage Kis Ho Hawas Barg O Bar Ki Hai

Sharbat Na De Na De Toh Kare Baat Lutf Se
Ye Shahad Ho Toh Phir Kise Parwa Shakar Ki Hai

Aa Kuch Suna De Ishq Ke Bolo Me Aye Raza
Mushtaq Taba Lazzat E Soaz E Jigar Ki Hai

1: Aaya Hoon Ban Ke Saail Sultan E Do Jahaan
2:
Aaya Hoon Ban Ke Saa-Il Sultan E Do Jahaan
Rehmat Ho Phir Se Maa-Il Sultan E Do Jahaan

Izzo Waqaar Dedo Islam O Muslimeen Ko
Mit Jaayain Saare Baatil Sultan E Do Jahaan

Bekas Hoon Naatawaan Hoon Dar Par Main Aagaya Hoon
Mo’min Banaado Kaamil Sultan E Do Jahaan

Maujon Ke Ranj O Gham Mein Kashti Hai Yeh Phansee Hai
Mujh Ko ‘ataa Ho Saahil Sultan E Do Jahaan

Apni Wilaa Me Mujh Ko Aisa Guma Do Aaqa
Khud Sey Rahoon Main Gaafil Sultan E Do Jahaan

Duniya Ke Shar Sey Mujh Ko Behr E Khudaa Bachaalo
Daaman Me Karlo Daakhil Sultan E Do Jahaan

Ban Ke Gadaa Hoon Haazir Nazr E Karam Ho Naazir
Deedaar Ab Ho Haasil Sultan E Do Jahaan

Jumla Muballigeen Ko Khairaat E ‘ilm Dedo
Sunnat Ke Sab Ho ‘aamil Sultan E Do Jahaan

Tehreek Sunni Dawat E Islami Ko Hamesha
Nazron Me Karlo Shaamil Sultan E Do Jahaan

Shaikhain Ka Tasadduq ‘ilm E Ladunni Dedo
Khashiyat Ho Rab Ki Haasil Sultan E Do Jahaan

Dar Pe Bulaate Rehna Bigdi Banaate Rehna
Izzat Rahe Yeh Haasil Sultan E Do Jahaan

Giryan Hai Qalb E Shakir Kardo Karam Bhi Waafir
Apnon Me Karlo Shaamil Sultan E Do Jahaan

1: Aaya Ramzaan Ka Mahina Khafila Chala Soo-E-Madina
2:
Aaya Ramzaan Ka Mahina Khafila Chala Soo-E-Madina
Mujhe Bhi Do Izn-E-Madina Aane Ki Sarkare Madina

Mujhe Na Aaya Bulawa Kitni Hai Dil Me Tamanna
Kash Aqa Mai Bhi Dekh Leta Bahar-E-Ramzaan-E-Madina

Meri Qismat Ko Bhi Khudara Tum Sajana
Hasnain Ke Sadqe Me Dikhana Baar Baar Madina

Kahaan Jaun Kahaan Daman Pasaroon Mai Malik-E-Madina
Aas Lagai Hamne Tumhare Dar Se Ae Shahinsha-E-Madina

Kaheen Aisa Na Ho Seene Me Dafn Karke Gham-E-Madina
Mai Duniya Se Chala Jaon Bin Deed Ke Madina

Ghamaun Ke Sailab Me Dooba Jaraha Hoon Sultan-E-Madina
Lillah Imdad Ko Aao Meri Sarwar-E-Madina

Iss Saal Zaroor Mujh Aasi Ko Sarkar Bulana
Rauda-E-Anwar Aur Gumbade Khizra Dikhana

Chamka Kar Meri Aankhaun Ko Jalwa Dikha Dena
Dekh Loon Aankh Bharke Tum Ko Shahe Madina

Duniya Ki Mohabbat Dil Se Nikal Jae Aqa-E-Madina
Rahe Chashm-E-Nam Dil Me Bas Gham-E-Madina

Maana Ke Nahi Qabil Hoon Jo Dekhoon Tumhara Madina
Phir Laoon Kahaan Se Wo Aamal Mai Sarkar-E-Madina

Nahi Jaber Ke Paas Koi Zar Jo Dekhe Pyara Madina
Itna To Ho Karam Khabaun Me Ise Dikhado Madina

2:

Aaye Muhammad Rahmatan Wale

1: Ab Kahan Jaon Tarap Ke
2:
Ab Kahan Jaon Tarap Ke
Dil Ki Yeh Khwahish Nikaal
Ae Madine Ki Zameen
Meri Bhi Gunja-Ish Nikaal

Ae Rahe Ishq E Nabi
Kar Ke Fanah Tak Rahbari
Mujh Se Aasi Ki Bhi Koi
Soorat E Bakhshish Nikaal

Aye Fiza Taiba Ki Mere
Gird Halqa Khench Kar
Mudat E Umr E Rawan Se
Arsa E Gardish Nikaal

Bargah E Mustafa Mein
Dil Se Yeh Aai Sada
Aaj Ki Taareekh Se

Nama E Pursish Nikaal

1: Ab Meri Nigahon Mein Jachta Nahi Koi
2:
Ab Meri Nigahon Mein Jachta Nahi Koi
Jaisay Meray Sarkaar Hain Waisa Nahi Koi

Tumsa To Hasin Aankh Ne, Dekha Nahin Koi
Yeh Shaane Lataafat Hai, Ke Saaya Nahin Koi

Aey Zarfe Nazar Dekh, Magar Dekh Adab Se
Sarkaar Ka Jalwah Hai, Tamaasha Nahin Koi

Yeh Tajrubaa-E Imaan Hai, Aey Rehmate Aa鱈am
Fariyaad Tumhaare Siwa Sunta Nahin Koi

Yeh Toor Se Kehti Hai Abhi Tak Shabe Me坦aaj
Didaar Ki Taaqat Ho To Parhdah Nahin Koi

Woh Aankh Jo Roti Hai Ghame Ishqe Nabi Mein
Us Aankh Se Ruposh To Jalwah Nahin Koi

Socho To Kabhi Nisbate Rehmat Ke Nataaij
Taslim Ke Hum Logon Mein Ach-Cha Nahin Koi

Shamshir Wasila Hai Sipar Rehmate Haqq Hai
Sarkaar Ki Ummat Mein Nihatta Nahin Koi

Bekaar Hai Har Waar Tera Gardishe Dauraan
Woh Humdamo Gham Khwaar Hain Tanha Nahin Koi

Ezaaz Yeh Haasil Hai To, Haasil Hai Zamin Ko
Aflaak Pe To Gumbade Khazra Nahin Koi

Hota Hai Jahaan Zikr Muhammad Ke Karam Ka
Us Bazmein Mehrume Tamanna Nahin Koi

Darmaan-E Ghamo Dardo Shifaa-E Dile Bimaar
Juz Aap Ke Aey Jaane Masiha Nahin Koi

Sarkaar Ki Rehmat Ne, Magar Khoob Nawaaza
Yeh Sach Hai Ke, Khalid Sa Nikamma Nahin Koi

1: Ab To Bas Ek Hi Dhun Hai Ke Madina Dekhoon
2:
Akhri Waqt Me Kya Raunaq E Duniya Dekhun
Ab To Bas Ek Hi Dhun Hai Ke Madina Dekhun

Aqibat Meri Sawar Jaye Jo Taiba Dekhun
Dast-E-Imroz Me Aiyinaye Farda Dekhun

Jaliyan Dekhun Ke Deewar-O-Dar-O-Baam E Haram
Apni Mazoor Nigahon Se Main Kya Kya Dekhun

Main Kahan Hoon Ye Samajh Loon To Uthaun Nazren
Dil Zara Sambhle To Main Janib-E-Khazra Dekhun

Maine Jin Ankhon Se Dekha Hai Kabhi Shahr-E-Nabi
Aur In Ankhon Se Ab Kya Koi Jalwa Dekhun

Mere Maula Meri Ankhen Mujhe Wapas Kar De
Take Is Baar Main Jee Bhar Ke Madina Dekhun

Jin Gali Kuncho Me Guzre Ho Kabhi Mere Huzoor
In Me Ta-Hatte Nazar Naqshe Kafe Paa Dekhun

Take Ankhon Ka Bhi Ehsaan Utana Na Pare
Qalb Khud Aiyina Ban Jaye Mai Itna Dekhun

Kash Iqbal Yunhi Umr Basar Ho Meri
Subah Kaabe Me Ho Aur Sham Ko Taiba Dekhun

Apni Be Noor Nigahon Se Mai Kya Kya Dekhun
Ab To Bas Ek Hi Dhun Hai Ke Madina Dekhun

1: Adrikni Ya Rasoolallah
2:
Qallat Hee Lati Anta Waseelati Adrikni Ya Rasoolallah
Adrikni Ya Rasoolallah Adrikni Ya Rasoolallah

Ghatayein Gham Ki Chaayein Dil Pareshan Ya Rasoolallah
Tumhi Ab Kuch Karo Maah-E-Risalat Ya Rasoolallah

Ghatayein Gham Ki Chaayein Dil Pareshan Ya Rasoolallah
Tumhi Ho Mere Dard-O-Dukh Ka Darmaan Ya Rasoolallah

Safeenay Ke Parakhchay Urr Chukkay Hain Zor-E-Tufaan Se
Sambhalo Mein Bhi Dooba Aey Meri Jaan Ya Rasoolallah

Gunahoon Ki Nahi Jaatei Hai Aadat Ya Rasoolallah
Tumhi Ab Kuch Karo Maah-E-Risalat Ya Rasoolallah

Mein Bachna Chahta Hoon Haaye Phir Bhi Bach Nahi Paata
Gunahoon Ki Parri Hai Aisi A?adat Ya Rasoolallah

Humein Haryalay Gumbad Ke Tallay Qadmon Mein Maut Aaye
Salamat Lekay Jaayein Deen-O-Imaan Ya Rasoolallah

Mujhe Marna Hai Aaqa Gumbad-E-Khizra Ke Saaye Mein
Watan Mein Margaya Tou Kia Karoonga Ya Rasoolallah

Bohot Kamzoor Hoon Qabil Nahi Hargiz Azaboon Ke
Khudara Saath Letay Jaana Jannat Ya Rasoolallah

Yahan Jaisay Hamari A?eb Pooshi Aap Kartay Hain
Wahan Bhi Aap Rakhlejiyega Izzat Ya Rasoolallah

Mera Ye Khuwaab Hojaye Shaha Sharminda-E-Ta?beer
Madinay Mein Piyoon Jaam-E-Shahadat Ya Rasoolallah

Madina Meetha Meetha Hai Madina Pyara Pyara Hai
Madinay Se Mujhe Beyhud Hai Ulfat Ya Rasoolallah

Meri Har Dharkan-E-Dil Se Madinay Ki Sada Niklay
Rahay Zikr-E-Madina Lub Pe Har Dam Ya Rasoolallah

Shaha Attar Per Har Aan Rehmat Ki Nazar Rakhna
Karay Din Raat Buss Sunnat Ki Khidmat Ya Rasoolallah

Shaha Attar Ko Dou Gaz Madinay Mein Zameen Dejiye
Waheen Ho Dafn Tera Ye Sana Khuwaan Ya Rasoolallah

1: Ae Sabz Gumbad Wale Manzoor Dua Karna
2:
Ae Sabz Gumbad Wale Manzoor Dua Karna
Jab Waqt E Nazah Aye Deedar Ataa Karna

Ya Dar Pe Bula Lena Ya Khawab Main Aa Jana
Ae Parda Nasheen Dil Ke Parde Mein Raha Kerna
Jab Waqt E Nazah Aye Deedar Aata Karna

1: Aey Ishq E Nabi Meray Dil Mein Bhi Sama Jaana
2:
Ae Ishq-E-Nabi Meray Dil Mein Bhi Sama Jana
Mujh Ko Bhe Muhammad(S.a.w) Ka Deewana Bana Jana

Jo Rang Kay Jami Par Roomi Pey Charhaya Tha
Us Rang Ki Kuch Rangat Mujh Pay Bhi Charha Jana

Qudrat Ki Nigahein Bhe Jis Chehra E Anwar Ko Taktee Hein
Us Chehra E Anwar Ka Deedaar Kara Jana

Jis Khwab Mey Ho Jaey Deedaar E Nabi(S.a.w) Hasil
Aey Ishq Kabhi Mujh Ko Neend Aesi Sula Jana

Ae Kaash Riyaaz Aey Pegham Madina Paak Say
Sarkar(S.a.w) Bulatay Hein, Tum Naat Suna Jana

Deedaar E Muhammad(S.a.w) Ki Hasrat To Rahey Baki
Juz Is Key Har Ik Hasrat Is Dil Sey Mita Jana

Duniya Sey Niyaaz Ho Jab Uqbaa Ki Taraf Jaana
Daagh-E-Gham-E-Ahmad Sey Seeneh Ko Sajaa Jaana

1: Aey Mawla Ik Baar Dikhadey Jalwa Kamli Waley Ka
2:
Aey Mawla, Ik Baar Dikhadey Jalwa Kamli Waley Ka
Tan Man Wara Jis Ney Deykha Chehra Kamli Waley Ka

Ghaus Qutb Abdaal Kalandar, Sab Unkey Gun Gaathey Hai
Farshain Zameen Par Arshay Bareen Par, Charcha Kamli Waley Ka

Qabr Mey Jab Poonchein Gey Farishtey Apna Ta'ruf Peysh Karo
Tho Keh Dun Ga Unsey, Keh Mey Hun Mangta Pyaray Aqa Ka

Har Neymat Deyta Hai Khuda, Par Waar Keh Un Par Deta Hai
Khataa Hai Alam Sara Sadqah Kamli Waley Ka

Ho Gi Talab Meri Yeh Puri, Duur Woh Karein Gey Wo Duuri
Insha'allah Ham Deykhein Gey Rowza Kamli Waley Ka

1: Agar Koi Apna Bhala Bhahta Hai
2:
Agar Koi Apna Bhala Chahta Hai
Usey Chahe Jisko, Khuda Chahta Hai

Durood Un Pe Bejo Salaam Un Pe Bejo
Yahi Momino Se, Khuda Chahta Hai

Khuda Ki Raza, Mustafa Chahtey Hai
Khuda Mustafa Ki, Raza Chahta Hai

Faqiron Ke Malja, Yeh Mangta Tumhara
Madine Mein Thori, Silja Chahta Hai

Banaley Mujhey Apna Mehman Aaqa
Yeh Har Aik Shaho Ghada Chahta Hai.

Sana Khwan Banaya, Sana Go Banaya
Sahi Dum Se Tu, Aur Kya Chahta Hai

Karey Khuld Hasil Habib E Khuda Ka,
Jo Insaan Kurbe Khuda Chahta Hai

Agar Koi Apna Bhala Chahta Hai
Usey Chahi Jisko, Khuda Chahta Hai

1: Ahle Siraat Ruhe Ameen Ko Khabar Karen
2:
Ahle Siraat Ruhe Ameen Ko Khabar Karen

Kilke Raza Hai Khanjare Khu-Khwar Barq-Baar

2:

1: Aisa Tujhe Khaliq Ne Tarahdaar Banaya
2:
Aisa Tujhe Khaliq Ne Tarahdaar Banaya
Yusuf Ko Tera Taalibe Dedaar Banaya

Tal’at Se Zamane Ko Pur Anwaar Banaya
Nikhat Se Gali Kucho Ko Gulzaar Banaya

Deewaro Ko Aaina Banate Hai Wo Jalwe
Aaino Ko Jin Jalwo Ne Deewar Banaya

Aye Nazme Risalat Ke Chamakte Hue Makte
Tune Hi Use Matlaaye Anwaar Banaya

Kaunain Banaye Gaye Sarkar Ki Khatir
Kounain Ki Khatir Tumhe Sarkar Banaya

Kunji Tumhe Di Apne Khazano Ki Khuda Ne
Mehboob Kiya Maalik O Mukhtaar Banaya

Allah Ki Rehmat Hai Ke Aise Ki Ye Kismat
Aasi Ka Tumhe Haami O Gamkhaar Banaya

Aainaye Zaate Ahadi Aaphi Thehre
Wo Husn Diya Aisa Tarahdaar Banaya

Anwaar Tajalli Se Wo Kuch Hairate Chaayi
Sab Aaino Ko Pusht Badewaar Banaya

Aalam Ke Salateen Bhikari Hai Bhikari
Sarkar Banaya Tumhe Sarkar Banaya

Ye Lazzate Pa Bos Ke Paththar Ne Jigar Me
Nakshe Qadame Sayyed E Abrar Banaya

Khuddam To Bande Hai Tere Husne Khalk Ke
Pyare Tujhe Badkharo Ka Gamkhaar Banaya

Be Parda Wo Jab Khaak Nasheeno Me Nikal Aaye
Har Zarre Ko Khursheede Pur Anwaar Banaya

Aye Maahe Arab Mehre Ajam Mai Tere Sadqe
Zulmat Ne Mere Din Ko Shabe Taar Banaya

Lillah Karam Mere Bhi Veeranaye Dil Par
Sehra Ko Tere Husn Ne Gulzaar Banaya

Allah Ta’ala Bhi Hua Uska Tarafdaar
Sarkar Tumhe Jisne Tarafdaar Banaya

Gulzaar Jinaa Tere Liye Haq Ne Banaaye
Apne Liye Tera Gule Gulzaar Banaya

Be Yaar O Madadgaar Jinhe Koi Na Pooche
Aiso Ka Tujhe Yaar O Madadgaar Banaya

Har Baat Bad Amaliyon Se Maine Hai Bigaadi
Aur Tumne Meri Bigdi Ko Har Baar Banaya

Us Jalwaaye Rangeen Ka Tasadduk Tha Ke Jisne
Firdaus Ke Har Takht Ko Gulzaar Banaya

Us Roohe Mujassam Ke Tabarruk Ne Masiha
Jaan Bakhsh Tumhe Yu Dame Guftaar Banaya

Us Chehraye Pur Noor Ki Wo Bheek Thi Jisne
Mehrooma Wo Anjum Ko Pur Anwaar Banaya

Un Haatho Ka Jalwa Tha Ye Aye Hazrat E Moosa
Jisne Yadi Biza Ko Ziya Baar Banaya

Unke Labe Rangi Ki Nichawar Thi Wo Jisne
Paththar Me Husn Laalaye E Pur Anwaar Banaya

1: Ajab Rang Par Hain Bahaar E Madina
2:
Ajab Rang Par Hain Bahaar E Madina
Ke Sab Jannatein Hain Nisaar E Madina
Sarkaar Ka Madina Sarkaar Ka Madina
Sarkaar Ka Madina Sarkaar Ka Madina

Suhaana Suhaana Dulaara Madina
Har Aashiq Ki Aankho Ka Taara Madina
Pahado Pe Di Husn Kaate Bhi Dil Kash
Hai Qudrat Ne Kaisa Sawaara Madina

Khula Hain Sabhi Ke Liye Baab E Rehmat
Wahan Koi Rutbe Mein Adna Na Aali
Muraadon Se Daaman Nahi Koi Khaali
Qitare Lagaye Khade Hai Suwaali

Main Pehle Pehel Jab Madine Gaya Tha
To Thi Dil Ki Haalat Tadap Jaane Wali
Wo Darbaar Sach Much Mere Saamne Tha
Abhi Tak Tasavvur Tha Jiska Khayali

Main Ek Haath Se Dil Sambhale Hue Tha
To Thi Dusre Haath Me Thi Unki Jaali
Dua Ke Liye Haath Uthte To Kaise
Na Ye Haath Khaali Na Wo Haath Khaali

Jo Poocha Kisi Ne Ke Tum Nazr Karne
Ko Kya Le Gaya Tha To Tafseel Sun Lo,
Tha Naaton Ka Ek Haar Ashkon Ke Moti,
Duroodon Ka Gajra, Salaamon Ki Daali

Yahaan Pyaara Kaaba, Wahaan Sabz Gumbad
Ye Makkah Bhi Meetha To Pyaara Madina
Khuda Gar Qayamat Me Farmaye Maango
Lagaayenge Deewane Naara Madina

Madina Madina Humara Madina
Hume Jaan O Dil Se Hai Pyara Madina
Suhana Suhana Dilara Madina
Har Aashiq Ki Aankhon Ka Taara Madina

Pahado Pe Bhi Husn, Kaante Bhi Dilkush
Hain Qudrat Ne Kaise Sawaara(N) Madina
Khuda Gar Qayamat Mein Farmaye Maango
Lagayenge Deewane Naara Madina

Rage Ghul Ki Jab Naazuki Dekhta Hu
Mujhe Yaad Aate Hain Khaar E Madina
Mubarak Rahe Andalibo Tumhe Gull
Hume Gull Se Behtar Hain Kahaar E Madina

Rahe Unke Jalwe Base Unke Jalwe
Mera Dil Bane Yaadgaar E Madina
Murad E Dil Bul Bule Be Nawade
Khudaya Dikha De Bahaar E Madina

Jidhar Dekhiye Baage Jannat Khula Hai
Nazar May Hai Naqsh O Nigaar E Madina
Sharaf Jinse Haasil Hua Ambiya Ko
Wahi Hai Hasan Iftekhaar E Madina.

1: Ajj Sik Mitraan Di Wadheri Aey
2:
Ajj Sik Mitraan Di Wadheri Aey
Keyoon Dilrhii Udaas Gharii Aey
Loon Loon Wich Showq Changerii Aey
Ajj Nennan Laayaan Keyon Jarhyaan

Mukh Chand Badar Sha'shaanii Aey
Mathey Chankey Laat Nooraanii Aey
Kaalii Zulf Te Akh Mastaanii Aey
Makhmoor Akheen Han Mad Bharyaan

Do Abro Kos Misal Day Saan
Jadoon Nokay Mujhday Teer Chutan
Laban Surkh Akhan Kay Lal E Yaman
Chitay Dan Moti Diyan Hen Lariyan

Is Soorat Noon Main Jaan Aakhaan
Jaanaan Kih Jaan-E-Jahaan Aakhaan
Sach Aakhaan Te Rab De Main Shaan Aakhaan
Jis Shaan Theen Shaanaan Sab Banyaan

Aehaa Soorat Shaalaa Pesh-E-Nazar
Rahey Waqt-E-Naz'a Te Roz-E-Hashar
Wich Qabar De Pul Theen Jad Hosii Quzar
Sab Khotiyaan Thiisan Tadh Kharyaan

Laaho Mukh Theen Mukhttat Burde Yaman
Man Bhaanwrii Jhalak Dekhaa'o Sajan
Ohaa Mithiyaan Gaaleen Alaao Mithan
Jo Hamraa Waadii San Karyaan

Aenaan Sikhdiyaan Te Kurlandiyaan Te
Lakh Waarii Sadqey Jandiyaan Te
Aenaan Burdiyaan Muft Wekaandiyan Te
Shaalaa Wat Wi Aawan Oh Gharhyaan

Subhan'allah Maa Ajmalaka
Maa Ahsanaka Maa Akmalaka
Kithey Mehar Ali Kithey Terii Sanaa
Gustakh Akheen Kithey Jaa Larhyaan

1: Akhee Sohnay Nuu Waye Nee
2:
Akhee Sohnay Nuu Waye Nee, Jay Tayra Guzar Ho Way
May Mar Kay V Nae Marda, Jay Tayri Nazar Ho Way

Dam Dam Naal Ziker Karaa, May Tayriyaa Shaanaa Daa
Tayray Naam Tou Waar Dey Vaa, Jinni Meri Ummer Ho Way

Dewaanay O Baythay Ravvoo, Mehfil Nuu Saja Kay Tay
Shayad Mayra Aaqa Daa, Itthou V Guzer Ho Way

Ay Ho Dil Wich Niyaazi Day, Ikko Aas Charoukni Ay
Sohnay Day Shaher Ander, Kittay Meri Kabar Ho Way

Oodi Zaat Tay Her Waylay, Phool Charan Duruuda Day
Charcha Mayray Aaqa Da, Her Shaam-O-Saher Ho Way

Akhee Sohnay Nuu Waye Nee, Jay Tayra Guzar Ho Way
May Mar Kay V Nae Marda, Jay Tayri Nazar Ho Way

1: Akhiyan Vich Sohne Mahi Di
2:
Akhiyan Vich Sohne Mahi Dee Tasveer Sajayi Phirna Aa
Kee Jaanan Duniya Dil Vich Main Kee Dard Lukaee Phirna Aa

Tere Naa Di Maala Gal Paake Saare Jag Diyan Khushia Thukraa Ke
Jera Dard Ditta Teri Furqat Ne Seene Naal Lai Phirna Aa

Kee Jaanan Duniya Dil Vich Main Kee Dard Lukaee Phirna Aa

Tera Naam Ziyarat Thakda Nahi Kisse Ghair Valley Main Takda Nahi
Jis Din Dee Khaak Madine Di Akhiyan Vich Paai Phirna Aa

Koi Oganhaar Nai Mere Jeya Koi Parda Posh Nai Tere Jeya
Aese Lai Teri Rahmat Te Umeed Lagaai Phirna Aa

Sanu Murshid Kamil Mil Gaya Ae Sada Khul Gaya Buha Dil Da Ae
Mainu Kalmah Parhan Da Das Ke Te Insaan Banaya Murshid Ne

Kinna Murshid Da Ehsaan Hoya Dil Da Pura Arman Hoya
Meri Ungli Pakarr Ke Jis Wele Meinu Naal Chalaya Murshid Ne

Sach Kehnda Han Dandi Maarda Nai Main Tan Hor Kise Kam Kaar Da Nai
Dewan Peer/murshid/sohne Da Hoka Gali Gali Jis Kam Murshid Meinu Laa Chaddeya

1: Akss E Rab E Zul Jalaal Allah Hi Allah
2:
Akss E Rab E Zul Jalaal Allah Hi Allah
Amma Amina Day Laal Allah Hi Allah

Ummati Nuun Jaduun Koii Gham Oanday Nay
Mayray Aqa Madinay Tarrap Jaanday Nay
Sun-Day Sab Di Kissay Da Ni Dil Ttaawan-Day
Mayri Sarkar Sab Da Pala Chaawan-Day
Kinnay Aqa Lajpaal Allah Hi Allah

Jag Tuun Wakhhraa Maza Aqa Day Pyaar Da
Lamha Lamha Karam Wajaan He Maar Da
Khhulla Rehnda Sada Booha Sarkar Da
Oas Darbar Tay Har Gunahgar Da
Poora Hunda Ay Sawaal Allah Hi Allah

Jayrra Mahboob Koii Iradah Karay
Oas Waylay Khuda Oa Nuun Poora Karay
Jiss Tuun Khaliq Kadi Wi Na Parda Karay
Jiss Nuun Kaba E Alam Wi Sajda Karay
Shaan Sohnay Da Kamaal Allah Hi Allah

Ghar Sajaanday Nay Aqa Diyaan Mehfilaan
Ddayray Laandiyaan Nay Rab Diyaan Rahmataan
Oaday Ghar Wich Sada Rehndiyaan Barkataan
Duur Ho Jaandiyaan Sariyaan Ghurbataan
Banda Rehnda Khush Haal Allah Hi Allah

Peda Jiss Thhaan Huay O Makaan Saj Gya
Aap A-Ay Zameen Aasmaan Saj Gya
Saari Mehfil Saji Naat Khawaan Saj Gya
Nuur Day Naal Saara Jahaan Saj Gya
Waah Husn O Jamaal Allah Hi Allah

1: Alaa Yaa Ayyuhas Saaqi Adir Kasan Wa Naa Wilhaa
2:
Alaa Yaa Ayyuhas Saaqi Adir Kasan Wa Naa Wilhaa,
Keh Bar Yaad-E-Shahe Kausar Bana Saazeym Mehfilhaa.

Balaa Baareed Hubb-E-Shaikh Najdi Bar Wahaabiya,
Keh Ishq Aasaan Namood Awwal Wale Uftaad Mushkilhaa.

Wahaabi Gar Che Ikhfaami Kunad Bughz-E-Nabi Lekin,
Nihaa(N) Key Maanad Aan Raaz-E-Kaz-O-Saazand Mehfilhaa.

Tawahhub Gaah Mulk-E-Hind Iqaamat Raa Namie Shaayad,
Jaras Fariyaad Mee Daarad Keh Bar Bandeed Mahmilhaa.

Salaa-E-Majlisam Dar Gosh-E-Aamad Bee(N) Bia Bishinaw,
Jaras Mastaana Mee Goyad Keh Bar Bandeed Mahmilha.

Magar Daa(N) Roo Azin Mehfil Rah-E-Arbaab-E-Sunnat Rau,
Keh Saalik Bey Khabar Nabood Ze Raah-O-Rasm Manzilha.

Darin Jalwat Biyaa Az Raah-E-Khalwat Taa Khuda Yaabi,
Mataa Maa Talqa Man Tahwaa Da’iduniya-Wa-Amhilhaa.

Dilam Qurbaanat Aay Dood-E-Charaag-E-Mehfil-E-Maulid,
Ze Taab-E-Ja’d-E-Mushkeenat Che Khoo(N) Uftaad Dar Dilha.

Ghareeq-E-Behr-E-Ishq Ahmadiem Az Farhat-E-Maulid,
Kujaa Daanand Haal-E-Maa Sabaksaaraan-E-Saahilha.

Raza Mast-E-Jaam-E-Ishq Saaghar Baaz Mee Khwaahad,
Alaa Yaa Ayyuhas-Saaqi-Adir Ka’-San Wa Naa Wilhaa.

1: Alfaaz Nahi Milte Sarkaar Ko Kya Kahiye
2:
Alfaaz Nahi Milte Sarkaar Ko Kya Kahiye
Jibreel Salaami De Darbaar Ko Kya Kahiye.

Akhalqe Muhammad Ki Kya Shaan Niraali Hai
Dushman Bhi Padhe Kalma Kirdaar Ko Kya Kahiye.

Misaqe Azal Me Jo Iqraare Bala Thehra
Jaari Hai Wo Mehshar Tak Iqraar Ko Kya Kahiye.

Bas Ek Palak Jhapki Meraaj Hui Poori
Us Saahibe Rif’at Ki Raftaar Ko Kya Kahiye.

Thi Nutqe Muhammad Me Taasire Kalaame Rab
Fusha Bhi Bane Gunge Guftaar Ko Kya Kahiye.

Ek Ek Sahabi Par Firdaus Bhi Naazaan Hai
Siddique Umar Usman Karraar Ko Kya Kahiye.

Aye Toor Tujhe Shayad Wo Baat Na Bhooli Ho
Israar Ko Kya Kahiye Inkaar Ko Kya Kahiye.

Woh Gaar Ke Jisne Ek Tareekh Banaayi Hai
Us Gaar Ko Kya Kahiye Us Yaar Ko Kya Kahiye.

Nazmi Teri Naato Ka Andaaz Niraala Hai
Mazmoon Anokhe Hai Ash’aar Ko Kya Kahiye.

1: Allah Allah Ke Nabi Se
2:
Allah Allah Ke Nabi Se
Fariyaad Hai Nafs Ki Badee Se

Din Bhar Khelon Mein Khaak Udaayi
Laaj Aayi Na Zarro Ki Hansi Se

Shab Bhar Sone Hee Se Garaz Thi
Taaron Ne Hazaar Daant Peese

Imaan Pe Maut Behtar O Nafs
Teri Naapaak Zindagi Se

O Shahad Numaaye Zahar Dar Jaam
Gum Jaaoon Kidhar Teri Badee Se

Gehre Pyare Purane Dilsoz
Guzra Main Teri Dosti Se

Tuj Se Jo Uthaaye Main Ne Sadme
Aise Na Mile Kabhi Kisi Se

Uf Re Khud Kaam Be Murawwat
Padta Hai Kaam Aadmi Se

To Ne Hi Kiya Khud Se Naadim
Tu Ne Hi Kiya Khazil Nabi Se

Kaise Aaqa Ka Hukm Taala
Hum Mar Mite Teri Khud-Saree Se

Aati Na Thi Jab Badee Bhi Tujh Ko
Hum Jaante Hain Tujhe Jabhi Se

Had Ke Zaalim Sitam Ke Katthar
Patthar Sharmaayen Tere Jee Se

Hum Khaak Mein Mil Chuke Hain Kab Ke
Nikla Na Gubaar Tere Jee Se

Hai Zaalim! Main Nibahoon Tujh Se
Allah Bachaye Us Ghadi Se

Jo Tum Ko Na Jaanta Ho Hazrat
Chaalen Chaliye Us Ajnabi Se

Allah Ke Saamne Who Gun The
Yaaron Main Kaise Muttaqi Se

Rehzan Ne Loot Lee Kamaayi
Fariyaad Hai Khizr Haashmi Se

Allah Koonye Main Khud Gira Hoon
Apni Naalish Karu(N) Tujhi Se

Hain Pushte Panah Gause Aa’zam
Kyun Darte Ho Raza Kisi Se

1: Allah Allah Phir Ham Madine Chalein
2:
Allah Allah Phir Ham Madine Chalein
Seekhne Zindagi Ke Kareene Chalein

Allah Allah Phir Ham Madine Chalein

Jis Se Bujhti Har Rooh Ki Tishnagi
Ham Us Hi Aab E Rehmat Ko Peene Chalein

Allah Allah Phir Ham Madine Chalein

Aaj Tak Zindagi Zindagi Hi Na Thi
Zindagi Ko Mubarak Ho Jeene Chalein

Allah Allah Phir Ham Madine Chalein

Is Taraf Haath Phailaye Pahunche Ghulam
Us Taraf Rehmaton Ke Khazeene Chalein

Allah Allah Phir Ham Madine Chalein

Allah Allah Yeh Aabru E Uruj
Ham Madine Chalein Ham Madine Chalein

Allah Allah Phir Ham Madine Chalein

Yeh Unhi Ka Karam Hai Ke Behzad Ham
Zakhm E Qalb E Shikasta Ko Seene Chalein

Allah Allah Phir Ham Madine Chalein

1: Allah Da Karam Hoya Sohna Duniya Te Aaya Eh
2:
Allah Da Karam Hoya,
Sohna Duniya Te Aaya Eh,
Aamina Da Chan Tak Ke,
Eh Chan Sharmaaye Eh,

Allah Da Habeeb Aaya,
Rukh Phir Gaye Khizaawaan De,
Rehmat Payi Bardi Eh,
Rukh Dasde Hawawaan De,

Allah Da Karaam Hoya,
Badal Noor Da Chaa Gaya Eh,
Allah Da O Yaar Sohna,
Aaj Duniya Te Aagaaya Eh,

Allah Da Habeeb Aaya,
Wekho Ka’be Wee Phir Gaye Ne,
Pathran Wi Parhe Kalme,
Bu’t Qadman Vich Gir Gaaye Ne,

Allah Da Habeeb Aya,
Eho Wajde Paye Naare Ne,
Rab Wee Darood Parhda,
Naale Noori Wee Sare Ne,

Allah Da Habeeb Aaya,
Phul Khirre Ne Ghulaab Jaye,
Sohna A Churra Lesi,
Gunahgaar Shahaab Jaaye,

Allah Da Karam Hoya,
Sohna Duniya Te Aaya Eh,
Aamina Da Chan Tak Ke,
Eh Chan Sharmaaye Eh,

1: Allah De Habeeb Naal Piyaar Hona Chahida
2:
Zindagi Da Koi Tay Maeyaar Hona Chahida
Kujh Te Hayaati Da Mayaar Huna Chahi Da
Allah De Habeeb Naal Piyaar Hona Chahida

Allah De Habeeb Naal Piyaar Hona Chahida

Saanu Yaar-E-Ghaar Nay Dassayya Ey Dosto
Sab Kujh Sohnay Tou Nisaar Hona Chahida

Allah De Habeeb Naal Piyaar Hona Chahida

Aqa Jaddo Yaad Karo Apne Gulama Nuu
Sadda Wi Ghulama Wich Shumaar Hona Chahida

Allah De Habeeb Naal Piyaar Hona Chahida

Aur Houn Jaan Saaday Tay, Allah Ay Enayataa
Kay Juunday Juunday Sohnay Da Dedaar Ho Chahida

Allah De Habeeb Naal Piyaar Hona Chahida

Aur Koi Tamanna See, Siddique Yaar-E-Ghaar De
Kay Yaar Naalay Yaar Da Mazaar Hona Chahida

Allah De Habeeb Naal Piyaar Hona Chahida

Hasan Tay Hussain Tou, Jind Jaan Waar Kay
Ali Day Gulama Cho Shumaar Hona Chahi Da

Allah De Habeeb Naal Piyaar Hona Chahida

Jayray Tairay Naam Diya Mehfala Sajaunday Nay
Inha Bayliya Da Bayra Paar Hona Chahida

Allah De Habeeb Naal Piyaar Hona Chahida

Ay Labba Tay Niyaazi Ho, Saa Jaddo Aakhri
Uss Wailay Sohnay Da Dedaar Hona Chahida

Allah De Habeeb Naal Piyaar Hona Chahida

1: Allah Dikha De Mujhe Ramzane Madina
2:
Allah Dikha De Mujhe Ramzane Madina
Aati Hai Yahi Lab Pe Dua Rozo Shabina

Ramzan Me Umre Ki Sa'adat Mujhe De De
Aaqa Ki Ma-E-Yeth Mile Haj Ka Qazina
Allah Dikha De Mujhe Ramzane Madina

Allah Dikha De Mujhe Ramzane Madina
Aati Hai Yahi Lab Pe Dua Rozo Shabina

Sehri Ki Woh Raunak Dare Sarkar Pe Dekhe
Allah Mera Ghar Bhi Ho Mehroom Kahi Na
Allah Dikha De Mujhe Ramzane Madina

Allah Dikha De Mujhe Ramzane Madina
Aati Hai Yahi Lab Pe Dua Rozo Shabina

Iftar Karu Masjide Nabawi Ke Sehan Me
Mil Jaye Meri Zeest Ko Lamhate Sakina
Allah Dikha De Mujhe Ramzane Madina

Allah Dikha De Mujhe Ramzane Madina
Aati Hai Yahi Lab Pe Dua Rozo Shabina

Ramzane Madina Jo Guzar Jaaye Karam Se
Phir Eid Ujagar Ki Ho Ha Eid E Madina
Allah Dikha De Mujhe Ramzane Madina

Allah Dikha De Mujhe Ramzane Madina
Aati Hai Yahi Lab Pe Dua Rozo Shabina

1: Allah Hi Allah Mere Nabi Di
2:
Allah Hi Allah Mere Nabi Di,
Sab Toh Shaan Niraali Eh,
Sab De Aayb Chupaawaan Waali,
Aaqa Di Zaat Niraali Eh,

Teriya Ummeeda Da Gulshan,
Harya Barya Rehnda Eh,
Jis Din To Main Sabz Gumbad Di,
Wekh Laayi Haryaali Eh,

Lakh Rawe Koi Karda Bhawe,
Dil Vich Allah Allah Hoo,
Je Nahi Sil Vich Ishq Nabi Da,
Samjho O Bhandha Khaali Eh,

Us Di Misl Misaal Na Koi,
Oo De Jeya Lajpaal Na Koi,
Sohniya De O Dil Vi Rehde,
Koojea Da Wee O Saaiin Eh,

Dil Vich Ishq Da Chaanan Howe,
Fer Niazi Wekh Zara,
O Sarkaar Da Roza Jisda,
O Sarkaar Di Jaali Eh,

Menu Sud Bud Hor Na Koi,
Eni Gal Samjha Dewa,
Jis Te Sohna Ho Gaya Raazi,
Oho Hi Karma Waali Eh,

1: Allah Kare Ke Ho Jaaye Guzar Taiba Ki Galliyon Se
2:
Allah Kare Ke Ho Jaaye Guzar Taiba Ki Galliyon Se,
Main Saari Zindagi Kar Doon Bassar Taiba Ki Galliyon Mein.

Hua Jo Aamina Bi Ki Goad Mein Tera Zahoor Aaqa,
Khud Jibriel Ne Yeh Di Khabbar Taiba Ki Galliyon Mein.

Jo Dekha Gumbad-E-Khadra Ke Saaye Mein Kharre Ho Kar,
Jamaal-E-Mustafa Aaya Nazar Taiba Ki Galliyon Mein.

Tere Darbaar Ka Darba Banoo Main Bhi Kabhi Aaqa,
Mere Dilbar Mujhe Bhi Ho Fakhar Taiba Ki Galliyon Mein.

Hawaaein Rehmaton Ki Wahaan Subho O Shaam Chalti Hain,
Barasta Noor Hai Sham O Sahar Taiba Ki Galliyon Mein.

Tere Dar Ke Galli Kooche Jo Palkhon Par Uthaoon Main,
Meri Saari Guzar Jaaye Ummar Taiba Ki Galliyon Mein.

Jo Tukre Ho Gaya Tha Mere Aaqa Ke Ishaare Par,
Najdi Tum Ne Nahi Dekha Qamar Taiba Ki Galliyon Mein.

Du’a Rabb Se Yeh Karta Hoon Subho Se Shaam Ro Ro Kar,
Ali Akbar, Teri Bhi Ho Qabar Taiba Ki Galliyon Mein.

Hua Jo Aamina Bi Ki Goad Mein Tera Zahoor Aaqa,
Khud Jibriel Ne Yeh Di Khabbar Taiba Ki Galliyon Mein.

1: Allah Ke Ghar Me Hu Allah Ne Bulaya Hai
2:
Allah Ke Ghar Me Hu Allah Ne Bulaya Hai
Kaabe Ka Nazara Hai Allah Ke Ghar Me Hu

Allah Ne Bulaya Hai

Darbar Ye Kaisa Hai Peshani Se Pehle Dil
Sajde Me Jhukaya Hai Allah Ke Ghar Me Hu

Allah Ne Bulaya Hai

Woh Ruqne Yamaani Ho Ya Ruqne Iraaqi Ho
Maine Har Kone Ko Chuma Hai Allah Ke Ghar Me Hu

Allah Ne Bulaya Hai

Ye Waqt Hai Izzat Ka Mizaab Hai Rehmat Ka
Sar Par Yahi Saaya Hai Allah Ke Ghar Me Hu

Allah Ne Bulaya Hai

Sajde Me Ujaagar Hai Aur Saamne Kaaba Hai
Maula Ne Nawaza Hai Allah Ke Ghar Me Hu

Allah Ne Bulaya Hai

1: Allah Ke Habeeb Ka Kitna Haseen Dayaar Hai
2:
Allah Ke Habeeb Ka Kitna Hasee(N) Dayaar Hai
Mausam Ho Koi Bhi Magar Rehti Waha Bahaar Hai

Unki Zubaane Dil Nashee(N) Kis Darja Ba Waqar Hai
Dushman Ko Bhi Rasool Ki Baato Pe Aitebaar Hai

Marne Ke Baad Bhi Meri Aankhen Na Band Ho Saki
Mujh Ko Abhi Rasool Ki Aamad Ka Intezaar Hai

Khulde Bari Ka Tazkira Chedo Na Doston Abhi
Mere Tasawwuraat Me Sarkar Ka Mazaar Hai

Mere Kareeb Aa Sake Shaitaan Ki Majaal Kya
Noore Khuda Ke Naam Se Maine Kiya Hisaar Hai

Jab Se Tabassum Me Aziz Choota Hai Shehre Mustafa
Ye Jaan Nisaar Har Ghadi Ab Hijr Ka Shikaar Hai

1: Allah Mera Dahar Mein Aala Maqaam Ho
2:
Allah Karam Allah, Allah Karam Allah

Allah Mera Dahar Mein A’ala Maqaam Ho
Sarkaar Ke Ghulamon Mein Mera Bhi Naam Ho

Allah Karam Allah, Allah Karam Allah

Marnay Say Pehlay Dekh Loon Subh-E-Dayaar-E-Paak
Sarkaar Haazri Ka Koi Intizaam Ho

Allah Karam Allah, Allah Karam Allah

Saansein Mehekti Hoon Dam-E-Aakhir Gulab See
Dard-E-Zubaan Huzoor-E-Garaami Ka Naam Ho

Allah Karam Allah, Allah Karam Allah

Jiss Waqt Meri Rooh Jasad Chornay Lagay
Aankhoon Ke Saamnay Mere Mah-E-Tamaam Ho

Allah Karam Allah, Allah Karam Allah

Iss Masht-E-Khaak Ki Hoon Sabhi Hasratein Tamaam
Mehboob Ki Gali Mein Jou Qissa Tamaam Ho

Allah Karam Allah, Allah Karam Allah

Nas Nas Mein Nashaa Aisa Samaa Jaye Naat Ka
Sarkaar Lab Pe Naat Mere Subh-O-Shaam Ho

Allah Karam Allah, Allah Karam Allah

Seraab Tahayaat Hoon Sab Tashangaan-E-Ishq
Khudaam-E-Mustafa Mein Ujaagar Kalaam Ho

Allah Karam Allah, Allah Karam Allah

1: Allah Ne Ye Shaan Barhaee Tere Dar Ki
2:
Allah Ne Ye Shaan Barhaee Tere Dar Ki
Bakhshi Hain Malaik Ko Gadaee Tere Dar Ki

Hooro Ne Malaik Ne Ajinna Ne Bashar Ne
Kis Kis Ne Yahan Na Beek Paee Tere Dar Ki

Paane Ko To Khursheed O Qamar Charkh Ne Paaye
To Kya Paaya Agar Khaak Na Paee Tere Dar Ki

Jannat Ne Utaare To Bohat Noor Ke Naqshe
Tasveer Maghar Haat Na Aayi Tere Dar Ki

Jab Zulm Karo Jaan Pe Pohonch Jao Madina
Quraan Bhi Karta Hain Baraee Tere Dar Ki

Sarkaar Karam Nazar E Karam Jae Kidhar Hum
Jaooka Ne To Rah Dikhaee Tere Dar Ki

Mehshar Me Bhi Is Shaan Se Jae Ga Munawaar
Rakhe Hue Kaande Pe Chataai Tere Dar Ki

Hain Naaz Muqaddar Pe Ubaid E Razwi Ko
Sarkaar Mili Is Ko Gadaee Tere Dar Ki

1: Allah Salamat Rakkhe Milaad Manane Waalo Ko
2:
Allah Salamat Rakkhe Milaad Manane Waalo Ko
Allahumma Salle Ala Sayyedina Mohammadin

Sarkar Ki Ulfat Se Imaan Ko Jagaye Jaa
Sub Ahle Mohabbat Ko Deewana Banaye Jaa

Aaqa Ne Rakha Roza Khud Apni Wiladat Ka
Sunnat Hai Mohammed (S.a.w) Ki Is Din Ko Manaye Jaa

Touseef Nahi Mumkin Us Fakhre Do Alaam Ki
Naghme Hi Duroodon Ke Aaj Unke Sunaye Jaa

Milaad Ki Sa’at Hai Mil Jayega Jo Maango
Ghar Apna Zara Tu Bhi Jannat May Banaaye Jaa

Unke Rukhe E Roshan Ki Tamseel Ho Kya Mumkin
Koi Bhi Nahi Unsa Yeh Sub Ko Bataya Jaa

Duniya Ki Mohabbat Se Is Dil Ko Bachaye Jaa
Aaqa Ki Addaoun Ko Toh Dil Me Basaye Jaa

Apne Ne Do Alam May Sarkar Sahara Hai
Bus Unki Mohabbat Se Daarein Banaye Jaa

Jibreel Ki Sunnat Hai Is Din Toh Uda Parcham
Aaqa Ki Wiladat Par Jhandoun Ko Lagaye Jaa

Isiya Ki Tere Baqshish Toh Chahe Agar Ahmed
Bus Unki Mohabbat Ko Seene May Basaye Jaa

1: Ambiya Ko Bhi Ajal Aani Hai
2:
Ambiya Ko Bhi Ajal Aani Hai
Magar Aisi Ki Faqat Aani Hai

Phir Usi Aan Ke Baad Un Ki Hayaat
Misle Saabiq Wohi Jismaani Hai

Ruh To Sab Ki Hai Zinda Un Ka
Jisme Purnoor Bhi Ruhaani Hai

Auro(N) Ki Rooh Ho Kitni Hi Lateef
Unke Ajsaam Ki Kab Saani Hai

Paau Jis Khaak Pe Rakh De(N) Woh Bhi
Rooh Hai Paak Hai Nooraani Hai

Uski Azwaaj Ko Jaaiz Hai Nikaah
Us Ka Tarka Bate Jo Faani Hai

Yeh Hain Haiyye Abadi Un Ko Raza
Sidqe Waa'da Ki Qazaa Maani Hai

1: Amina Bibi Ke Angan Mein Barkat Wala Aaya Hai
2:
Amina Bibi Ke Angan Mein Barkat Wala Aaya Hai
Hashmi Quraishi Makki Madani Ne’mat Wala Aaya Hai

Jiski Shari’at Ne Insaan Ko Nek Chalne Ka Dars Diya
Haan Woh Khuloos O Hilm Ka Paykar Rehmat Wala Aaya Hai

Misr Mein Husne Yusuf Dekhke Hath Kate They Kitne Hi
Raj Dilon Per Karne Ko Woh Soorat Wala Aaya Hai

Chand Hua Shaq Suraj Palta Kalma Padha Kankariyo Ne
Mazhare Daste Qudrat Ban Kar Qudrat Wala Aaya Hai

Saare Gunahgarane Ummat Mehshar Mein Masroor Hue
Jannat Ka Parwana Lekar Jannat Wala Aaya Hai

Dayi Halima Ki Qismat Per Rashq Farishte Karte Hain
Goad Mein Unki Noore Mujassam Tal’at Wala Aaya Hai

Summa Dana Fatadalla Ka Misdaq Bana Me’raj Ki Shab
Arsh Se Aage Manzil Karne Himmat Wala Aaya Hai

Jiske Badan Se Nikle Khushbu Mushqe Khutan Ko Maat Kare
Tayyab O Tahir Noore Mujassam Nikhat Wala Aaya Hai

Ahle Arab Ko Kisne Sikhaye Jeene Ke Andaaz Naye
Haan Wohi Ibne Zabihe Azam Shohrat Wala Aaya Hai

Jiske Naame Mubarak Se Tal Jaye Musibat Door Hon Gham
Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Barkat Wala Aaya Hai

Inna A’taina Kal Kausar Jiski Shaan Hai Qur’an Mein
Qasime Ne’mat Sahibe Rehmat Kasrat Wala Aaya Hai

Maahe Rabi Ul Awwal Hum Qurban Hon Teri Azmat Per
Leke Zahoore Noore Ilahi Tu Matwala Aaya Hai

Jiske Qalam Ki Har Jumbish Mein Na’at Hai Apne Nana Ki
Aapki Basti Mein Woh ?nazmi? Nisbat Wala Aaya Hai

1: Amina Ka Laal Aaya
2:
Amina Ka Laal Aaya, Amina Ka Laal Aaya

2:

Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah
Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah

Kaabe Ke Badrud Duja Tum Pe Karodon Durood
Tayba Ke Shamsud Duha Tum Pe Karodon Durood

Dafiye Jumla Bala Thum Pe Karodon Durood

An Nabi Ya Man Hadar An Nabi Khairul Bashar
Man Lahu Shaqq Ul-Qamar Wa Nazil Sallim 'alayh

Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah
Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah

Dil Karo Thandha Mera Wo Kafe Pa Chaand Sa
Seene Pe Rakdho Zara Tum Pe Karodon Durood

Zaat Hui Intikhab Wasf Hue La Jawab
Naam Hua Mustafa Tum Pe Karodon Durood

An Nabi Dhak Al-Uroos Dhikruhu Yuhyin Nufoos
An Nasaara Wa L-Majoos Aslamu 'ala Yadayh

Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah
Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah

Be Hunar Be Tameez Kiske Hue Hain Azeez
Ik Tumare Siwa Tum Pe Karodon Durood

Aas Hai Koi Na Paas Ik Tumaari Hai Aas
Bas Hai Yahin Aasra Tum Pe Karodon Durood

Seena Ke Hai Daag Daag Kehdo Karein Baag Baag
Tayba Se Aake Saba Tum Pe Karodon Durood

An Nabiyyul Mustafa Ibn Zamzam Wa S-Safa
Man Ta'ala Sharafa Kulluhum Salla 'alayh

Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah
Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah

An Nabiyy Ul-Mujtafa An Nabi Saakin Quba
Hubbuhu Li Madhaba Rabbana Salla 'alayh

Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah
Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah

Tum Se Jahan Ka Nizaam Tum Pe Karodon Durood
Tum Pe Karodon Sana Tum Pe Karodon Durood

Tum Ho Jawado Kareem Tum Ho Rawoofo Raheem
Bheek Ho Data Ataa Tum Pe Karodon Durood

Khalq Ke Haakim Ho Tum Rizq Ke Qaasim Ho Thum
Thum Se Mila Jo Mila Tum Pe Karodon Durood

Nafii Wo Dafii Ho Thum Shaafii Wo Rafii Ho Thum
Tum Se Bas Afzon Khuda Tum Pe Karodon Durood

Shaafee Wo Naafee Ho Tum Kaafee Wo Daafee Ho Tum
Dard Ko Kardo Dawa Tum Pe Karodon Durood

Barse Karam Ki Bharan Bhoole Niam Ke Chaman
Aysi Chala Do Hawa Tum Pe Karodon Durood

Kiyoon Kahoon Be Kas Hun Main Kiyoon Kahoon Be Bas Hun Main
Thum Ho Main Thum Pe Fida Tum Pe Karodon Durood

An Nabi Dhaakal Maleeh Qawaluhu Qawlu Saheeh
Wal Quran Shaiun Faseeh Alladhee Unzil 'alayh

Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah
Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah

Karke Thumare Gunaah Maanghe Thumaari Panaa
Tum Kaho Daaman Men Aa Tum Pe Karodon Durood

Theek Ho Naame Raza Tum Pe Karodon Durood

Allaah Allaah Allaah Allaah

1: Andheri Raat Hai Gham Ki Ghata Isyaan Ki Kaali Hai
2:
Andheri Raat Hai Gham Ki Ghata Isyaa(N) Ki Kaali Hai
Dile Bekas Ka Is Aafat Mein Aaqa Tu Hi Waali Hai

Na Ho Maayoos Aati Hai Sada Gore Ghareeba(N) Se
Nabi Ummat Ka Haami Hai Khuda Bando(N) Ka Waali Hai

Utarte Chaand Dhalti Chaandni Jo Ho Sake Kar Le
Andhera Paakh Aata Hai Yeh Do Din Ki Ujaali Hai

Are Yeh Bhediyon Ka Ban Hai Aur Shaam Aagayi Sar Par
Kahaan Soya Musaafir Haaye Kitna Laa Ubaali Hai

Andhera Ghar, Akeli Jaan, Dam Ghut-Ta, Dil Uktaataa
Khuda Ko Yaad Kar Pyaare Woh Saa'at Aane Waali Hai

Zamee(N) Tapti, Kateeli Raah, Bhaari Bojh, Ghaail Paau(N)
Musibat Jhelne Waale Tera Allah Waali Hai

Na Chaunka Din Hai Dhalne Par Teri Manzil Hui Khoti
Are O Jaan Wale Neend Ye Kab Ki Nikaali Hai

Raza Manzil To Jaisi Hai Woh Ik Main Kya Sabhi Ko Hai
Tum Is Ko Rote Ho Yeh To Kaha Yaa(N) Haath Khaali Hai

1: Apne Daaman E Shifaat Main Chupaye Rakhna
2:
Apnay Daaman E Shifa'at Main Chupaye Rakhna
Mere Sarkaar Meri Baat Banaye Rakhna

Isi Mansab Ka Talab Gaar Hu Mai Bhi Aqaa
Khaak Hoon Mai Mujhe Khadmo Se Lagaye Rakhna

Aap Ki Yaad Se Aabaad Hai Dil Mera Huzoor
Banda Par Var Meri Hasti Ko Basaye Rakhna

Aap Yaad Aaye To Phir Na Yaad Na Aaye Koi
Ghair Ki Yaad Mere Dil Se Bhulaye Rakhna

Unke Hojao Har Ek Cheez Unhi Se Maango
Apne Daaman Me Na Ehsaan Parae Rakhna

Maine Maana Ke Nikamma Hoon Magar Aap Ka Hoon
Is Nikamme Ko Bi Sarkar Nibaye Rakhna

Jab Sawaaneze Pai Khursheed Qhayamat Aaye
Apne Zulfoun Ke Gunahgaar Pai Saye Rakhna

Un Kai Aane Ki Gari Hai Wo Hain Aane Waaley

2:
Apni Nisbat Se Mein Kuch Nahi Hu

Unkay Tukroon Say Ezaz Pa Kar
Tajdaroon Ki Saf Mein Khara Hu

Iss Karam Ko Magar Kiya Kaho Gay
Meinay Mana Mein Saab Say Bura Hoon

Dekhnay Walo Mujhko Na Dekho

2:
Apni Rehmat Ke Samander Mein Utar Jaane De

Mujhko Leke To Hai Sahara Tera Shaha
Apne Kadmoun Se Lipat Kar Mujhe Mar Jaane De

Khahishe Zaat Bohot Saat Diya Hai Tera
Ab Jidhar Mere Muhammed Hain Udar Jaane De

Zindagi Gumbade Qazra Hito Manzil Hai Meri
Mujhko Hariyaali Youn Me Khaak Basar Jaane De

2:

1: Aqa Bachalo Is Aasi Ko Jo Duba Huva Hai Gunaho Me
2:
Aqa Bachalo Is Aasi Ko Jo Duba Huva Hai Gunaho Me
Ab Aap Hi Ise Bachana Ya Rasula Llah

Mai Qatakaar Hoo Mai Gunahgaar Hoo Mai Siyakar Hoo
Mujh Bad Ko Aap Hi Bachana Ya Rasula Llah

Tum Malik-O-Muqtaar Ho Jise Chahe Jo Chahe Use Ataa Karde
Meri Bhi Jholi Bhardena Ya Rasula Llah

Mere Bad Aamal Ke Sabab Mujh Par Azab Ho Jab Qabr Me
Mujhe Tum Bachane Aana Ya Rasula Llah

Sunta Hoo Logon Se Ke Aqa Ghar Tashrif Laye Qaab Me
Mere Qaab Me Bhi Tum Aana Ya Rasula Llah

Tere Dar Ki Haazri Ke Liye Kab Se Hoo Shaha Betab
Mujhe Dar Pe Tum Bulana Ya Rasula Llah

Ghamo Ke Samandar Me Dubta Ja Raha Hai Mera Safina
Ho Jai Nazre Karam Kinare Lag Jai Mera Safina Ya Rasula Llah

Kuch Amal Nahi Is Aasi Ke Paas Sar Ta Pa Gunaho Me Duba Huva Hai
Mahshar Me Tum Hi Bharam Rakhna Ya Rasula Llah

Hoga Jab Khuda Jalal Me Puche Jab Mujh Se Mera Amal
Mujhe Mahshar Me Tum Bachana Ya Rasula Llah

Nikle Meri Rooh Tere Hi Dayar Me Sabz Gumbad Ke Saye Me
Is Waqt Mujhe Apna Didar Bhi Karana Ya Rasula Llah

Gar Hind Me Israiel Meri Rooh Lene Aaye
Kahdena Tahro Ise Aajane Do Madina Ya Rasula Llah

Hogaye Hai Dur Mujh Se Mere Dost-O-Ahbab
Mujh Se Tum Na Dur Ho Jana Ya Rasula Llah

Hubbe Duniya Se Bachakar Mujhe Apni Kambli Me Chupalena
Bas Mai Banjau Tera Hi Diwana Ya Rasula Llah

Jaber Jo Aap Ke Dar Ki Hazri Ke Liye Tadap Raha Hai
Ise Jald Taiba Me Bulana Ya Rasula Llah

1: Arsh Se Aage Jaake Dikhao Phir Kehna Hum Jaise They
2:
Arsh Se Aage Jaake Dikhao Phir Kehna Hum Jaise They
Noore Mujassam Ban Ke Dikhao Phir Kehna Hum Jaise They

Chand Hua Shak Suraj Palta Unke Ek Ishare Se
Tum Bhi Zara Ye Kar Ke Dikhao Phir Kehna Hum Jaise They

Summa Dana Fatadalla Unki Qurb Ki Manzil Ka Hai Bayaa
Hai Gar Mumkin Tum Bhi Jao Phir Kehna Hum Jesethey

Hazrat E Jabir Ki Dawat Me Jaise Hazaro Sair Huve
Dawat Aisi Tum Bhi Khilao Phir Kehna Hum Jaise They

Khoob Baha Panjabe Rehmat Khub Hue Sairaab Sabhi
Pani Aisa Tum Bhi Pilao Phir Kehna Hum Jaise They

Hirni Wapas Laut Ke Aai Unse Wafa Ka Dars Diya
Aisi Huqumat Tum Bhi Chalao Phir Kehna Hum Jaise They

Unka Yad Beshak Hai Yadullah Unka Kalaam Allah Ka Kalaam
Dasto Zubaan Apne To Dekhao Phir Kehna Hum Jaise They

Maana Bashar Wo Bhi Hai Lekin Yuha Ilaiya Bhi To Padho
Koi Wahi Ek Tum Bhi Laao Phir Kehna Hum Jaise They

Inna Aatayna Kal Kausar Aur Rafana Laka Zikrak
Sura E Toaba Padhte Jao Phir Kehna Hum Jaise They

Wo Hai Luab E Paak Nabi Ka Khari Kooye Meethey Hue

Daste Mubarak Ki Barkat Se Tooti Haddi Thik Hui
Haath Zara Apna Bhi Badhao Phir Kehna Hum Jaise They

Koi Muhammad Aur Batao Phir Kahna Hum Jaise They

Khulke Azeem Akhlak Hai Kiska Arsh Ka Dulha Ksun Bana
Aur Koi Aisa Hai Batao Phir Kahna Hum Jaise They

1: Arshe Haq Hai Masnade Rifat Rasoolullah Ki
2:
Arshe Haq Hai Masnade Rif'at Rasoolullah Ki
Dekhni He Hashr Me Izzat Rasoolullah Ki

Laa Wa Rabbil Arsh Jisko Jo Mila Unse Mila

Sooraj Ulte Paaw Palte Chaand Ishaare Se Ho Chaak
Andhe Najdi Dekhle Qudrat Rasoolullah Ki

Tujhse Aur Jannat Se Kya Matlab Wahabi Duur Ho
Hum Rasoolullah Ke, Jannat Rasoolullah Ki

Hum Bhikaari Wo Kareem, Unka Khudaa Unse Fazoo
Aur Naa Kehna Nahee Aadat Rasoolullah Ki

Wo Jahannum Me Gaya Jo Unse Mustaghni Huwa
Hai Khalleelullah Ko Haajat Rasoolullah Ki

Qabr Me Lehrayenge Tha Hasr Chashme Noor Ke
Jalwah Farma Hogi Jab Tal'at Rasoolullah Ki

Kaafiro Par Taighe Waala Se Giri Bakre Ghazab

Najdi Usne Tujhko Mohlat Di Ki Iss Aalam Me Hai
Kaafiro Murtad Pe Rehmat Rasoolullah Ki

Ahle Sunnat Ka He Bera Paar Ashaabe Rasool
Najm He Aur Naav Hai Itrat Rasoolullah Ki

Khaaq Ho Kar Ishq Me Aaram Se Sona Mila
Jaan Ki Akseer Hai Ulfat Rasoolullah Ki

Toot Jaa-Enge Gunaahgaro Ke Fawran Qaid-O-Bund
Hashr Ko Khuljaaegi Taaqat Rasoolullah Ki

Ya Rabb Ik Saa'at Me Dhul Jaa-E Siyaahkaro Ke Jurm
Josh Par Aa Jaaye Ab Rehmat Rasoolullah Ki

Hai Ghule Baaghe Qudus Rukhsaar E Zeba E Huzoor

Ae Raza Khud Saahibe Quraan Hai Mud'daahe Huzoor
To Mujhse Kab Mumkin He Phir Midhat Rasoolullah Ki

1: Arze Jannat Kaun Chahe Arze Taiba Dekh Kar
2:
Arze Jannat Kaun Chahe Arze Taiba Dekh Kar,
Unka Rauza Dekh Kar Kaabe Ka Kaaba Dekh Kar.

Ruk Gaye Jibreel Jab Miqat-E-Sidra Dekh Kar,
Badhne Wale Badh Gaye Qurbat Ka Lamha Dekh Kar.

Banke Shamshir-E-Mujassam Ibn-E-Khattab Aaye The,
Apna Sauda Kar Gaye Aaqa Ka Chehra Dekh Kar.

Ya Muhammad 'irfa-Rasak' Jab Khuda Farmayega,
Jee Uthegi Ummate Mehshar Ka Sajda Dekh Kar.

Najdiya Pachtayega Tu Insha Allah Hashr Me,
Mere Daye Hath Me Aamal Naama Dekh Kar.

Hazrat-E-Jaabir Ka Imaan Aur Pukhta Ho Gaya,
Sainkdo Hatho Me Barkat Ka Niwala Dekh Kar.

Aaya Tha Shaitan Par Maayus Ho Kar Chal Diya,
Mere Dil Par Ulfat-E-Ahmed Ka Pehra Dekh Kar.

Kaabe Se Poocha Kya Tera Bhi Koi Qibla Hua,
Kaaba Karta Hai Ishara Simt-E-Taibah Dekh Kar.

Mujko Jeete Ji Zameen Par Lutf-E-Jannat Mil Gaya,
Unka Mimbar Dekh Kar Mehrab-E-Sajda Dekh Kar.

Rashq Se Jhoomenge Saare Ambiya Mehshar Ke Din,
Noori Shano Par Shafa’at Ka Doshala Dekh Kar.

Mujko Jannat Khud Bulayegi Yahi Ummeed Hai,
Meri Gardan Me Pada Barkaati Patta Dekh Kar.

Zaair-E-Raah-E-Madina Tujko Kuch Maaloom Hai,
Rashq Karti Hai Iram Tera Irada Dekh Kar.

Sayyed-Ush-Shohda Laqab Jin Ko Mila Sarkaar Se,
Qudsiyo Ko Rashq Aaye Shaan-E-Hamza Dekh Kar.

Naat Goi Nazmi Ne Seekhi Hassaan-Ul-Hind Se,
Naat Kehte The Bareli Me Jo Taibah Dekh Kar.

2:

Allahu Allahu Allahu Allah

2:

1: Baat Jo Kijiye Aur Jab Kijiye
2:
Baat Jo Kijiye Aur Jab Kijiye,
Saath Mein Zikr-E-Mehboob-E-Rab Kijiye.

Chahtay Ho Milay Zoq Ansu Bahain,
Lab Baaton Say Band Apnay Lub Kijiye.

Loh Woh Minar-O-Gumbad Nazar Aa Gaye,
Ab Salam Arz Sub Ba-Adab Kijiye.

Subz Gunbad Kay Saaye Talay Hain Kharay,
Khoob Taqdeer Par Rashk Aab Kijiye.

Woh Nawaazein Gay Khali Na Lotaayein Gay,
Unsay Jo Chahiye Wo Talab Kijiye.

Dar Pe Aakar, Bhikari Phirein Namurad,
Yeh Gawara Bhala Aap Kab Kijiye.

Ru Baroo Jaalion Kay Kharay Hain Hazoor,
Ab Ataa Bheek Shah-E-Arab Kijiye.

Aap Kay Dar Kay Hotay Kidhar Jaayein Hum,
Ab Ataa Bheek Shah-E-Arab Kijiye

Dijiye Hum Ko Khairat Deedar Ki,
Aab Karam Ya Nabi Behr-E-Rab Kijiye.

Mar Raha Hoon Gunahoon Kay Amraaz Say,
Ek Nazar Janib-E-Jaan Balab Kijiye.

Qalb-E-Tareek Par Rakh Kay Apna Qadam,
Chaandna Mere Mah-E-Arab Kijiye.

Sun Kay Faryad Imdaad Ko Aa Gaye,
Yaad Ubaid-E-Raza Unko Jab Kijiye.

Unkay Nisar, Koi Kaisay Bhi Ranj Mein Ho,
Jab Yaad Aagaye Hain, Sub Gham Bhula Diye Hain,
Yaad Ubaid-E-Raza Un Ko Jab Kijiye.

Walah Woh Sun Lein Gay, Faryad Ko Pohnchein Gay,
Itna Bhi To Ho Koi, Jo Aah Karay Dil Say,
Yaad Ubaid-E-Raza Unko Jab Kijiye.

Baat Jo Kijiye Aur Jab Kijiye,
Saath Main Zikr-E-Mehboob Kijiye.

Hain Hassan Imam Hussain Bhi
Hain Ali Raza Wo Naqi Taqi
Hain Imam Baqir-O-Kazmi
Kahin Abdi Kahin Ja’fari
Koi Mahdi Koi Hai Askari
Hai Har Ek Rasool Ki Raushni
Mili Unse Duniya Ko Hai Zia

Badi Shai Hai Nisbate Mustafa
Hai Waseela Apni Najaat Ka

1: Bagh E Jannat Me Nirali Chaman Aarai Hai
2:
Bagh E Jannat Me Nirali Chaman Aarai Hai
Kya Madine Pe Fida Hoke Bahar Aayi Hai

Unke Gesu Nahi Rehmat Ki Ghata Chaayi Hai
Unke Abru Nahi Do Qiblo Ki Yakjayi Hai

Sarewala Unhe Rehmat Ki Ghata Laayi Hai
Haal Bigda Hai Toh Beemaar Ki Ban Aayi Hai

Jiske Haatho Ke Banaye Huye Hai Husno Jamal
Aye Haseen Teri Adaa Usko Pasand Aayi Hai

Tere Jalwo Me Ye Aalam Hai Ki Chashme Aalam
Taab Deedar Nahi Fir Bhi Tamashaayi Hai

Jab Teri Yaad Me Duniya Se Gaya Hai Koi
Jaan Lene Ko Dulhan Ban Ke Kaza Aayi Hai

Darde Dil Kisko Sunao Mai Tumhare Hote
Bekaso Ki Isi Sarkar Me Sunwayi Hai

Chashme Be Khwaab Ke Sadqe Me Hai Bedaar Naseeb
Aap Jaago Toh Hume Chain Ki Neend Aayi Hai

Na Ummido Tumhe Muzda Ki Khuda Rehmat
Unhe Mehshar Me Tumhare Hi Liye Laayi Hai

Aye Hasan Husne Jahaan Taab Ke Sadqe Jau
Zarre Zarre Se Aaya Jalwa E Zebayi Hai

1: Bahar E Jaan Fiza Tum Ho Naseem E Gulsitaan Tum Ho
2:
Bahar E Jaan Fiza Tum Ho, Naseem E Gulsitaan Tum Ho
Bahare Baagh E Rizwan Tum Se Hai Zaibe Jinaa Tum Ho

Khuda Ki Saltanat Ka Do Jahan Mein Kaun Dulha Hai
Tum Hi Tum Ho, Tum Hi Tum Ho Yahan Tum Ho Wahan Tum Ho

Haqeeqat Se Tumhari Juzz Khuda Aur Kaun Waqif Hai
Kahe To Kiya Kahe Koi Chuni Tum Ho Chuna Tum Ho

Nazar ‘arif Ka Har Alam Main Aya Aap Ka ‘alam
Na Hote Tum Tu Kya Hota, Bahar E Har Jahan Tum Ho

Kuja Hum Khaak Uftada Kahan Tum Aye Shahe Waala
Agar Misle Zameen Hum Hain To Misle Asmaan Tum Ho

Ye Kya Maine Kaha Misle Sama Tum Ho Ma’azallah
Munazza Misl Se Bartar Ze Har Wehmo Gumaan Tum Ho

Main Bhoola Aapki Rif’at Se Nisbat Hi Humein Kya Hai
Woh Kehne Bhar Ki Nisbat Thi Kahan Hum Hain Kahan Tum Ho

Humein Umeed Hai Roz E Qayamat Unki Rehmat Say
Ke Farmaaye Idhar Aao Na Mayoos Az Jina Tum Ho

Sitamkaaro Siyahkaro Khatakaro Jafaakaro
Humare Daaman E Rehmat Mein Aajao Kahan Tum Ho

Tumhare Hote Saare Dardo Dukh Kise Kahoon Pyare
Shafiye Aasiyan Tum Ho Wakeele Mujriman Tum Ho

Riyazat Ke Yahi Din Hain Budhape Mein Kahan Himmat
Jo Kuch Karna Hai Abhi Karlo Abhi Noori Jawaan Tum Ho

Faqat Nisbat Ka, Jaise Hoon Haqeeqi Noori Ho Jaaoon
Mujhe Jo Dekhe Keh Uthe Miyan Noori Miyan Tum Ho

1: Baithe Baithe Kaam Saara Ho Gaya
2:
Baithe Baithe Kaam Saara Ho Gaya
Sabz Gumbad Ka Nazaara Ho Gaya

Kar Liya Allah Ne Us Ko Pasand,
Jo Mere Aaqa Ka Pyaara Ho Gaya

Mil Gaya Sadqa Mujhe Aaqa Ka,
Zindagi Bhar Ka Guzaara Ho Gaya

Naam Naame Mustafa Salle Ala,
Besahaaron Ka Sahaara Ho Gaya

Aap Ke Darbaar Gohar Baar Se,
Saare Mangton Ka Guzaara Ho Gaya

Zindagi Bhar Naat Main Padhta Raha
Meri Bakshish Ka Sahaara Ho Gaya

Mohsin Aasi Hai Yaqeen Ye Hashr Mein
Woh Kahenge Tu Hamaara Ho Gaya

1: Bakhshish Ka Silsila Hai Ye Ramzan Kareem Hai
2:
Bakhshish Ka Silsila Hai Ye Ramzan Kareem Hai
Rehmat Ka Aasra Hai Ye Ramzan Kareem Hai

Jo Mango Mil Raha Hai Ye Ramzan Kareem Hai
Ye Faiz Aur Sakha Hai Ye Ramzan Kareem Hai

Aye Bekaso Aye Mujrimo Aye Aasiyo Suno
Gaffaar Kibriya Hai Ye Ramzan Kareem Hai

Har Lehza Barasti Hai Jo Rehmat Ki Barishe
Ye Rab Ka Mahina Hai Ye Ramzan Kareem Hai

Bakhsha Gaya Jo Aamade Ramzan Pe Khush Hua
Kya Paya Martaba Hai Ramzan Kareem Hai

Isko Mila Sharaf Hai Nuzule Qur’an Ka
Jo Rehmato Shifa Hai Ye Ramzan Kareem Hai

Shaitaan Hai Fikar Na Dozakh Ka Koi Darr
Dar Khuld Ka Bhi Wa Hai Ye Ramzan Kareem Hai

Tujhko Naseeb Hogi Bahare Haram Bhi Ab
Tune Jo Paaliya Hai Ye Ramzan Kareem Hai

Sayyed Khuda Ka Shukr Aada Kar Ke Zeest Me
Baare Digar Mila Hai Ye Ramzan Kareem Hai

1: Bakhte Kufta Ne Mujhe Roze Pe Jaane Na Diya
2:
Bakhte Kufta Ne Mujhe Roze Pe Jaane Na Diya
Chashmo Dil Seene Kaleje Se Lagane Na Diya

Aah Qismat Mujhe Dunya K Ghamoo Ne Roka
Ha'ay Taqdeer K Taiba Mujhe Jaane Na Diya

Paoon Thak Jaate Agar Paoon Banata Sar Ko
Sar Ke Bal Jaata Magar Zouf Ne Jaane Na Diya

Sar To Sar Jaan Se Jaane Ki Mujhe Hasrat He
Mot Ne Ha'ay Mujhe Jaan Se Jaane Na Diya

Sharbat E Deed Ne Or Aag Laga De Dil Mein
Tapsh E Dil Ko Barhaya He, Bujaane Na Diya

Ab Kahaan Jae Ga Naksha Tera Mere Dil Se
Tehh Me Rakha He, Ise Dil Ne Gumane Na Diya

Sajda Karta Jo Mujhe Is Ki Ijazat Hoti
Kya Karoon Izn Mujhe Is Ka Khuda Ne Na Diya!

Mere A'amal Ka Badla To Jahannum Hi Tha
Mein To Jaata, Mujhe Sarkar Ne Jaane Na Diya

Mere A'amale Siyah Ne Kiya Jeena Dobar
Zahr Khata, Tere Irshad Ne Khane Na Diya

Nafse Badkaar Ne Dil Par Yeh Qiyamat Tori
Amal E Naik Kiya B To Chupane Na Diya

Itna Kamzor Kiya Zoa'afa E Quwa Ne Mujh Ko
Paanv To Paanv Mujhe Sarr Bhi Uthane Na Diya

Kabhi Beemar E Muhabbat Bhi Hue Hai Achhe
Roz Afzu(N) Hai Marz Kaam Dawa Ne Na Diya

Aur Chamakti Si Ghazal Koi Padho Aye Noori
Rang Apna Abhi Jamne Shu'ara Ne Na Diya

1: Balaghal Ula Bi Kamalihi Kasha Fadduja Bijamalihi (Sallu Alayhi Wa Aalihi)
2:
Balaghal 'ula Bi Kamalihi, Kasha Fadduja Bijamalihi
Hasunat Jami'u Khisaalihi Sallu 'alayhi Wa Aalihi

Wo Kamaal-E-Husn-E-Huzoor Hay, Kay Gumaan-E-Naqs Jahaan Naheen
Yay-Hee Phool Khaar Say Duur Hay, Yay-Hee Sham'a Hai Kay Dhu-Aan Naheen

Do Jahan Ki Behtariyan Nahi, Ke Amaniye Dilo Jaan Nahi
Kaho Kya Hain Wo Jo Yaha Nahi, Magar Ik Nahi Ki Wo Haan Nahi

Teyray Aagay Youn Hayn Dabbay Lachay, Fu-Saha A'rab Kay Barray Barray
Ko-Ee Jaanay Muh Mayn Zubaan Naheen, Naheen Balkay Jism Mein Jaan Naheen

Ba Khuda Khuda Ka Yay-Hee Hay Darr, Nahin Aur Koi Maffar Maqqar
Joe Wahaan Say Ho Yaheen Aakay Ho, Jo Yahaan Naheen Tou Wahan Naheen

Sar-E-'arsh Per Hai Teree Guzar, Dil-E-Farsh Per Hai Teree Nazar
Malakoot-O-Mulk Mayn Ko-Ee Shay, Naheen Wo Tujh Pay A'yaan Naheen

Karuun Tayray Naam Pay Jaan Fida, Na Bas Eyk Jaan Do Jahaan Fida
Do Jahan Say Bhi Nahiin Ji Bhara, Karun Kya Karoron Jahan Nahiin

Sare La Makan Se Talab Hui, Sue Muntaha Wo Chale Nabi
Koi Hadd Hai Unke Urooj Ki, Balaghal 'ula Bi Kamalihi

Wo Khuda Ke Noor Ko Dekh Karbhi, Jahaan Walon Me Agae
Sar-E-'arsh Jaana Kamaal Tha, Ke Waha Se Aana Kamaal Hai

Main Nisaar Tere Kalaam Par Mili Yun To Kisi Ko Zabaan Nahi
Wo Sikhan Hai Jisme Sukhan Na Ho Wo Bayaan Hain Jiska Bayaan Nahi

Hain Unhi Ke Noor Se Sab Ayaan Hain Unhi Ke Jalwo Me Sab Nihaan
Bane Subha Taabishe Mehar Se Rahe Peshe Mehar Yeh Jaan Nahi

Wahi Noor E Haq Wahi Jille Rab Hain Unhi Se Sab Hain Unhi Ka Sab
Nahi Unki Milk Mein Aasmaan Ki Jameen Nahi Ki Jamaan Nahi

Wo-Hee Noor-E-Haq Wo-Hee Zillay Rub Hai Unhee Say Sub Hai Unhee Ka Sub
Naheen Unkee Milk Meyn Aasmaan Ke Zameen Nahin Ke Zamaan Naheen

Wo-Hee Laa Makaan Kay Makeen Huay Sar-E-'arsh Takht Nasheen Huay
Wo Nabee Hai Jiss Kay Hain Yay Makaan Wo Khuda Hai Jiss Ka Makaan Naheen

Kare Mustafa Ki Ihaanatain Khule Bando Uss Pe Yein Jur’ate,
Ke Mein Kya Nahin Hoon Muhammadi? Arey Haan Nahin Arey Haan Nahin.

Woh Sharf Key Qat’a Hain Nisbatain Wo Karam Key Sab Sey Qareeb Hain,
Koi Keh Do Yaas-O-Ummid Sey Wo Kaheen Nahin Wo Kahaan Nahin.

Yeh Nahin Key Khuld Na Ho Neko Wo Nekoi Ki Bhee Hay Aabroo,
Magar Aay Madinah Ki Aarzoo Jise Chahe To Wo Samaa(N) Nahin.

Tera Qad To Naadire Daher Hay Koi Misl Ho To Misaal Dey,
Nahin Gul Key Paudo Mein Daaliya Key Chaman Mein Saro Chamaa Nahin.

Nahin Jis Key Rang Ka Dusra Na To Ho Koi Na Kabhi Huwa,
Kaho Us Ko Gul Kahe Kiya Koi Key Gulo Ka Dher Kahaa Nahin.

Karoon Madhay Ahle-E-Doel Raza Parray Iss Bala Meyn Meyree Balaa
Meyn Gada Hoon Apnay Kareem Ka Meyra Deen Paara-E-Naan Naheen
