1: Bheeni Suhani Subh Mei Thandak Jigar Ki Hai
2:
Bheeni Suhani Subh Mei Thandak Jigar Ki Hai
Kaliyaa(N) Khili Dilo Ki Hawa Ye Kidhar Ki Hai.

Khubti Huwi Nazar Mei Adaa Kis Sahar Ki Hai
Chubhti Huwi Jigar Mei Sadaa Kis Gajar Ki Hai.

Daaley Hari Hari Hai To Baaley Bhari Bhari
Kishte Amal Pari Hai Ye Barish Kidhar Ki Hai.

Hum Jaye Aur Qadam Se Lipat Kar Haram Kahey
Sounpa Khuda Ko Ye Azmat Kis Safar Ki Hai.

Hum Girdey Kaaba Phirte They Kal Tak Aur Aaj Wooh
Hum Par Nisaar Hai Ye Iradat Kidh’ar Ki Hai.

Kalik Jabee(N) Ki Sajdaaye Dar Se Chudaavogey
Mujh Ko Bhi Le Chalo Ye Tamanna Hajar Ki Hai.

Dooba Huwa Hai Shouq Mei Zam Zam Aur Aankh Se
Jhaale Baras Rahey Hai Ye Hasrat Kidhar Ki Hai.

Barsa Ke Jaane Walo Pa Ghouhar Karu Nisaar
Abrey Karam Se Arz Ye Mizaabey Zar Ki Hai.

Aagooshe Shouq Kholey Hai Jin Ke Liye Hateem
Woh Phir Ke Dekhte Nahi Ye Dhun Kidhar Ki Hai.

Haa’n Haa’n Rahey Madina Hai Ghafil Zara Tu Jaag
Wo Paav Rakhne Waley Ye Jaa Chashmo Sar Ki Hai.

Waaru Qadam Qadam Pa Kay Har Dam Hai Jaane Nao
Ye Raahey Jaa(N) Fiza Mere Moula Ke Dar Ki Hai.

Ghadiya Gini Hai Barso Ke Ye Shubh Ghadi Phiri
Marmar Ke Phir Ye Sil Mere Seene Se Sar Ki Hai.

Allaho Akbar Apne Qadam Aur Ye Khaakey Pak
Hasrat Malai’ka Ko Jahaan Waz’ye Sar Ki Hai.

Mea’raj Ka Sama Hai Kaha Pahonchey Zae’roo
Kursi Se Onchi Kursi Usi Pak Ghar Ki Hai.

Ushhaq Rouza Sajdey Mei Suye Haram Jhukey
Allah Jaanta Hai Ke Niyyat Kidhar Ki Hai.

Ye Ghar Ye Dar Hai Uska Jo Ghar Dar Se Paak Hai
Muzhdah Ho Be-Gharo Kay Salaa Achchey Ghar Ki Hai.

Mehboobe Rabbe Arsh Hai Is Sabz Qubba Mei
Pahlu Mei Jalwa Gah Ateeqo Umar Ki Hai.

Chaye Malaika Hai Lagaatar Hai Durood
Badley Hai Pahrey Badli Mei Barish Durar Ki Hai

Sa’dayn Ka Qiraan Hai Pahluye Maah Mei
Jhurmut Kiye Hai Taarey Tajalli Qamar Ki Hai.

Sattar Hazaar Subh Mei Sattar Hazaar Shaam
Yun Bandagiye Zulfo Rukh Aatho Pahar Ki Hai.

Jo Ek Baar Aye Dobara Na Ayenge
Rukhsat Hi Bargah Se Bas Is Qadar Ki Hai.

Tadpa Karey Badal Ke Phir Aana Kaha Naseeb
Bey Hukm Kab Majaal Parinde Ko Par Ki Hai.

Ay Waye Beikasiye Tammana Ke Ab Ummeed
Din Ko Na Shaam Ki Hai Na Shab Ko Sahar Ki Hai

Ye Badliya(N) Na Ho To Karooro(N) Ki Aas Jaye
Aur Bargaahe Marhamate Aaam Tar Ki Hai.

Masoom Ko Hai Umr Mei Sirf Ek Bar Bar
Aasi Padey Rahe To Sila Umr Bhar Ki Hai.

Zinda Rahe To Haazriye Baargaah Naseeb
Mar Jaye To Hayaate Abad Aysh Ghar Ki Hai.

Moflis Aur Aisey Dar Se Phirey Be-Ghani Huve
Chandi Har Ek Tarah To Yaha Gadiya Gar Ki Hai.

Jaana Pe Takiya Khaak Nihali Hai Dil Nihaal
Han Be-Nawa’o Khoob Ye Sorat Guzar Ki Hai.

Hai Chatro Takht Saya-E Dewaaro Khaake Dar
Shaho Ko Kab Naseeb Ye Dhaj Karro Far Ki Hai.

Iss Paak Ku Mei Khaak Ye Basar Sar-Ba-Khaak Hai,
Samjhe Hai Kuch Yahi Jo Haqiqat Basar Ki Hai.

Kyo Taajdaaro! Khwaab Mei Dheki Kabi Ye Shai
Jo Aaj Jholiyo Mei Gadhayaane Dar Ki Hai.

Jaaru-Kasho Mei Chehre Likhey Hai Mulook Ke
Wo Bhi Kaha Naseeb Faqat Naam Bhar Ki Hai.

Taiba Mei Mar Ke Thande Chaley Jaav Aankhey Bandh
Seedhi Sadak Ye Shahre Shafa’t Nagar Ki Hai.

Aasi Bhi Hai Chahitey Ye Taiba Hai Zahido!
Makka Nahi Ke Jaanch Jaha Khair O Shar Ki Hai.

Shaane Jamaal Taiba Jana Hai Naf’a Mahaz
Wus’at Jalale Makka Mei Soodo Zar Ki Hai.

Kaba Hai Beshak Anjum-Aara Dulhan Magar
Saari Bahar Dhulhano Mei Dulha Ke Ghar Ki Hai.

Kaba Dhulhan Hai Turbate At-Har Nayi Dulhan
Ye Rashk E Aftaab Wo Gairat Qamar Ki Hai.

Dono Bani Sajeeli Aneeli Bani Magar
Jo Pe’ Ke Paas Hai Wo Suhagan Kun’war Ki Hai.

Sar Sabze Wasl Ye Hai Siyaa Poshey Hijr Wo
Chamki Dupatto Se Hai Jo Haalat Jigar Ki Hai.

Ma Wo Shuma To Kya Ke Khaleel E Jaleel Ko
Kal Dhekna Ki Unse Tamanna Nazar Ki Hai.

Apna Sharaf Dua Se Hai Baaki Raha Kabool
Ye Jaane Unke Haath Mei Kunji Asar Ki Hai.

Jo Chahey Unse Maang Ki Dono Jahaa’n Ki Khair
Zar Na-Khareeda Ek Kaneez Unke Ghar Ki Hai.

Roomi Ghulam Din Habshi Baandiya(N) Shab’e
Ginti Kaneez Zaado Mei Shaamo Sahar Ki Hai.

Itna Ajab Bulandiye Jannat Pe Kisliye
Dekha Nahi Ke Bheek Ye Kis Unchey Ghar Ki Hai.

Arshe Bari Pe Kyo Na Ho Firdous Ka Dimaagh
Utri Huvi Shabeeh Tere Baamo Dar Ki Hai.

Wo Khuld Jismei Utregi Abrar Ki Baraat
Adna Nichawar Uss Mere Dulha Ke Sar Ki Hai.

Amber Zamee(N), Abeer Huwa Mushke-Tar Gubaar
Adna Si Ye Shanaakhat Teri Rahguzar Ki Hai.

Sarkaar Hum Gawaro Mei Tarze Adab Kaha
Humko To Bas Tameez Yahi Bheek Bhar Ki Hai.

Maangenge Maange Jayenge Muh Maangi Payenge
Sarkar Mei Na Laa Hai Na Hajat Agar Ki Hai.

Uff Be-Hayayi’aa Ke Ye Muh Aur Tere Huzoor
Ha Tu Kareem Hai Teri Khu’ Dar Guzar Ki Hai.

Tujh Se Chupau Muh To Karu Kiske Saamne
Kya Aur Bhi Kisi Se Tawaqqo Nazar Ki Hai.

Jaavu Kaha Pukaru Kisey Kiska Muh Taku
Kia Pursish Aur Ja’ Bhi Sagey Be-Hunar Ki Hai.

Baab E At’a To Ye Hai Jo Bahka Idhar Udhar
Kaisi Kharaabi Uss Nagharey Dar-Ba-Dar Ki Hai.

Aabad Ek Dar Hai Tera Aur Tere Siwa
Jo Baargah Dekhiye Ghairat Khandar Ki Hai.

Lub Wa Hai Aankhey Bandh Hai Phayli Hai Jholiya
Kitne Maaze Ki Bheek Tere Paak Dar Ki Hai.

Ghera Andheriyo Ne Duh’ee Hai Chand Ki
Tanha Hu Kaali Raat Hai Manzil Khatar Ki Hai.

Kismat Mei Laakh Pech Ho Sau Bal Hazaar Kaj
Ye Saari Ghutthi Ik Teri Seedhi Nazar Ki Hai.

Aisi Bandhi Naseeb Khule Mushkiley Khuli
Dono Jaha Mei Dhoom Tumhari Kamar Ki Hai.

Jannat Na Dey Na Dey Teri Ruyat Ho Khair Se
Is Ghul Ke Aagey Kisko Hawas Bargho Bar Ki Hai.

Sharbat Na Dey Na Dey To Karey Baat Lutf Se
Ye Shahad Ho To Phir Kise Parwa Shakar Ki Hai.

Mai Khana-Zaad Kohna Hu Surat Likhi Huwi
Bando Kaneezo Mei Mere Madar Pedar Ki Hai.

Mangta Ka Haath Uth-Te Hi Daata Ki Dayn Thi
Doori Qubool O Arz Mei Bas Haath Bhar Ki Hai.

Sanki Wo Dekh Baad’e Shafat Ki De Hawa
Ye Aabru Raza Tere Damaan E Tar Ki Hai

1: Bigri Bhi Banaeinge Jalwe Bhi Dikhaeinge
2:
Bigri Bhi Banaeinge Jalwe Bhi Dikhaeinge
Ghabrao Na Deewano Sarkar Bolain Ge
Ghabrao Na Deewano Sarkar Bolain Ge

Hum Masjid E Nabawi Key Dekhe Ge Minaron Ko
Aur Gumbad E Khazran Key Purnoor Nazaron Ko
Hum Ja Key Madina Phir Wapis Nahi Aay Ge

Dil Ishq E Nabi Mey Tum Kuch Aur Tarapne Do
Is Deed Ki Atish Ko Kuch Aur Bharakne Do
Hum Tishna Dily Chal Kar Zam Zam Sey Bojhay Ge

Jab Hashar Key Medan Mey Eik Hashar Bapaa Ho Ga
Jab Fesla Ummat Ka Karny Ko Khuda Ho Ga
Ummat Ko Shahe Bat Haa Kamli Mey Chupain Ge

Mil Jay Gi Tabirein Eik Rooz To Khawaboo Ki
Gir Jay Gein Dewarein Sab Dekhna Rahoo Ki
Hum Roza E Aqdas Par Jab Ansoo Bahain Ge

Li Llah Muhammad Sey Rodad Meri Kehna
Ye Poch Key Aaqa Sey Ey Hajion Tum Ana
Ishrat Ko Dare Aqdas Kab Aap Bolain Ge

1: Bismillah (I Am A Muslim)
2:
I Am A Muslim, The Things I Say
In Everything I Do Everyday
We Are Muslims, The Things We Say
In Everything We Do Everyday

Oooh, Bismillah,
Oooh, Alhamdullillah

I Am A Muslim And This I Know
I Need To Eat So That I Will Grow
We Are Muslims And This We Know
We Need To Eat So That We Will Grow
When We Eat We Say Bismillah
When We're Full, We Say Alhamdullillah

Water, Juice And Milk, These I Think
Are So Delicious For Me To Drink
Water, Juice And Milk, These We Think
Are So Delicious For Us To Drink
When We Drink We Say, Bismillah
When We're Done We Say Alhamdullillah

Going Out With My Mum And Dad
Coming Home, Oh What Fun We Had
Going Out With Our Mum And Dad
Coming Home, Oh What Fun We Had
Driving In The Car, Bismillah
Coming Safely Home, Alhamdullillah

I Go To Sleep Saying Allah's Name
And In The Morning I Do The Same
We Go To Sleep Saying Allah's Name
And In The Morning We Do The Same
When We Sleep We Say Bismillah
When We Rise We Say Alhamdullillah

1: Bohot Din Ho Gaye Taiba Ke Raste Dekh To Aaye
2:
Bohot Din Ho Gaye Taiba Ke Raste Dekh To Aaye
Chalo Us Shehr Ko Ik Baar Phir Se Dekh To Aaye

Utar Jaayegi Mehroomi Ki Chaadar Shehre Taiba Mein
Chamak Uthenge Qismat Ke Sitaare Dekh To Aaye

Judaayi Ke Dhulenge Naqsh Gehre Dil Ki Takhti Se
Chadhega Range Qurbat Wo Nazaare Dekh To Aaye

Usi Din Aarzuon Ke Khandar Mein Raushni Hogi
Dare Sarkaar Ke Raushan Ujaale Dekh To Aaye

Huzoori Ki Woh Pehli Pehli Saa'at Khoob Rulaati Hai
Nigaahon Ko Ussi Dar Ki Talab Hai Dekh To Aaye

Haseen Palkhon Ka Chilman Kholenge Jaa Kar Madine Mein
Sadaa Aankhon Mein Rakhenge Woh Jalwe Dekh To Aaye

Mehekti Khushbuen Khud Hi Pata Us Shehar Ka Dengi
Ujaagar Uttho Himmat Karlo Chal Ke Dekh To Aaye

1: Bulalo Phir Mujhay Ey Shahe Bahrobar Madinay Main
2:
Bulalo Phir Mujhay Ey Shahe Bahrobar Madinay Main
Main Phir Rota Huwa Aaoon, Teray Dar Par Madinay Mein.

Mein Pohunchoon Koey Jana Mein, Ghareeban Chak Seena Chak
Gira Day Kash Mujhko Showk Tarpa Kar Madinay Mein.

Mein Unka Deewana, Madinay Mein Bari Shaan Gaya
Chak Dil, Chak Jigar, Chak Ghareeban Gaya.

Madinay Jaaney Waalo Jaao Jaao Fi Aman'illah
Kabi Toh Apna Bhi Lag Jaey Ga Bistar Madinay Main.

Salaam-E-Showq Kehna Haajio Meraa Bhi Ro Ro Kar
Tumhe Aae Nazar Jab Roza E Anwar Madinay Mein.

Zahe Muqaddar Huzur-E-Haq Say Salaam Aaya Payam Aaya
Jhukao Nazreen Bichao Palkeen Adab Ka Aala Maqam Aaya.

Yeh Rahe-Haq Hai Sambhal Ke Chalna Yahan Hai Manzil Qadam Qadam Par
Pohanchna Dar Par To Kehna Aaqa Salaam Lijiye Ghulam Aaya.

Yeh Kehna Aaqa Bohat Se Aashiq Taraptey Se Choor Aaya Hoon Mein
Bulawe Ke Muntazir Hain Lekin Na Subah Aaya Na Sham Aaya.

Payame Showk Letay Jao Mera Kafilay Walo
Sunaana Dastaney Gham Meri Ro Kar Madinay Main.

Paye Tableegay Sunnat Tu Jahan Rakay Maghar Aae Kash
Main Khawaboon Mein Puhanchta Hee Rahoon Aqsar Madinay Mein.

Madina Is Liye Attar Jaan-O-Dil Say Hai Pyara
Key Rehtay Hain Meray Aaqa, Meray Dil Bar Madinay Main.

Na Dowlat Dey Nah Showhrat Dey, Mujhay Bas Yeh Sahaadat Dey
Teray Kadmo Main Marjaoon, Main Ro Ro Kar Madinay Main.

Meraa Gham Bhi Toh Dekho, Main Paraa Hoo Duur Tayba Sey
Sukoon Aey'ga Bas Meraa Dil-E-Muztar Madinay Main.

Wahan Ik Saas Miljaye Yehi Hai Zeest Ka Haasil
Vo Kismet Ka Dhani Hao Jo Gaya Dam Bhar Madiney Mein.

Chalo Chaukat Pe Unki Rak Ke Sar Qurbaan Ho Jaye
Hayat E Jaan Vidaani Paayengey Mar Kar Madiney Mein.

Madina Is Liye Attar Jaan-O-Diil Sey Hai Pyaara
Key Rehtay Hain Meray Aqa Meray Diil Bar Madinay Main.

1: Bulwaya Jo Rauze Par Ek Nazre Karam Kardo
2:
Bulwaya Jo Rauze Par Ek Nazre Karam Kardo
Tum Hi Ho Mere Sarwar Ek Nazre Karam Kardo

Dil Mere Kiya Chalni Apne Ho Ke Begaane
Lafzon Ke Diye Nashtar Ek Nazre Karam Kardo

Bigdi Huwi Banti Hai Har Baat Madine Me
Haajat Hai Ayaa Tum Par Ek Nazre Karam Kar Do

Tum Raafat O Rehmat Ho Tum Qaasime Ne’mat Ho
Shafqat Ke Ho Tum Paikar Ek Nazre Karam Kar Do

Bardo Meri Jholi Ko Badi Door Se Aaya Hu
Baitha Hu Main Chaukhat Par Ek Nazre Karam Kar Do

Kyun Kis Se Kahu Dil Ki Tum Sunte Ho Sab Dil Ki
Haalaat Ho Ab Behtar Ek Nazre Karam Kar Do

Tehreek Ke Daa’i Ko Daaman Me Panaah De Do
Rehmat Ho Sada Hum Par Ek Nazre Karam Kar Do

Kya Khoob Nibhaya Hai Shakir Ko Shaha Tum Ne
Apne Ho Tumhi Yaawar Ek Nazre Karam Kar Do

1: Chaayaa Hai Kaif Dil Par Qadmon Me Baith Kar
2:
Chaayaa Hai Kaif Dil Par Qadmon Me Baith Kar
Hai Auj Par Muqaddar Qadmon Me Baith Kar

Khushboo E Mustafa Sey ‘aalam Mehak Raha Hai
Main Bhi Huwa Mu’attar Qadmon Me Baith Kar

Taskeen E Qalb Mujh Ko Phir Sey Huwi Hai Haasil
Roodaad E Gham Sunaa Kar Qadmon Me Baith Kar

Kya Ab Bhi Meyre Rab Ka Mujh Par Karam Na Hoga
Phailey Hain Haath Dar Par Qadmon Me Baith Kar

Taiba Me Rehmaton Ki Baarish Baras Rahi Hai
Deykha Hai Pyaara Manzar Qadmon Me Baith Kar

Ghaus O Raza Key Sadqey Khwaaja Piya Key Sadqey
Iftaar Hai Mayassar Qadmon Me Baith Kar

Noor E Nabi Se ‘aalam Roshan Huwa Hai Shakir
Dil Bhi Huwa Munawwar Qadmon Me Baith Kar

Sultan E Do Jahan Ka Tujh Par Karam Hai Shakir
Aankhain Huwi Hain Phir Tar Qadmon Me Baith Kar

1: Chala Madina Zauya Ho Chala Madina Zaauya (Marathi Naat)
2:
Chala Madina Zauya Ho Chala Madina Zaauya
Sarv Jagi Je Mahan Aahe Makka Madina Pahu Ya

Tiyanch Sangna Konhi Zahla Aani Na Honar Koni
Paropkari Manawteche Charitra Tiyanchech Gheu Ya

Adhin Tyanch Hukmache Pashaan Wriksh Aani Pakshi Pashu
Tyancha Karita Surya Paratla Chandra Dubhangla Pahu Ya

Nil Gagan Aakasha Peksha Mahan Aahe Tech Nagar
Swarga Peksha Sundar Aahe Chala Madina Pahu Ya

Mahan Tyancha Jancha Warnan Quran Madhe Paano Paani
Tyanchi Mamta (Raficha)aamcha Sange Geet Tyanchech Gauya

1: Chalo Diyaar E Nabi Ki Jaanib Durood Lab Par Saja Saja Kar
2:
Chalo Diyaar-E-Nabi Ki Jaanib Durood Lab Par Saja Saja Kar
Bahaar Luuttain Ge Ham Karam Ki Dilon Ko Daman Bana Bana Kar

Na Un Ke Jesa Sakhi Hei Koii Na Un Ke Jesa Ghani Hei Koii
Wo Be-Nawa-O Ka Har Jaga Se Nawaazte Hein Bula Bula Kar

Mein Wo Nikamma Hun Jisski Jholi Main Koii Husn-E-Amal Nahiin Hei
Magar Wo Ihsaan Kar Rahe Hein Khata-Ain Meri Chhupa Chhupa Kar

Hei Unki Ummat Se Pyaar Kitna Karam Hei Rahmat Sha’aar Kitna
Hamaare Jurmon Ko Dho Rahe Hein Wo Apne Aansu Baha Baha Kar

Yahi Asaas-E-Amal Hei Meri Issi Se Bigrri Bani Hei Meri
Samett-Ta Hun Karam Khuda Ka Nabi Ki Naatain Suna Suna Kar

Wo Raahain Ab Tak Saji Huii Hein Dilon Ka Kaaba Bani Huii Hein
Jahaan Jahaan Se Huzur Guzre Hein Naqsh Apna Jama Jama Kar

Agar Muqaddar Ne Yaawri Ki Agar Madine Gya Mein Khaalid
Qadam Qadam Khaak Uss Gali Ki Mein Chuum Lun Ga Uttha Uttha Kar

1: Chamak Tujhse Paate Hain Sab Paane Waale
2:
Chamak Tujhse Paate Hain Sab Paane Waale
Mera Dil Bhi Chamka De Chamkane Waale

Barasta Nahi Dekh Kar Abr E Rehmat
Badoo(N) Par Bhi Barsa De Barsane Waale

Tu Zinda Hai Wallah Tu Zinda Hai Wallah
Mere Chashme Aalam Se Chup Jaane Waale

Madine Ke Khitte Khuda Tujhko Rakhhe
Ghareebo Faqeero Ke Thehrane Waale

Me Mujrim Hu Aaqa Mujhe Saath Le Lo
Ke Raste Me Hai Jaa Baja Thane Waale

Haram Ki Zamee(N) Aur Qadam Rakh Ke Chalna
Are Sar Ka Mouqa Hai O Jaane Waale

Chal Uth Zabah Farsa Ho Saaki Ke Dar Par
Dar E Jood Hai Mere Mastane Waale

Tera Khaye Tere Ghulamo Se Uljhe
Hai Munkir Ajab Khaane Gurrane Waale

Rahega Yu Hi Unka Charcha Rahega
Pade Khaaq Ho Jaye Jal Jaane Waale

Ab Aayi Shafa’at Ki Sa’at Ab Aayi
Zara Chain Le Mere Ghabhrane Waale

Raza Nafs Dushman Hai Dumme Na Aana
Kaha Tumne Dekhe Hai Chandrane Waale

1: Chamane Taiba Mein Sumbul Jo Sawaare Gesu
2:
Chamane Taiba Mein Sumbul Jo Sawaare Gesu
Hoor Badh Kar Shikane Naaz Pe Waare Gesu

Ki Jo Baalon Se Tere Rauze Ki Jaaroob Kashi
Shab Ko Shabnam Ne Tabarruk Ko Hain Dhaare Gesu

Hum Siyah Kaaron Pe Ya Rab Tapishe Mahshar Mein
Saaya Afgan Hon Tere Pyare Ke Pyare Gesu

Charche Hooron Mein Hain Dekho To Zara Baale Burraq
Sumbule Khuld Ke Qurban Utare Gesu

Aakhire Hajj Ghame Ummat Mein Paresha(N) Ho Kar
Teerah Bakhton Ki Shafa’at Ko Sidhare Gesu

Gosh Tak Sunte The Fariyad Ab Aaye Taa Dosh
Ki Bane Khana Badoshon Ko Sahare Gesu

Sukhe Dhano(N) Pe Humare Bhi Karam Ho Jaaye
Chaye Rehmat Ki Ghata Ban Ke Tumhare Gesu

Ka’baye Jaa(N) Ko Pinhaya Hai Gilafe Mushkee(N)
Udh Ke Aaye Hain Jo Abr Pe Tumhare Gesu

Silsila Paa Ke Shafa’at Ka Jhuke Padte Hain
Sajdaye Shukr Ke Karte Hain Ishare Gesu

Mushk Boo Koocha Ye Kis Phool Ka Jhada Un Se
Hooriyo Ambare Saara Huye Saare Gesu

Dekho Qur’an Me Shabe Qadr Hai Ta Matlaye Fajr
Ya’ni Nazdeek Hain Aariz Ke Woh Pyare Gesu

Bheeni Khushboo Se Mahak Jaati Hain Galiya(A) Wallah
Kaise Phoolo Mein Basaye Hain Tumhare Gesu

Shaane Rehmat Hai Ki Shaana Na Juda Ho Dam Bhar
Seena Chaakon Pe Kuch Is Darja Hain Pyare Gesu

Shaana Hai Panjaye Qudrat Tere Baalon Ke Liye
Kaise Haathon Ne Shaha Tere Saware Gesu

Uhade Paak Ki Choti Se Ulajh Le Shab Bhar
Subah Hone Do Shabe Eid Ne Haare Gesu

Muzda Ho Qibla Se Ghanghor Ghatayen Umdee
Abroouon Par Woh Jhuke Jhoom Ke Baare Gesu

Taare Sheerazaye Majmuaye Kaunain Hain Yeh
Haal Khul Jaaye Jo Ik Dum Hon Kanare Gesu

Tel Ki Boonde Tapakti Nahi Baalon Se Raza
Subhe Aariz Pe Lutate Hain Sitare Gesu.

1: Chamka Mahe Noor Ka Hilal Marhaba
2:
Ya Rasool Allah Marhaba Marhaba,
Ya Habib Allah Marhab Marhaba.

Bay Kasun Say Hai Jinhay Pyar Wohi Aaye Hain,
Jo Do Aalam Kay Hain Ghum Khaar Wohi Aaye Hain.

Ek Nazar Asmaan Per Daal, Marhaba,
Chamka Mah-E-Noor Ka Hilal, Marhaba.

Ya Rasool Allah Marhaba Marhaba,
Ya Habib Allah Marhab Marhaba.

Jhanday Lagao Galiyan Sajao,
Karlo Charaghan Ghar Jagmagao,
Razi Ho Ga Rab-E-Zuljalal, Marhaba.

Ya Rasool Allah Marhaba Marhaba,
Ya Habib Allah Marhab Marhaba.

Mehfil Sajaayein Naatein Sunaein,
Aaqa Ki Aamad Ki Dhoomain Machayein,
Roz-O-Shab Yehi Ho Apna Haal, Marhaba.

Ya Rasool Allah Marhaba Marhaba,
Ya Habib Allah Marhab Marhaba.

Laaraib Nabiyon Kay Saalar Aaye,
Aaye Do Aalam K Ghum Khaar Aaye,
Shahkaar-E-Rab-E-Zuljalal, Marhaba.

Ya Rasool Allah Marhaba Marhaba,
Ya Habib Allah Marhab Marhaba.

Aashiq Key Dil Jagmaganay Lagay Hain,
Dekho Zara Muskuranay Lagay Hain,
Deedni Hain Unkay Khad-O-Khaal, Marhaba.

Ya Rasool Allah Marhaba Marhaba
Ya Habib Allah Marhab Marhaba

Sadqa Wiladat Ka Jalwa Dikha Do,
Dil Ki Lagi Ab To Aaqa Bujha Do,
Dikhla Do Apna Ab Jamaal, Marhaba.

Ya Rasool Allah Marhaba Marhaba,
Ya Habib Allah Marhab Marhaba.

Jood-O-Sakhawat Hai Aadat Tumhari,
Phailaaye Daaman Kharay Hain Bhikari,
Kar Do Karam Amna K Laal, Marhaba.

Ya Rasool Allah Marhaba Marhaba,
Ya Habib Allah Marhab Marhaba.

Jaam-E-Shahadat Piya Hai Jinho Ne,
Ahle-Sunan Ko Jila Di Unho Na,
Yaad Aayengay Wo Har Saal, Marhaba.

Ya Rasool Allah Marhaba Marhaba
Ya Habib Allah Marhab Marhaba

Shaadi Kay Naghmay Sunatay Rahengay,
Jashn-E-Wiladat Manaatay Rahengay,
Waar Daingay Tum Pay Jaan-O-Maal, Marhaba.

Ya Rasool Allah Marhaba Marhaba
Ya Habib Allah Marhab Marhaba

Parhnay Laga Jab Ubaid Un Ki Naatein,
Honay Lageen Chaar Soo Us Ki Baatein,
Faiz-E-Raza Ka Hai Sub Kamaal, Marhaba.

Ya Rasool Allah Marhaba Marhaba
Ya Habib Allah Marhab Marhaba

1: Chand Se Unke Chehre Par Ghesue Mushk Faam Do
2:
Chand Se Unke Chehre Par Ghesue Mushk Faam Do
Din Hai Khila Hua Magar Waqte Sahar Hai Sham Do

Khair Se Din Khuda Wo Laye Dono Haram Hame Dikhaye
Zamzam O Beer E Fatima Ke Piyenge Chalke Jaam Do

Talwo Se Unke Chaar Chand Lag Gaye Mahromah Ko
Hai Yeh Unhi Ki Tabishe Aur Hain Unhi Ke Naam Do

Haatho Se Chaar Yaar Ke Hum Ko Milenge Chaar Jaam
Daste Hasan Husain Se Aur Milenge Jaam Do

Unki Jabeen E Naaz Par Zulf E Siyaah Bikhar Gayi
Jam'a Hain Ek Waqt Me Jiddain E Subha Wa Shaam Do

Zaate Hasan Husain Hai Ahle Shabeehe Mustafa
Zaat Hain Ek Nabi Ki Zaat Aur Hain Unhi Ke Naam Do

Aarize Noor Bar Se Bikhri Hui Hati Jo Zulf
Ek Andheri Raat Me Nikle Mahe Tamaam Do

Pike Pila Ke Maiksho Kuch To Bachi-Kuchi Hi Do
Qatra Do Qatra Hi Sahi Kuch To Barah-E-Naam Do

Ab To Madine Lo Bula Gumbad E Sabz Do Dikha
Haamid O Mustafa Tere Hind Me Hain Ghulaam Do

-------------------More----------------------
------------------Verses---------------------

Ye Majlise Ghazal Nahi Muh Ko Zara Lagaam Do

1: Chand Taare Hi Kya Dekte Reh Gaye
2:
Chand Taare Hi Kya Dekte Reh Gaye
Unko Arzo Sama Dekhte Reh Gaye

Ham Daray Mustafa Dekhtay Reh Ga-Ay,
Noor Hi Noor Tha, Dekhtay Reh Ga-Ay.

Par Ke Rooh Ul Amin Soorah E Wadduha
Soorat E Mustafa Dekhte Reh Gaye

Woh Imamat Ki Shab Woh Saf E Ambiya
Muqtadi Muqtada Dekhte Reh Gaye

Woh Gaye Arsh Tak Aur Rooh Ul Amin
Sidrah Tul Muntaha Dekhte Reh Gaye

Nek O Badh Par Hua Unka Yaksa Karam
Log Acha Bura Dekhte Reh Gaye

Kya Khabar Kis Ko Kab Jaam E Kauthar Mila
Hum Toh Unki Ada Dekhte Reh Gaye

Ho Ke Gum Aye Naseer Unke Jalwo Me Hum
Shaan E Rabul Ulaa Dekhte Reh Gaye

Baar Baar Tauba Ki Aur Phir Torr Di
Woh Habib-E-Khuda Maaf Karte Rahe

Ya Rasul Llah Ya Habiba Llah
Mere Sar Ko Haram Ki Fiza Chahiye

Ya Rasool Llah Ya Habiba Llah
Mere Dil Ko Dar-E-Mustafa Chahiye

Fazl-E-Rabb-Ul-‘ula Aur Kya Chahiye
Mil Gaye Mustafa Aur Kya Chahiye

Chand Taaray Hi Kyaa, Dekhtay Reh Ga-Ay,
Unko Arzo Samaa Dekhtay Reh Ga-Ay.

1: Changa Nabi Da Naam Ay
2:
Changa Nabi Da Naam Ay
Changian Nabi Diyan Shaanan

Zikr Nabi Da Kar Deya Rehna Changa Lagda Ey
Ais Bahane Ral Mil Behna Changa Lagda Hai

Masjid Nabawi De Wich Jaakeh Nukre Hoke Bai Jaana
Roz-E-Paak Nu Tak Deya Rehna Changa Lagda Ey

Aale Nabi Di Izzat Khaatir Which Ukhaare De
Shaykh Junaid Da Jaan Keh Taina Changa Lagda Ey

Jaaliyan Koul Khalouna Uchi Saah Na Lehna Ro Lehna
Boulan Naaloun Chup Kar Rehna Changa Lagda Ey

1: Charche Hain Yehi Ghar Ghar Eidon Ki Hai Eid Aayi
2:
Charche Hain Yehi Ghar Ghar
Eidon Ki Hai Eid Aayi
Aaye Hain Nabi Sarwar
Eidon Ki Hai Eid Aayi

Kiya Koonch Hawaaon Ne
Di Khabar Fizaaon Ne
Badle Hai Sabhi Manzar
Eidon Ki Hai Eid Aayi

Rehmat Ka Phera Huwa
Sab Door Andhera Huwa
Gayi Raat Aur Aayi Sahar
Eidon Ki Eid Aayi

Kaha Baagh Bahaaron Ne
Sayyaar Sitaaron Ne
Kehte Hain Shamso Qamar
Eidon Ki Eid Aayi

Khush Momin Hone Lage
Aur Shaitaan Rone Lage
Jis Waqt Suni Ye Khabar
Eidon Ki Eid Aayi

Na Kabhi Ghabraaya Kar
Tu Jashn Manaaya Kar
Khush Ho Ke Yahi Sagar
Eidon Ki Eid Aayi

1: Chor Fikr Duniya Ki Chal Madine Chalte Hain
2:
Chor Fikr Duniya Ki, Chal Madine Chalte Hain,
Mustafa Ghulamo Ki Qismatein Badal Te Hain

Rehmato Ke Badal Ke Saaye Saath Chalte Hain
Mustafa Ke Deewane, Ghar Se Jab Nikalte Hain

Aamena Ke Pyare Ka, Sabz Gumbad Waale Ka
Jashn Hum Manate Hain Jalne Waale Jalte Hain

Humko Roz Milta Hain Sadqa Pyare Aaqa Ka
Unke Dar Ke Tukdo Par Khush Naseeb Palte Hain

Naqsh Kar Le Seene Par Naam Sarwar E Deen Ka
Yay Wo Naam Hain Jis Se Sab Azaab Ttaltay Hain

Sirf Saari Duniya Me, Wo Taibah Ki Galiya(N) Hain
Jis Jagah Pe Hum Jaise, Khote Sikke Chalte Hain

Sach Hain Gair Ka Ehsaan, Wo Kabhi Nahi Lete
Ay Aleem Aaqa Ke Jo Tukdo Pe Palte Hain

Naat E Mustafa Sunn Kar Aag Sard Hoti Hain
Zikr E Mustafa Sunn Kar Sangay Dil Pigaltay Hain

Ziker E Shahebatha Ko, Wird Ab Bana Legiye
Ye Wo Ziker He Jis Se, Gham Khoshi Me Dalte Hain

Un Ko Kia Zarorat He, Iter Mushk Amber Ki
Khaak Jo Madina Ki, Apne Tan Pe Malte Hain

1: Daagh E Furqate Taiba Qalb Muzmahil Jaata
2:
Daagh-E-Furqate Taiba Qalb Muzmahil Jaata
Kaash Gumbade Khazraa Dekhne Ko Mil Jaata

Mera Dam Nikal Jaata Unke Aastane Par
Unke Aastaane Ki Khaak Mai Mein Mil Jaata

Mere Dil Se Dhul Jaata Daaghe Furqate Taiba
Taiba Mai Fanaa Ho Kar Taiba Mai Hi Mil Jaata

Maut Le Ke Aa Jaati Zindagi Madine Mein
Maut Se Gale Mil Kar Zindagi Mein Mil Jaata

Khuld Zaare Taiba Ka Is Tarha Safar Hota
Peeche Peeche Sar Jaata Aage Aage Dil Jaata

Dil Pe Jab Kiran Parti Unke Sabz Gumbad Ki
Uski Sabz Rangat Se Baagh Ban Ke Khil Jaata

Furqate Madina Ne Woh Diye Mujhe Sadme
Koh Par Agar Padte Koh Bhi To Hil Jaata

Dil Pe Woh Qadam Rakhte Naqshe Paa Yeh Dil Banta
Yaa To Khaak-E-Paa Ban Kar Paa Se Muttasil Jaata

Un Ke Dar Pe Akhtar Ki Hasratein Hui Poori
Saaile Dare Aqdas Kaise Munfa`il Jaata

1: Dar Pe Bulawo Makki Madni Bigri Banawo Makki Madni
2:
Madine Punchun Ga Yaaaro, Mujhe Yaqeen To Hai
Keh Yeh Safar Mere Hathon Ke Lakiron Mein Hai
Dar Pe Bulawo Makki Madni, Bigri Banawo Makki Madni

Mai Aaoun Madine Meri Auqaa Nahi Hai,
Gar Aap Bulalen To Badi Baat Nahi Hai,
Dar Pe Bulawo Makki Madni,

Deed Teri Ho Eid Meir, Eid Meri
Deed Karao Makki Madni,
Dar Pe Bulao Makki Madni

Mehshar Me Ho Lab Pe Mere
Mujh Ko Bachawo Makki Madni
Dar Pe Bulawo Makki Madni

Ghumbad Ke Khazra Ke Saye Tale
Mujh Ko Sulao Makki Madni,
Dar Pe Bulao Makki Madni

Apne Nawason Ka Sadqa
Dukhre Mitao Makki Madni,
Dar Pe Bulao Makki Madni

Asdi Gunaho Me Dooba Huwa Hai
Jaisa He Nibhao Makki Madni,
Dar Pe Bulao Makki Madni.

Hai Aarzoo Hai Mere Seene Mein
Dam Nikle Mera Madine Mein
Madad Ko Aayo, Makki Madni.

Mangta Hu(N) Me Sawaali Hoon,
Ishq-E-Nabi Ka Pujaari Hu(N),
Thokaren Khaata Hu(N) Dar Dar Ki,

Har Saas Me Madinah He,
Muskhkil Ab Mera Jeena He,
Dil Mein Tamanna Hai Tayba Ki,

Barso(N) Say Akhiya Tarsi,
Jalwa Dikhawo Makki Madni,
Dar Pe Bulawo Makki Madni

1: Dard E Dil Chahiye Chashm E Tar Chahiye
2:
Dard E Dil Chahiye Chashm E Tar Chahiye
Dard E Dil Chahiye Chashm E Tar Chahiye
Mujh Ko Aaqa Ki Pyaari Nazar Chaahiye
Mujh Ko Aaqa Ki Pyaari Nazar Chaahiye

Hai Munawwar Ziya Sey Yeh Saara Jahan
Sab Key Dil Ki Haqeeqat Hai Unpar ‘ayaan
Merey Dil Ki Tamanna Hai Jaan E Jahan
Noor Ki Eyk Kiran Ab Idhar Chaahiye

Sarwarey Do Jahan Ka Hai Behad Karam
Zaatey Waala Sey Qaayim Hai Mera Bharam
Mujh Ko Aaqa Dikhaatey Ho Apna Haram
Aap Ki Deed Ko Chashm E Tar Chaahiye

Khud Khudaa Ney Banaaya Hai Tum Ko Habeeb
Aur Uss Ney Banaaya Hai Tum Ko Tabeeb
Marz E ‘isyaan Sey Ab To Shifa Ho Naseeb
Sunnaton Par ‘amal ‘umr Bhar Chaahiye

Ya Nabi Mujh Pey Ho Eyk Karam Ki Nazar
Baar E ‘isyaan Sey Ab To Jhuki Hai Kamar
Koi Husn E ‘amal To Nahin Hai Magar
Mujh Ko Bakhshish Ka Zaad E Safar Chaahiye

Bheek ‘ilm O ‘amal Ki ‘ataa Keejiye
Apni Sunnat Ka Paikar Banaa Deejiye
Jaam E ‘ulfat Mujhey Ab Pilaa Deejiye
Waqt E Aakhir Mujhey Wo Nazar Chaahiye

Sharf E Khidmat ‘ataa Ho Gulaamon Ko Ab
Jitney ‘ushaaq Hain Sab Rahey Baa Adab
Khuld Maskan Baney Aur Raazi Ho Rab
Har Du’a Mey Meyri Wo Asar Chaahiye

Jo Mujaahid Philisteen Mey Hain Shahaa
Aas Tum Par Laga Kar Hee Paayain Jilaa
Khaak Mey Zaalimon Ki Miley Ab Jafaa
‘aashiqon Key Liye Ab Zafar Chaahiye

Mujh Ko Aaqa Madiney Bulatey Rahey
Shakir E Bey Nawaa Ko Nibhatey Rahey
Apna Mehmaan Hameysha Banaatey Rahey
Aakhree Waqt Mujh Ko Yeh Dar Chaahiye

1: Dard E Dil Chashme Nam Chahiye
2:
Dard E Dil Chashme Nam Chahiye
Aitebaar E Karam Chahiye

Unse Hi Lao Lagae Rakhe
Jisko Apna Bharam Chahiye

Hum Gire To Samhale Huzoor
Ye Ataa Har Qadam Chahiye

Sabz Gumbad Nazar Me Rahe
Kab Mujhe Jaam E Jam Chahiye

Azeem E Bargah E Nabi
Pehle Taofe Haram Chahiye

Hum Madine Ke Mushtaq Hai
Hum Ko Baagh E Iram Chahiye

Hoon Gadaa Bheek Sarkaar Ki
Paiba Paidam Badam Chahiye

Nisbat E Mustafa Ki Qasam
Kuch Kulaho Me Qam Chahiye

Anjum Unki Sana Jo Kare
Mujh Ko Aisa Khalam Chahiye

1: Darde Dil Kar Mujhe Ata Ya Rab
2:
Darde Dil Kar Mujhe Ata Ya Rab
De Mere Dard Ki Dawa Ya Rab

Laaj Rakh Le Gunaahgaaron Ki
Naam Rehmaan Hai Tera Ya Rab

Aib Mere Na Khol Mahshar Mein
Naam Sattaar Hai Tera Ya Rab

Be Sabab Bakhsh De Na Pooch Amal
Naam Gaffaar Hai Tera Ya Rab

Bhool Kar Bhi Na Aaye Yaad Apni
Mere Dil Se Mujhe Bhula Ya Rab

Khaak Kar Apne Aastaane Ki
Yoon Humein Khaak Mein Mila Ya Rab

Teri Jaanib Yeh Mushte Khaak Ude
Bhej Aisi Koi Hawaa Ya Rab

Sabqat Rehmatee Ala Gadhabee
Tu Ne Jab Se Suna Diya Ya Rab

Yuh Gumoo Ke Mai Tujh Se Mil Jau
Yuh Gumaa Is Tarha Mila Ya Rab

Har Bhale Ki Bhalai Ka Sadqa
Mujh Nikamme Ko Kar Bhala Ya Rab

Meri Ankhe Mere Liye Tarse
Mujh Se Aisa Mujhe Chupa Ya Rab

Tu Aasra Hum Gunahgaro Ka
Aur Mazboot Ho Gaya Ya Rab

Ahle Sunnat Ki Har Jamat Par
Har Jaga Ho Teri Ata Ya Rab

Dushmanon Ke Liye Hidayat Ki
Tujh Se Karta Hu Iltija Ya Rab

Meri Maan Meri Behnain Bhanjay Sab
Pa’ayn Araam-E-Do Sara Ya Rab

Aur Bhi Jitne Pyaare Hai
Hajatain Sab Ki Ho Rawa Ya Rab

Mere Ahbab Par Bhi Fazl Rahe
Tera Tere Habeeb Ka Ya Rab

Teens Kam Ho Na Dard E Ulfat Ki
Dil Tadapta Rahe Mera Ya Rab

Aasraa Hum Gunaahgaaron Ka
Aur Mazboot Ho Gaya Ya Rab

Tu Ne Mere Zaleel Haathon Mein
Daamane Mustafa Diya Ya Rab

Kar Diya Tu Ne Qadri Mujh Ko
Teri Qudrat Ke Main Fida Ya Rab

Tu Hasan Ko Utha Hasan Kar Ke
Ho Ma'al-Khair Khaatima Ya Rab

1: Dare Nabi Par Para Rahoon Ga Parre Hi Rehne Se Kaam Hoga
2:
Dare Nabi Par Para Rahoon Ga,
Parre Hi Rehne Se Kaam Hoga
Kabhi To Qismat Khule Gi Meri,
Kabhi To Mera Salam Hoga

Khilafe Maashooq Kuch Huwa Hai,
Na Koi Aashiq Se Kaam Hoga
Khuda Bhi Hoga Wahi Pe Aye Dil,
Jidhar Woh Aali Maqam Hoga

Kiye Hi Jaoon Ga Arz Matlab,
Milega Jab Tak Na Dil Ka Matlab
Na Shaam E Matlab Ki Subha Hogi,
Na Yeh Fasana Tamam Hoga

Jo Dil Se Hai Ma’il-E-Payambar,
Yeh Is Ki Pehchan Hai Muqarrar
Ke Har Dam Is Be Nawa Ke Lab Par,
Durood Hoga Salam Hoga

Isi Tawaqqo Pe Ji Raha Hoon,
Yehi Tamanna Jila Rahi Hai
Nigahe Lutfo Karam Na Hogi,
To Mujh Ko Jeena Haram Hoga

Dare Nabi Par Para Rahoon Ga,
Parre Hi Rehne Se Kaam Hoga
Kabhi To Qismat Khule Gi Meri,
Kabhi To Mera Salam Hoga

1: Dare Nabi Par Yeh Umr Beete Ho Hum Pe Lutfe Dawaam Aisa
2:
Dare Nabi Par Yeh Umr Beete
Ho Hum Pe Lutfe Dawaam Aisa
Madine Waale Kahe Maqaami
Ho Unke Dar Par Qayaam Aisa

Yeh Rifate Zikre Mustafa Hai
Nahi Kisi Ka Maqaam Aisa
Jo Baad Zikre Khuda Hai Afzal
Hai Zikre Khairul Anaam Aisa

Jo Ghamzadon Ko Gale Laga Le
Buron Ko Daaman Me Jo Chupa Le
Hai Doosra Kaun Is Jahaan Me
Siwaae Khairul Anaam Aisa

Bilal Tujh Par Nisaar Jau
Ke Khud Nabi Ne Tujhe Khareeda
Naseeb Ho To Naseeb Aisi
Ghulam Ho To Ghulam Aisa

Namaaz Aqsa Me Jab Padhayi
To Ambiya Aur Rusul Yeh Bole
Namaaz Ho To Namaz Aisi
Imaam Ho To Imaam Aisa

Mai Khalid Apne Nabi Pe Qurban
Hai Jin Ka Khulq-E-Azeem Qur'aan
Hai Roshni Jis Ki Do Jahan Me
Kaheen Hai Maah-E-Tamaam Aisa

1: Darpesh Ho Taiba Ka Safar Kaisa Lage Ga
2:
Darpesh Ho Taiba Ka Safar Kaisa Lage Ga
Guzrain Jo Wahan Shaam O Sehar Kaisa Lage Ga

Jab Door Se Hai Itna Haseen Gumbad-E-Hazra
Iss Paar Ye Aalum Hai Udhaar Kaisa Lage Ga

Kismat Se Jo Ajaye Mere Ghar Me Shahedi
Mai Kaisa Lagoon Ga Mera Ghar Kaisa Lage Ga

Rakh Loonga Imame Pe Jo Naalyne Muqadas
Shaahon Ke Muqabil Mere Sar Kaisa Lage Ga

Sarkar Ne Dar Pe Tujhe Bulwaya Hai Mangte
Jab Koi Tumhe Dega Khabar Kaisa Lage Ga

Ghaosul Wara Se Puchlo Ek Roz Ye Chal Kar
Baqdaad Se Taiba Ka Safar Kaisa Lage Ga

Ae Kash Madine Main Mujhe Maot Youn Aye
Kadmoon Main Ho Sarkar Ke Sar Kaisa Lage Ga

Ae Pyare Khuda Dekhoon Main Sarkar Ka Jalwa
Mil Jaye Dua To Jo Asar Kaisa Lage Ga

Aa Jayen Mere Ghar Main Agar Rehmat-E-Aalim
Main Kesa Lagoon Ga Mera Ghar Kesa Lage Ga

Taiba Ki Saadath To Youn Pathe Hain Hazaroon
Murshid Ka Saath Ho Jo Safar Kaisa Lage Ga

Payee Munawar Ne Kazza Dar Pe Nabi Ke
Aajaye Watan Aesi Habbar Kaisa Lage Ga.

1: Das Ni Haleema Saadia Kitho Le Aayi Ay Sohna Laal
2:
Das Ni Haleema Saadia
Kitho Le Aayi Ay Sohna Laal.

Akhiyan Mazaagh Al-Bassar,
Wa-Layl De Wingrhe (Kundle) Waal,
Lukda Phirda Chan Asmaani,
Wekh Ke Husn O Jamal.

Das Ni Haleema Saadia,
Kitho Le Aayi Ay Sohna Laal.

Teri Daachi Si Kamzoor Barri,
Kiwein Ho Gayi Ay Shahzor Barri,
Tu Lang Gayi Ay Picche Reh Gayia,
Tenu Tak Tak Sochdi Reh Gaiya,
Jad Da Sohna Madni Aaya Eh,
(Jad Da Sawaar Haseen Aaya)
Teri Ho Gayi Wakhri Shaan (Chaal).

Das Ni Haleema Saadia,
Kitho Le Aayi Ay Sohna Laal.

Oh Bole Taan Farmaan (Sultaan) Bane,
Odhe Hont Hillan Quran Bane,

'allam Nashrah Laka Sadrak.
Warafa'na Laka Zikrak.

Sohne Di Tareef Karaan Main,
Jidda Wasif Ay Zul Jalaal.

Das Ni Haleema Saadia,
Kitho Le Aayi Ay Sohna Laal.

1: Deewane Jo Wi Mangde Ne
2:
Deewane Jo Wi Mangde Ne
Shah-E-Abrar (Mere Sarkar) Dende Ne
Karam (Nazar) Karde Ne Jis Wele
Te Naslan Taar Dende Ne

Jadon Ae Bewafa Dunya
Meinu Akhiyan Wikhondi Ae
Dilaase Pyaar De Meinu
Mere Ghamkhwaar Dende Ne

Qasam Rabb Di Nabi De
Nan Ton Wik Jande Ne Diwaane
Ae Kuj Wi Kol Nai Rakhde
Ae Sab Kuj Waar Dende Ne

Ali Haidar De Bacheyaan Di
Main Ljapali Ton Sadqe Jaan
Koi Ik War Mangda Ae
Au Sau Sau War Dende Ne

Jerre Lamhe Nabi Sarwar De
Zikr-E-Paak Wich Guzran
Dilaan Nu Chain Dende Ne
Te Seene Thaar Dende Ne

Ghulamaan Da Aqeeda Ae,
Mera Imaan-E-Farooqi
Kammi Rehndi Nai Fer Koi
Jaddon Sarkar Dende Ne

Deewane Jo Wi Mangde Ne
Mere Sarkar Dende Ne
Nazar Karde Ne Jis Wele
Te Naslan Taar Dende Ne

2:

Aap Ki Aye Mehboobe Khuda

2:
Dil Da Chain Qaraar Tussi Ho
Dil Da Chain Qaraar Tussi Ho

Dil Da Chain Qaraar Tussi Ho
Sabhaan De Sarkaar Tussi Ho

Main Ki Dassan Dunya Kehndi
Nabiyaan De Sardaar Tussi Ho

1: Dil Dard Se Bismil Ki Tarah Laot Raha Ho
2:
Dil Dard Se Bismil Ki Tarah Laot Raha Ho
Seene Pe Tasalli Ko Tera Haath Dhara Ho

Gar Waqte Ajal Sir Teri Chaukhat Pe Jhuka Ho
Jitni Ho Qaza Ek Hi Sajde Me Ada Ho

Tum Zaat E Khuda Se Na Judaa Ho Na Khuda Ho
Allah Ko Ma'alum Hai Kya Jaaniye Kya Ho

Ye Kyu Kahu Mujhko Ye Ataa Ho Ye Ataa Ho
Wo Do Ke Hamesha Mere Ghar Bhar Ka Bhala Ho

Dekha Unhe Mehshar Me To Rehmat Ne Pukara
Aazad Hain Jo Aapke Daaman Se Bandha Ho

Firdous Ke Baagho Se Udhar Mil Nahi Sakta
Jo Koyi Madine Ke Bayaba Me Ghuma Ho

Mangta To Hain Mangta Koi Shaho Me Dikha De
Jisko Mere Sarkaar Se Tukda Na Mila Ho

Mitti Na Ho Barbaad Pase Marge Ilahi
Jab Khaaq Ude Meri Madine Ki Hawaa Ho

Aata Hain Faqeero Pe Unhe Pyar Kuch Aisa
Khud Bheekh De Khud Kahe Mangta Ka Bhala Ho

Dhundha Hi Kare Sadr Qayamat Ke Sipahi
Woh Kisko Mile Jo Tere Daaman Me Chupa Ho

Shaabaash Hassan Aur Chamakti Si Ghazal Parh
Dil Khol Kar Aaina E Iman Ki Jilaa Ho

De Daaliye Apne Lab E Jaa Baksh Ka Sadqa
Ay Chara E Dil Dard E Hasan Ki Bhi Dawa Ho

1: Dil Di Tasbih Utte Bandeya Allah Allah Karda Ro
2:
Dil Di Tasbih Utte Bandeya
Allah Allah Karda Ro

Sache Rab De Wekh Kamal
Rehnada Ae Har Wele Tere Naal
Sar Ton Dukh Denda Ae Taal
Kar Ke Munh Apna Qibla Ru
Karda Ro Allah Allah Hu

Uthdeyan Baindeya Chaldeyan Phirdeyan
Dam Ohda Hi Barda Ro
Har Ik Da Oh Palan Wale, Har Ik Da Oh Sahara Ae
Auhdiyan Ne Ae Qul Tajalliyan
Ohda Chanan Sara Ae
Shae Rag Ton Wi Nerhe Hai Au
Qaul Quran Da Pyaara Ae
Shaam Saware Khulla Rehnda Auhda Paak Dawara Ae

Dil Di Tasbih Utte Bandeya
Allah Allah Karda Ro

Alif Allah Chambe Di Booti
Murshid Man Wich Lai Hu
Nafi Ithbat Da Pani Mileya
Har Rage Har Jaye Hu
Andar Booti Mushk Machaya
Jaan Phullan Te Ai Hu
Jiwe Murshid Kamil Bahu
Je Ae Booti Lai Hu

Dil Di Tasbih Utte Bandeya
Allah Allah Karda Ro

Ey Tan Mera Chashma Howe
Murshid Wekh Na Rajjan Hu
Loon Loon De Mud Lakh Lakh Chashma
Ik Kholan Hik Khajjan Hu
Inna Ditheya Sabr Na Away
How Kidde Wal Bhajja Hu
Murshid Da Deedar Hai Bahu
Lakh Karoran Hajjan

Dil Di Tasbih Utte Bandeya
Allah Allah Karda Ro

Rakhe Jinun Raz Khuda Ao
Raaz Kisse De Khulda Nai
Jinnun Maula Izzat Dewe
Lakh Koi Role Rulda Nai
Sadqe Jawan Sohail Farooqi
Rab Di Karam Nawazi Ton
Banda Aunun Bhul Janda Ae
Au Bande Nun Bhulda Nai

Dil Di Tasbih Utte Bandeya
Allah Allah Karda Ro

1: Dil Ki Dua Hai Maula Imaan Dil Pe Likh De
2:
Dil Ki Dua Hai Maula Imaan Dil Pe Likh De
Mehboob Ka Waseela Imaan Dil Pe Likh De

Imaan Par Hi Mera Ho Khaatima Khudaya
De Panjatan Ka Sadqa Imaan Dil Pe Likh De

Rehmat Ke Phool De De Hubbe Rasool De De
Dil Hai Bada Shakista Imaan Dil Pe Likh De

Imaan Dene Waale Imaan Ki Kar Hifaazat
Mehroom Ho Na Banda Imaan Dil Pe Likh De

Noore Muhammadi De Dil Raushni Se Bhar De
Anmol De Khazaana Imaan Dil Pe Likh De

Ummat Mein Sab Se Zyada Imaan Mila Hai Jis Ko
Bu Bakr Ka Waseela Imaan Dil Pe Likh De

Imaan Par Ho Jeena Imaan Par Ho Marna
Imaan Ka De Gehna Imaan Dil Pe Likh De

Imaan Chin Na Jaaye Hain Ghaat Mein Lootere
Imaan Mera Bachana Imaan Dil Pe Likh De

Maula Se Aye Ujaagar Kar Ye Dua Barabar
Ho Umr Bhar Ka Naata Imaan Dil Pe Likh De

1: Dil Ki Duniya Ko Sajaao Aaqa
2:
Dil Ki Duniya Ko Sajaao Aaqa
Apni Ulfat Me Jilaao Aaqa

Hubbe Duniya Se Bachaana Mujh Ko
Mujh Ko Apna Hee Banaao Aaqa

Shauq E Deedar Me So-Un Jis Shab
Apna Deedar Karaao Aaqa

Mere Dil Ki Hai Tamanna Har Dam
Apna Ghar Isko Banao Aaqa

Fikr E Duniya Me Na Aansoo Nikle
Apni Ulfat Me Rulaao Aaqa

Jitney Mo’min Hain Pareshaan Shaaha
Sab Ki Bigdi Ko Banaao Aaqa

Aakhri Dum Bhi Adaa Ho Sunnat
Peer Ke Din Jo Qaza Ho Aaqa

Dil Tarapta Hai Huzoori Ko Huzoor
Sadqe Murshid Ke Bulaao Aaqa

Mujh Ko Phir Dushmano Ne Ghera Hai
Apne Daaman Me Chupaao Aaqa

Shakir E Razvi Hai ‘aasi Shaaha
Muzda Bakhshish Ka Sunaao Aaqa

1: Dil Ko Unse Khuda Judaa Na Kare
2:
Dil Ko Unse Khuda Judaa Na Kare
Bekasi Loot Le Khuda Na Kare

Is Me Rauze Ka Sajda Ho Ki Tawaaf
Hosh Mein Jo Na Ho Who Kya Na Kare

Ye Wohi Hain Ki Baksh Dete Hain
Kaun In Jurmo(N) Par Saza Na Kare

Sab Tabeebo Ne De Diya Hai Jawaab
Aah Isaa Agar Dawa Na Kare

Dil Kaha(N) Le Chala Haram Se Mujhe
Are Tera Bura Khuda Na Kare

Uzr Umeede Afw Gar Na Sune(N)
Roo Siyah Aur Kya Bahana Kare

Dil Mein Rausahn Hai Shama-E Ishqe Huzoor
Kaash Joshe Hawas Hawa Na Kare

Hashr Mein Hum Bhi Sair Dekhenge
Munkir Aaj Unse Iltijaa Na Kare

Zau'f Maana Magar Yeh Zaalim Dil
Unke Raste Mein To Thaka Na Kare

Jab Teri Khoo Hai Sab Ka Jee Rakhna
Wohi Achcha Jo Dil Bura Na Kare

Dil Se Ik Zauqe Mai Ka Taalib Hoon
Kaun Kehta Hai Ittiqa Na Kare

Le Raza Sab Chale Madine Ko
Main Na Jaaoon Are Khuda Na Kare

1: Dil Me Ishqe Nabi Ki Ho Aesi Lagan
2:
Dil Me Ishqe Nabi Ki Ho Aesi Lagan
Rooh Tarapti Rahe Dil Machalta Rahe

1: Ek Main Hi Nahi Un Par Qurban Zamana Hai
2:
Ek Main Hi Nahi Un Par Qurban Zamana Hai,
Jo Rab E Do Aalam Ka Mahboob Yagana Hai.

Kal Pul Say Hamein Jis Nay Khud Paar Lagana Hai,
Zahra Ka Woh Baba Hai Hasnain Ka Nana Hai.

Iss Hashmi Dulha Per Konain Ko Main Waroon,
Jo Husn O Shumail Mein Yakta E Zamana Hai.

Izzat Say Na Marjayein Kyun Naam E Muhammad Par,
Youn Bhi Kisi Din Hum Ne Duniya Say Toh Jana Hai.

Yoon Shah E Madina Ki Mein Pusht Panahi Mein,
Kiya Iski Mujhe Parwah Dushman Jo Zamana Hai.

Soh Bar Agar Tauba Tuti Bhi To Kiya Hairat,
Bakhshih Ki Riwayat Mein Toba To Bahana Hai.

Pur Noor Si Rahein Hain, Gunbad Pay Nigahein Hai,
Jalwey Bhi Anokhay Hain, Manzar Bhi Suhana Hai.

Yeh Keh Kay Dar E Haq Say Li Maut Mein Kuch Mohlat,
Milad Ki Aamad Hai Mehfil Ko Sajana Hai.

Aao Dar E Zahra Par Phalaye Hue Daman,
Yeh Nasal Kareemon Ki Lajpal Gharana Hai.

Qurban Us Aaqa Per Kal Hashr Ke Din Jisnay,
Iss Ummat E Aasi Ko Kamli Mein Chupana Hai.

Har Waqt Woh Hain Meri Duniya E Tasawar Mein,
Aie Shoq Kahin Ab To Aana Hai Na Jana Hai.

Hum Kyun Na Kahein Unsay Rodad E Alam Apni,
Jab Unka Kaha Khud Bhi Allah Nay Mana Hai.

Mehroom E Karam Is Ko Rakhiye Na Sar E Mehshar,
Jaisa Hai Naseer Aakhir, Sahil Toh Purana Hai.

Naam Unka Jahaan Bhi Liya Jaega,
Zikr Unka Jahaan Bhi Kiya Jaega

1: Farishtay Jis Kay Zaair Hain Madinay Main Woh Turbat Hay
2:
Farishtay Jis Kay Zaair Hain Madinay Main Woh Turbat Hay
Yeh Woh Turbat Hay Ji Ko Arsh E Azam Pur Fazeelat Hay!

Bhala Dasht E Madinah Say Chaman Ko Koi Nisbat Hai
Madinay Ki Fazaa Rashk E Bahaar E Baagh E Jannat Hai.

Madinah Gar Salamat Hay To Phir Sab Kuch Salamat Hai
Khuda Rakhay Madinay Ko, Issi Ka Damm Ghaneemat Hai.

Madinah Aisa Gulshan Hai Jo Har Gulshan Ki Zeenat Hai
Bahaar E Baagh E Jannat Bhi Madinay Ki Ba-Dawlat Hai.

Madinah Chor Kar Sayr E Jinaa(N) Ki Kya Zaroorat Hai
Yeh Jannat Say Bhi Behter Hai Yeh Jeete Jee Ki Jannat Hai.

Humee(N) Kya Haqq Ta'aala Ko Madinay Say Muhabbat Hai
Madinay Say Muhabbat Un Say Ulfat Ki `alaamat Hai!

Ilahi!! Woh Madinay Kaisi Basti Hay Dikhaa-Dayna
Jahaa(N) Rahmat Barasti Hay Jahaa(N) Rahmat Hi Rahmat Hay.

Madinah Chor Kar Jannat Ki Khushboo Mil Nahi(N) Sakti
Madinay Say Mahabbat Hay To Jannat Ki Zamanat Hay.

Zamee(N) Pur Woh Muhammad Hain, Woh Ahmad Asmaano(N) Main
Yahaa(N) Bhi Un Ka Charcha Hay - Wahaa(N) Bhi Un Ki Midhat Hay.

Yahaa(N) Bhi Un Ki Chalti Hay, Wahan Bhi Un Ki Chalti Hay
Madinah Raajdhaani Hay Do `aaalam Pur Hukoomat Hay!

Ghazab Hi Kardiya Akhtar, Madinay Say Chalay Aa'aey
Yeh Woh Jannat Hay Jis Ki `arsh Waalo(N) Ko Bhi Hasrat Hay.

Madinah Chor Kar Akhtar Bhala Kyu(N) Jaa'ayn Jannat Ko
Yeh Jannat Kya Har Ik Ni`mat Madinay Ki Ba-Dawlat Hay.

1: Fida Kar Ishq E Nabi Par Jaan
2:
Fida Kar Ishq-E-Nabi Par Jaan

Jab Yaad Nabi Ki Aati Hai Ik Kaif Sa Aalam Hota Hai

Yahi To Kahta Hai Qur'an Ke Aaqa Hai Jaan-E-Iman
Zamana Yaad Karega Zamana Yaad Karega

Sarkar Se Tu Hai Door Magar Sarkar To Tujh Se Door Nahi
Kyu Khoya Khoya Rehta Hai Mukhtar Hai Tu Majboor Nahi
Nabi Ko Pahle Dil Se Maan, Nabi Par Sab Kuch Kar Qurbaan

1: Fir Utha Walwala E Yaade Mugilaane Arab
2:
Phir Utha Walwala-E-Yaad-E-Mugheelaan-E-Arab,
Phir Khincha Daaman-E-Dil Sooye Bayaabaan-E-Arab.

Bagh-E-Firdous Ko Jaate Hain Haazaaraan-E-Arab,
Haaye Sehra-E-Arab Haaye Bayaabaan-E-Arab.

Meethi Baatein Teri Deen-E-Ajam Imaan-E-Arab,
Namkeen Husn Tera Jaan-E-Ajam Shaan-E-Arab.

Ab To Hay Girya-E- Khoon Gauhar-E-Daamaan-E-Arab,
Jismein Do La’al The Zahra Key Woh Thee Kaan-E-Arab.

Dil Wohi Dil Hay Jo Aankhon Sey Ho Hairaan-E-Arab,
Aankhein Wo Aankhein Hain Jo Dil Sey Hon Qurbaan-E-Arab.

Haaye Kis Waqt Lagi Phaans Alam Ki Dil Mein,
Ke Bohot Door Rahe Khaar-E-Mugheelan-E-Arab.

Fasl-E-Gul Lakh Na Ho Wasl Ki Rakh Aas Hazaar,
Phoolte Phalte Hain Be Fasl Gulistaan-E-Arab.

Sadqe Hone Ko Chale Aate Hain Laakhon Gulzaar,
Kuch Ajab Rang Sey Phoola Hay Gulistaan-E-Arab.

Andaleebi Pe Jagharte Hain Kate Marte Hain,
Gul-O-Bulbul Ko Laraata Hay Gulistaan-E-Arab.

Sadqe Rahmat Key Kahaan Phool Kahaan Khaar Ka Kaam,
Khud Hay Daaman Kash-E-Bulbul Gul-E-Khandaan-Arab.

Shaadi-E-Hashr Hay Sadqe Mein Chutenge Qaidi,
Arsh Par Dhoom Sey Hay Daawat-E-Mehmaan-E-Arab.

Charche Hote Hain Ye Kamhlaaye Huey Phoolon Mein,
Kyoon Ye Din Dekhte Paate Jo Biyabaan-E-Arab.

Tere Be Daam Key Bande Hain Raeesaan-E-Ajam,
Tere Be Daam Key Bandi Hain Haazaaraan-E-Arab.

Hasht-E- Khuld Aayein Wahan Kasb-E-Latafat Ko Raza,
Chaar Din Barse Jahan Abr-E-Bahaaran-E-Arab.

1: Firaaq E Madinah Mein Dil Ghamzada Hai
2:
Firaaq-E-Madinah Mein Dil Ghamzada Hai,
Jigar Tukray Tukray Hua Ja Raha Hai.

Chura Kar Madinah Mera Chain Cheena,
Bata Nafs-E-Zalim Tujhe Kia Mila Hai.

Meri Aankh Se Cheena Taiba Ka Manzar,
Yeh Kis Baat Ka Tu Ne Badla Lia Hai.

Sikhaya Hai Phir Yeh Muqaddar Ne Mujh Ko,
Na Shikwa Kisi Se Na Koi Gila Hai.

Rahoon Bus Isi Ghum Mein Bay Chain Sarwar,
Muqaddar Ne Jo Daagh-E-Furqat Dia Hai.

Muqaddar Se Jis Ja Rahoon Per Shaha Ho,
Nazar Mein Madinah Meri Iltija Hai.

Mere Dil Kay Armaan Rahe Dil Hi Dil Mein,
Yehi Ghum Mere Dil Ko Tarpa Raha Hai.

Sukoon Tha Mujhe Koocha-E-Mustafa Mein,
Watan Mein Mera Sub Sukoon Lut Gaya Hai.

Na Dunya Ki Fikrain Na Ghum Tha Wahan Per,
Yahan Aa Kar Dil Aafaton Mein Phansa Hai.

Na Chootay Mere Haath Se Un Ka Daaman,
Jiyun Jab Talak Ya Khuda Yeh Dua Hai.

Mein Lafzon Mein Kaise Bata Doon Kisi Ko,
Kay Kia Kia Mujhe Aaj Yaad Aa Raha Hai.

Paharon Ki Dilkash Sitaron Kay Jalway,
Woh Manzar Mujhe Aaj Yaad Aa Raha Hai.

Unhe Choomna Haath Lehra Kay Paiham,
Woh Lamha Mujhe Aaj Yaad Aa Raha Hai.

Aqeedat Se Khaak-E-Madinah Utha Kar,
Use Choomna Aaj Yaad Aa Raha Hai.

Kabhi Deed-E-Sarwar Ki Hasrat Mein Minbar,
Ko Takna Woh Chup Chup Kay Yaad Aa Raha Hai.

Haseeno Jamil Piyaari Woh Jannat Ki Kiyari,
Wahan Baithna Aaj Yaad Aa Raha Hai.

Kabhi Dekh Kar Subz Gumbad Ka Manzar,
Jhukana Nazar Aaj Yaad Aa Raha Hai.

1: Furqate Taiba Ki Wahshat Dil Se Jaaye Khair Se
2:
Furqate Taiba Ki Wahshat Dil Se Jaaye Khair Se
Mai Madine Ko Chalu Wo Din Phir Aaye Khair Se

Dil Mein Hasrat Koi Baaki Reh Na Jaaye Khair Se
Raahe Taiba Mein Mujhe Yoon Maut Aaye Kahir Se

Mere Din Phir Jaaye Ya Rab Shab Wo Aaye Khair Se
Dil Me Jab Maahe Madina Ghar Banaaye Khair Se

Raat Meri Din Bane Unki Baqaaye Khair Se
Qabr Me Jab Unki Tal’at Jagmagaaye Khair Se

Wo Khiraame Naaz Farmaaye Jo Paaye Khair Se
Kya Bayaan Woh Zindagi Ho Dil Jo Paaye Khair Se

Hai Ghani Ke Dar Pe Hum Bistar Jamaaye Khair Se
Khair Ke Taalib Kaha Jaaenge Jaaye Khair Se

Mar Ke Bhi Dil Se Na Jaaye Ulfate Baage Nabi
Khuld Me Bhi Baag Janaa Yaad Aaye Khair Se

Ranjo Gham Hon Be Nishaan Aaye Bahaare Be Khizaa
Mere Dil Me Baage Janaa Ki Hawaaye Khair Se

Is Taraf Bhi Do Qadam Jalwe Khiraam Naaz Ke
Reh Guzar Me Hum Bi Hain Aankhen Bichaaye Khair Se

Ho Mujhe Seere Gulistaane Madina Yoon Naseeb
Main Bahaaron Me Chalu Khud Ko Gumaaye Khair Se

Zindabaad Aye Aarzooye Baaghe Taiba Zindabaad
Tere Dum Se Hai Zamaane Ke Sataaye Khair Se

Jhanhk Lo Aankhon Me Unki Hasrate Taiba Liye
Zaaire Taiba Ziyaae Taiba Laaye Khair Se

Najdiyo Ki Cheera Dasti Ya Ilaahi Tabake
Ye Balaaye Najd Ye Taiba Se Jaaye Khair Se

Hai Ye Taiba Ka Payame Taalibe Aaishe Dawaam
Jannate Taiba Me Aahistee Mitaaye Khair Se

Sange Dar Se Aa Mile Taiba Me Ab To Jaa Mile
Aa Gaye Dar Pe Tere Tere Dar Pe Bulaaye Khair Se

Gosh Bar Aawaaz Hu Qudsi Bhi Is Ke Geet Par
Baaghe Taiba Me Jab Akhtar Gungunaaye Khair Se

2:

1: Gham Ho Gaye Beshumar Aaqa Banda Tere Nisaar Aaqa
2:
Gham Ho Gaye Beshumar Aaqa
Banda Tere Nisaar Aaqa

Bigda Jaata Hai Khel Ye Mera
Aaqa Aaqa Sawaar Aaqa

Manjhdaar Pe Aake Naav Tooti

Tooti Jaati Hai Peeth Ye Meri

Majboor Hai Hum To Fikr Kya Hai

Mujhsa Koi Ghamzada Na Hoga

Girdaab Me Padh Gayi Hai Kashti

Halka Hai Agar Hamara Palla

Tum Woh Ki Karam Ko Naaz Tum Se

Phir Muh Na Pade Kabhi Khaza Ka

Jiski Marzi Khuda Na Taale
Mera Hai Woh Naamdaar Aaqa

Hai Mulke Khuda Pe Jis Ka Qabza

Soya Kiye Nabakaar Bande

Kya Bhool Hai Inke Hote Kehlaaye

Unke Adna Gada Pe Mit Jaaye

Be Abre Karam Ke Mere Dhabbe
La Tagsilul Bihaar Aaqa

Itni Rehmat Raza Pe Kar Lo
La Taqrubuhul Bawaar Aaqa.

2:

2:

1: Ghulamo Ko Madine Me Bulana Ya Rasool Allah
2:
Ghulamo Ko Madine Me Bulana Ya Rasool Allah
Tumhi Ho Be-Thikano Ka Thikana Ya Rasool Allah

Karam Se Paas Bulwa Kar Kaleja Kijiye Thanda
Judai Ke Sitam Kab Tak Uthana Ya Rasool Allah

Kisi Hile Bahane Se Dikha Do Chaand Si Surat

Madina Jald Shayiq Ko Bulana Ya Rasool Allah

1: Gunahgaaron Ko Haatif Se Naveede Khush Maaali Hai
2:
Gunahgaaron Ko Haatif Se Naveede Khush Ma-Aali Hai
Mubarak Ho Shafa'at Ke Liye Ahmed Sa Waali Hai

Qazaa Haq Hai Magar Is Shauq Ka Allah Waali Hai
Jo Un Ki Raah Mein Jaaye Woh Jaan Allah Waali Hai

Tera Qadde Mubarak Gulbune Rehmat Ki Daali Hai
Ise Bo Kar Tere Rab Ne Bina Rehmat Ki Daali Hai

Tumhari Sharm Se Shaane Jalaali Haq Tapakti Hai

Zahe Khud Gum Ho Gum Hone Pe Yeh Dhoonde Ki Kya Paaya

Main Ik Mohtaaj Be Waq-At Gada Tere Sage Dar Ka
Teri Sarkaar Waala Hai Tera Darbaar Aali Hai

Teri Bakhshish Pasandi, Uzr Jooee, Tauba Khwahi Se
Umoome Be Gunaahi, Jurm Shaane Laa Ubaali Hai

Abu Bakro Umar Usmano Haidar Jis Ke Bulbul Hain

Raza Qismat Hi Khul Jaaye Jo Gilaa(N) Se Khitaab Aaye
Ki Tu Adna Sage Dargaahe Khuddaame Ma-Aali Hai

1: Guzre Jis Raah Se Woh Sayyide Wala Hokar
2:
Guzre Jis Raah Se Woh Sayyide Wala Hokar
Reh Gayi Saari Zamee(N) Ambare Saara Hokar

Rukhe Anwar Ki Tajalli Jo Qamar Ne Dekhi
Reh Gaya Bosa Dahe Nakshe Kafe Pa Hokar

Waye Mehroomiye Qismat Ki Main Phir Ab Ki Baras
Reh Gaya Hum-Rahe Zawware Madina Hokar

Chamane Taiba Hai Woh Baagh Ki Murge Sidra
Barso Chahke Hain Jaha Bulbule Shaida Hokar

Sar-Sare Dashte Madina Ka Magar Aaya Khayaal
Rashke Gulshan Jo Bana Gunchaye Dil Waa Hokar

Goshe Shah Kehte Hain Fariyaad Rasi Ko Hum Hain
Wa’daye Chashm Hai Bakhshaenge Goya Hokar

Paaye Shah Pe Gire Ya Rab Tapushe Mehar Se Jab
Dil Betab Ude Hashr Mein Para Hokar

Hai Ye Ummeed Raza Ko Teri Rehmat Se Shaha
Na Go Zindaaniye Dozakh Tera Banda Hokar

1: Haajiyo Aao Shahenshah Ka Roza Dekho
2:
Haajiyo Aao Shahenshah Ka Roza Dekho
Kaaba To Dekh Chuke Kaabe Ka Kaaba Dekho

Rukn E Shaami Se Miti Wah'shate Shaame Ghurbat
Ab Madine Ko Chalo Subhe Dil Aaraa Dekho

Aabe Zam-Zam To Piyaa Khoob Bujhaa-Ee Pyaase
Aao Joode Shahe Kowsar Ka Bi Darya Dekho

Zayre Mizaab Mile Khoob Karamke Cheente
Abre Rehmat Ka Yaha Zowr Barasnaa Dekho

Dhoom Dekhi Hai Dare Kaaba Pe Betaabo Ki
Unke Mushtako Me Hasrat Ka Tadapna Dekho

Misle Parwana Phiri Karte The Jis Sham'a Ke Gird
Apni Uss Sham'a Ko Parwana Yaha Ka Dekho

Khoob Aankho Se Lagaaya He Gilaafe Kaaba
Qasre Mehboob Ke Parde Ka Bhi Jalwa Dekho

Wa(N) Mutiyo Ka Jigar Khauf Se Pani Paaya
Ya(N) Siyahkaaro Ka Daaman Pe Machalna Dekho

Awwali Khana E Haq Ki To Ziyaye Dekhi
Aakhri Bait E Nabi Ka Bhi Tajalla Dekho

Jinte Kaaba Me Tha Laakh Aruso Ka Banav
Jalwa-Farma Yaha Kaunain Ka Dulha Dekho

Aymane Tur Ka Tha Rukne Yamani Me Farog
Shola E Tur Yaha Anjuman-Aara Dekho

Mehre Madar Ka Maza Deti Hai Aagosh E Hateem
Jin Pe Maa Baap Fida Ya(N) Karam Unka Dekho

Kar Chuki Rif'ate Kaaba Pe Nazar Par-Vaze
Topi Ab Thaam Ke Khaaq E Dar E Wala Dekho

Be-Niyazi Se Waha Kaapti Payi Ta'at
Joshe Rehmat Pe Yaha Naaz Gunah Ka Dekho

Multazim Se To Gale Lag Ke Nikale Armaan
Adab O Shouq Ka Yaha Baham Ulajhna Dekho

Khoob Mas'a Me B-Ummide Safa Daud Liye
Rahe Jana(N) Ki Safaka Bhi Tamasha Dekho

Zeenate Kaaba Me Tha Laakh Arooso Ka Banaw
Jalwa Farma Yaha Kownain Ka Doolhaa Dekho

Dho Chuka Zulmate Dil Bosaa-E Sunge Aswad
Khaak Bosi-E-Madina Ka Bhi Rutbaa Dekho

Jum'ma-E Makkah Tha Eid, Ahle Ibaadat Keliye
Mujrimo! Aawo Yaha Eide Do Shamba Dekho

Raqse Bismilki Bahaare To Minaa Me Dekhi
Dil Khonaa Be Fishaa Ka Bhi Tarapna Dekho

Gowr Se Sun To Raza Kaaba Se Aati He Sadaa
Meri Aankho Se Mere Pyaare Ka Rozaa Dekho

1: Haale Dil Kisko Sunae Aap Ke Hote Hue
2:
Haale Dil Kisko Sunae Aap Ke Hote Hue
Kyu Kisi Ke Dar Pe Jaayen Aap Ke Hote Hue

Mein Gulame Mustafa Hu Ye Meri Pehchan Hai
Gham Muje Kyun Kar Satayen Aap Ke Hote Hue

Apna Jeena Apna Marna Ab Isi Chokhat Pe Hai
Ham Kaha Sarkar Jaayen Aap Ke Hote Hue

Keh Raha Hai Aapka Rabb Ant Fihim Aap See
Kyu Inhe Mein Dun Sazaen Aap Ke Hote Hue

Samne Hai Aye Ali Ke Laal Usvaa Apka
Kyu Kisi Ka Khauf Khayen Aap Ke Hote Hue

Mein Ye Kaise Maan Jaoon Sham Ke Darbar Mein
Chhin Le Koi Ridayen Aap Ke Hote Hue

Ye To Ho Sakta Nahin Ye Baat Munkin Hi Nahi
Mere Ghar Alam Aae Aap Ke Hote Hu

Kaun Hai Altaf Apna Haale Dil Jis Se Kahe
Zakhme Dil Kis Ko Dikhae Aap Ke Hote Hu

1: Habib E Khuda Ka Nazaara Karoon Mein
2:
Habib-E-Khuda Ka Nazaara Karoon Mein
Dil-O-Jaan Un Par Nisaara Karoon Mein

Teri Kakshe Pa Yu Savaara Karoon Mein
Ke Palko Se Usko Buhaara Karoon Mein

Mera Deen-O-Iman Farishte Jo Puche
Tumhari Hi Janib Ishaara Karoon Mein

Tere Naam Par Sar Ko Qurbaan Karke
Tere Sar Se Sadqe Utaara Karoon Mein

Yeh Ek Jaan Kiya Hai Agar Ho Karoron
Tere Naam Par Sab Ko Wara Karoon Mein

Tere Dar Ke Hote Kahan Jawoon Pyare
Kahan Apna Daaman Pasaaraa Karoon Mein

Salasil Masaib Ke Abru Se Kato
Kaha Tak Masaib Gavara Karu Mai

Teri Rehmate Aam Hai Phir Bhi Pyare
Ye Fadmate Furqat Sahara Karu Mai

Khuda Khair Se Laye Wo Din Bhi Noori
Madine Ki Galiya Bulaara Karoon Mein

Mein Kiyu Ghair Ki Thokre Khane Jao
Tere Dar Se Apna Guzaara Karoon Mein

Dam-E-Wapsi Tak Tere Geet Gau
Muhammad Muhammad Pukara Karoon Mein

Tera Zikr Lab Par Khuda Dil Ke Andar
Yuhi Zindagani Guzaara Karoon Mein

Khudara Ab Aawo Ke Dam Hai Labo Par
Dame Wapasi To Nazaara Karoon Mein

Mujhe Apni Rehmat Se To Apna Karle
Siwa Tere Sab Se Kinaaraa Karoon Mein

Khudaa Aisi Kuwat De Mere Qalam Mein
Ke Bad-Mazhabon Ko Sudhaaraa Karoon Mein

1: Hai Arshe Bari Par Jalwa Figan Mehboobe Khuda Subhanallah
2:
Hai Arshe Bari Par Jalwa Figan
Mehboobe Khuda Subhanallah

Talib Ka Pata Matloob Ko Hai
Matloob Hai Talib Se Wakif
Parde Mein Bula Kar Mil Bhi Liye
Parda Bhi Raha Subhanallah

Hai Arshe Bari Par Jalwa Figan
Mehboobe Khuda Subhanallah

Hairaan Hue Barq Aur Nazar
Ik Aan Hai Aur Barso Ka Safar
Raakib Ne Kaha Allahu Ghani
Markab Ne Kaha Subhanallah

Hai Arshe Bari Par Jalwa Figan
Mehboobe Khuda Subhanallah

Hai Abd Kaha Ma’bood Kaha
Meraj Ki Shab Hai Raaze Nihaa
Woh Noor Hijaabe Noor Mein The
Khud Rab Ne Kaha Subhanallah

Hai Arshe Bari Par Jalwa Figan
Mehboobe Khuda Subhanallah

Samjhe Hamid Insaani Kya
Ye Raaz Hai Husn O Ulfat Ke
Khaliq Ka Habibi Kehna Tha
Khalqat Ne Kaha Subhanallah

Hai Arshe Bari Par Jalwa Figan
Mehboobe Khuda Subhanallah

1: Hai Kalaam E Ilahi Me Shamsuz Zuha
2:
Hai Kalaam E Ilahi Me Shamsuz'zuha,
Tere Chehr E Noor E Faza Ki Qasam
Qasam E Shab E Taar Me Raaz Yeh Tha,
Ke Habeeb Ki Zulfe Duta Ki Qasam

Woh Khuda Ne Hai Martaba Tujh Ko Diya,
Na Kisi Ko Mile Na Kisi Ko Mila
Ke Kalaam E Majeed Ne Khaee Shaha,
Tere Shehro Kalamo Baqa Ki Qasam

Tera Masnade Naaz Hai Arshe Baree,
Tera Mehrame Raaz Hai Rooh E Ameen
Tu Hi Sarware Har Do Jahaan Hai Shaha,
Tera Misl Nahi Hai Khuda Ki Qasam

Yehi 'arz Hai Khaliq E Ard O Sama,
Woh Rasool Hai Tera, Mai Bandah Tera
Mujhe Unki Jawaar Me Day Woh Jagah,
Ke Hai Khuld Ko Jiski Safa Ki Qasam

Tu Hi Bandaun Pa Karta Hai Lutf O 'ata,
Tujhi Pe Bharosa Hai Tujhi Se Dua
Mujhe Jalwah E Pak Rasool Dikha,
Tujhe Apne Hi Izz O 'ala Ki Qasam

Mere Gar Chay Gunah Hai Had Se Siwa,
Magar Un Se Ummed Hai Tujh Se Rija
Tu Raheem Hai Unka Karam Hai,
Gawah Woh Kareem Hai Teri 'ata Ki Qasam

Tere Khulq Ko Haq Ne Azeem Kaha,
Teri Khilq Ko Haq Ne Jameel Kiya
Koee Tujh Sa Huwa Hai Na Hoga Shaha,
Tere Khaliqe Husn O Ada Ki Qasam

Yehi Kehti Hai Bulbule Baagh E Jina,
Ke Raza Ki Tarha Koee Sehre Bayaan
Nahi Hind Me Wasif Shahe Huda,
Mujhe Shaukhe Tabae Raza Ki Qasam

1: Hai Karam Aap Ka Sarkaar Rasool E Arabi
2:
Hai Karam Aap Ka Sarkaar Rasool E ‘arabi
Phir Dikhaaya Mujhe Darbaar Rasool E ‘arabi

Aise ‘aasee Ko Banaaya Madine Ka Mehmaan
Jo Hai Sartaapa Khataakaar Rasool E ‘arabi

Bhardo Aaqa Mere Aaqa Meri Jholi Bhardo
Main Bhi Hoon Haazir E Darbaar Rasool E ‘arabi

Sadqa Hasnain Ka Dedo Mere Aaqa Mujh Ko
Main Karam Ka Hoon Talabgaar Rasool E ‘arabi

Waasta Pyaare Raza Ka Tumhe Detaa Hoon Shahaa
Apna Kehdo Sag E Darbaar Rasool E ‘arabi

Arz E Shakir Mere Aaqa Hai Yeh Waqt E Rukhsat
Phir Dikhaana Mujhe Darbaar Rasool E ‘arabi

1: Hai Yehi Qahesh Ke Raat Din Likhta Rahu Naat E Mustafa
2:
Hai Yehi Qahesh Ke Raat Din Likhta Rahu Naat-E-Mustafa
Isse Badkar Aur Kiya Hogi Aata-E-Mustafa

Sajate Raho Mahafil Aqidat Se Aur Mohabbat Se
Phir Jald Hogi Mahafil Me Amad-E-Mustafa

Wala Soufa Yuu Tika Rabbuka Fatarza Kaha Hai Quraan Me Rab Ne
Dekho Khuda Bhi Chahta Hai Raza-E-Mustafa

Chale The Farooq Khatl-E-Huzoor Ke Liye
Badal Diye Irada Jab Dekha Chehra-E-Mustafa

Padte Raho Durood-O-Salam Aqa-E-Do Jahan Par
Yaqinan Hogi Wajib Shafaat-E-Mustafa

Karde Moula Ab Fazlo Karam Jaber Pe
Take Ye Bhi Ban Jaye Aashiq-E-Mustafa

(Ameen Ya Allah)
(Ameen Ya Allah)

1: Haleema Main Tere Muqaddran To Sadqay
2:
Haleema Main Tere Muqaddran To Sadqay
Tu Madani Da Jhoola Jhulendi Wee Hosay

Wo Sohden Da Mukhda Noorani Noorani
Tu Takdee Tey Raiyan Choomedee Wee Hosay

Mohabbat Che Aake Bose Di Khatir
Laba Naal Lab To Milendee Wee Hosay
Main Manya Zamane De Rahmat Noo Lutke
Ada Shukr Rab Da Karedi Wee Hosay

Undhi Ungli Tho Phadke Wede De Andar
Khuda De Sajad Nu Tu Rehndi Wee Hosay
Ke Arshan Da Chan Vi Khilondan Ae Jisda
Tu Us Be Missil Nu Khide Di Wee Hosay

Kadi Laal Hasdana Chukdi Vi Sohna
Aur Usda Wee Hosee Tu Mane Di Wee Hosee
Nawa Ke Saja Ke De Surma Wee Paa Ke
Tu Dhodi Hila Ke Hase Dee Wee Hosay

************other Version*****************

Haleema Main Tere Muqaddran To Sadqay
Tu Madani Da Jhoola Jhulendi Wee Hosay

Ke Sohnay Da Mukhra Noorani Noorani
Tu Takdi Te Rahi Hain Chumendi Wee Hosay

Eh Ungli Naapaak Eh Tu Werre De Andhar
Khuda De Sajjan Noo Turendi Wee Hosay

Te Arsha Da Chan Eh Khillona Wee Jis Da
Te Tu Uss Bemisal Noo Khidendi Wee Hosay

Kadi Naal Terey Nazakat Thi Sohna
O Rusda Wee Hosee Manandi Wee Hosay

Nawa Ke Sajaa Ke Te Gajla Vee Paake
Te Thodi Hilaa Ke Hasendi Wee Hosay

Zamane Di Tattiyan Hawawa De Kolon
Nabuvat De Phool Nu Lukendi Wee Hosay

Haleema Main Tere Muqaddran To Sadqay
Tu Madani Da Jhoola Jhulendi Wee Hosay

1: Halima Menoo Naal Rakh Le
2:
Sa'af Karan Gi Mein, Bakrian Da Wara
Halima Menoo Naal Rakh Le
Teriaan Bakrian, Noon Pavan Gi Mein Chara
Halima Menoo Naal Rakh Le

Jithay Jithay, Chalein Gi Toonutay Utay Java Gi
Nuss Kay Bazaroon, Tera Sodah Wi Liawaangi
Tera, Kam Mein Karan Gi Sara
Halima Menoo Naal Rakh Le

Chula, Tera Balaan Gi Tay Rotiaan Pakawan Gi
Amna, Day Chann Da Mein Jhula Wi Jhulawan Gi
Bas Karan Gi Mein Sohnay Da Nazara
Halima Menoo Naal Rakh Le

Teri Ainhan, Bakrian Da Dudh Wi Mein Chuva Gi,
Pandey Wi Mein Maanjan Gi, Tey Kapray Wi Dhovan Gi
Tera Lipan Gi, Mein Kakhan Wala Tara
Halima Menoo Naal Rakh Le

Jay Toon Pawein Kuj Kawain, Uff Wi Ni Karan Gi
Teray Ghar Jivan Gi, Mein Teray Ghar Maran Gi
Mil Jaaye, Menoo Bakshish Da Sahara
Halima Menoo Naal Rakh Le

Mintaan Wi, Kardi Tay Tarle Ve Pawaan Gi
Rakh Le Halima, Teri Nokari Mein Karan Gi
Mani Waasta Na Laveen Menoo Laraa
Halima Menoo Naal Rakh Le

Sun Ni, Halima Teri Kuli Si Eh Kakhan Di
Aa Gaya Aye Sohna, Teh Eh Ho Gayi Lakhan Di
Teri Goud, Wich Allah Da Piyara
Halima Menoo Naal Rakh Le

Hafiz Younis, Bara Shaan Halima Da
Jinday Ghar Khaiday Pia Wali Yateeman Da
Sada Ais Bin Hona Nai Guzara
Halima Menoo Naal Rakh Le

1: Ham Dare Aaqa Pe Sar Apna Jhuka Lete Hain
2:
Ham Dare Aaqa Pe Sar Apna Jhuka Lete Hain
Sach Bataana Are Duniya Tera Kya Lete Hain

Us Ko Aankhon Pe Bithaatye Hain Zamaane Waale
Jis Ko Mehboobe Khuda Apna Bana Lete Hain

Waqt Ki Kaid Nahi Hai Ye Karam Ki Baatein
Jab Bhi Sarkaar Ki Marzi Ho Bula Lete Hain

Gham Ke Maaro Ka Tabeebo Na Karo Koi Ilaaj
Ham Ghame Ishqe Nabi Me Bhi Maza Lete Hain

Patharon Tum To Ho Pathar Magar Aaqa Mere
Tum Se Gar Chahe To Kalma Bhi Padha Lete Hain

Jab Nahi Milti Kahi Se Bhi Suqoon Ki Daulat
Teri Mehfil Tere Dewaane Sajaa Lete Hain

Ye Bhi Sarkaar Ki Rehmat Hai Karam Hai Unka
Ham Jahaa Jaaye Waha Rang Jamaa Lete Hain

Gumbade Khazra Khuda Tujh Ko Salaamat Rakhe
Dekh Lete Hain Tujhe Pyaas Bujha Lete Hain

Jab Se Dekha Hai Niyazi Wo Riyazul Jannah
Hum To Ghar Baith Ke Jannat Ki Hawa Lete Hai

1: Hame Apna Woh Kehte Hain Muhabbat Ho To Aisi Ho
2:
Hame Apna Woh Kehte Hain Muhabbat Ho To Aisi Ho
Hame Nazron Me Rakhte Hain Inaayat Ho To Aisi Ho

Woh Pathar Maarne Waalo Ko Dete Hain Dua Aksar
Koi Laao Misaal Aisi, Sharaafat Ho To Aisi Ho

Ishaara Jab Woh Famaaye To Pathar Bol Uthte Hain
Nabuwwat Ho To Aisi Ho Risaalat Ho To Aisi Ho

Mere Aaqa Ki Wiladat Par Huwe Sab Ko Ata Dete
Isse Milaad Kehte Hain Wilaadat Ho To Aisi Ho

Namaze Asr Ko Qurbaan Kar Ke Ki Hasti Par
Ali Maula Ne Batlaaya Ibaadat Ho To Aisi Ho

Hussain Ibne Ali Ne Karbala Me Ye Kiya Saabit
Rahe Jaari Jo Neze Par Tilaawat Ho To Aisi Ho

Waha Mujram Ko Milti Hain Panaaein Bhi Jadaaein Bhi
Madine Me Jo Lagti Hain Adalat Ho To Aisi Ho

Aur Muhammad Ki Wiladat Par Hooain Sab Ko Ataa Baitain
Isse Milad Kehte Hain Wiladat Ho To Aisi Ho

Aur Hussain Ibn-E-Ali Ne Karbala Me Ye Kiya Sabith
Rahe Jaari Jo Nezay Par Tilawat Ho To Aisi Ho

1: Haqeeqat Me Woh Lutfe Zindagi Paya Nehi Karte
2:
Haqeeqat Me Woh Lutfe Zindagi Paya Nehi Karte
Jo Yaad E Mustafa Se Dil Ko Behlaya Nahin Kartay.

Zaban Per Shikwae Ranj O Alam Laya Nahin Karte
Nabi Kay Naam Lewa Gham Say Ghabraya Nahin Karte.

Yeh Darbaar E Mohammad Hai Yahan Apnoon Ka Kiya Kehna
Yahaan Se Hath Khali Gheir Bhi Jaya Nehi Karte.

Are O Na Samaj Qurbaan Hoja Inke Roze Par
Yeh Lamhe Zindagi Me Baar Baar Aya Nehin Karte.

Yeh Hai Darbaar Aqa Ka Yahaan Milta Hei Bemange
Are Nadan Yahaan Daman Ko Phelaya Nehi Karte.

Madinay Jo Bhi Jata Hai, Woh Jholi Bhar Kay Lata Hai
Sakhi Data Hain Khali Haath Lotaya Nahin Kertay.

Mohammad Mustafa Key Bagh Key Sabh Phool Aise Hain
Jo Bepani Ke Tar Rehte Hain Murjaya Nahi Karte.

Nadamat Sath Le Kar Hashr Mein Ae Aasio Jana
Suna Hei Sharm Waloon Ko Woh Sharmaya Nehi Karte.

Jo Unke Damaan E Rehmet Say Wabasta Hai Ae Hamid,
Kisi Kay Samnay Woh Haath Phelaya Nehi Karte.

Mohammad Mustafa Ki Shaan E Rehmet To Zarah Dekho,
Sittam Sehte To Hain Lekin Sittam Daya Nehi Karte.

Aggar Ho Jazba E Sadiq To Aksar Humne Dekha He,
Woh Khud Tashreef Le Ate Hain Tarpaya Nehi Karte.

Jo Inke Damaan E Rehmet Se Wabasta Hain Ae Hamid,
Kissi Ke Samne Woh Hath Phelaya Nehi Karte

Haqeeqat Me Woh Lutfe Zindagi Paya Nehi Karte,
Jo Yaad E Mustafa Se Dil Ko Garmaya Nehi Karte.

1: Har Dum Ho Mera Vird Madina Hi Madina
2:
Har Dum Ho Mera Vird Madina Hi Madina
Bas Yaad Teri Dil Me Rahe Roz-O-Shabina

Wo Lamha Wo Din Aur Wo Aajaye Mahina
Phir Kash Tadapta Huva Pahunchu Mai Madina

Sina Ho Madina Mera Sina So Madina
Ban Jaye Mera Dil Teri Ulfat Ka Khazina

Aaye Noo-E-Khuda Noor Bhari Dil Pe Nazar Ho
Ho Noor Se Pur Noor Ye Be Noor Nagina

Sarkar Tamanna Hai Yuhi Umr Basar Ho
Bas Teri Mohabbat Me Ho Marna Jina

Saqi Muhje Jaam Aaisa Mohabbat Ka Pilade
Utre Na Kabhi Iska Nasha Aai Sha-E-Madina

Tum Khak-E-Madina Mere Lashe Pe Chidakna
Phir Malna Kafan Par Jo Mile Un Ka Pasina

Attar Talab Gaar Hai Bas Unke Karam Ka
Lillah Karam Jane Karam Bahre Madina

1: Har Nazar Kaanp Utthegi Mehshar Ke Din
2:
Har Nazar Kaanp Utthegi Mehshar Ke Din
Khauf Se Har Kaleja Dehel Jaayega
Par Ye Naaz Un Ke Bande Ka Dekhenge Sab
Thaamkar Unka Daaman Machal Jaayenga

Maujh Katra Ke Hum Se Chalee Jayegi
Rukh Mukhalif Hava Ka Badal Jaayega
Jab Ishaarah Karenge Wo Naa Khuda
Apna Beda Bhanvar Se Nikal Jaayega

Yoon To Jeeta Hu Hukme Khuda Se Magar
Mere Dil Ki Hai Unko Yaqeenan Khabar
Haasile Zindagi Hoga Wo Din Mera
Unke Kadmon Mein Jab Dam Nikal Jaayega

Rabbi Sallim Wo Farmaane Wale Mile
Kyun Satate Hai Aye Dil Tujhe Waswase
Pul Se Guzrenge Hum Wajd Karte Huwein
Kaun Kehta Hai Paau Fisal Jayega

Akhtar E Khasta Kyun Itna Beychen Hai
Tera Aaqa Shehenshahe Kaunain Hai
Lau Lagaa To Sahin Shahe Laulaak Se
Gham Masarrat Ke Sanche Me Dhal Jayenga

1: Har Soo Hai Izhaar Madine Waale Ka
2:
Har Soo Hai Izhaar Madine Waale Ka
Noorani Darbaar Madine Waale Ka

Le Ke Chalo Ab Mujh Ko Madine Leke Chalo
Main To Hoon Bimaar Madine Waale Ka

Mujhko Hoga Naaz Ke Jab Ye Log Kahe
Ye Mangta He Sarkaar Madine Waale Ka

Mere Dil Ki Yehi Ek Tamanna Hai
Ke Ho Jaaye Deedar Madine Waale Ka

Meri Dua Hain Mehfil Mein Maujood Hain Jo
Sab Dekhe Darbaar Madine Waale Ka

Jannati Hai Woh Jannati Hai Woh Jannati Hai
Jis Le Dil Mein Hai Pyaar Madine Waale Ka

Shakir O Rizwan Par Ho Karam Ki Khaas Nazar
Yeh Karte Hai Parchaar Madine Waale Ka

---------------- Verses ----------------

Apna Thikana Wo Dozakh Me Payega
Jisne Kiya Inkar Madine Wale Ka

Apne To Apne Haan Dushman Bhi Bol Uthe
Aala Hai Kirdar Madine Wale Ka

Mohsin Ek Din Jayenge Hum Bhi Taiba Me
Dekhenge Darbar Madine Wale Ka

1: Har Soo Jahaan Wale Khushiya Mana Rahe Hai
2:
Har Soo Jahaan Wale Khushiya Mana Rahe Hai
Dono Jahaan Ke Dulha Tashreef Laa Rahe Hai

Ye Mo’jiza To Dekho Sardare Ambiya Ka
Mutthi Me Kankaro Se Kalma Padha Rahe Hai

Najdi Wahabi Shaitaan Sab Baithe Ro Rahe Hai
Hum Aashiqe Nabi Hai Khushiya Mana Rahe Hai

Ishqe Nabi Basaa Kar Jo Shakhs Mar Gaya Hai
Us Laash Ko Farishte Kaandha Laga Rahe Hai

Mehsoos Ho Raha Hai Is Bazme Qaadri Me
Sarkaare Gause Aazam Tashreef La Rahe Hai

Ye Sach Hai To Hai Zinda Qur’an Keh Raha Hai
Is Waaste Hum Sunni Chaadar Chada Rahe Hai

Ye Martaba Kisi Ne Paaya Hai To Bataao
Jibreel Mustafa Ko Jhoola Jhoola Rahe Hai

Mehshar Ki Bheed Me Hum Ghairo Se Ye Kahenge
Woh Dekho Mere Aaqa Tashreef La Rahe Hai

1: Har Taraf Anwaar Ki Barsaat Hai
2:
Allah Hoo, Allah Hoo
Allah Allah Allah Allah Hoo Allah

Har Taraf Anwaar Ki Barsaat Hai,
Aamad E Sarkaar Ki Kya Baat Hai,
Mehfil E Sarkaar Ki Kiya Baat Hai.

Raat Jo Guzri Nabi Kay Zikr Mein,
Din Se Behtar Woh Hamari Raat Hai.

Aagaya Hai Amena Bibi Laal,
Ab Yaqeenan Sab Ka Beda Paar Hai.

Yoon To Gumbad Hai Jahaan Mein Har Jagah,
Gumbad E Khazra Teri Kya Baat Hai.

Kya Bigade Gaa Zamaana Ab Mera,
Sar Pe Mere Peer Ka Jab Haat Hai.

Kyun Mein Mangoon Jab Mere Kashkol Main,
Naqsh E Naal E Pak Ki Khairaat Hai.

Kyun Pareshan Hoon Mein Uqhba Key Liye,
Shafa E Rauzay Jaza Woh Zaat Hai.

Wali E Kaun O Makaan Kay Zikr Say,
Wajd Mein Yeh Sari Kainaat Hai.

Nausha E Bazme Jina Kay Waaste,
Anbiya Ki Saf Ba Saf Baraat Hai.

Kis Tarha Likhoon Main Midhat Aap Ki,
Jab Madha Khawan Khud Khuda Ki Zaat Hai.

Kis Qadar Rehaan Khush Qismat Hai Tu,
Teri Bakhshish Ka Wasila Naat Hai.

Har Taraf Anwaar Ki Barsaat Hai,
Mehfil E Sarkar Ki Kya Baat Hai,
Mehfil E Sarkaar Ki Kiya Baat Hai.

1: Har Waqt Tasawwur Mein Madine Ki Gali Ho
2:
Har Waqt Tasawwur Mein Madine Ki Gali Ho
Aur Yaad Muhammad Ki Mere Dil Me Basi Ho

Do-Soz Bilal Aqa Mile Dard Raza Sa
Sarkar Ataa Ishq Owais-E-Qarni Ho

Aye Kaash Mai Banjau Madine Ka Musafir
Phir Rooti Huwi Taibah Ko Baraat Chali Ho

Phir Rehmat-E-Bari Se Chaloon Soo-E-Madina
Ai Kaash! Muqaddar Se Mayas'sar Woh Ghadi Ho

Jab Aau Madine Me Toh Har Chaak Girebaan
Aankhon Se Barasti Huwi Ashkon Ki Jhadi Ho

Aye Kaash Madine Me Mujhe Maut Yuh Aaye
Qadmon Me Tere Sar Ho Meri Rooh Chali Ho

Jab Leke Chalo Gharibaan Ko Janazah
Kuch Khaak Madine Ki Mere Munh Pe Saji Ho

Jis Waqt Nakirein Meri Qabr Mein Aaein
Us Waqt Mere Lab Pe Saji Naat E Nabi Ho

Allah Karam Aisa Kare Tujh Par Jahan Me
Aye Dawate Islami Teri Dhoom Machi Ho

Aaqa Ka Gada Hoon Aye Jahannam Tu Bhi Sunle
Woh Kaise Jalay Jo Ke Ghulam E Madani Ho

Sadqa Mere Murshid Ka Karoon Door Balaein
Pura Mera Sarkaar Har Armaan Dili Ho

Allah Ki Rehmat Se To Jannat Hi Milegi
Ai Kaash! Mahille Me Jagah Unke Mili Ho

Mehfooz Sada Rakhna Shaha Be Adbaun Se
Aur Mujhse Bhi Sarzor Kabhi Be Adbi Ho

Attar Hamara Hai Saray Hashr Ai Kaash!
Daste Shaha Batha Se Yehi Chit'thi Mili Ho

1: Hawa Ki Khushbu Bata Rahi Hai
2:
Hawa Ki Khushbu Bata Rahi Hai
Woh Zulf Apni Sajaa Rahe Hain
Sawaari Taiba Se Chal Padi Hai
Huzoor Tashreef Laa Rahe Hain

Kahi Pe Mehfil Hai Mehkasho Ki
Kahi Pe Mehfil Hai Dil Jalo Ki
Ye Kitne Khushbakht Hain Jo
Nabi Ki Mehfil Sajaa Rahe Hain

Na Paas Bhi Ho To Soona Saawan
Woh Jis Pe Raazi Wohi Suhaagan
Jinho Ne Pakda Nabi Ka Daaman
Unhi Ke Ghar Jagmagaa Rahe Hain

Habeebe Daawar Ghareeb Parwar
Rasoole Akram Karam Ke Paikar
Kisi Ko Dar Pe Bula Rahe Hain
Kisi Ke Khawaabo Me Aa Rahe Hain

Mai Apni Khairul Waraa Ke Sadqe
Mai Unki Shaane Ata Ke Sadqe
Bhara Hai Aibo Se Mere Daaman
Huzoor Phir Bhi Nibha Rahe Hain

Banega Jaane Ka Phir Bahaana
Kahega Aakar Koi Deewaana
Chalo Niyaazi Chale Madine
Madine Waale Bula Rahe Hain

1: Hayya Alas Salah Hayya Alal Falah
2:
Di Hazrate Bilal Ne Kaabe Se Jab Sada
Haiya Alas Salah Haiya Alah Falah
Aalam Me Aam Naraa E Tauheed Ho Gaya
Haiyya Alas Salah Haiyya Alal Falah
Irshade Kibriya Hai Ye Farmaane Mustafa
Haiyya Alas Salah Haiyya Alal Falah

Paida Hue Rasool To Rehmat Baras Padi
Thi Arsh Se Zameen Talak Noor Ki Jhadi
Daee Haleema Goud Me Lekar Jo Chal Padi
Beemar Ootni Me Ajab Jaan Pad Gayi
Baade Saba Ne Jhoom Ke Kaano Me Yoon Kaha
Haiyya Alas Salah Haiyya Alal Falah

Pahucha Jo Unke Dar Pe Muqaddar Sawar Gaya
Marehra Se Hai Shehre Bareili Ka Silsila
Bagdaad Se Hai Shehre Madina Ka Raabta
Gausul Wara Ke Naam Se Dil Ko Sukoon Mila
Jibreel Aaye Nasbe Alam Kaabe Par Kiya
Haiyya Alas Salah Haiyya Alal Falah

Islam Ke Alam Ko Uthaya Hussain Ne
Baatil Ke Aage Sar Na Jhukaya Hussain
Kya Cheez Hai Namaaz Bataya Hussain Ne
Sajde Me Apne Sar Ko Kataya Hussain Ne
Ye Dashte Karbala Se Abhi Aati Hai Sadaa
Haiyya Alas Salah Haiyya Alal Falah

Meraj Me Jo Rab Ne Bulaya Huzoor Ko
Jibraeel Aaye Aur Jagaya Huzoor Ko
Haq Ki Raza Ka Jaam Pilaya Huzoor Ko
Chalne Lage To Rab Ne Bataya Huzoor Ko
Ummat Se Jaake Kehna Yehi Tohfa Hai Mila
Haiyya Alas Salah Haiyya Alal Falah

Daadhi Tamaam Nabiyon Ki Sunnat Hai Momino
Islam Ka Shi'ar Hai Rehmat Hai Momino
Sarkar Ki Ghulami Ki Nisbat Hai Momino
Sunnat Pe Jo Chala Use Jannat Hai Momino
Jannat Me Bhi Milega Hume Qurbe Mustafa
Haiyya Alas Salah Haiyya Alal Falah

Meraj Rooh E Ahle Baseerat Namaaz Hai
Afzal Tareen Shughl Sa'adat Namaaz Hai
Mere Nabi Ki Aankho Ki Thandak Namaaz Hai
Momin Ke Waaste To Sa'adat Namaaz Hai
Yeh Hai Kaleem Mazhar E Altafe Kibriya
Haiyya Alas Salah Haiyya Alal Falah

1: Hirze Jaan Zikre Shafaat Kijiye
2:
Hirze Jaa(N) Zikre Shafa'at Kijiye
Naar Se Bachne Ki Soorat Kijiye

Unke Naqshe Paa Pe Gairat Kijiye
Aankh Se Chup Kar Ziyaarat Kijiye

Unke Husne Baa Malaahat Par Nisaar
Sheeraye Jaa(N) Ki Halaawat Kijiye

Unke Dar Par Jaise Ho Mit Jaaiye
Natawaano Kuch To Himmat Kijiye

Frr Deeje Panjaye Deve Laee
Mustafa Ke Bal Pe Taaqat Kijiye

Doob Kar Yaade Labe Shadaab Mein
Aabe Kauthar Ki Sabaahat Kijiye

Yaade Qaamat Karte Uthiye Qabr Se
Jaane Mehshar Par Qayaamat Kijiye

Unke Dar Par Baithiye Ban Kar Faqeer
Be Nawaao Fikre Sarwat Kijiye

Jiska Husn Allah Ko Bhi Bhaa Gaya
Aise Pyaare Se Muhabbat Kijiye

Hayy Baaqee Jiski Karta Hai Sana
Marte Dum Tak Uski Midhat Kijiye

Arsh Par Jiski Kamaanen Chad Gayi
Sadqe Us Baazoo Pe Quwwat Kijiye

Neem Wa Taiba Ke Phoolon Par Ho Aankh
Bulbulo Paase Nazaakat Kijiye

Sar Se Girta Hai Abhi Baare Gunaah
Kham Zara Farqe Iraadat Kijiye

Aankh To Uthti Nahi Kya De(N) Jawaab
Hum Pe Be Pursish Hi Rehmat Kijiye

Uzr Badtar Az Gunah Ka Zikr Kya
Be Sabab Hum Par Inaayat Kijiye

Naa'ra Kije Ya Rasoolallah Ka
Mufliso Saamaane Daulat Kijiye

Hum Tumhare Hoke Kis Ke Paas Jaaye
Sadqa Shehzaadon Ka Rehmat Kijiye

Man Ra Aani Qad Ra Al Haq Jo Kahe
Kya Bayaa(N) Uski Haqeeqat Kijiye

Aalime Ilme Do Aalam Hain Huzoor
Aapse Kya Arze Haajat Kijiye

Aap Sultane Jahaa(N) Hum Benawaa
Yaad Humko Waqte Ne'mat Kijiye

Tujh Se Kya Kya Aye Mere Taiba Ke Chaand
Zulmate Gham Ki Shikaayat Kijiye

Dar Badar Kab Tak Fire(N) Khasta Kharaab
Taiba Mein Madfan Inaayat Kijiye

Har Baras Woh Qaafilo Ki Dhoom Dhaam
Aah Suniye Aur Gaflat Kijiye

Phir Palat Kar Muh Na Us Jaanib Kiya
Sach Hai Aur Daa'waye Ulfat Kijiye

Aqribaa Hubbe Watan Be Himmati
Aah Kis Kis Ki Shikaayat Kijiye

Ab To Aaqa Muh Dikhane Ka Nahi
Kis Tarah Raf-E Nadaamat Kijiye

Apne Haatho Khud Luta Baithe Hain Ghar
Kis Pe Daa'waye Bizaa'at Kijiye

Kis Se Kahiye Kya Kiya Kya Ho Gaya
Khud Hi Apne Par Malaamat Kijiye

Arz Ka Bhi Ab To Muh Padta Nahi
Kya Ilaaje Darde Furqat Kijiye

Apni Ik Meethi Nazar Ke Shehad Se
Chaaraye Zehre Musibat Kijiye

De Khuda Himmat Ki Ye Jaane Hazee
Aap Par Waaren Woh Soorat Kijiye

Aap Hum Se Badh Ke Hum Par Meherbaan
Hum Kare Jurm Aap Rehmat Kijiye

Jo Na Bhoola Hum Ghareebon Ko Raza
Yaad Uski Apni Aadat Kijiye

1: Ho Gaey Bazme Jahan Mey Khwaar Ham
2:
Ho Gaey Bazme Jahan Mey Khwaar Ham
Chahthay Hai Ik Nazar Sarkar Ham

Ham Buray Hai Ya Balay Jeysay Bhi Hai,
Aap Key Hai Aey Shahe Abrar Ham
Kasthi Milath Bhanwar Main Phans Gaee,
Ya Rasulullah Uthray Paar Ham

Ab Tho Qismath Mey Andheyrey Reh Gaey,
Roshni Key Thay Kabhi Minaar Ham
Ley Gaey Kirdar Ki Dolath Aduw,
Ab Hai Khaali Saahibe Gafthaar Ham

Aasi-Wo-Khaathi Sahi Leykin Hazoor,
Aap Ki Ulfath Say Hai Sarshaar Ham
Ab Na Khali Haath Lowtein Ya Nabi,
Ho Gaey Hain Haazre Darbaar Ham

Ho Gaey Bazme Jahan Mey Khwaar Ham
Chahthay Hai Ik Nazar Sarkar Ham

1: Ho Karam Sarkar Ab To Ho Gaey Gham Beshumaar
2:
Ho Karam Sarkar Ab To Ho Gaey Gham Beshumaar
Jaan-O-Dil Thum Par Fida Aey Do Jahan Key Taajdaar

Mey Akeyla Aur Maas'il Zindagee Key Beshumaar
Aap Hi Kuch Kijiey Na Ey Shahey Aali Waqar

Yaad Atha Hey Tawafe Khanaey Ka'ba Mujhay
Aur Lipatna Multazam Say Waley Khana Bar Bar

Sange Aswad Chuum Kar Milta Mujhay Keyf-O-Saroor
Chayn Patha Deykh Kar Dil Mustajab-O-Mustajar

Ya Khuda Dikhlahathi Mey Pak Mizan Woh Maqam
Aur Safa Marwa Mujhay Behray Rasoole Zi Waqar

Ja Raha Hey Kaafila Taiba Nagar Rotha Huwa
Mey Raha Jatha Hun Thanha Aey Habibey Kirdgaar

Jald Phir Thum Lo Bula Aur Sabz Ghumbad Do Dikha
Hazri Ki Aarzo Ney Kardiya Phir Beykaraar

Choom Kar Khake Madinah Jhoomtha Phirtha Tha Mey
Yaad Athay Hey Madinay Kay Mujhay Leyl O Nahar

Ghumbaday Khazra Key Jalway Aur Woh Iftariya
Yaad Athi Hey Bohoth Ramadhan Taibah Ki Bahar

Ya Rasula Llah Sun Li Jey Meri Faryaad Ko
Kown Hai Jo Key Sunay Teray Siwa Meri Pukaar

Haal Par Meray Karam Ki Ik Nazar Farmaey
Dil Mera Ghamgeen Hai Aey Ghamzadon Kay Ghamgusaar

Kaflay Walo Suno Yaad Aey Tho Mera Salam
Arz Karna Rothay Rothay Ho Sakey Tho Bar Bar

Ghamzada Yun Na Huwa Hotha Obaid-E-Qadri
Iss Baras Bhi Deykhtha Ghar Sabz Ghumbad Ki Bahar

1: Hui Umeed E Barawar Madina Aane Wala Hai
2:
Hui Umeed E Barawar Madina Aane Wala Hai
Jhuka Lo Ab Adab Se Sar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Pila De Saqiya Saghar Madina Aane Wala Hai
Ata Ab Kaif O Masti Kar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Teher Ja Rooh E Muztar Tu Nikal Jana Madine Me
Khudara Ab Na Jaldi Kar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Wasila Char Yaro Ka Uhad Ke Jaan Nisaro Ka
Dikha Do Ek Jhalak Dilbar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Meri Ho Arzoo Puri Mujhe Miljaye Manzoori
Baqi E Paak Ki Sarwar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Ata Ho Mujhko Chashm E Tar Mujhe Dedo Dil E Muztar
Zara Jaldi Mere Dilbar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Tadap Ne Ka Qarina Do Mujhe Do Chaak Sina Do
Pae Shabeer Aur Shabar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Mubarak Ho Gunahgaro Khatakaro Siyahkaro
Tumhe Ab Asiyo Kya Dar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Utho Attar Ab Utho Zara To Ghor Se Dekho
Wo Chaya Noor Har Shae Par Madina Aane Wala Hai

1: Hum Apni Hasrate Dil Ko Mitane Aaye Hai
2:
Hum Apni Hasrate Dil Ko Mitane Aaye Hai
Hum Apni Dil Ki Lagi Ko Bujhane Aaye Hai

Dil E Hazi Ko Tassalli Dilane Aaye Hai
Ghum E Firaq Ko Dil Se Mitane Aaye Hai

Ajab Karma Hai Ke Khud Mujrimo Ke Hamee Hai
Gunah Gaaron Ki Baqshih Karaane Aaye Hai

Kareem Hai Wo Nigah E Karam Se Dekhenge
Hai Daagh-Daagh Dil Apna Dikhane Aaye Hai

Huzoor Bahre Khuda Daastaan E Ghum Sun Le
Ghum E Firaaq Ka Kissa Sunane Aaye Hai

Khuda Ne Ghaib Diya Hai Inhe Hai Sab Raushan
Jo Khatre Dil Hi Me Chupne Chupane Aaye Hai

Nigaah E Lutf O Karam Hogi Aur Fir Hogi
Ki Zakhm E Dil Pe Ye Marham Lagane Aaye Hai

Faqeer Aapke Darr Ke Hai Hum Kaha Jaye
Tumhare Kuche Me Dhuni Ramaane Aaye Hai

Daba Nahi Wo Falak Se Buland O Bala Hai
Tale Zameen Jise Sarwar Sulane Aaye Hai

Naseeb Jaag Utha Uska Chayn Se Soya
Wo Jisko Kabr Me Sarwar Sulane Aaye Hai

Naseeb Tera Chamak Uthha Dekh To Noori
Arab Ke Chand Lahad Ke Sir-Hane Aaye Hai

1: Hum Bazm Sada Unke Sajaate Hi Rahenge
2:
Hum Bazm Sada Unke Sajaate Hi Rahenge
Sarkaar Ka Meelad Manate Hi Rahenge

Jo Dono Jahaanon Mein Sahara Hai Humara
Geet Unki Inaayat Ke Gaate Hi Rahenge

Haq Wale Sada Sayyade Shabbir Ke Gham Mein
Ro Ro Ke Zamaane Ko Rulate Hi Rahenge

Aise Hi Duroodon Ki Salaamon Ki Fiza Mein
Ushshaq Unhe Ghar Mein Bulate Hi Rahenge

Jo Naate Nabi Sun Kar Tadap Jaate Hai Saaim
In’aam Wo Sarkaar Se Paate Hi Rahenge

1: Hum Bhi Aye Kaash Madine Mein Bulaaye Jaate
2:
Hum Bhi Aye Kaash Madine Mein Bulaaye Jaate
Shahe Kaunain Ke Mehmaan Banaaye Jaate

Wajd Mein Hoke Bhi Ek Hosh Ki Dunya Hoti
Parde Aankhon Se Meri Itne Hataaye Jaate

Zindgaani Ko Bhi Jeene Ka Saleeqa Aata
Raat Bhar Unki Huzoori Mein Jagaaye Jaate

Ek Jhadi Aansuon Ki Nazre Aqeedat Karte
Daaghe Isyaan Bhi Isi Tarha Mitaaye Jaate

Aap Ke Qurb Ki Khushbu Ki Sa’adat Ka Nasha
Dekhte Rauza E Purnoor Ko Aate Jaate

Martaba Apna Bhi Shahon Se Zyada Hota
Unki Dehleez Pe Jab Shaad Bithaaye Jaate.

1: Hum Khaak Hain Aur Khaak Hi Maawa Hai Hamaara
2:
Hum Khaak Hain Aur Khaak Hi Maawa Hai Hamaara
Khaki To Wo Aadam Jadd-E-Aala Hai Hamara

Allah Hamein Khaak Kare Apni Tallab Mein
Ye Khaak To Sarkaar Se Tamgha Hai Hamara

Jis Khaak Pe Rakhte The Qadam Sayyid-E-Aalam
Us Khaak Pe Qurbaan Dil-E-Shaida Hain Hamara

Kham Ho Gayi Pushte Falak Is Ta’ne Zamee Se
Sun Humpe Madina Hai Woh Rutba Hai Humara

Usne Laqabe Khaak Shahenshaah Se Paaya
Jo Haidar-E-Karraar Ke Maula Hai Hamara

Aye Muddaiyo Khaak Ko Tum Khaak Na Samjho
Iss Khaak Mein Madfoon Shah-E-Batha Hai Hamaara

Hai Khaak Se Taameer Mazaar-E-Shah-E-Konain
Ma'moor Isi Khaak Se Qibla Hai Hamara

Ham Khaak Uraeinge Jo Wo Khaak Na Paayi
Aabaad Raza Jiss Pe Madina Hai Hamara

Hum Khaak Hain Aur Khaak Hi Maawa Hai Hamaara
Khaki To Wo Aadam Jadd-E-Aala Hai Hamara

1: Hum Sar Pe Kafan Bandhe Maidan Mein Nikle Hain
2:
Hum Sar Pe Kafan Bandhe Maidan Mein Nikle Hain
Batil Ke Mehlon Ko Hum Daahne Nikle Hain

Himmat Hai Hume Toke Dam Hai To Hume Roko
Hum Naara-E-Risalat Ko Pehlane Nikle Hain

Har Des Main Gunjega Ab Ya Rasool Allah
Har Shakhs Pukarega Ab Ya Rasool Allah

Hum Saari Duniya Mein Halchal Si Macha Denge
Sarkar Ke Aashiq Hai Rang Apna Jamaa Denge

Milad-E-Nabi Karna Ye Khoon Mein Shamil Hai
Is Mission Ki Khatir Hum Din Raat Lagaa Denge

Sarkaar Ki Naaton Se Pur Josh Hai Deewane
Milad Ki Mehfil Mein Maahol Bana Denge

Kyun Kar Na Manayen Hum Ye Sunni Saqhafat Hai
Milad Manane Par Sarkar Jagaa Denge

Sauda Na Karenge Hum Imaan Na Bechenge
Naamus-E-Risalat Par Duniya Ko Hilaa Denge

Har Nasl Ka Naara Hai Har Qaum Ka Naara Hai
Is Naare Se Logon Ko Aapas Me Milaa Denge

Islam Jo Mazahab Hai Paigham-E-Mohabbat Hai
Is Aman Ke Parcham Ko Har Ghar Main Jagaa Denge

Sarkaar Ki Izzat Par Marna Hai Hume Logon
Ye Wada Hamara Hai Sab Kuch Hi Lutaa Denge

Hum Ne Yehi Thani Hai Mannat Yehi Maani Hai
Is Des Ki Matti Par Khoon Apna Bahaa Denge

Hai Aal-E-Nabi Piyare Ashaab Sitaren Hain
Dono Ki Mohabbat Ko Hum Dil Main Basaa Denge

Aaye Hain Ujaagar Sang Amjad-O-Tahir Bhi
Paigham-E-Nabi Denge Ahkaam-E-Khuda Denge

2:
Humko Bulana Ya Rasool Allah, Humko Bulana Ya Habeeb Allah

Humhey Bulwaaye Gay Aaqa Madina Hum Bhi Dekhe Gay
Humhey Bulwaaye Gay Aaqa Madina Hum Bhi Dekhe Gay

Humhey Bulwaaye Gay Aaqa Madina Hum Bhi Dekhe Gay

Humhey Bulwaaye Gay Aaqa Madina Hum Bhi Dekhe Gay

1: Husne Mehboob Ne Aalam Ko Saja Rakha Hai
2:
Husne Mehboob Ne Aalam Ko Saja Rakha Hai
Rishta Makhlooq Ka Khaliq Se Mila Rakha Hai

Chaand Taare Hai Jabhi Noor Nazar Ko Dete
Unki Nalain Ka Surma Jo Laga Rakha Hai

Phoolon Mein Chaand Mein Taaron Mein Tabassum Unka
Unke Jalwon Ke Siwa Duniya Mein Kya Rakha Hai

Naat Kehta Hu To Aati Hai Fiza Mein Masti
Jaam Taiba Ka Khayalon Ko Pila Rakha Hai

Sadqe Taiba Ke Azaab Aata Nahi Hum Par
Shehre Mehboob Ne Duniya Ko Bacha Rakha Hai

Jab Bhi Tu Chahe Sada Dene Sawaali Aaja
Mere Mehboob Ne Darwaza Khula Rakha Hai

Jinke Tukdon Pe Jahaan Palta Hai Saara Saaim
Unki Sarkaar Mein Daaman Ko Bicha Rakha Hai

1: Huzoor Aisa Koi Intizam Ho Jaye
2:
Huzoor Aisa Koi Intizam Ho Jaye,
Ke Phir Madina Rawana Ghulam Ho Jaye.

Naseeb Waalon Mein Mera Bhi Naam Ho Jaye,
Jo Zindagi Ki Madinay Mein Shaam Ho Jaye.

Main Shaad Shaad Maroon Ga, Agar Dum-E-Akhir,
Naseeb Jalwa E Kahirul Anam Ho Jaye.
Zubaan Pe Jaari Muhammad Ka Naam Ho Jaye

Fuzool Goi Say Bach Jaye Yeh Zaban Meri,
Mera Kalaam Durood-O-Salaam Ho Jaye.

Pia Raza Ne Pia Jo Murshid Nay,
Ataa Mujhe Shaha Aisa Jaam Ho Jaye.

Shaha Ubaid-E-Raza Dar Badar Phiray Kab Tak,
Huzoor Is Ka Madinah Maqam Ho Jaye.

Ubaid Mar Kay Madinah Mein Paa Chuka Hai Baqi,
Khabar Watan Mein Kabhi To Yeh Aam Ho Jaye.

Huzor Aap Jo Sun Le To Baat Ban Jaaye
Huzor Aap Jo Keh De To Kaam Ho Jaaye

Tajalliyat Se Bhar Lu Mai Apna Kasa E Jaan
Kabhi Jo Un Ki Gali Mai Kayam Ho Jaaye

Huzor Aap Jo Chahe To Kuchh Nahi Mushkil
Simat Ke Fasla Ye Chand Gaam Ho Jaaye

Maza To Jab Hai Farishte Ye Kabr Mai Keh De
Sabih Mid’hat E Khairul Anam Ho Jaaye

Huzor Aisa Koi Intezam Ho Jaaye
Salam Ke Liye Hazir Gulam Ho Jaaye

Woh Bazm-E-Khaas Jo Darbaar-E-Aam Ho Jaye
Umeed Hai Keh Hamara Salaam Ho Jaye

Idher Bhi Ik Nigaah-E-Lutf-E-Aam Ho Jaye
Ke Aashiqon Mein Hamara Bhi Naam Ho Jaye

Tere Ghulam Ki Shaukat Jou Dekh Le Mehmood
Abhi Ayaaz Ki Surat Ghulam Ho Jaye

Mein Qayal Aap Ke Rauzay Ka Hoon Woh Qayal Tur
Kaleem Se Na Kissi Din Kalaam Ho Jaye

Madinay Jaon Phir Aaon Dobara Phir Jaon
Tamaam Umar Issi Mein Tamaam Ho Jaye

Bulao Jald Madinay Mein Hai Ameer Ko Khauf
Kaheen Na Umar Do Roza Tamaam Ho Jaye

Tumhari Naat Parhon Mein Sunoo Likhoon Har Dum
Ye Zindagi Meri Yunhi Tamaam Ho Jaye

Meri Namaz-E-Janazah Ki Yun Ibadat Ho
Ke Do Jahan Ke Aaqa Imam Ho Jaye

Piya Raza O Ziya Ne Piya Jou Murshid Ne
A’ta Mujhay Bhi Shah Aisa Jaam Ho Jaye

1: Huzoor Jaante Hain
2:
Jo Ho Chuka Hai Jo Hoga, Huzoor Jante Hain,
Teri Aata Say Khudaya, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Aie Ilm E Ghaib Kay Munkir Khuda Ko Dekha Hai?
Aur Tujhay Bhi Kehna Padega, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Munafiqoon Ka Aqeeda Woh Gaibdaan Nahin,
Aur Sahabiyoon Ka Aqeeda, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Woh Mominon Ki To Janoon Say Bhi Kareeb Huye,
Kahan Say Kisnay Pukara, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Haran Ye Kehne Lagi Chor De Mujhe Saiyaad,
Mai Laut Aaungi Wallah, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Haran Ne Oonth Ne Chiryoon Ne Ki Yehi Faryaad,
Ke Unkay Gham Ka Madawa, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Bula Rahe Hai Nabi Jaake Itna Bol Use
Darakht Kaise Chale Ga, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Kahan Marein Gay Abu Jahal O Utba O Sheiba,
Ke Jang E Badr Ka Naqsha, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Isiliye To Sulaya Hai Apne Pehlu Mein,
Ke Yaar E Ghar Ka Rutba, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Umar Nay Tan Say Juda Kar Diya Tha Sar Jis Ka,
Woh Apna Hai Ke Paraya, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Nabi Ka Faisla Na Maan Kar Woh Jaan Say Gaya,
Mizaaj Umar Ka Hai Kaisa, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Wohi Hai Paikar E Sharm O Haiya O Zul Nuraian,
Maqaam Unki Haya Ka, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Yeh Khud Shaheed Hain, Betay Nawasay Potay Shaheed,
Ali Ki Shaan E Yagana, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Hain Jiske Moula Huzoor Uske Hain Ali Moula,
Abu Turab Ka Rutba, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Main Unki Baat Karoon Yeh Nahin Meri Auqaat,
Ke Shaan E Fatma Zahra, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Jina Mein Kaun Hain Sardaar Nojawanoon Kay,
Hasan, Hussain Ke Nana, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Nahi Hai Zaad E Safar Pass Jin Ghulamoon Ke,
Unhein Bhi Dar Pe Bulana, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Khuda Hi Jaanay Ubaid Unko Hai Pata Kiya Kiya,
Hamein Pata Hai Bus Itna, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Malaika Ne Kiya Youn To Sajda Adam Ko,
Dar Asal Kis Ko Tha Sajda, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Woh Kitna Fasla Tha, Aur Kalaam Tha Kaisa,
Aao Adna Aur Ma Aaoha, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Milay Thay Rah Mein 9 Bar Kis Liye Musa,
Yeh Deed E Haq Ka Bahana, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Main Chup Khara Houn Mawaja Pay Sar Jhukaye Huye,
Sunaoon Kaise Fasana, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Chupa Rahe Hai Lagatar Mere Aiyboon Ko,
Main Kis Qadar Houn Kameena, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Main Unki Baat Karoun Yeh Nahin Meri Auqaat,
Ke Shaan E Fatma Zahra, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Jo Ho Chuka Hai Jo Hoga, Huzoor Jante Hain,
Teri Aata Say Khudaya, Huzoor Jaante Hain.

Khuda Ko Dekha Nahin Aur Eik Maan Liya,
Ke Jantay Thay Sahaba, Huzoor Jantay Hein.

Khabar Bhi Hai? Ke Khabar Sabki Hai Unhein Kab Say,
Ke Jab Na Ab Tha Na Kab Tha, Huzoor Jante Hain.

Kai Unke Haath Mein Kya Kya Tujhe Khabar Na Mujhe,
Khuda Nay Kitna Nawaza, Huzoor Jante Hain.
