**************** Other Version ********************

Hudood E Taire Sidra Huzur Jante Hain
Kaha Hai Arshe Mohalla Huzur Jante Hain

Unhe Khabar Hai Kahin Se Padoh Durud Un Par
Tamam Daher Ka Naksha Huzur Jante Hain

Baroze Hashr Shafa'at Karenge Chun Chun Kar
Har Ek Gulam Ka Chehra Huzur Jante Hain

Mai Is Yakeen Se Nikla Hun Janeeb E Tayba
Mere Safar Ka Irada Huzur Jante Hain

Main Mangata Hun Unhi Se Unhi Se Manguga
Huzur Par Hai Bharosa Huzur Jante Hain

Madine Kis Ko Hai Jana Huzoor Jante Hain
Kise Hai Dar Pe Bulana Huzoor Jante Hain

Har Ek Harf E Tamana Huzoor Janta Hain
Tamam Haal Dilon Ka Huzoor Janta Hain

Broz E Hashar Shifaet Krain Ge Wo Lakin
Agar Hua Ye Aqida Huzoor Janta Han

Mai Is Umeed Se Nikla Hun Haazri Ke Liye
Mere Safar Ka Irada Huzoor Janta Han

Bula Bhi Sakte Han Wo Aur Abhi Sakte Hain
Ke Duriyon Ko Mitana Huzoor Janta Hain

Ma Maangta Hoon Unhi Se Unhi Se Maangta Hoon
Huzoor Par Hai Bharosa Huzoor Janta Hain

Khuda Ne Is Liye Qasim Unhe Banaya Hain
Ke Bantna Ka Qareena Huzoor Janta Hain

Isi Liye Hai Laqab Un Ka Rahmat E Aalam
Ke Haal Maziyon Ferda Huzoor Janta Hain

Pohanch Ke Sidra Pe Ruhul Ameen Kehne Lage
Yahan Se Age Ka Rasta Huzoor Janta Han

Qayamat Aye Gi Kub Unko Ilm Hai Serwar
Zahoor E Kun Ka Bhi Lamha Huzoor Janta Hain

Sikhae Ham Ko Sahaba Ne Baat Ye Serwar
Ke Janta Hai Khuda Or Huzoor Janta Hain

1: Ik Baar Madiney Jaawa Mey
2:
Allah Allah Allah
Allah Allah Allah
Allah Allah Allah
Allah Allah Allah

Ik Baar Madiney Jaawa Mey,
Feyr Murkey Kadee Na Awaan Mey
Lokee Labdey Phiran Meynu Galiya Dey Wich
Kalee Kamlee Thaley Chup Jaawa Mey

Kar Zikr Madiney Waley Da
Ey Dey Wich Balaee Teri Ey
Ik Baar Tu Hoja Sohna Da
Feyr Saaree Khudaee Teri Ey

Jittey Meray Nabi Da Deyra Ey
Othey Reynda Sada Saweyra Ey
Wich Qabr Dey Aqa Aakhan Gey
Eynu Chad Deyo Ey Tey Meyra Ey

Lajpaal Jida Rakwaala Ey
O Nu Kaun Mitaawan Waala Ey
Sadi Uss Sohney Nal Lag Gaey Ey
Jera Toor Nibawan Walaa Ey

Manmohney Nabi Makki Madani
Ham Par Bhi Karam Farma Ja Na
Teray Deed Key Pyasey Beytey Hai
Meray Shaha Pyaas Bujaa Ja Na

1: Ilahi Madad Kar Madad Ki Ghari Hai
2:
Ilahi Madad Kar, Madad Ki Ghari Hai,
Gunaahon Kay Darya Mein Kashti Phansi Hai.

Mere Tan Pay Ghaflat Ki Chaadar Pari Hai,
Nahoosat Gunaahon Ki Chaei Hui Hai,

Yahi Baat Hum Nay Barhon Say Suni Hai,
Na Ho Banagi Gar To Kia Zindagi Hai,

Ae Abr-E-Karam Aa Baras Ja, Baras Ja,
Ajab Aag Isyaan Ki Mujh Mein Lagi Hai,

Nahi Pass Husn-E-Amal Meray Mola,
Nazar Meri Tere Karam Per Lagi Hai,

Ubaid-E-Raza Naikyon Say Hai Khali,
Gunaahon Mein Hasil Ise Bartari Hai,

Lab-E-Mustafa Say Khudaya Suna Day,
Ubaid-E-Raza Naar Se Tu Bari Hai

1: Imaan Hai Qaale Mustafayi
2:
Imaan Hai Qaale Mustafayi
Qur'ane Hai Haale Mustafayi

Allah Hi Saltanat Ka Dulha
Naqshe Timsaale Mustafayi

Kul Se Baala Rusul Se Aa'la
Ijlaalo Jalaale Mustafayi

Ashaab Nujoome Rahnuma Hain
Kashti Hai Aale Mustafayi

Idbaar Se Tu Mujhe Bacha Le
Pyare Iqbaale Mustafayi

Mursal Mustaaqe Haq Hain Aur Haq
Mushtaaqe Wisaale Mustafayi

Khwahaane Wisaale Kibriyaa Hain
Jooyaane Jamaale Mustafayi

Allah Na Choote Daste Dil Se
Daamaane Khayaale Mustafayi

Hain Tere Sipurd Sab Ummeeden
Aye Joodo Nawaale Mustafayi

Raushan Kar Qabr Be Kaso(N) Ki
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Andher Hai Be Tere Mera Ghar
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Mujh Ko Shabe Gham Dara Rahi Hai
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Aankhon Mein Chamak Ke Dil Mein Aa Ja
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Meri Shabe Taar Din Bana De
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Chamka De Naseebe Bad Naseeba(N)
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Qazzaaq Hain Sar Pe Raah Gum Hai
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Chaaya Aankhon Tale Andhera
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Dil Sard Hai Apni Lau Lagaa De
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Ghanghor Ghataye Gham Ki Chaayi
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Bhatka Hoon Tu Raasta Bata Ja
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Fariyaad Dabaati Hai Siyaahi
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Mere Dile Muda Ko Jilaa De
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Aankhen Teri Raah Tak Rahi Hai
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Dukh Mein Hai Andheri Raat Wale
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Tareek Hai Raat Ghamzado Ki
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Ho Dono Jahaa(N) Mein Muh Ujaala
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Taareekiye Gor Se Bachana
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Purnoor Hai Tujh Se Bazme Aalam
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Hum Teerah Dilon Pe Bhi Karam Kar
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Lillah Idhar Bhi Koi Fera
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

Taqdeer Chamak Utthe Raza Ki
Aye Sham'ae Jamaale Mustafayi

1: In Nilti Ya Ri Hassaba Yawman Ila Ardil Haram (Qaseeda Imam Zain Ul Abideen)
2:
In Nilti Ya Ri Hassaba Yawman Ila Ardil Haram
Balligh Salaami Rawdatan Fihan Nabiyyul Mohtaram

Bade Saba Tera Guzar Ho Gar Kabhi So E Haram
Roze Pe Le Jana Salaam Jis Me Nabi Hai Mohtaram

Man Wajhohu Shamsud Doha Man Khadduhu Badrud Doja
Man Zaa’tuhu Noorul Hoda Man Kaffuhu Bahrul Himam

Chera Tera Shamsud Doha Ruqsaar Hai Badrud Doja
Noor E Hida Yat Zaat Hai Aur Haat Hai Daste Karam

In Nilti Ya Ri Hassaba Yawman Ila Ardil Haram
Balligh Salaami Rawdatan Fihan Nabiyyul Mohtaram

Jo Guzar Nasib Ho Aey Saba, Kisi Din Diyaare Hijaaz Mei(N)
To Mera Salaame Niyaaz Kehna, Harime Bandaah Nawaaz Mei(N)

Man Wajhohu Shamsud Doha Man Khadduhu Badrud Doja
Man Zaa’tuhu Noorul Hoda Man Kaffuhu Bahrul Hamam

Wohi Jinke Ruey Munir Par, Kisi Mehromaah Ka Gumaan Hai
Tu Himam Ka Ik Yame Bekaraa(N), Hai Karam Ke Daste Daraaz Mei(N)

Qur’anuhu Burhaanona Naskhan Le Adya Nim Madat
Iz Jaa-Ana Ahkaamuhu Kullus Suhuf Saaral Adam

Huey Fiskh Ehde Kohan Ke Deen, Woh Jo Laaey Qur’ane Mubi(N)
Woh Dalile Roshano Aakhri(N), Ke Hai Deene Haqqe Jawaaz Mei(N)

Akbado Na Majruhatun Min Sayfe Hijril Mustafa
Tuba Le Aih’l-E Baldatin Fihan Nabiyyul Muhtasham

Zahesa Kinaane Haram Jahaa(N), Shahe Do Jahaa(N) Ka Qayaam Hai
Bara Dil Phigaar Hu(N) Mei(N) Yahaa(N), Ghame Hijre Sina Gudaaz Mei(N)

Ya Laytani Kunto Kaaman Yattba’a Nabiyyan Aliman
Yawman Wa Laylan Daaeman Warzuq Kazaali Bil Karam

Aey Khusha Woh Mo’mine Khush Amal, Ke Muti-Aey Hukme Rasool Hai
Hai Yeh Aarzoo Meri Zindagi, Bhi Ho Waqf Sharaaey Niyaaz Mei(N)

Li Hasratun Isma’a Kazaalema Lam Aasefil Mustafa
Fi Kulle Hi-Nin Qad Mada Fil Haale Ma Yahsul Behim

Thi Azal Se Dil Mei(N) Tarap Yehi, Ke Ho Madd-Ha Shaane Hazoor Ki
Hui Harfo Saut Se Aashna, Jo Fugaa(N) Thi Pardaaey Saaz Mei(N)

Lasto Berajin Mufradan Bal Aqrebaee Kullohum
Fil Qabre Shifa’a Ya Shaafio Bissaade Wan Nunil Qalam

May(N) Aur Sab Mere Aqraba, Hai(N) Ik Shafa’at Ke Gada
Ho(N) Ba Saado Nuno Qalam Ata, Woh Lahad Ki Manzile Raaz Mei(N)

Ya Mustafa, Ya Mujtaba, Irham Ala Isyaanena
Majburatun Aamaalona, Tam-An Wazanban Wazzulm

Karam Aey Shahewaala, Hasham Ke Hai(N), Aaj Muntazire Karam
Woh Asire Gham Ke Shikasta Par, Hai(N) Gunaah Ke Daamane Aaz Mei(N)

Ya Rahmatan Lil Aa’lameen Anta Shafiul Muznebin
Akrim Lana Yawmal Hazina Fadlan Wajudow Wal Karam

Sare Hashr Aap Ke Haath Hai, Mere Hashr-O-Nasr Ki Aabru
Ke Kalide Rehmate, Do Jahaa(N), Hai Nabi Ke Daste Majaaz Mei(N)

Ya Rahmatan Lil Aa’lameen Adrik Le Zaynil Abedeen
Mahbuse Aydiz Zaalemin Fil Mawkabe Wal Muzdaham

Lillaah Zaynil Abedeen, Pe Bhi Nigaahe Lutfe Huzoor Ho
Ke Sitam Nasib Rahine Gham, Hai Udu Ki Qaide Daraaz Mei(N)

1: Is Karam Ka Karoon Shukr Kaise Ada
2:
Is Karam Ka Karoon Shukr Kaise Ada
Jo Karam Mujpe Mere Nabi Ne Kiya
Main Sajata Tha Sarkar Ki Mehafile
Mujko Har Gam Se Rab Ne Bari Kar Diya
Is Karam Ka Karoon Shukr………………………

Lamha Lamha Hai Mujpar Nabi Ki Ata
Dosto Or Mangu Main Maula Se Kya
Kya Ye Kam Hai Ke Mere Khuda Ne Muje
Apne Mehbub Ka Ummati Kar Diya
Is Karam Ka Karoon Shukr………………………

Zikr Sarkar Ki Hai Bari Barkate
Mil Gai Rahate Azamate Rifa-Ate
Main Gunahgaar Tha Be-Amal Tha Magar
Mustafa(Saw) Ne Muje Jannati Kar Diya
Is Karam Ka Karoon Shukr………………………

Jo Dare Mustafa(Saw) Ke Daga Ho Gae
Dekhte Dekhate Kya Se Kya Ho Gae
Aisi Chasme Karam Hai Sarkar Ne
Har Daga Ko Shafi Ne Wali Kar Diya
Is Karam Ka Karoon Shukr………………………

Koy Mayus Lota Na Darbar Se
Jo Bhi Manga Mila Mere Sarkar Se
Sadake Jau ‘niyazi’ Mai Lajpal Ke
Dono Aalam Mai Mujko Sakhi Kar Diya
Is Karam Ka Karoon Shukr………………………

Jo Bhi Aaya Hai Mehfil Main Sarkaar Ki,
Haazari Mil Gaee Jiss Ko Darbaar-E-Ki,
Koee Siddeeq-E-Farooq, Usmaan Huwe,
Aur Kissee Ko Nabi Nay Ali Kar Diya
Is Karam Ka Karoon Shukr………………………

Mere Shaahe Madina Ki Kya Baat Hai,
Un Ki Dar Say Millee Sab Ko Khairaat Hai,
Sadqay Jaaon Nay-Yaazi Main Lajpaal Kay,
Har Gadaa Ko Sakheenay Sakhee Kar Diya
Is Karam Ka Karoon Shukr………………………

1: Ishk E Ahmed Rang Lana Chahiye
2:
Ishk-E-Ahmed Rang Lana Chahiye
Ab Unhe Surat Dikhana Chahiye

Peeliya Hai Jab Maye Ishq-E-Nabi
Hosh Me Hargis Na Aana Chahiye

Khaja-E-Alam Ka Daaman Mil Gaya
Daaman Ab Sab Se Bachana Chahiye

Aagayi Hai Sarhad-E-Sher E Nabi
Wajd Me Ab Hamko Aana Chahiye

Lab Pe Aaye Jab Bhi Naam-E-Mustafa
Be Khudi Me Doob Jaana Chahiye

Ek Dil Hai Ek Ki Ulfat Mile
Ek Zubaa(N) Hai Ek Fasaana Chahiye

Jaane Kis Rukh Se Chale Aaye Nabi
Har Taraf Aankhen Bichana Chahiye

Apne Bal Par Koun Jaata Hai Waha
Bas Muqaddar Aazmana Chahiye

Naatiya Ash'aar Keh Kar Muttaqui
Apne Rab Se Daad Paana Chahiye

1: Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jao Mere Yaar
2:
Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jaein Jab Afkaar To Khulte Hein Ghulaamon Pe Wo Asraar Ke Rehte Hein Wo Tawseef Sanaae Shahe Abraar Me Har Lehzaa Guhar Baar
Warna Wo Sayyide Aale Nasabi Han Wohi Ummi Laquabi Hashmi O Muttalabi O ‘arabi O Farashi O Madani Aur Kahan Hamse Gunahgaar

Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jao Mere Yaar

Aarzoo Ye He Ke Ho Qualb Muattar Wo Mutahhar Wo Munawwar Wo Mujalla Wo Musaffa Durehaalaa Jo Nazar Aae Kahin Jalwaae Roue Shahe Abraar
Jin Ke Qadmon Ki Chamak Chaand Sitaaron Me Nazar Aae Jidhar Se Wo Guzar Jaae Wohi Raah Chamak Jae Damak Jae Mahak Jae Bane Rawnaque Gulzaar

Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jao Mere Yaar

Soung Loun Khushbue Gesue Muhammad Wo Siya Zulf Nahin Jis Ke Muquaabil Ye Banafsha Ye Suyunti Ye Chambeli Ye Gule Laalaa O Champaa Ka Nikhaar
Jis Ki Nakhat Pe Hein Qurbaan Gulo Bargo Saman Naafaae Aahoue Khutan Bade Chaman Buwe Chaman Naaze Chaman Noure Chaman Range Chaman Saaraa Chaman Zaar

Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jao Mere Yaar

Ik Shahanshah Ne Bakhshe Jo Samarkand O Bukhaaraa Kissi Mahboub Ke Rukhsaar Ke Til Par Magar Eh Sayyade Aali Teri Namos Teri Azmat Par
Aey Rasul E Madani Eik Nahin Laakhon Hein Qurbaan Gahe Ishq Ke Har Kuchao Bazaar Me Sar Apnaa Hatheli Pe Liye Phirte Hein Karne Ko Nisaar

Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jao Mere Yaar

Aap Ke Zikr Me Hein Dam Masaalaa Sare Huda Kawne Arab Naghma Nigaaraane Ajam Shawkate Alfaaz Adab Azmate Kirtaas O Qalam Baate Sabaa Mohje Naseen
Dahne Bulbule Shiri Lahane Umriyo Toti Shafe Mahtaab Sitaare Malak O Hour Jinaa Jin Ki Nawahon Me Duroodon Ka Hisaar

Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jao Mere Yaar

Warafahnaa Lakazikrak Ki Iss Aayaa E Tawseef Ki Tawseef Me Tafseer Me Tashreekh Me Tawzikh Me Tanween Me Har Ehd Ki Shaamil He Zabaan.
Labe Hassan O Ravaahaa Wo Labe Fatimah Zahraa Wo Ali Aabide Bimaar Busairi Dahane Ourtiyo Jaame Labe Sahti O Razaa Sab Sar Shaar

Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jao Mere Yaar

Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jaae Muhajir Ho Ke Pakhtoun Balonchi Ho Ke Punjabi O Sindhi Kissi Khitte Ki Kabile Ki Zaban Isse Nahin Koyi Sarokaar
Jaamae Ishqe Muhammad Jo Pehenletaa He Har Haar Ko Wo Phool Banaa Letaa He Dunyaa Ko Jhukaaletaa He Kartaa He Zamaane Ko Muhabbat Ka Shikaar

Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jao Mere Yaar

Ye Muhaajir Ki He Saf Aur Ye Punjabi Ki Pakhtoun Ki Sindhi Ki Balonchi Ki Juda Par Ke Dikhao To Kissi Shehr Ki Masjid Me Kabhi Eisi Namaz
Harame Kaabaa Me Arafaat Ke Maidaan Me Ya Rawza-E-Sarkaar Pe Kyun Shaane Milaate Wahan Karte Nahin Rang Ka Aur Nasl Katum Apni Shoumaar

Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jao Mere Yaar

Yaa Nabi ! Aap Ka Ye Adbi Sanaakhwane Dare Rahmat Ka Gada Detaa He Dar Dar Ye Sadaa Detaa He Aap Se Chaahat Ka Salaa Apni Zaban Me Taasir
Soun Ke Sab Ahle Chaman Ous Ka Sukhan Oun Ko Bhi Aajaae Hayaa Sar Ho Nidaamat Se Jhukaa Aur Nazar Dekhe Wo Islaaf Ki Oulfat Ka Nazaaraa Eik Baar

Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jao Mere Yaar

Eh Aadeeb! Ab Youn Hi Alfaaz Ke Ambaar Me Ham Doubte Reh Jaein Magar Haqqe Sanaa Goyi Adaa Phir Bhi Naa Kar Paein Ye Jazbaat O Zabaan O Kalam O Fikr O Khayaal
Oun Ki Midhat To Malaaik Ka Wazifaa He Sahaaba Ka Tariqaa Heibaadat Ka Saleeqaa He Ye Khaaliq Ka Pasandeeda He Quraan Ka He Iss Me Shyaar

Ishq Ke Rang Me Rang Jao Mere Yaar

1: Itna Kaafi Hai Zindagi Ke Liye
2:
Itna Kaafi Hai Zindagi Ke Liye
Rakh Le Aaqa Jo Naukri Ke Liye

Tak Ke Unko Ayyub Ke Ghar Mein
Mahel Tarse Hain Jhonpdi Ke Liye

Aa Gaye Qabr Mein Bhi Chhurwaane
Dard Kitna Hai Ummati Ke Liye

Lambe Sajde Kiye Nabi Ne Kaha
Aye Nawaase Teri Khushi Ke Liye

Chaand Taare Bhi Unke Qadmon Mein
Roz Aate Hain Roshni Ke Liye

Doobe Suraj Ko Phirse Paltaaya
Apne Pyare Maula Ali Ke Liye

Khud Darakht Bhi Jadein Ukhade
Aate Hain Paas Unke Haazri Ke Liye

Mehfile Amaad Saji Rahe Ta Umar
Iltija Yehi Hai Zindagi Ke Liye

Aye Kash Aaye Woh Maqaam Bhi
Jiye Bas Ham Aaqa Ki Aashiqui Ke Liye

Deed Maangi Hai Unki Aye Haakim
Maine Bas Waqte Aakhri Ke Liye

1: Jaam Ulfat Ka Pilado Ya Rasool
2:
Jaam Ulfat Ka Pilado Ya Rasool
Apna Deewana Banado Ya Rasool

Meri Qismat Ko Jagaa Do Ya Rasool
Ek Jhalak Apni Dikha Do Ya Rasool

Khwaab Me Tashreef La Kar Ek Baar
Deed Ka Sharbat Pilaa Do Ya Rasool

Umr Bhar Teri Sanaa Khwaani Karu
Har Rukaawat Ko Hataa Do Ya Rasool

Aa Gaya Beemaar Aye Mere Tabeeb
To Shifaaye Kaamila Do Ya Rasool

Woh Kabhi Bhi Uth Nahi Sakta Jise
Tum Nigaahon Se Giraa Do Ya Rasool

Umr Isiyaan Ke Sabab Barbaad Hai
Tum Khataaye Bakshwa Do Ya Rasool

Na Kahu Tum Se To Phir Kis Se Kahu
Meri Bigdi Ko Banaa Do Ya Rasool

Baksh Dega Har Khata Meri Khuda
Tum Zara Lab Ko Hilaa Do Ya Rasool

Chaand Ko Ungli Se Mehde Paak Me
Jis Taraf Chaaho Jhuka Do Ya Rasool

Tum Jo Chaho To Phira Kar Shams Ko
Raat Ko Bhi Din Bana Do Ya Rasool

Sooi Mil Jaaye Andhera Bhi Ho Gar
Tum Jo Aa Kar Muskura Do Ya Rasool

Tum Jo Aa Kar Muskura Do Ya Rasool
Gair Ke Dar Par Mai Jaau Kis Liye

Jab Talab Se Tum Siwaa Do Ya Rasool
Hai Bada Weeran Shaha Qalbe Ubaid

Apne Jalwon Se Basaa Do Ya Rasool

1: Jab Gumbad E Khazra Ke Anwaar Nazar Aye
2:
Jab Gumbad-E-Khazra Ke Anwaar Nazar Aye
Anwaar Ke Jhurmat Mein Sarkar Nazar Aye

Taiba Ke Tasawwur Ne Jeene Ka Maza Bakhsha
Main Kaise Kahoon Jeena Dushwaar Nazar Aye

Naghmat Daroodon Ke Honton Pe Hue Jaari
Jab Shehr-E-Muhabbat Ke Aasar Nazar Aye

Makke Se Madine Tak Mehdood Nahi Jalwe
Ushaak Ko Har Janib Sarkar Nazar Aye

Aankhein Meri Roshan Ho Jayein Jigar Thanda
Jis Waqt Mujhe Mera Manthar Nazar Aye

1: Jab Gumbad E Khizra Pe Woh Pehli Nazar Gayi
2:
Jab Gumbad-E-Khizra Pe Woh, Pehli Nazar Gayi,
Aankhon Kay Raastay Meray Dil Mein Uttar Gayi.

Sar Kham Tha, Lab Khamoosh Thay, Aankhein Thein Ashkbaar,
Ik Sa’at-E-Bedaar Thei Jou Ke Guzar Gayi.

Barsi Thei Iss Qadar, Ke Naha Sa Gaya Udher,
Woh Barish-E-Karam Mere Daaman Ko Bhar Gayi.

Dil Bhi Hai Shad Shad, Tabiyat Hai Pur Bahar,
Lagta Hai Aaj Meri Madinay Khabar Gai.

Jo Keh Sakaa Na Lab Say, Mili Woh Murad Bhi,
Mere Sukoot Per Bhi Shaha Ki Nazar Gayi.

Taiba Se Lautna, Kissi Aashiq Se Puchiye,
Aisa Lagay Kay Rooh Badan Say Guzar Gayi.

Awaz Ubaid Teri Ba Faizan-E-Naat Hee,
Seenoon Mein Aashiqan Nabi (Saw) Kay Utar Gayi.

Mar Kar Bhi Na Marunga Mai Allah Ki Qasam,
Yeh Jaan Unke Zikr Mey Meri Agar Gayee.

1: Jab Husn Tha Unka Jalwa Numa Anwaar Ka Alam Kya Hoga
2:
Jab Husn Tha Unka Jalwa Numa Anwaar Ka Alam Kya Hoga
Har Koee Fida Hai Bin Dekhe, Deedaar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Jis Waqt The Qidmat Me Unki, Abubakar Omar Usman Ali
Us Waqt Rasool-E-Akram Kay, Darbaar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Ek Simt Ali Ek Simt Umar, Siddiq Idhar Uthmaan Udhar
In Jug Mug Jug Mug Taraun May, Sarkaar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Jis Waqt Haleemah Ki Godi, Anwaare Khuda Say Raushan Thi
Us Waqt Haleemah Daee Kay, Ghar Baar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Jab Inke Gada Bhar Detay Hain, Shahaanay Zamana Ki Jholi
Mohtaaj Ka Jab Yeh Alam Ha, Mukhtaar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Chahay To Ishaaraun Say Apne, Kaya Hi Palat Day Duniya Ki
Yeh Shaan Hai Unke Ghulamau’n Ki, Sardaar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Sun Sun Kay Sahaba Ki Batein, Kuffar Musalmaan Hotay Thay
Phir Mere Rasool-E-Akram Ki, Guftaar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Taibah Say Hawaein Atee Hai Baikal Ko Sukoon Mil Jata Hai
Iss Paar Ka Jab Yeh Alam Hai, Uss Paar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

1: Jab Ke Paida Hue Hai Hamare Nabi
2:
Ummati Ummati Ummati Ummati
Ummati Ummati Ummati Ummati

Jab Ke Paida Hue Hai Hamare Nabi
Bhole Bhale Nabi Pyare Pyare Nabi
Dono Aalam Ki Ankhon Ke Taare Nabi
Apne Naazuk Laboun Se Pukare Nabi

Ummati Ummati Ummati Ummati
Ummati Ummati Ummati Ummati

Jab Sataane Lage Kafir-O-Mushrikeen
Haq Ta'ala Ne Farmaya Ae Shah-E-Deen
Tum Kaho To Karoon Inko Gharat Yahi
Bole Hazrat Nahi Ye Na Hoga Kabhi

Ummati Ummati Ummati Ummati
Ummati Ummati Ummati Ummati

Is Qadar Thi Mohabbat Ki Khairul Bashar
Rakh Ke Sajde Me Sar Hogae Chashm Tar
Kehte The Aye Khuda Malik O Behrobar
Baqsh Do Ummat Ko Hai Dua Ye Meri

Ummati Ummati Ummati Ummati
Ummati Ummati Ummati Ummati

Toli Jaegi Jis Waqt Neki Badi
Phir Na Hargiz Sune Ga Kisi Ki Koi
Nafsi Nafsi Pukare Ge Saare Nabi
Aap Us Waqt Bhi Kehte Honge Yahi

Ummati Ummati Ummati Ummati
Ummati Ummati Ummati Ummati

Inko Ankhein Tu De Mujhko Pehchan Le
Mujhko Pehchan Le Tujhko Bhi Jaan Le
Sidq Teri Sadaaqat Ko Pehchan Le
Tu Khila De Mere Maula Dil Ki Kali

Ummati Ummati Ummati Ummati
Ummati Ummati Ummati Ummati

1: Jab Masjid E Nabawi Kay Miinaar Nazar Aay
2:
Jab Masjid E Nabawi Kay Miinaar Nazar Aa-Ay
Allah Ki Rahmat Kay Aasaar Nazar Aa-Ay

Bas Yaad Raha Itna Siinay Say Lagi Jaali
Phir Yaad Nahiin Kya Kya Anwaar Nazar Aa-Ay

Makkay Ki Fiza-On Mayn Teba Ki Hawa-On Mayn
Ham Nay To Jidhar Daykha Sarkaar Nazar Aa-Ay

Makkay Se Madine Tak Mehdoon Nahi Jalwe
Ushaaq Ko Har Janib Sarkaar Nazar Aa-Ay

Chhorr Aaya Zahoori Meyn Dil O Jaan Madinay Mayn
Ab Jiina Yahaan Mujh Ko Dushwaar Nazar Aa-Ay

Taiba Ki Ziyarat Ne Jeene Ka Mazaa Baqsha
Mai Kaise Kahoon Jeena Dhuwaar Nazar Aa-Ay

Manzar Ho Bayaan Kesay Alfaaz Nahiin Miltay
Jiss Waqt Muhammad Ka Darbaar Nazar Aa-Ay

Dukh Dard Kay Maaron Ko Gham Yaad Nahiin Rehtay
Jab Saamnay Aankhon Kay Gham-Khuar Nazar Aa-Ay

1: Jagaa Do Meri Qismat Bhi Khudara Ya Rasulullah
2:
Jagaa Do Meri Qismat Bhi Khudara Ya Rasulullah
Dikhado Mujh Ko Rozah Ka Nazarah Ya Rasulullah

Tumahara Naam-E-Naami Hai Sukoon-E-Qalb Ka Ba’is
Nazar Ka Noor Hai Rozah Tumhara Ya Rasulullah

Meri Duniya Sanwar Jaey Meri ‘uqba Sadhar Jaey
Agar Ho Jaey Rahmat Ka Isharah Ya Rasulullah

Zamanah Choot Jaey Ruth Jaey Khalq To Kya Gham
Na Choote Haath Sey Daman Tumharah Ya Rasulullah

Jabeen-E-Showq Mas Hoti Hai Jab Rowzah Ki Jaali Sey
Chamak Jata Hai Qismat Ka Sitarah Ya Rasulullah

Tamana-E-Sikandar Hai Dam-E-Aakhar Shah-E-Bat-Ha
Rahey Wird-E-Zuban Kalmah Tumhara Ya Rasulullah

1: Jahan Roza E Pak E Khairul Wara Hai
2:
Jahan Roza E Pak E Khairul Wara Hai
Wo Jannat Nahi Hai To Phir Aur Kya Hai
Kahaan Mai Kahaan Yeh Madine Ke Galiyaan
Yeh Qisamt Nahi Hai To Phir Aur Kya Hai

Muhammed (Saw) Ki Azmath Ko Kya Poochte Ho
Ke Wo Sahibe Qaba Qausain Tehre
Bashar Ki Sare Arsh Mehmaan Nawazi
Yeh Azmath Nahi Hai To Phir Aur Kya Hai

Jo Aasi Ko Kamli Me Apne Chupa Le
Jo Dushman Ko Bhi Zakhm Khakar Dua De
Use Aur Kya Naam Dega Zamana
Wo Rehmat Nahi Hai To Phir Aur Kya Hai

Qayamat Ka Ek Din Muaiyan Hai Lekin
Hamare Liye Har Nafas Hai Qayamat
Madine Se Hum Jaan Nisaraun Ki Doori
Qayamat Nahi Hai To Phir Aur Kya Hai

Tum Iqbal Yeh Naat Kehto Rahe Ho
Magar Yeh Bhi Soncha Ke Kya Kar Rahe Ho
Kahaan Tum Kahaan Madhe Mamduhe Yazdaan
Ye Jurrat Nahi Hai To Phir Aur Kya Hai

1: Jald Ham Aazmi E Gulzar E Madina Honge
2:
Jald Ham Aazmi-E-Gulzar-E-Madina Honge
Hazir-E-Dargah-E-Sardar-E-Madina Honge

Sabz Gumbad Ki Waha Khub Bahare Hongi
Rubaru Phir Mere Minar-E-Madina Honge

Wajd Aajaiga Khismat Ko Bhi Us Dam Walla
Samne Jab Mere Sarkar-E-Madina Honge

Khafile Ki Yuun Madine Se Judai Hogi
Muztar O Gham Zada Zaw'ar-E-Madine Honge

Mere Sarkar Ka Aaiga Bulawa Unko
Jo Koi Dil Se Talab Gaar-E-Madina Honge

Hashar Se Kyun Ho Pareshaan Gunah Gaaro Tum
Apne Haami Waha Sarkar-E-Madina Honge

Hashar Me Jainge Attar Yu Inshallah
Apni Darhi Me Saje Khaar-E-Madina Honge

Hashr Ka Qouf Na Rakho Aae Ghulam-E-Nabi
Apne Haami Waha Sarkar-E-Madina Honge

Ab To Noorani Chaman Zaar-E-Madina Honge
Samne Ab Mere Kohsar-E-Madina Honge

Unki Rahmat Se Jo Miljai Baqi-E-Markhad
Bil Haqeeqat Qabr Me Anwar-E-Madina Honge

Unko Haasil Mere Aqa Ki Shafaat Hogi
Jo Koi Hazir-E-Darbar-E-Madina Honge

1: Jalwa E Janaan (Junaid Jamsheed)
2:
Jalwa-E-Janaan, Jalwa-E-Janaan
Jalwa-E-Janaan, Jalwa-E-Janaan

Maula Yaa Salli Wa Sallim Da’aiman Abadan
Ala Habibika Khairi Khlaqi Kulli’ini

Na Koi Aap Sa Ho Ga Na Koi Aap Jesa Tha
Koi Yusaf Say Poochay Mustafa Ka Husn Kaisa Tha
Zameen-O-Aasmaan Main Koi Bhi Misaal Na Mili

Maula Yaa Salli Wa Sallim Da’aiman Abadan
Ala Habibika Khairi Khlaqi Kulli’ini

Daleel-E-Zindagi Wo Hain Kamaal-E-Bandagi Wo Hain
Koi Bhi Daur Ho Us Main Meraj-E-Aadmi Wo Hain
Wohi Toh Deen-O-Duniya Hai Jo Baatain Aap Nay Kahin

Maula Yaa Salli Wa Sallim Da’aiman Abadan
Ala Habibika Khairi Khlaqi Kull’ini

Rasulullah Habibulllah Imam Al Mursaleen
Rasulullah Habibulllah Imam Al Mursaleen

Koi Bhi Baat Ho Har Hukm Unka Mutabar Aisa
Kay Un Ka Haan Nahin Kehna Bhi Hai Quran Kay Jesa
Hadith-E-Paak Kehlaain Jo Baatein Aap Nay Kahin

Maula Yaa Salli Wa Sallim Da’aiman Abadan
Ala Habibika Khairi Khlaqi Kull’ini

Durrod Un Par Salaam Un Par Yehi Kehna Khuda Ka Hai
Khuda Kay Baad Jo Hai Martaba Salle Ala Ka Hai
Wohi Sardaar-E-Alam Hain Wohi Gham`khwaar-E-Ummat Hian
Wohi Toh Hashar Kay Maidan Main Sab Ki Shifa’at Hain
Shifa’at Kay Liye Sab Ki Nazar Un Par Lagi Ho Ge

Maula Yaa Salli Wa Sallim Da’aiman Abadan
Ala Habibika Khairi Khlaqi Kulli’ini

1: Jannat Mein Lay Kay Jaey Ghi Chahat Rasool Ki
2:
Kyun Kar Na Meray Dil Mein Ho Ulfat Rasool Ki,
Jannat Mein Lay Kay Jaey Ghi Chahat Rasool Ki.

Chalta Hoon Mein Be Qafelay Walo Ruko Zara,
Milnay Do Bus Mujhay Bhi Ijazat Rasool Ki.

Phochain Jo Deen-O-Iman Nakerain Qabr Mein
Us Waqt Meray Lab Pay Ho Midhat Rasool Ki.

Qabr Mein Sarkar Aayein To Mein Qadmoon Mein Giroon,
Gar Farishtay Bhi Uthaein To Mein Unsay Yoon Kahoon,
Ab To Paye Naaz Say Mein Aye Farishto Kyon Uthoon,
Mar Kay Pohncha Hoon Yahan Is Dilruba Kay Wastay.

Tarpa Kay Un Kay Kadmoon Mein Mujh Ko Gira Day Shok,
Jis Waqt Ho Lahad Mein Ziyarat Rasool Ki.

Sarkar Nay Bula Kay Madina Dikha Dia,
Ho Ghi Mujhay Naseeb, Shafa’at Rasool Ki.

Ya Rab Dikha Day Aaj Ki Shab Jalwa E Habib,
Ik Bar To Aata Ho Ziarat Rasool Ki.

In Ankh Ka Warna Koi Hasrat Hi Nahin Hai,
Sarkar Tumhara Woh Khazaiba Nazar Aaye,
Ya Rab Dikha Day Aaj Ki Shab Jalwa E Habib,
Ik Bar To Aata Ho Ziarat Rasool Ki.

Damen Mein Un Kay Lay Lo Pannah Aaj Munkiro,
Mahengi Paray Ghi Warna Adawat Rasool Ki.

To Hai Ghulam Un Ka Ubad-E-Raza Teray,
Mahshar Mein Ho Ghi Saath Himayat Rasool Ki.

Kyun Kar Na Meray Dil Mein Ho Ulfat Rasool Ki.
Jannat Mein Lay Kay Jaey Ghi Chahat Rasul Ki.

1: Jashn E Meelad Hum Manaaenge
2:
Jashn E Meelad Hum Manaaenge
Rab Se Sadqa Nabi Ka Paaenge

Door Dil Ki Siyahee Karne Ko
Mehfil E Na’at Ham Sajaaenge

Aaj Ki Shab Hai Rehmaton Ki Shab
Rab Ki Rehmat Me Hum Nahaaenge

Dekh Kar Qabr Me Huzoor Ko Hum
Na’at E Salle ‘alaa Sunaaenge

Maang Deewane Unse Taiba Ko
Sadqe Meelad Ke Bulaaenge

Paak Karle Nigaah Ashkon Se
Aaqa Jalwah Tujhe Dikhaaenge

Kaash Farmade Hashr Me Aaqa
Aaja Shakir Tujhe Bachaaenge

1: Jashne Amade Rasool Allah Hi Allah
2:
Jashne Amade Rasool, Allah Hi Allah
Bibi Amna Ke Phool, Allah Hi Allah

Jab Kay Sarkaar Tashreef Laane Lage,
Huro Gilma Bhi Khusiyan Manaane Lage
Har Taraf Noor Ki Rosheni Chagayi,
Mustafa Kiya Milay Zindagi Milgayi,
Aie Halima Teri Goad Mein Aa Gaye,
Dono Alam Ke Rasool, Allah Hee Allah

Jashne Amade Rasool, Allah Hi Allah
Bibi Amna Ke Phool, Allah Hi Allah

Chehra-E-Mustafa Jab Dikhaya Gaya
Jhook Gaye Taarey Aur Chaand Sharmaa Gaya
Amina Dekh Kar Muskuraney Lageen
Hawwa Maryam Bhi Khushiyaan Manane Lageen
Amina Bibi Sub Se Kehney Lageen
Dua Ho Gayi Qabul, Allahi Allah

Jashne Amade Rasool, Allah Hi Allah
Bibi Amna Ke Phool, Allah Hi Allah

Shaadiyaaney Khoshi Ke Bajaaey Gaaey
Shaadi Ke Naghmey Sab Ko Sonaaney Gaaey
Har Taraf Shaur Salli ‘ala Hogaya
Aaj Paida Habib-E-Khuda Hogaya
Phir Tu Jibreel Ne Bhi Ye Ailan Kiyaa
Ye Khudaa Ke Hain Rasul, Allahi Allah

Jashne Amade Rasool, Allah Hi Allah
Bibi Amna Ke Phool, Allah Hi Allah

Unka Saya Zameen Par Na Paya Gaya
Noor Se Noor Dekho Juda Na Hua
Hum Ko Abid Nabi Par Bada Naaz Hai
Kya Bhala Mere Aqa Ka Andaaz Hai
Jisne Rukh Par Mali Wo Shifa Pa Gaya
Khak-E-Taiba Teri Dhool, Allahi Allah

Jashne Amade Rasool, Allah Hi Allah
Bibi Amna Ke Phool, Allah Hi Allah

Noor Ki Tann Gaeen Chaadrain Chaarsoon
Hoor-O-Gilmaan Ki Poori Hoii Arzoo
Mustafa Mujtaba Shah-E-Kono Mukaam
Rub Ki Sarkaar Jub Hogaey Roh Baroh
Phir Khuda Ne Khaha Mere Mahboob Tum
Ho Rasuloon Ke Rasul, Allahi Allah

Jashne Amade Rasool, Allah Hi Allah
Bibi Amna Ke Phool, Allah Hi Allah

Farsh Se Arsh Tak Noor Ka Hai Samaa
Laaey Tashreef Doniyan Main Khair-Ul-Waraa
Aasi Ummat Ki Kismal Sawarney Lagii
Barishain Rehmatoon Ki Barasney Lageen
Ay Haleema Teri Looriyoon Keyliye
Rabb Ke Aagaey Rasul, Allahi Allah

Jashne Amade Rasool, Allah Hi Allah
Bibi Amna Ke Phool, Allah Hi Allah

Boodd Girey Tooth Kar Khaaq Main Attak Gaaey
Kufr Ke Phele Baadal Sabhi Chatt Gaey
Jub Rukh-E-Mustafa Ki Pari Roshni
Ye Zameenon Zamaan Khood Main Butt Gaaey
Hoor-O-Gilman Malaik Sabhi Aaj Hain
Zikr Ahmed Main Mashgool, Allahi Allah

Jashne Amade Rasool, Allah Hi Allah
Bibi Amna Ke Phool, Allah Hi Allah

Chehra Quraan Ki Tafseer Hai
Noor Hi Noor Hai Haq Ki Tasveer Hai
Mussaf-E-Mustafa Ke Oojaalon Ke Rung
Rehmatoon Se Sajii Ek Tasveer Hai
Jaane Kaunay Ju Hai Shafee-Ul-Waraa
Aysey Piyaare Hain Rasul, Allahi Allah

Jashne Amade Rasool, Allah Hi Allah
Bibi Amna Ke Phool, Allah Hi Allah

Unki Khaatir Ye Dunya Banaai Gai
Dono Aalam Ki Har Shay Sajaai Gai
Wo Jo Aae Jahan Me Bahaar Aagaee
Har Taraf Rehmato Ki Ghata Chaa Gai
Aise Banke Aae Phool Allahi Allah
Jashne Amade Rasool, Allah Hi Allah

Bibi Amna Ke Phool, Allah Hi Allah

1: Jashne Nabi Se Pyar Hai
2:
Jashne Nabi Se Pyar Hai Hamme Jashne Nabi Se Pyar Hai
Aamad Hai Mebhoob-E-Khuda Ki Sab Ka Bera Paar Hai

Mubarak Ho Mohammad Mustafa Tashreef Lei Aye
Abbhie Jibreal Utre Bhi Na The Ka’abe Ke Mimbar Se
Ke Itne Mein Sada Ayi Ye Abdullah Ke Ghar Se

Tahashar Sada Gunje Ghi Youn Sale Ala Ke Tarane
Aate Hai Horu Malaik Aamad Ka Jashane Manane
Seine Pei Tasveere Madina Rab Pei Darood Ka Haar Hai

Mitha Hai Naam-E-Mohammad Mithi Hai In Ki Boli
Deedar-E-Mohammad Karne Aye Nabiyoun Ki Toli
Aalaane Khuda Khud Karta Hai Ye Mera Shahkaar Hai

Jab Rehmat Ban Kar Aya Wo Amina Bi Ka Pyara
Hai Donno Jahan Mein Chamka Wo Arsh Bari Ka Tara
Mera Aqa Noor Hedayat Ka Roshan Minaar Hai

Dar Dar Na Jao Gadao Sarkar Se Mang Ke Dekho
Gham Mith Jaye Gei Sare Gham Khaar Se Mang Ke Dekho
Dei De Gein Hasnaain Ka Sadqa Ye To Sakhi Darbar Hai

Hazir Nazir Hai Aqa Bas Ye Mera Imaan Hai
Tum Kalma Par Ke Dekho Kalma Is Ki Pehchaan Hai
Aane Uthe Ke Dekh Zara Khud Rab Ka Ye Iqraar Hai

Wara Faana La Ka Zikrak Ki Quraan Bhi Sada Deta Hai
Rashid Ye Karam Kya Kam Hai Tu Un Ki Sana Karta Hai
Pyar Nabi Ke Karne Wala Jannat Ka Haq Daar Hai

1: Jis Ka Koi Saani Nahi Wo Nabi Hamara Hai
2:
Jis Ka Koi Saani Nahi Wo Nabi Hamara Hai
Mustafa Ki Azmat Ka Had Hai Na Kinaara Hai

Zor Par Ho Tufaa(N) Bhi Aur Dagmagaayi Nayya Bhi
Aap Gar Karam Kar De To Saamne Kinaara Hai

Is Ummeed Par Mein Bhi Aa Khada Hu Chaukhat Par
Wo Kabhi To Poochenge Kaun Gham Ka Maara Hai

Jo Habeebe Daawar Hai Jo Makeene Khizra Hai
Sayyida Ka Baba Hai Amina Ka Pyaara Hai

Aap Ki Hi Chaukhat Ke Ya Nabi Bhikaari Hai
Aap Hi Ke Tukdon Pe Ya Nabi Guzaara Hai

Naat-E-Mustafa Sunli Naat-E-Mustafa Padli
Mai Ne Apni Zindagi Ka Waqt Yun Guzaara Hai

Hum Ko Bhi Ataa Kardo Sadqa Apne Yaaron Ka
Aap Ke Siwa Aqa Koun Ab Hamaara Hai

Bhoole Na Niyaazi Kabhi Bhool Kar Bhi Yaade Nabi
Un Ko Bhool Jaana Hi Asal Main Khasaara Hai

Har Ghadi Rulata Hai Bhool Ta Nahi Mujhko
Mustafa Ke Qadmo Me Waqt Jo Guzaara Hai

1: Jis Ke Khatir Ye Quran Nazil Hua
2:
Jis Ke Khatir Ye Quran Nazil Hua
Wo Muhammad Madine Me Moujood Hai
Hum Ne Ankhon Se Dekha Nahi Hai Magar
Unki Tasveer Sine Me Moujood Hai

In Hawao Se Kehdo Na Aaye Idhar
Aisi Khushbu Ki Mujhko Zaroorat Nahi
Jis Ki Khushbu Se Mehka Hai Sara Jahan
Wo Nabi Ke Pasine Me Moujood Hai

Garmi Roz-E-Mehshar Sataye Gi Kya
Mujko Naar-E-Jahannam Jalaye Gi Kya
Pura Quran Nahi Ek Aayat Sahi
Har Musalman Ke Sine Me Moujood Hai

Aabe Zamzam Ko Pine Chale Dosto
Aao Aao Madine Chale Dosto
Bheek Lene Karam Ki Chale Dosto
Aao Aao Madine Chale Dosto

Phool Khilte Hai Padh Padh Ke Salle Ala
Jhoom Kar Keh Rahi Hai Ye Bade Saba
Aisi Khushbu Gulo Ke Chaman Me Kaha
Jo Nabi Ke Pasine Me Moujood Hai

Maine Mana Ke Jannat Bohot Hai Haseen
Chor Kar Mai Madina Najaoun Kahi
Yun To Jannat Me Sab Hai Madina Nahi
Aur Jannat Madine Me Moujood Hai

Chorna Tera Taiba Gawara Nahi
Sari Duniya Me Aisa Nazara Nahi
Aisa Manzar Zameen Pe Na Dekha Kahi
Jaisa Manzar Madine Me Moujood Hai

Jabke Toofan Safine Se Takra Gaya
Mai Ne Us Se Ye Be Saqta Keh Diya
Kya Bigare Ga Tu Kashti E Deen Ka
Na Khuda Jab Safine Me Moujood Hai

1: Jis Taraf Chashme Muhammad Ke Ishaare Ho Gaye
2:
Jis Taraf Chashme Muhammad Ke Ishaare Ho Gaye
Jitne Zarre Saamne Aaye Sitaare Ho Gaye /(Or)
Jis Taraf Nazarein Utahi Sab Tumhaare Ho Gaye

Doob Ne Walo Ne Jab Naam-E-Muhammad Le Liya
Halka-E-Toofan Me Haasil Kinaare Ho Gaye

Ya Muhammad Aap Ki Nazaron Ka Ye Ajaaz Hai
Jitne Zarre Saamne Aaye Sitaare Ho Gaye /(Or)
Jis Taraf Nazarein Utahi Sab Tumhaare Ho Gaye

Mauja-E-Toofan Me Naam-E-Muhammad Le Liya
Doob Ti Kashti Ke Tinke Bhi Sahaare Ho Gaye

Main Hoon Aur Yaadein Madina Aur Hai Tanhaaiyaan
Apne Begaane Sabhi Mujh Se Kinaare Ho Gaye

Apni Kamli Ka Zara Saaya Inaayat Ho Mujhe
Dil Ke Dushman Ja Muhammad Dil Se Pyaare Ho Gaye

Sabz Ghumbad Ke Ishaare Sagar Marhaba
Jag Maga Kar Zindagi Ke Maah Paare Ho Gaye

1: Jitna Diya Sarkar Ne Mujhko Utni Meri Auqat Nahi
2:
Jitna Diya Sarkar Ne Mujhko Utni Meri Auqat Nahi
Yeh To Karam Hain Unka Varna Mujh Mein To Aisi Baat Nahi

Tu Bhi Wahin Par Jake Jahaa Par Sab Ki Bhigri Banti Hain
Ik Teri Taqdeer Bana Na Unke Liye Koi Baat Nahi

Jo Hain Meri Jaan-O-Iman Kya Mein Unki Nazar Karon?
Paas Mere Ashko Ke Ilava Or Koi Saugat Nahi

Ishq-E-Shahe-Batha Se Pehle Muflis-O-Khasta-Haal Tha Mai
Naam-E-Muhammad Ke Mai Qurban Ab Woh Mere Haalat Nahi

Zikre-Nabi Mein Din Jo Guzrein Woh Din Sab Se Behtar Hain
Yaad-E-Nabi Mein Raat Jo Guzrein Iss Se Behtar Raat Nahi

Gaur To Kar Sarkar Ki Tujh Pe Kaisi Khas Inayat Hain
Kausar Tou Hain Unka Sanakha Ye Mamoli Baat Nahi

Jitna Diya Sarkar Ne Mujhko Itni Meri Auqat Nahi
Yeh To Karam Hain Unka Varna Mujh Mein To Aisi Baat Nahi.

Yaad E Nabi Mai Din Jo Guzre Vo Din Sabse Behtar Hai Jee
Yaad E Nabi Mai Raat Jo Bite Us Se Behtar Raat Nahi

1: Jitna Mere Khuda Ko Hai Mera Nabi Azeez
2:
Jitna Mere Khuda Ko Hai Mera Nabi Azeez
Konain Me Kisi Ko Na Hoga Koi Azeez

Kyu Jaaye Hum Kahi Ke Ghani Tum Ne Kar Diya
Ab To Ye Ghar Pasand Ye Dar Ye Gali Azeez

Jo Kuch Teri Raza Hai Khuda Ki Wahi Khushi
Jo Kuch Teri Kushi Hai Khuda Ko Wahi Azeez

Khak E Madina Par Mujhe Allah Maut De
Wo Murda Dil Hai Jisko Na Ho Zindagi Azeez

Go Hum Namak Haram Nikamme Gulaam Hai
Qurbaan Phir Bhi Rakhti Hai Rehmat Teri Azeez

Shaan E Karam Ko Achche Bure Se Garaz Nahi
Usko Sabhi Pasand Hai Usko Sabhi Azeez

Mangta Ka Haat Utha To Madina Hi Ki Taraf
Tera Hi Dar Pasand Hai Teri Gali Azeez

Us Dar Ki Khak Par Mujhe Marna Pasand Hai
Takhte Shahi Pe Kisko Nahi Zindagi Azeez

Konain De Diye Hai Tere Ikhtiyaar Me
Allah Ko Bhi Kitni Hai Khatir Teri Azeez

Mehshar Me Do Jaha Ko Khuda Ki Khushi Ki Chah
Mere Huzoor Ki Hai Khuda Ko Khushi Azeez

Quraan Kha Raha Hai Usi Khaak Ki Qasam
Hum Kon Hai Khuda Ko Hai Teri Gali Azeez

Dil Se Zara Ye Keh De Ke Unka Gulaam Hu
Har Dushman E Khuda Ho Khuda Ko Abhi Azeez

Taiba Ke Hote Khuld E Bari Kya Karu Hasan
Mujh Ko Yahi Pasand Hai Mujh Ko Yahi Azeez

1: Jo Hijr E Nabi Mein Rote Hain
2:
Jo Hijr E Nabi Mein Rote Hain
Wo Dar Pe Bhulay Jaate Hain
Deedar Ki Nimat Milti Hai
Har Shay Jo Lutay Jaate Hain

Sarkaar Ki Pyaari Ghaliyoun Mein
Kya Lutf Hai Unki Taliyoun Mein
Jibril Ameen Se Poocho Zara
Jo Lutf Uthaay Jaate Hain

Sarkaar Ki Midhat Ka Yeh Sila
Deta Hai Mujhe Youn Mera Khuda
Mein Naate Nabi Jab Parta/sunta Hu
Mere Ayeb Mithay Jaate Hain

Mein Naate Nabi Jab Liktha Hun
Jibril Madad Ko Aate Hain
Touseef Nabi Ke Yeh Unwaan
Jannat Se Mangwaay Jaate Hain

1: Jo Madina Hum Bhi Jaate To Kuch Aur Baat Hoti
2:
Jo Madina Hum Bhi Jaate To Kuch Aur Baat Hoti
Wahi Raah Bhool Jaate, To Kuch Aur Baat Hoti

Ye Hawa Ke Mast Jhoke Jo Iram Se Aarahe Hai
Yehi Taiba Hoke Aate, To Kuch Aur Baat Hoti

Meri Aankh Jab Bhi Khulti Teri Rehmato Se Aaka
Tujhe Saamne Jo Paata, To Kuch Aur Baat Hoti

Muje Zehr Dene Wale Bare Kam Nazar Hai Aaka
Tere Naam Par Pilaate To, Kuch Aur Baat Hoti

Mein Madine Ko Gaya Tha Ye Bara Sharap Hai Lekin
Wohi Dam Jo Toot Jata To, Kuch Aur Baat Hoti

Ye Sitaaron Ka Tabassum Hai Nazar Nawaaz Lekin
Mere Aaka Muskuraate, To Kuch Aur Baat Hoti

Duniya Ke Gham Mein Yeh Jo Mere Aansoo Behrahe Hai
Tera Gham Agar Rulaata, To Kuch Aur Baat Hoti

Ye Jo Naat-E Paak Bekal Mehfil Mein Par Rahe Hai
Yehi Taiba Mein Sunaate, To Kuch Aur Baat Hoti

1: Jo Saamne Hai Madina To Dekhta Kya Hai
2:

Gira Hoon Baare Isyaan Se Agisnee Ya Rasool Allah
Gire Ko Tum Uthaate Ho Uthaate Yunhi Rehna Tum

Gham-E-Ishq-E-Muhammad Me Rahe Aankhen Hamesha Nam
Pilaate Jaam E ‘ulfat Ho Pilaate Yunhi Rehna Tum

Nazar Ke Saamne Haazir Hain Aaqa Aap Ka Mujrim
Mitaao Is Key Jurmo Ko Mitaate Yunhi Rehna Tum

Mili Iftaar Ki ‘izzat Mujhe Phir Maah E Ramzan Me
Khilaya Mujh Ko Qadmon Me Khilate Yunhi Rehna Tum

Mile Shab Qadr Ki Ne’mat Shaha Hamza Key Sadqe Me
Lutaate Unka Sadqa Ho Lutaate Yunhi Rehna Tum

Chala Hoon Phir Madine Sey Liye Armaan Yeh Dil Me
Bulaana Jald Taiba Me Bulaate Yunhi Rehna Tum

Muradain Sab Ne Paayee Hain Isi Sarkaar Me Aakar
Hansaya Tumne Roton Ko Hansate Yunhi Rehna Tum

Karam Sey Aap Key Jaaga Pisar Ka Bakhte Khufta Yun
Dikhaaya Usko Taibah Bhi Dikhaate Yunhi Rehna Tum

Yeh Maana Mujrimo ‘aasee Tumhaara Shakir E Noorie
Nibhaate Isko Rehte Ho Nibhaate Yunhi Rehna Tum

1: Karam Ke Badal Baras Rahe Hain
2:
Karam Ke Badal Baras Rahe Hain
Dilon Ki Kheti Hari Bhari Hai
Yeh Kon Aaya Ke Zikr Jis Ka
Nagar Nagar Hai Gali Gali Hai

Ye Koun Ban Kar Qaraar Ayaa
Ye Koun Jaane Bahaar Ayaa
Gulo Ke Chehre Hai Nikhre Nikhre
Kali Kali Me Shaguftagi Hai

Diye Dilon Ke Jalaae Rakhna
Nabi Ki Mehfil Sajaae Rakhna
Jo Rahate Dil Sukoone Jaan Hai
Woh Zikr Zikre Muhammadi Hai

Nabi Ko Apna Khuda Na Mano
Magar Khuda Se Juda Na Jano
Hai Ahle Imaan Ka Ye Aqeeda
Khuda Khuda Hai Nabi Nabi Hai

Na Mango Dunya Ke Tum Khazaane
Chalo Niyaazi Chalein Madine
Ke Badshah Se Bhadh Ke Pyare
Nabi Ke Dar Ki Gadaagari Hai

Jo Gaaliya Sun Ke De Duayen
Bado Ko Apne Galle Lagaye
Saraapa Lutfo Karam Jo Thehri
Woh Mere Aaqa Ki Zindigi Hai

Main Apni Qismat Pe Kyun Na Jhoomu
Main Kyun Na Waliyon Ke Dar Ko Choomu
Main Naam Lewa Hu Mustafa Ka
Khuda Ke Bandon Se Dosti Hai

Hai Dosh Par Jin Ke Kamli Kaali
Wohi To Hain Do Jahaan Ke Waali
Koi Sawaali Na Bejha Khaali
Ye Shaan Mere Kareem Ki Hai

1: Karam Maangta Hu Ata Mangta Hu
2:
Karam Maangta Hu Ata Mangta Hu
Shah E Deen Ki Ulfat Sada Mangta Hu

Main Hu Mubtala Marz E Isyan Me Moula
Muhammad Ke Sadqe Shifa Mangta Hu

Meri Zindgi Unki Ulfat Me Guzre
Dar E Mustafa Par Qaza Mangta Hu

Nazar Me Basa Hai Tere Ghar Ka Jalwa
Sar E Hashr Behtar Liqa Mangta Hu

Jahan Bhar Me Sab Hain Musalman Pareshan
Dua Me Unhi Ka Bhala Mangta Hu

Meri Zist Ka Hai Yahi Ek Unwan
Ke Shah E Deen Ki Wila Mangta Hu

Tere Dar Ka Sayil Hai Shakir Khudaya
Main Tujh Se Teri Hi Raza Mangta Hu

1: Kardo Aqa Karam Kardo Aqa Karam
2:
Kardo Aqa Karam, Kardo Aqa Karam
Lab Pey Jaari Sadaa, Kardo Aqa Karam

Key Raha Hai Jahaa, Hu Gadaa-E-Nabi
Rakh Low Data Barang, Kardo Aqa Karam

Jiis Taraa Apney Dee Yaha Par Khushi
Hashr Mein Bhi Miley, Kardo Aqa Karam

Dar Mein Pohncha, Toh Diil Ney Kaha Par Mala
Maaf Ho Sab Hataa, Kardo Aqa Karam

Kiis Ki Jaanib Chalu, Kis Ka Mu Mein Taku
Chor Kar Yeh Chalaa, Kardo Aqa Karam

Haazri Key Liye, Jiitney Behchen Hai
Izn-E-Tayba Miley, Kardo Aqa Karam

Ap Haazir Hai, Ap Naazir Bhi Hai
Ik Nazaar Soo’ey Ma, Kardo Aqa Karam

Aaj Peyba Kara, Hii Banaa Hii Diya
Khuld Ka Bhi Banu, Kardo Aqa Karam

Mar’zey Isiya Sey Ab Toh, Mein Chur Huwa
Dey Doh Kaamil Shifaa, Kardo Aqa Karam

Kown Detaa Hai, Denay Koh Mu Chahiye
Haath Peyla Diya, Kardo Aqa Karam

Saa’iley Daar Huwa, Shaqirey Bey Nawa
Ilm-E-Naafey Ataa, Kardo Aqa Karam

Jaaliyo Key Kareeb, Shaqirey Khush Naseeb
Aankh Karli Hai Nam, Kardo Aqa Karam

1: Kaun Hai Jiska Muqaddar Musatafa Ne Saanwara Nahi
2:
Kaun Hai Jiska Muqaddar Musatafa Ne Sawara Nahi Hai
Tere Dar Ke Siwa Shah Ab Do Jahan Me Guzara Nahi Hai

Kis Ko Faryaad Apni Sunaoo, Kis Ke Dar Pe Mai Daaman Bichaoo
Mera Tere Siwa Ya Muhammad, Aur Koi Sahaara Nahi Hai

Koee Manay Nah Manay Yeh Sun Le Bus Yehi Faesla Hai Khuda Ka
Jo Tumhara Nahi Ya Habeebi Wo To Hargiz Hamara Nahi

Aao Nukhtaun Ka Mai Bhaid Kholoon, Kyun Hai Be Nukhta Naam E Muhammad
Naam Par Jo Bojh Nukhte Ka Aae, Rabb Ko Yeh Bhi Gawara Nahi

Hai Dawa Har Alam Ki Yeh Sahil, Bus Mere Mustafa Ko Pukaro
Jabse Naat E Nabi Hai Zabaan Par, Mera Gardish Me Tara Nahi

1: Kaun Kehta Hai Aankhein Chura Kar Chale
2:
Kaun Kehta Hai Aankhein Chura Kar Chale
Kab Kisi Se Nigahe Bacha Kar Chale

Kaun Unse Nigahe Lada Kar Chale
Kiski Taaqat Hai Jo Aankhein(N) Mila Kar Chale

Wo Hansi Kya Jo Fitne Utha Kar Chale
Haan Hansi Tum Jo Fitne Mita Kar Chale

Unke Kunche Me Mangta Sada Kar Chale
Rehmat E Haq Ho Har Dam Dua Kar Chale

Qissa E Gham Sunaya Suna Kar Chale
Jaan E Isa Dawa Do Dua Kar Chale

Rabb Ke Bando Ko Rab Se Mila Kar Chale
Jalwa E Haq Wo Humko Dikha Kar Chale

Man Ra'aani Ra'al Haq Suna Kar Chale
Mera Jalwa Hai Haq Ka Jata Kar Chale

Juz Bashar Aur Kya Dekhe Qira Nazar
Aiyyu Kum Misli Go Wo Suna Kar Chale

Jagmaga Daale Galiya(N) Jidhar Aaye Woh
Jab Chale Wo To Kooche Basa Kar Chale

Koi Maane Na Maane Ye Wo Jaan Le
Seedha Raasta Wo Sabko Bata Kar Chale

Badd Se Badd Ko Liye Jisne Agosh Me
Kab Kisi Se Wo Daaman Bacha Kar Chale

Jo Kameene The Unko Muaz-Zaz Kiya
Wo Razilo Ko Seene Laga Kar Chale

Jism Par Noor Ka Yu To Saaya Na Tha
Aur Path-Thar Me Nakshe Jama Kar Chale

Marte Dam Sar Dar E Paak Par Rakh Diya
Iss Adaa Se Kaza Hum Adaa Kar Chale

Kisi Jaanib Se Aayi Nida E Huzoor
Mujrimo Ki Rihayi Ka Kya Kar Chale

Daagh E Dil Humne Noori Dikha Hi Diya
Dard E Dil Ka Fasana Suna Kar Chale

1: Kaun Shehre Makkah Me Subha Subha Aaya Hai
2:
Kaun Shehre Makkah Me Subha Subha Aaya Hai
Jiske Noor Se A'alam Saara Jagamagaya Hai

Ghaib Se Nida Aayi Aamena Mubarak Ho
Tune Rehmate Haq Se Noor Haq Ka Paaya Hai

Thi Nida Shab E Asra Udno Minne Mehboob
Be Thadak Chale Aao, Humne Hi Bulaya Hai

Aql Sabki Hairaa Hain Dekh Kar Shahe Dee Ko
Ye Bashar To Hai Lekin, Kyu Na Inka Saaya Hai

Inna-Ma Ana Basharum Mislokum Ke Parde Me
Haq Ne Apne Jalwo Ka Aayina Sajaya Hai

Ya Nabi Main Tumpar Kyu Na Jaano Dil Fida Kar Du
Humne Aapko Paa Kar To Khuda Ko Paaya Hai

Daaman E Nabi Aashiq Ab Na Humse Chootega
Humne Unse Jo Maanga, Wo Khuda Se Paaya Hai

1: Kerrey Paasey Jaande Ey Saare Sawali
2:
Kerrey Paasey Jaande Ey Saare Sawali
Aqa Je Tera Dwaara Na Honda

Kiwe Koi Sambhalda, Bhala Wich Ghaman De..
Aqa Je Tera Sahara Na Honda

Kerrey Paasey Jaande Ey Saare Sawali
Aqa Je Tera Dwaara Na Honda

Gadha Te Gadha Ne, Gadhawan Nu Chorro..
Ey Sab Badshah Tere Darr De Ne Mangtey..

Tussi Je Na Wand’dey Aye Khayrat Aaqa..
Kisse Da Wee Ayethe Guzaara Na Honda..

Kerrey Paasey Jaande Ey Saare Sawali
Aqa Je Tera Dwaara Na Honda

Adab Naal Dubya Si Aye Suraj Nabi Nu..
Tey Sou Rabb Di Kehnda Si Aake Asr Nu..

Main Dubb Ke Naa Aunda, Kaddi Wee Asr Te..
Je Mehboob Tera Ishara Na Honda..

Kerrey Paasey Jaande Ey Saare Sawali
Aqa Je Tera Dwaara Na Honda

Khuda Khud Sanakhwan Hai Apne Nabi Da..
Je Na Manne Hakim, Te Aa Tainu Dassan..

Je Rabb Mustafa Da Sanakhwan Na Honda..
Te Quran Da Koi Sipara Na Honda..

Kerrey Paasey Jaande Ey Saare Sawali
Aqa Je Tera Dwaara Na Honda

Kiwe Koi Sambhalda, Bhala Wich Ghaman De..
Aqa Je Tera Sahara Na Honda

1: Khaak Sooraj Se Andheron Ka Izaala Hoga
2:
Khaak Sooraj Se Andheron Ka Azaala Hoga.
Aap Aaye To Mere Ghar Me Ujaala Hoga

Ishqe Sarkaar Ki Ik Shamma Jalaalo Dil Mein
Baad Marne Ke Lahad Mein Bi Ujaala Hoga

Jab Bhi Maango To Waseele Se Unhi Ke Maango
Is Waseele Se Karam Aur Do Bala Hoga

Hashr Mein Hoga Woh Sarkaar Ke Jhande Ke Tale
Meri Sarkaar Ka Jo Chaahne Waala Hoga

Hashr Mein Usko Bhi Seene Se Lagayenge Huzoor
Jis Gunahgaar Ko Har Ek Ne Taala Hoga

Silaa-E-Naate Nabi Paaunga Jis Din Khalid
Woh Karam Dekh Na Tum Dekhne Waala Hoga

Hashr Mein Unka Har Ik Chaahne Waala Hoga
Mere Sarkaar Ka Aalam Hi Niraala Hoga

1: Khair Karam Wala Sadi Jholi Paa Jaavi
2:
Khair Karam Wala Sadi Jholi Paa Jaavi
Laajaan Waalerya Saadi Laaj Nibhaa Jaavi

Hijr Judaiyan Wichhonr Muddatan Ho Gaiya
Tak Tak Raah Tera Honr Akhiyaan Ro Paiyaan
Enha Akhiyan Noon Deedar Karan Jaavi

Laajaan Waalerya Saadi Laaj Nibhaa Jaavi

Thokraan Khaa Baithe Saara Jag Azmaa Baihte
Dhikde Tainde Honr Tere Dar Te Aa Baithe
Assan Koojean Noon Seene Nal Jaavi

Laajaan Waalerya Saadi Laaj Nibhaa Jaavi

Raat Andheri Eh Chulli Gham Di Hanerieh,
Chor Diti Kashti Assan Naam Tere Teh Eh,
Zahraa De Baaba Honr Paar Lagaa Jaavi,

Laajaan Waalerya Saadi Laaj Nibhaa Jaavi

1: Khake Madina Hoti Mein Khaksar Hota
2:
Khake Madina Hoti Mein Khak-Sar Hota
Hoti Rahe Madina Mera Hubar Hota

Aaqa Agar Karam Se Tayba Muje Bulate
Roze Par Sadke Hota Unpar Nisar Hota

Mar Mitke Khub Lagti Mitti Meri Thikane
Ghar Unki Rah-Guzar Par Mera Mazar Hota

Ye Aarazu Hai Dil Ki Hota Wo Sabz Gumbad
Aur Mein Gubar Ban Kar Us Par Nisar Hota

Tayba Mein Ghar Muyassar Do Gaz Zameen Hoti
Unke Kareeb Basta Dil Ko Karar Hota

Bechain Dil Ko Ab Tak Samja Buja Ke Rakha
Magar Ab To Is Se Aaqa Nahin Intezar Hota

Wo Bekason Ke Aaqa Bekas Ko Ghar Bulate
Kyun Sab Ki Thokaron Par Padh Kar Khuwar Hota

Salik Hue Ham Unke Wo Bhi Hue Hamare
Dile Muztarib Ko Lekin Nahin Intezar Hota

1: Khake Taiba Mere Seene Se Laga Di Jaaye
2:
Khake Taiba Mere Seene Se Laga Di Jaaye,
Haan Basharat Mujhe Jannat Ki Suna Di Jaye.

Mehfil-E-Naat Phir Ek Baar Saja Di Jaaye,
Qalbe Dushman Ki Jalan Aur Badha Di Jaaye.

Hosh Aayega Na Duniya Ki Dawaao Se Mujhe,
Naale Sarkaare Do Aalam Ki Hawa Di Jaaye.

Jis Paseene Ki Mahak Makke Ki Galiyon Me Rachi,
Wohi Khushboo Mujhe Ek Baar Sungha Di Jaaye.

Ibne Khattab Ko Farooq Banaaya Jisne,
Wohi Tasveer Mere Dil Me Bitha Di Jaaye.

Ishq Gar Jurm Hai Faansi Ki Saza Do Mujh Ko,
Dare Mehboob Pe Lekin Ye Saza Di Jaaye.

Ya Nabi Mujhko Bhi Haasil Hai Ghulami Ka Sharaf,
Meri Naato Me Bhi Taasire Raza Di Jaaye.

Hashr Ke Roz Mai Aaqa Ki Sunaau Naate,
Rab Kahe Nazmi Ko Firdous Me Jaa(N) Di Jaaye

1: Kharab Haal Kiya Dil Ko Pur Malaal Kiya
2:
Kharab Haal Kiya Dil Ko Pur Malaal Kiya
Tumhare Kooche Se Rukhsat Kiya Nihaal Kiya

Na Ruye Gul Abhi Dekha Na Buye Gul Soonghi
Kaza Ne Laake Qafas Mein Shikasta Baal Kiya

Woh Dil Ki Khoo(N) Shuda Armaan The Jis Mein Mal Dala
Fugaa(N) Ki Gore Shaheeda(N) Ko Paayemaal Kiya

Ye Rai Kya Thi Waha Se Palatne Ki Aye Nafs
Sitamgar Ulti Choori Se Hume Halaal Kiya

Ye Kab Ki Mujhse Adawat Thi Tujhko Aye Zaalim
Chchuda Ke Sange Dare Paak Sar Wabaal Kiya

Chaman Se Phenk Diya Aashiyaan E Bulbul
Ujada Khanaye Bekar Bada Kamaal Kiya

Tera Sitamzada Aankhon Ne Kya Bigada Tha
Ye Kya Samayi Ki Door In Se Woh Jamaal Kiya

Huzoor Unke Khayale Watan Mitana Tha
Hum Aap Mit Gaye Achcha Faraagh Baal Kiya

Na Ghar Ka Rakha Na Us Dar Ka Haaye Nakaami
Humari Bebasi Par Bhi Na Khuch Khayal Kiya

Jo Dil Ne Mar Ke Jalaya Tha Mannato Ka Charaag
Sitam Ki Arz Rahe Sar Sare Zawaal Kiya

Madina Chchod Ke Viraana Hind Ka Paaya
Ye Kaisa Haaye Hawaaso(N) Ne Ikhtilaal Kiya

Tu Jis Ke Waaste Chchod Aaya Taiba Sa Mehboob
Bata To Us Sitam Aara Ne Kya Nihaal Kiya

Abhi Abhi To Chaman Me The Chahchahe Nagaah
Ye Dard Kaisa Utha Jis Ne Jee Nidhaal Kiya

Ilahi Sunle Raza Jeete Jee Ki Maula Ne
Sagaane Koocha Mein Chehra Mera Bahaal Kiya

1: Khayal Aata Hai Dil Me Ye Gar Hua Hota
2:
Khayal Aata Hai Dil Me Ye Gar Hua Hota
Unhi Ke Daur Me Maine Janam Liya Hota

Woh Chalte Aage Mere Shane Dilrubayi Se
Mai Peeche Unki Sawari Ke Daudta Hota

Mere Bhi Sar Pe Tasalli Ka Haath Rakhte Woh
Yateem Gar Mai Usi Daure Paak Ka Hota

Woh Leke Jaate Mujhe Roz Kaash Sehra Me
Haleema Daai Ki Bakri Hi Ban Gaya Hota

Mujhe Bhi Aisi Namazon Ka Gar Sharaf Milta
Mai Unke Rooe Munawaar Ko Tak Raha Hota

Woh Aake Mere Janaze Pe Jab Khade Hote
Kafan Hata Ke Mai Unko Hi Tak Raha Hota

Ameen E Khasta Ka Uthta Janaza Taiba Mein
Muraad Apni Bechaara Ye Paa Gaya Hota

1: Khoob Khushiya Manao Huzoor Aa Gaye
2:
Khoob Khushiya Manao Huzoor Aa Gaye
Naat-E-Ahmed Sunao Huzoor Aa Gaye

Unke Sajde Ko Mehraab E Kaaba Jhuki
Apna Dil Tum Jhukao Huzoor Aa Gaye

Boli Daayi Haleema Unhe Dekh Kar
Noori Jhoola Jhulao Huzoor Aa Gaye

Dushmani Chchod Do Sab Muhobbat Karo
Dil Se Dil Ko Milao Huzoor Aa Gaye

Padh Ke Kalma Ye Kankar Bhi Kehne Lage
Logo Imaan Laao Huzoor Aa Gaye

But Shikan Aaya But Sar Ke Bal Gir Pade
Parchame Haq Uthao Huzoor Aa Gaye

Hai Lakad Jaa-A-Kum Dekho Quran Me
Padh Ke Sab Ko Sunao Huzoor Aa Gaye

Yaad Ummat Ko Waqte Wilaadat Kiya
Yaad Ab Tum Manao Huzoor Aa Gaye

Jhoom Kar Khoob Rizwan Naate Padho
Sab Ko Muzda Sunao Huzoor Aa Gaye

1: Khuda Ka Zikr Kare Zikre Mustafa Na Kare
2:
Khuda Ka Zikr Kare Zikre Mustafa Na Kare
Hamare Munh Me Ho Aisi Zubaan Khuda Na Kare

Aseer Jis Ko Bana Kar Rakhen Madine Me
Tamaam Umar Rihayi Ki Woh Dua Na Kare

Madina Ja Ke Nikalna Na Shehar Se Baahar
Khuda Na Khwasta Ye Zindagi Wafaa Na Kare

Kaha Khuda Ne Shafa’at Ki Baat Mehshar Me
Mera Habeeb Kare Koi Doosra Na Kare

Sha-Oore Naat Bhi Ho Aur Zubaan Bhi Ho Adeeb
Woh Aadmi Nahi Jo Unka Haq Adaa Na Kare

Hamare Dard-E-Jigar Ki Koi Dawa Na Kare
Kami Ho Ishk-E-Nabi Me Kabhi Khuda Na Kare

Hamare Dekhe Hue Hai Madine Ke Zarre
Batado Mehar Ko Ab Daawa-E-Ziya Na Kare

Razae Namasiya Ka Kaha Thikaana Hai
Shafa’at Iski Jo Mehshar Me Mustafa Na Kare

Dare Rasool Pe Aisa Kabhi Nahi Dekha
Koi Sawaal Kare Aur Woh Ataa Na Kare

Nabi Ke Qadmon Pe Jis Dam Ghulaam Ka Sar Ho
Qaza Se Keh Do Ke Ik Lamha Bhi Kaza Na Kare

1: Khuda Ki Azmate Kya Hai Muhammad Mustafa Jaane
2:
Khuda Ki Azmate Kya Hai Muhammad Mustafa Jaane
Maqaam-E-Mustafa Kya Hai Muhammad Ka Khuda Jaane.

Sada Karna Mere Bas Me Tha Maine To Sada Kardi
Woh Kya Denge Mai Kya Loonga Shaha Jaane Gadaa Jaane

Kaha Jibreel Ne Sidra Talak Meri Rasaayi Thi
Hai Kitni Manzile Aage Nabi Jaane Khuda Jaane

Madine Haazri Ki Maangte Rehna Dua Yaaro
Asar Hoga Nahi Hoga Nabi Jaane Khuda Jaane

Meri Mitti Madeeni Shehar Ki Raah Me Bichaa Dena
Kaha Le Jaati Hai Mujh Ko Madine Ki Hawaa Jaane

Mujhe To Sur Khuroo Hona Hai, Aaqa Ki Nigaahon Me
Zamaane Ka Hai Kya Naasir Buraa Jaane Bhala Jaane

Darana Mujh Ko To Kyoun Hai Azaab-E-Kabbar Se Wahid
Wahan Sarkaar Aye Gei Khata Jane Atta Jane

1: Khuda Ne Mujh Ko Diya Maa Teri Duaon Se
2:
Khuda Ne Mujh Ko Diya Maa Teri Duaon Se
Mila Hai Jo Bhi Mila Maa Teri Duaon Se

Jahaa Jahaa Bhi Gaya Log Dil Bichane Lage
Ye Ehteram Mera Maa Teri Duaon Se

Ye Kaamyabi Ya Shohrat Qadam Qadam Pe Mili
Naseeb Aisa Mila Maa Teri Duaon Se

Mujhe Girane Pe Haasid Tule Hue The Magar
Main Dushmanon Se Bacha Maa Teri Duaon Se

Tawaaf Maine Kiya Ki Saei-E-Marwah Bhi
Jo Maine Umrah Kiya Maa Teri Duaon Se

Qasam Hai Isme Ujaagar Ka Kuch Kamal Nahin
Urooj Isko Mila Maa Teri Duaon Se

1: Khushiyo Ki Bahare Laya Ramzan Mubarak Aaya
2:
Khushiyo Ki Bahare Laya Ramzan Mubarak Aaya
Dil Joom Ke Mera Gaya Ramzan Mubarak Aaya

Qur'an Ki Tilawat Hogi Bharpoor Ibaadat Hogi
Qur'an Ka Tohfa Laya Ramzan Mubarak Aaya

Sehri Ki Ajab Rahat Hai Iftar Me Woh Rounaq Hai
Ik Kaif Ajab Hai Chaya Ramzan Mubarak Aaya

Roze Ki Ye Lazzat Dekho Na Pyaas Ki Shiddat Hai Woh
Kya Sabr Hai Hum Ne Paaya Ramzan Mubarak Aaya

Ramzan To Hai Us Ki, Ho Saath Me Maa Jiski
Turkee Ne To Ashk Bahaya Jab Ramzan Mubarak Aaya

Allah Meri Maa Ko Ramzan Ke Sadqe Me
Sab Maaf Gunah Karde Jannat Bhi Ataa Karde
Zahra Ka Mile Saaya Ramzan Mubarak Aaya

1: Khusravi Achhi Lagi Na Sarwari Achhi Lagi
2:
Khusravi Achhi Lagi Na Sarwari Achhi Lagi
Hum Faqeero Ko Madine Ki Gali Achhi Lagi

Mai Na Jaunga Kahi Bhi Darr Nabi Ka Chor Kar
Mujhko Ko-E Mustafa Ki Chaakri Achhi Lagi

Rakh Diye Sarkaar Ke Qadmo Me Sultaano Ne Sarr
Sarwar E Kouno Makaa Ki Saadgi Achhi Lagi

Naaz Kar Tu Ay Haleema Sarwar E Kounain Par
Gar Lagi Achhi To Teri Jhopdi Achhi Lagi

Jinko Karni Hai Shahenshaho Ki Taarefe Kare
Mujhko Aaqa Bas Tumhari Naat Hi Achhi Lagi

Qabr Roushan Ho Gayi Noor E Nabi Se Is Tarah
Aashiqo Ko Maut Bhi Aur Qabr Bhi Achhi Lagi

Maut Jo Maangi Dayar E Mustafa Ke Saamne
Maut Ko Bhi Aarzu Meri Badi Achhi Lagi

Mahro Mah Ki Roushni Maana Ki Achhi Hai Magar
Sabze Ghumbad Ki Mujhe To Roushni Achhi Lagi

Duur The To Zindagi Be-Rang Thi Be-Kaif Thi
Unke Kooche Me Gaye To Zindagi Achhi Lagi

Aaj Mehfil Me Niyazi Naat Jo Maine Padhi
Aashiqane Mustafa Ko Wo Badi Achhi Lagi

1: Ki Ki Na Kita Yaar Ney Eik Yaar Waste
2:
Ki Ki Na Kita Yaar Ney Eik Yaar Waste
Rab Mehfilan Sajayan Ney Sarkar Waste

Dil Yaad Lai Banaya Wey Tareef Lai Zuban
Akhian Banaian Sohne De Deedar Waste

Sadqa Nabi Di Aall Da Bakhshy Khuda Shifa
Mango Duawan Mery Jay Bimar Waste

Kaian Noo Rooz Hondy Ney Dedar Aap Dey
Kai Taras Dey Ney Sohne De Deedar Waste

Rehmat Udey Ne Ley Liya Apni Panah Dey Wich
Pay Jado Mey Sohne De Do Char Waste

Guzry Niazi Zindage Ishq E Nabi Dey Wich
Naatan Mey Parh Da Rawan Sohne Sarkar Waste

Ki Ki Na Kita Yaar Ney Eik Yaar Waste
Rab Mehfilan Sajayan Ney Sarkar Waste

1: Kis Cheez Ki Kami Hai Maula Teri Gali Me
2:
Kis Cheez Ki Kami Hai Maula Teri Gali Me
Duniya Teri Gali Main Uqba Teri Gali Me

Deewangi Pe Meri Haste Hai Aql Wale
Rasta Teri Gali Ka Poocha Teri Gali Me

Deewana Kar Diya Hai Deewana Ho Gaya Hoon
Dekha Hai Maine Aisa Jalwa Teri Gali Me

Mauto Hayaat Meri Dono Tere Liye Hai
Marna Teri Gali Me Jina Teri Gali Me

Kis Tarah Pau Rakhe Ya Sahibe Baseerat
Aankhen Bichi Huwi Hai Har Jaa Teri Gali Me

Suraj Tajalliyon Ka Har Dam Chamak Raha Hai
Dekha Nahi Kisi Din Saya Teri Gali Me

Amjad Ko Aaj Tak Ham Adna Samajh Rahe The
Lekin Maqaam Uska Paya Teri Gali Me

1: Kiske Jalwe Ki Jhalak Hai Ye Ujala Kya Hai
2:
Kiske Jalwe Ki Jhalak Hai Ye Ujala Kya Hai
Har Taraf Dedaye Hairat Zada Takta Kya Hai

Maang Man Maanti Muh Maangi Muraaden Lega
Na Yaha 'naa' Hai Na Mangta Se Ye Kehna 'kya Hai'

Pand Kadwi Lage Naaseh Se Tursh Ho Aye Nafs
Zehre Isyaa(N) Mein Sitamgar Tujhe Meetha Kya Hai

Hum Hain Unke Woh Hain Tere To Huwe Hum Tere
Isse Badhkar Teri Samt Aur Waseela Kya Hai

Unki Ummat Mein Banaaya Unhen Rehmat Bheja
Yoon Na Farma Ki Tera Rehmat Mein Da'wa Kya Hai

Sadqa Pyare Ki Hayaa Ka Ki Na Le Mujh Se Hisaab
Bakhsh Be Pooche Lajaaye Ko Lajaana Kya Hai

Zaahid Unka Main Gunahgaar Woh Mere Shaafe'
Itni Nisbat Mujhe Kya Kam Hai Tu Samjha Kya Hai

Be Basi Ho Jo Mujhe Pursishe Aa'maal Ke Waqt
Doston Kya Kahu Us Waqt Tamanna Kya Hai

Kaash Fariyaad Meri Sunke Ye Farmaaye Huzoor
Haan Koi Dekho Yeh Kya Shor Hai Ghogha Kya Hai

Kaun Aafat Zada Hai Kis Pe Bala Tooti Hai
Kis Musibat Mein Giraftaar Hai Sadma Kya Hai

Kis Se Kehta Hai Ki Lillah Khabar Lije Meri
Kyun Hai Betaab Yeh Bechaini Ka Rona Kya Hai

Iski Bechaini Se Hai Khaatire Aqdas Pe Malaal
Be Kasi Kaisi Hai Poocho Koi Guzra Kya Hai

Yoon Malaaik Karen Maa'rooz Ki Ik Mujrim Hai
Usse Pursish Hai Bata Tune Kiya Kya Kya Hai

Saamna Qahar Ka Hai Daftare Aa'maal Hain Pesh
Dar Raha Hai Ki Khuda Hukm Sunata Kya Hai

Aap Se Karta Hai Fariyaad Ki Ya Shaahe Rusul
Banda Bekas Hai Shaha Rehem Mein Waqfa Kya Hai

Ab Koi Dum Mein Giraftaare Bala Hota Hoon
Aap Aa Jaayen To Kya Khauf Hai Khatka Kya Hai

Sun Ke Arz Meri Behre Karam Josh Mein Aaye
Yoon Malaaik Ko Ho Irshaad Theherna Kya Hai

Kis Ko Tum Mooride Aafat Kiya Chahte Ho
Hum Bhi To Aake Zara Dekhe Tamasha Kya Hai

Unki Aawaaz Pe Kar Utthu(N) Main Be Saakhta Shor
Aur Tadap Kar Ye Kahoon Ab Mujhe Parwa Kya Hai

Lo Woh Aaya Mera Haami Mera Gham Khwaare Umam
Aa Gayi Jaa(N) Tane Be Jaa(N) Mein Ye Aana Kya Hai

Phir Mujhe Daamane Aqdas Mein Chupa Le(N) Sarwar
Aur Farmaye Hato Is Pe Takaazaa Kya Hai

Banda Aazaad Shuda Hai Ye Humare Dar Ka
Kaisa Lete Ho Hisaab Is Pe Tumhara Kya Hai

Chchod Kar Mujhko Farishte Kahen Mahkoom Hai Hum
Hukme Waala Ki Na Taa'meel Ho Zahra Kya Hai

Ye Samaa Dekh Ke Mehshar Mein Uthe Shor Ki Wah
Chashme Bad-Door Ho Kya Shaan Hai Rutba Kya Hai

Sadqe Is Reham Ke Is Saaya E Daaman Pe Nisaar
Apne Bando Ko Musibat Se Bachaya Kya Hai

Aye Raza Jaane Anaadil Tere Nagmon Ke Nisaar
Bulbule Baage Madina Tera Kehna Kya Hai

1: Kiya Majal Kisi Ki Jo Sarkar Ki Barabari Kare
2:
Kiya Majal Kisi Ki Jo Sarkar Ki Barabari Kare
Ungli Se Hishara Karde Chand Ke Tukde Ho Jai.

Sarkar Ke Aqlaq Ki Quran Jo Taarif Kare
Pyare Aqa Ke Aqlaq Se Kafer Bhi Musalma Ho Jai

Mere Aqa Muqtar Hai Majboor Nahi Pyare
Mangta Aya Jo Wo Sultan Ho Jai

Sarkar Namaz Me Kabe Ki Samt Ruq Kare
Sahaba Kahte The Jo Sarkar Kare Wo Ho Jai

Namaz-E-Asr Ali(Raziallahu Talla Anhu) Khaza Nahi Ada Kare
Sarkar Hishara Karde Duba Huva Suraj Wapis Ho Jai

Ho Nazre Inayat Hum Asiyo Par Sarkar Mere
Taake Hamari Qismat Ke Sab Gardishe Dur Ho Jai

Sarkar Jaber Pe Ho Jai Karam Ki Nazre
Madine Me Iska Lasha Dafn Ho Jai

1: Koi Kaise Samajh Payega Rutba Sabz Gumbad Ka
2:
Koi Kaise Samajh Payega Rutba Sabz Gumbad Ka
Ke Khutba Pad Raha Hai Khud Hi Kaba Sabz Gumbad Ka

Jo Poocha Maine Jannat Se Teri Bhi Koi Jannat Hai
To Jannat Ne Diya Mujhko Hawala Sabz Gumbad Ka

Raza Ke Chahney Walon Ne Ek Soorat Nikali Hai
Ke Bareli Se Vo Karte Hai Nazara Sabz Gumbad Ka

Nabi Ko Noor Jo Samjhe Wahi Ye Raj Janegaa
Kya! Na Saya Mustafa Ka Hai Na Saya Sabz Gumbad Ka

Badi Hasrat Se Takti Hai Nigahein Asman Isko
Zami Nein Jab Se Bandha Hai Amama Sabz Gumbad Ka

Hare Patton Ko Aksar Dekhkey Ye Mehsoos Hota He
Darakhton Ne Saja Rakha Hai Thogra Sabz Gumbad Ka

Chale Aye Yahan Khich Khich Ke Ashiq Sabz Gumbad Ke
Asad Ne Jis Gadi Cheda Tarana Sabz Gumbad Ka

Koi Kaise Samajh Payega Rutba Sabz Gumbad Ka
Ke Khutba Pad Raha He Khud Hi Kaba Sabz Gumbad Ka

1: Koi Khilqat Mein Un Say Nahi Bada
2:
Koi Khilqat Mein Un Say Nahi Bada
Woh Habeeb-E-Khuda Unki Kya Baat Hai
Hum Gunahgar Hain Hum Siyah Kar Hain
Woh Shafi-Ul-Wara Unki Kya Baat Hai

Aur Kis Ko Urooj Jitna Hasil Huwa
Sara Quran Hi Un Pay Nazil Huwa
Zeenat-E-Arsh Hain Azmat-E-Farsh Hain
Woh Makeen-E-Hira Unki Kya Baat Hai

Sab Say Afzal Do Aalam Main Zaat Unki Hai
Woh Hi Mahboob-E-Rab Kainat Unki Hai
Rabb-E-Akbar Nay Jo Kuch Bhi Hum Ko Diya
Unke Sadqay Mila Unki Kya Baat Hai

Jo Bhi Un Say Mila Usko Rab Milgaya
Bay Adab Zindagi Ko Adab Milgaya
Rab Se Woh Aashna Un Say Rab Ashna
Woh Daleel-E-Khuda Unki Kya Baat Hai

Unki Khatir Do Aalam Banaye Gaye
Unke Anwaar Se Phir Sajaye Gaye
Unke Rutbe Ko Jitney Badaye Gaye
Akhl Se Mawara Unki Kya Baat Hay

Zindagi Ka Safar Ho Na Jaye Tamam
Un Pey Aijaz Bhejo Durood O Salam
Woh Karam Hi Karam Woh Ataa Hi Ataa
Woh Dua Hi Dua Unki Kya Baat Hai

1: Koi Saleeqa Hai Aarzoo Ka Na Bandagi Meri Bandagi Hai
2:
Koi Saleeqa Hai Aarzoo Ka
Na Bandagi Meri Bandagi Hai
Ye Sab Tumhara Karam Hai Aaqa
Ke Baat Ab Tak Bani Hui Hai

Kisi Ka Ehsan Kyun Uthaaye
Kisi Ko Haalat Kyun Bataaye
Tumhi Se Maangege Tum Hi Doge
Tumhare Dar Se Hi Lau Lagi Hai

Ataa Kiya Mujh Ko Dared Ulfat
Kaha Thi Ye Pur Khata Ki Qismat
Mein Is Karam Ke Kaha Tha Qaabil
Huzoor Ki Banda Parwari Hai

Sha-Oor O Fikro Nazar Ke Daire Had Ka
In Se Aage Badh Na Paaye
Na Choo Sake Un Bulandiyon Ko
Jahaa Maqaame Muhammadi Hai

Tajaliyon Ke Kafeel Tum Ho
Muraad Qalbe Khaleel Tum Ho
Khuda Ki Raushan Daleel Tum Ho
Ye Sab Tumhari Hi Raushni Hai

Basheer Kahiye Nazeer Kahiye
Unhe Siraaje Muneer Kahiye
Jo Sar Ba Sar Hai Kalaame Rabbi
Woh Mere Aaqa Ki Zindagi Hai

Amal Ki Mere Asaas Kya Hai
Bajuz Nadamat Ke Paas Kiya Hai
Rahe Salaamat Tumhari Nisbat
Mera To Ek Aasra Yehi Hai

Hai Kaaba Bhi Marjaye Khalaaiq
Bohat Numaaya Hai Ye Haqaaiq
Magar Jo Maqsoode Aashiqui Hai
Huzoor Ke Dar Ki Haazri Hai

Yehi Hai Khalid Asaqse Rehmat
Yehi Hai Khalid Binaa-E-Azmat
Nabi Ka Irfan Zindagi Hai
Nabi Ka Irfan Bandagi Hai......!!

1: Konain De Wali Da Darbar Bara Sohna
2:
Konain De Wali Da Gharbar Bara Sohna
So Rab Di Madine Da Darbaar Baraa Sohna

Mujhe Masjid-E-Nabvi Di Har Cheez Bari Sohni
Jeraa Roze Dey Naal Jureya Minaar Baraa Sohna

Sab Rastey Madinay Dey Sanu Jaan Toh Vadh Pyaarey
Jeraa Roze Nu Jaanda Ey Bazaar Baraa Sohna

Sadiq, Umar, Usman, Haider Toh Mey Vaari Jaa
Meray Sohne Sohne Aqa Da Har Yaar Baraa Sohna

Duniya Diya Safaran Toh Banda Thak Vi Teh Jaanda Ey
Par Safar Madinay Da Har Baar Baraa Sohna

Wekho Na Zahoori Nu Nisbat Nu Zaraa Wekho
Main Kohja Haan Par Meraa Ghumkhwar Baraa Sohna

Ungli Nu Hutawndey Ney Pey Chan Nu Hilawndey Ney
So Rab Di'ey Chan Falki Aqa Da Khilonaey

Sarkar Jeya Sohna Aya'e Na Awna Ey
Na Rab Ney Banaya Ey Na Rab Ney Banawna Ey

Konain Dey Waali Da Darbaar Baraa Sohna
So Rab Di Madinay Da Darbaar Baraa Sohna

1: Koyi Kya Jane Jo Tum Ho Khuda Hi Jaane Kya Tum Ho
2:
Koyi Kya Jane Jo Tum Ho Khuda Hi Jaane Kya Tum Ho
Khuda To Keh Nahi Sakte Magar Shaane Khuda Tum Ho

Nabiyoun Me Ho Tum Aise Nabiyul Ambiya Tum Ho
Haseenoun Me Tum Aise Ho Ke Mehboob E Khuda Tum Ho

Tumhara Husn Aisa Hai Ki Mehboob E Khuda Tum Ho
Mahe Kaamil Kare Kasbe Ziya Wo Mahlika Tum Ho

Uluwe Martabat Pyaare Tumhara Sab Pe Raushan Hai
Makeen E La Makaan Tum Ho Shah E Arshe Ula Tum Ho

Tumhari Hamd Farmaee Khuda Ne Apne Quran Me
Muhammad Aur Mumajjad Mustafa O Mujtaba Tum Ho

Jo Sab Se Pichla Hoga Uska Pichla Ho Nahi Sakta
Ki Wo Pichla Nahi Agla Hua Usse Wara Tum Ho

Tumhi Se Fatha Farmaee Tumhi Par Qatm Farmaee
Rasool Ki Ibteda Tum Ho Nabi Ki Intehaa Tum Ho

Khuda Ne Zaat Ka Apni Tumhe Mazhar Banaya Hai
Jo Haq Ko Dekna Chahe To Uske Aaina Tum Ho

Tumhi Batin Tumhi Zahir Tumhi Awwal Tumhi Aaqir
Niha Bhi Ho Ayaa Bhi Mubtada O Muntaha Tum Ho

Munawwar Kar Diya Hai Aap Ke Jalwo Ne Aalam Ko
Maho Khursheed Ko Baqshi Ziya Noor E Quda Tum Ho

Mita Di Kufr Ki Zulmat Tumhare Roo E Raushan Ne
Sawera Shirk Ka Tumne Kiya Shams O Duha Tum Ho

Jahan Taarik Tha Saara Andhera Hi Andhera Tha
Tum Aaye Zulmate Tumse Miti Badrudduja Tum Ho

Mera Mu Kya Ke Mai Madh O Sataish Me Zuba Kholoon
Mere Aqa Tum Aise Ke Mumdoohe Khuda Tum Ho

Rafa'na Se Tumhari Rifat E Baala Huwi Zahir
Ke Mehboob Bane Rab Me Sab Se Aali Martaba Tum Ho

Uloowe Rutba E Sarkaar E Aali Sab Pe Raushan Hai
Makeen E La Makaan Tum Ho Shahe Arshe Ula Tum Ho

Shabe Mearaj Se Ay Sayyide Kul Ho Gaya Zaahir
Rasool Hai Muqtadi Saare Imam Ul Ambiya Tum Ho

Na Hote Tum Na Hote Wo Ke Asle Jumla Tum Hi Ho
Qabar The Wo Tumhari Mere Maula Mubtada Tum Ho

Tumhare Chahne Wale Ko Kuch Aisi Mohabbat Hai
Udhar Ho Jae Wo Maula Jidhar Sadrul Wara Tum Ho

Tumhare Chahne Wale Use Mehboob Hai Saare
Kuch Is Andaaz Ke Pyaare Habeeb E Kibriya Tum Ho

Tumhare Baad Paida Ho Nabi Koyi Nahi Mumkin
Nubuvvat Khatam Hai Tum Par Ki Khatmul Ambiya Tum Ho

Ye Kya Maine Kiya Kyu Dhoond Dala Arsa E Mehshar
Hame Maloom Tha Pyaare Hamara Mud Da'aa Tum Ho

Magar Aisa Na Kyu Hota Ke Mehshar Me Ye Khulna Tha
Shafi E Mujrima Peshe Khuda Tanha Shaha Tum Ho

Giraftaar E Balaa Hazir Hue Hai Toote Dil Le Kar
Ki Har Bekal Ki Kal Toote Dilo Ka Aasra Tum Ho

Khabar Lije Khudara Mere Maula Mujh Se Bekas Ki
Ki Har Bekas Ke Kas Bebas Ke Bas Roohi Fida Tum Ho

Musallat Kardiya Tumko Khuda Ne Apne Ghaibo Par
Nabi E Mujtaba Tum Ho Rasool E Murtuza Tum Ho

Chamak Jaaye Dile Noori Tumhare Paak Jalwo Se
Mita Do Zulmat E Dil Ki Mere Noor Ul Huda Tum Ho

1: Kuch Aisa Kar De Mere Kirdgaar Aankho Me
2:
Kuch Aisa Kar De Mere Kirdgaar Aankho Me
Hamesha Naqsh Rahe Roo-E-Yaar Aankho Me

Unhe Na Dekha To Kis Kaam Ki Hai Ye Aankhe
Ke Dekhne Ki He Saari Bahaar Ankho Me

Ajab Nahi Ke Likha Lauh Ka Nazar Aaye
Jo Naqshe Paa Ka Laga’o Ghubaar Aankho Me

Basar Ke Saath Basirat Bhi Khub Roshan Hai,
Lagaoun Khake Qadam Baar Baar Aankhon Me.

Farishto Poochte Ho Mujh Se Kis Ki Ummat Ho
Lo Dekh Lo Ye Hai Tasweer-E-Yaar Aankho Me

Karam Ye Mujh Pe Kiya He Mere Tassawur Ne
Ke Aaj Khinch Di Tasweer-E-Yaar Aankho Me

Piyaa He Jaam-E-Muhabbat Jo Aap Ne Noori
Hamesha Us Ka Rahega Khumaar Aankho Me

Wo Noor De Mere Parwardigar Aankhon Me
Ki Jalwagar Rahe Rukh Ki Bahaar Aankhon Me

Tumhaare Qadmo Pe Moti Nisaar Hone Ko
Hain Be Shumaar Meri Ashkbaar Aankho Me

Nazar Me Kaise Samayenge Phool Jannat Ke
Ke Bus Chuke Hai Madine Ke Khaar Aankho Me

Khule Hain Deeda-E-Ushaaq Khwaabe Marg Me Bhi
Ke Us Nigaar Ka He Intizaar Aankho Me

Wo Subz Subz Nazar Aa Raha He Ghumbad-E-Subz
Qaraar Aa Gaya Yoo Be Qaraar Aankho Me

Ye Kya Sawaal He Mujh Se Ke Kis Ka Banda He
Me Jis Ka Banda Hoo He Noor Baar Aankho Me

Wahee Mujhe Nazar Aaye Jidhar Nigah Karu
Unhi Ka Jalwa Rahe Aash Kaar Aankho Me

Ye Dil Tarap Ke Kahee Aankho Me Na Aajaye
Ke Phir Rahaa Hai Kisi Ka Mazaar Aankho Me

Basa Huva Hai Koi Gul Azaar Aankhon Me,
Khila Hai Chaaron Taraf Lalazaar Aankhon Me.

Fir Aayen Din Mere Akhtar Shabe Huzuri Me,
Karam Se Jalwa Kare Jab Nigaar Aankhon Me.

Nigah E Mufti E Aazam Ki Hai Yeh Jalwahgiri,
Chamak Rahe Hai Jo Akhtar Hazaar Aankhon Me.

1: Kya Ajab Noor Ka Behta Hai Jo Darya Dil Me
2:
Kya Ajab Noor Ka Behta Hai Jo Darya Dil Me
Dil Hai Taiba Mein Mera Aur Hai Taiba Dil Me

Gham Ki Chaadar Jo Kabhi Odh Ke So Jaata Hoon
Jaagti Rehti Hai Aaqa Ki Tamanna Dil Me

Dil Isi Waaste Reh Reh Ke Dhadakta Hai Mera
Kyun Ke Rehte Hain Hamesha Mere Aaqa Dil Me

Us Ghari Meri Madad Karte Hain Mere Aaqa
Jab Bhi Ho Jaati Hai Uljhan Koi Paida Dil Me

Ek Ek Cheez Mujhe Sabz Nazar Aati Hai
Bas Gaya Jab Se Sakhi Gumbade Khazra Dil Me

1: Kya Hai Kisi Se Kaam Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad
2:
Kya Hai Kisi Se Kaam Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad
Sab Ko Mera Salaam Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

Koi Tabeeb Bhi Mera Karta Sada Ilaaj
Bas Aa Gaya Araam Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

Jalwa Kisi Ka Ho Ya Tajalli Kisi Ki Ho
Hai Dekhna Haraam Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

Jisko Bhi Tune Jaam E Muhabbat Pila Diya
Wo Kya Karega Jaam Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

Meri Raah E Hayaat Ke Dushwaar Marhale
Hal Ho Gaye Tamaam Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

Sajda Karun Toh Kufr Hai Na Sajda Karun Toh Kufr
Aaya Hai Woh Makaam Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

Sajda Jarun Ke Nakshe Kadam Choomta Rahun
Ghar Kaaba Bann Gaya Hai Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

Ham Aa Ke Tere Shehar Se Waapis Na Jaayenge
Yeh Faisla Kiya Hai Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

Lakhon Haseen Saamne Aaye Nigah Na Ki
Ankhon Ko See Liya Hai Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

Sajda Tha Sang E Dar Pe Tere Sar Tha Arsh Par
Aisi Padi Namaaz Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

Sajda Karunga Toh Mujhe Kaafir Kahenge Log
Yeh Kaun Sochta Hai Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

Mehmood Ka Ayaz Toh Bas Ek Hi Raha
Lakhon Banein Ayaz Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

Khoyi Hui Si Rehti Hai Har Waqt Ab Hi Na
Yeh Haal Ho Gaya Hai Tumhein Dekhne Ke Baad

*******************************************
************ Other Version ****************

Kese Sukoon Paon Tujhe Dekhne Ke Baad.
Ab Kia Ghazal Sunaon Tujhe Dekhne Ke Baad.

Awaaz De Rahi Hai Meri Zindagi Mujhe.
Main Jaon Ya Na Jaon Tujhe Dekhne Ke Baad.

Kaabay Ka Ehtaraam Bhi Meri Nazar Main Hai.
Sar Kis Taraf Jhukaon Tujhe Dekhne Ke Baad.

Teri Nigah-E-Mast Ne Makhmor Kar Dia.
Kia Mai-Kaday Ko Jaon Tujhe Dekhne Ke Baad.

Nazron Main Tab-E-Deed Hi Baqi Nahi Rahi.
Kis Se Nazar Milaon Tujhe Dekhne Ke Baad.

1: Kya Hi Muqaddar Wala Hai
2:
Kya Hi Muqaddar Wala Hai
Jo Unka Matwala Hai

Mera Kamli Wala Aaqa
Har Baala Se Baala Hai

Jalwae Qodrat Ka Parto
Har Soo Kamli Wala Hai

Mere Gale Me Ay Mere Aqaa
Tere Naam Ki Maala Hai

Mein Hoon Kamli Wale Kaa
Mera Kamli Wala Hai

Shaikhe Kareem Bacha Lijie
Aasi Doobne Wala Hai

1: Kya Hi Zauk Afza Shafaat Hain Tumhari Wah Wah
2:
Kya Hi Zauk Afza Shafa’at Hain Tumhari Wah Wah
Karz Leti Hain Gunah Parhezgari Wah Wah

Khama-E-Qudrat Ka Husn-E-Dastkaari Wah Wah
Kya Hi Tasveer Apne Pyare Ki Sawaari Wah Wah

Ashk Shab Bhar Intezar-E-Afwe Ummat Mein Bahe(N)
Main Fida Chaand Aur Yu Akhtar Shumari Wah Wah

Ungliya(N) Hain Faiz Par Toote Hain Pyase Jhoom Kar
Nadiya(N) Panj Aab E Rehmat Ki Hain Jaari Wah Wah

Noor Ki Khairaat Lene Daudte Hain Mehre Maah
Uthti Hain Kis Shaan Se Gard Sawaari Wah Wah

Neem Jalwe Ki Na Tab Aaye Qamar Saa To Sahi
Mehar Aur Un Talwo Ki Aaina Daari Wah Wah

Nafs Ye Kya Zulm Hain Jab Dekho Taaza Jurm Hain
Naatwa(N) Ke Sar Par Itni Bojh Bhari Wah Wah

Mujrimo Ko Dhundhti Phirte Hain Rehmat Ki Nigaah
Taaliye Bargashta Teri Saazgaari Wah Wah

Arz Begi Hain Shafa’at Afw Ki Sarkaar Mein
Chat Rahi Hain Mujrimo Ki Fard Saari Wah Wah

Kya Madine Me Saba Aayi Ki Phoolo Me Hain Aaj
Kuch Nayi Buu Bheeni-Bheeni Pyari-Pyari Wah Wah

Khud Rahe Parde Me Aur Aaina Akse Khaas Ka
Bhej Kar Anjaano Se Ki Rahdaari Wah Wah

Is Taraf Rouze Ka Noor Us Samt Mimbar Ki Bahaar
Beechme Jannat Ki Pyari Pyari Kyari Wah Wah

Sadqe Is In’aam Ke Qurbaan Us Ikraam Ke
Ho Rahi Hain Dono Aalam Me Tumhari Wah Wah

Para-E-Dil Bhi Na Nikla Dil Se Tohfe Me Raza
Un Sagane Ku Se Inti Jaan Pyari Wah Wah

1: Kya Khabar Kya Saza Mujko Milti
2:
Kya Khabar Kya Saza Mujko Milti
Mere Aqa Ne Izzat Bachali
Farde Isyaan Meri Mujse Le Kar
Kali Kamli Mein Apni Chhupali

Wo Ata Par Ata Karne Wale
Aur Ham Bhi Nahin Talne Wale
Jaisi Dewdi Hai Waise Bhikhari
Jaisa Data Hai Waise Sawali

Mein Gada Hun Magar Kiske Dar Ka
Wo Jo Sultan E Kauno Makan Hein
Ye Gulami Badi Mustanad Hai
Mere Sar Par Hai Taaje Bilali

Mein Madine Se Kya Aa Gaya Hun
Zindagi Jaise Buj Si Gayi Hai
Ghar Ke Andar Faza Suni Suni
Ghar Ke Bahar Sama Khali Khali

Meri Umar E Rawan Bas Thaher Jaa
Ab Safar Ki Zarurat Nahi Hai
Unke Kadmon Mein Meri Zabeen Hai
Aur Haathon Mein Roze Ki Jaali

Mein Fakat Naam Leva Hun Unka
Unki Tausif Mein Kya Karunga
Mein Na Iqbal Khusru Na Sa'di
Mein Na Kudsi Jaami Na Haali

Kya Khabar Kya Saza Mujko Milti
Mere Aqa Ne Izzat Bachali
Farde Isyaan Meri Mujse Le Kar
Kali Kamli Mein Apni Chhupali

1: Kya Mahekte Hain Mahekne Wale
2:
Kya Mahekte Hain Mahekne Wale
Boo Pe Chalte Hain Bhatakne Wale

Jagmaga Uthi Meri Gor Ki Khaak
Tere Qurbaan Chamakne Wale

Mahe Bedaag Ke Sadqe Jaaun
Yun Damakte Hain Damakne Wale

Arsh Tak Phaili Hai Taab E Aariz
Kya Jhalakte Hain Jhalakne Wale

Gul E Taiba Ki Sana Gaate Hain
Nakhl E Tooba Pe Chahekne Wale

Aasiyo! Thaam Lo Daaman Un Ka
Wo Nahin Haath Jhatakne Wale

Abr E Rehmat Ke Salaami Rehna
Phalte Hain Paude Lachakne Wale

Arey Ye Jalwa Gaahe Jaanan Hain
Kuch Adab Bhi Hain Phadakne Wale

Sunniyo! Un Se Madad Maange Jao
Pade Bakte Rehte Hain Bakne Wale

Sham'e Yaad E Rukh E Jaanan Na Bujhe
Khaaq Ho Jaaye Bhadakne Wale

Maut Kehti Hai Ke Jalwa Hai Qareeb
Ek Zaraa So Lein Bilakne Wale

Hum Bhi Khumhlaane Se Gaafil The Kabhi
Kya Hansa Gunche Chatakne Wale

Nakhl Se Chhutke Ye Kya Haal Huwa
Aah! O Patte Khadakne Wale

Jab Gire Munh Sooye Maikhana Tha
Hosh Mein Hai Ye Behekne Wale

Dekh O Zakhm E Dil Aape Ko Sambhal
Phoot Behte Hain Tapakne Wale

Mae Kahaan Aur Kahaan Main Zaahid
Yun Bhi To Chhakte Hain Chhakne Wale

Kaf E Dariya E Karam Mein Hai Raza
Paanch Fawware Chhalakne Wale

1: Kya Mojiza Hai Arsh Par Jaana Rasool Ka
2:
Kya Mojiza Hai Arsh Par Jaana Rasool Ka
Milkar Khuda Ki Zaat Se Aana Rasool Ka

Koi Karega Kya Bayaan Rutba Rasool Ka
Hai Saari Qainaat Me Charcha Rasool Ka

Ik Taazgi Utar Si Gayi Meri Rooh Mein
Mere Labon Pe Naam Jo Aaya Rasool Ka

Arzo Samaan Pe Isliye Hai Jashn Ka Samaa
Arahe Baree Pe Aaj Hai Jaana Rasool Ka

Meraj Par Bhi Bakhshishe Ummat Ki Fikr Thi
Ahsaan Ummati Pe Hai Kitna Rasool Ka

Meraj Par Bhi Bakhshishe Ummat Ki Fikr Thi
Ahsaan Ummati Pe Hai Kitna Rasool Ka

Roohul Ameen Se Poochiye Chooma Tha Aap Ne
Kitna Haseen Tha Paao Ka Talwa Rasool Ka

Aasif Use Ho Maut Ki Sakhti Ka Khauf Kyu
Jiski Nazar Ke Saamne Ho Chehra Rasool Ka

1: Kya Theek Ho Rukhe Nabavi Par Misaale Gul
2:
Kya Theek Ho Rukhe Nabavi Par Misaale Gul
Pamale Jalwaye Kafe Paa Hai Jamaale Gul

Jannat Hai Unke Jalwe Se Jooyaae Rango Boo
Aye Gul Humare Gul Se Hai Gul Ko Sawaale Gul

Unke Qadam Se Sil’aye Ghaali Hui Jinaa(N)
Wallah Mere Gul Se Hai Jaaho Jalaale Gul

Sunta Hu Ishqe Shah Me Dil Hoga Khoo(N) Fishaa(N)
Ya Rab Ye Muzda Sach Ho Mubarak Ho Faale Gul

Bulbul Haram Ko Chal Ghame Faani Se Faaeda
Kab Tak Kahegi Haaye Woh Gunjo Dalaale Gul

Ghamgee(N) Hai Shauqe Gaazaye Khaake Madina Me
Shabnam Se Dhul Sakegi Na Garde Malaale Gul

Bulbul Ye Kya Kaha Main Kaha(N) Fasle Gul Kaha(N)
Ummeed Rakh Ki Aam Hai Joodo Nawaale Gul

Bulbul! Ghira Hai Abre Wilaa Muzda Ho Ki Ab
Girti Hai Aashiyane Pe Barqe Jamaale Gul

Ya Rab Hara Bhara Rahe Daage Jigar Ka Baag
Har Mah Mahe Bahaar Ho Har Saal Saale Gul

Range Muzah Se Karke Khajil Yaade Shah Me
Kheencha Hai Hum Ne Kaanto(N) Pe Itre Jamaale Gul

Main Yaad E Shah Me Rou(N) Anadil Kare(N) Hujoom
Har Ashq Laala-Faam Pe Ho Ahtimaale Gul

Hai Akse Chehra Se Labe Gulgoo(N) Me Surkhiya(N)
Dooba Hai Badre Gul Se Shafaq Me Hilaale Gul

Naate Huzoor Mein Mutarannam Hai Andaleeb
Shaakho(N) Ke Jhoomne Se Ayaa(N) Wajdo Haale Gul

Bulbul Gule Madina Humesha Bahaar Hai
Dondin Ki Hai Bahaar Fana Hai Ma-Aale Gul

Shaikhain Idhar Nisaar, Ganiyyo(N) Ali Udhar
Guncha Hai Bulbulo(N) Ka Yameeno Shimaale Gul

Chahe Khuda To Paaenge Ishqe Nabi Me Khuld
Nikli Hai Naamaye Dile Pur Khoo(N) Mein Faale Gul

Kar Uski Yaad Jisse Mile Chain Andaleeb
Dekha Nahi Ki Khaare Alam Hai Khayaale Gul

Dekha Tha Khwaabe Khaare Haram Andaleeb Ne
Khatka Kiya Hai Aankh Mein Shab Bhar Khyaale Gul

Un Do Ka Sadqa Jinko Kaha Mere Phool Hai
Kije Raza Ko Hashr Mein Khanda(N) Misaale Gul

1: Laa Makan Se Bhi Aage Jiski Shaane Rifat Hai
2:
Laa Makan Se Bhi Aage
Jiski Shaane Rif'at Hai
Woh Nabiye Bar Haq Hai
Raaz Dare Wahdat Hai

Deobandi Kehata Hai
Jashne Noor Bid’at Hai
Aur Hum Ye Kehte Hai
Ain Rab Ki Sunnat Hai

Qaynaat Ki Har Shaye
Jiskey Noor Se Paida
Woh Muhammade Arbi
Sayyede Risaalat Hai

Jitna Ham Ko Rokoge
Uthna Hi Manayenge
Jashne Noor Aye Shaita(N)
Sunni Ki Alamat Hai

Bolta Hua Quran
Ham Ali Ko Kehate Hai
Zulfikare Haidar Ki
Do Jahaa Mey Shourat Hai

Khoon Dey Key Sichha Hai
Jisne Deene Ahmed Ko
Woh Hussaine Azam Hai
Sayyede Shahadat Hai

Ham Ko Makre Shaita(N) Ki
Fiqar Kya Ho Gam Kyun Ho
Hampe Gause Azam Ki
Jab Nigahe Rehmat Ho

Hamne Kas Key Pakda Hai
Apne Khawja Ka Daman
Saare Hind Par Jinki
Baatini Hukumat Hai

Sayyeda Hai Maa Meri
Baap Hai Ali Mere
Noor Key Gharane Se
Mujko Noori Nisabat Hai

Tumko Nazmi Nisabat Hai
Ahle Baite Aqdas Se
Jinki Shaan Ki Mazahar
Aayaye Taharath Hai

Jalta Hai Wahabi Jo
Jashne Noor Se Nazmi
Jalna Tho Hamesha Se
Uski Phooti Kismat Hai

1: Lab Pe Jaari Sadaa Kardo Aaqa Karam
2:
Lab Pe Jaari Sadaa Kardo Aaqa Karam
Lab Pe Jaari Sadaa Kardo Aaqa Karam

Dar Pe Pohcha To Dil Ney Kaha Barmalaa
Ma’af Ho Sab Khataa Kardo Aaqa Karam

Kis Ki Jaanib Chaloon Kis Ka Moonh Main Takoon
Chor Kar Dar Tera Kardo Aaqa Karam

Aap Haazir Bhi Hain Aap Naazir Bhi Hain
Yak Nazar Soo E Maa Kardo Aaqa Karam

Marz E Isyaan Sey Ab To Mey Choor Huwa
Deydo Kaamil Shifa Kardo Aaqa Karam

Kaun Deyta Hai Deyney Ko Moonh Chaahiye
Haath Phailaa Diya Kardo Aaqa Karam

Saa-Il E Dar Huwa Shakir E Bey Nawaa
‘ilm E Naaf’e ‘ataa Kardo Aaqa Karam

Jaaliyon Key Qareeb Shakir E Khush Naseeb
Aankh Kardee Hain Nam Kardo Aaqa Karam

1: Lab Pe Naate Paak Ka Naghma
2:
Lab Pe Naate Paak Ka Naghma Kal Bhi Ta Aur Aaj Bhi Hai
Meri Nabi Se Mera Rishta Kal Bhi Ta Aur Aaj Bhi Hai

Past Who Kaise Hosakta Hai Jis Ko Haqq Ne Buland Kiya
Dono Jahan Me Un Ka Charcha Kal Bhi Ta Aur Aaj Bhi Hai

Aur Kissi Jaanib Kyu Jaae Aur Kissi Ko Kyu Dekhe
Apna Sub Kuch Ghumbade Khazra Kal Bhi Ta Aur Aaj Bhi Hai

Fikr Nahein Hai Hum Ko Kuch Bhi Dukh Ki Dhoop Ghari To Kya
Hum Par Unke Fazl Ka Saaya Kal Bhi Ta Aur Aaj Bhi Hai

Batla Do Ghustaaq-E-Nabi Ko Ghairat Muslim Zinda Ho
Deen Pe Mar Mitne Ka Jazba Kal Bhi Ta Aur Aaj Bhi Hai

In Ke Dar Se Sub Ho Aaye Jaana Saka To Ek Sabhi
Ye Ke Ekh Tasweer Tamanna Kal Bhi Ta Aur Aaj Bhi Hai

1: Lagiyan Ne Mojan Honr Laayi Rakh Soniya
2:
Lagiyan Ne Mojan Honr Laayi Rakh Soniya
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Aaqa De Gulaman Da Main Adna Ghulam Aan
Loki Kehnde Khas Main Te Amaan Tu Wii Aam Aaan
Parda Je Paaya Hai Te Paayi Rakhin Sohniya
Changay Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Lagiyan Ne Mojan Hun Laayi Rakh Soniya
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Hashr Dihare Jaddon Amlan To Tolran
Sharm De Maare Main Tay Kujh Wii Nayi Bolna
Damin Wich Apnay, Chupayi Rakhin Soniya
Change Aan Ke Manday Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Lagiyan Ne Mojan Honr Laayi Rakh Soniya
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Kisay Nu Main Apna Dukhra Sunaya Nayi
Tere Baajon Kisse Meno Seene Naal Laaya Nayi
Seene Naal Laaya Aey Te Laaye Rakhin Sohnya
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Lagiyan Ne Mojan Honr Laayi Rakh Soniya
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Naa’m Tera Le Ke Aaqa, Shaan Main Wii Payi Aay
Teray Haath Dor Sanyaan Apay Tu Charhai Aay
Charhi Hui Guddi Nu Charhai Rakhein Sohnaya
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Lagiyan Ne Mojan Honr Laayi Rakh Soniya
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Ziya Teri Aal Da Banya Ghulam Aey
Aeday Naloon Aur Lena Ki Inam Aey
Banya Ghulam Hai Banayi Rakhein Sohnaya
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Lagiyan Ne Mojan Honr Laayi Rakh Soniya
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Naa Tera Leyke Aaqa, Ghulaam Sarey Sajey Nay,
Kasam Khuda Dee Tusan Aib Saarey Kajey Nay,
Lukkay Huey Aiban Nu Lukayi Rajhi Soniya,
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Lagiyan Ne Mojan Honr Laayi Rakh Soniya
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Zia O Diyaal Da, Baniya Ghulaam Mein,
Ehdey Naalo Wad Aur Leyna Ki Naam Aey,
Bharya Ghulaam Tey, Bharayi Rakhi Soniya,
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

Lagiyan Ne Mojan Honr Laayi Rakh Soniya
Change Aan Ke Mande Aan Nibhayi Rakhin Soniya

1: Lahad Mein Ishqe Rukhe Shah Ka Daagh Le Ke Chale
2:
Lahad Mein Ishqe Rukhe Shah Ka Daagh Le Ke Chale
Andheri Raat Suni Thi Chiraagh Le Ke Chale

Tere Ghulamon Ka Naqshe Qadam Hai Raahe Khuda
Woh Kya Behak Sake Jo Yeh Suraagh Le Ke Chale

Jinaa(N) Banegi Muhibbaane Chaar Yaar Ki Qabr
Jo Apne Seene Mein Yeh Chaar Baagh Le Ke Chale

Gaye, Ziyaarate Dar Ki, Sad Aah Waapas Aaye
Nazar Ke Ashk Puche Dil Ka Daagh Le Ke Chale

Madina Jaane Jinaano Jahaa(N) Hai Woh Sun Le
Jinhe Junoone Jinaa(N) Suye Jaagh Le Ke Chale

Tere Sahaabe Sukhan Se Na Nam Ki Nam Se Bhi Kam
Baleegh Bahre Balaaghat Balaagh Le Ke Chale

Huzoore Taiba Se Bhi Koi Kaam Badh Kar Hai
Ki Jhoote Heelaye Makro Faraagh Le Ke Chale

Tumhare Wasfe Jamaalo Kamaal Mein Jibreel
Muhaal Hai Ki Majaalo Masaagh Le Ke Chale

Gilaa Nahi Hai Mureede Rasheede Shaitaan Se
Ki Us Ke Wus'ate Ilmi Ka Laagh Le Ke Chale

Har Ek Apne Bade Ki Badaayi Karta Hai
Har Ek Mugbacha Mug Ka Ka Ayaagh Le Ke Chale

Magar Khuda Pe Jo Dhabba Darogh Ka Thopa
Ye Kis Laee(N) Ki Ghulami Ka Daagh Le Ke Chale

Wuquye Kizb Ke Maa'ni Durust Aur Quddoos
Hiye Ki Foote Ajab Sabz Baagh Le Ke Chale

Jahaa(N) Mein Koi Bhi Kaafir Sa Kaafir Aisa Hai
Ki Apne Rab Pe Safaahat Ka Daagh Le Ke Chale

Padi Hai Andhe Ko Aadat Ki Shorbe Hi Se Khaaye
Bater Haath Na Aayi To Zaagh Le Ke Chale

Khabees Bahre Khabeesa Khabeesa Bahre Khabees
Ki Saath Jins Ko Baazo Kulaagh Le Ke Chale

Jo Deen Kawwo(N) Ko De Baithe Un Ko Yaksaa(N) Hai
Kulaagh Le Ke Chale Ya Ulaagh Le Ke Chale

Raza Kisi Sage Taiba Ke Paau Bhi Chume
Tum Aur Aah Ki Itna Dimaagh Le Ke Chale

1: Lajpaala Mereya Saiyaan
2:
Lajpaala Mereya Saiyaan
Tere Naal Baharaan Aiyaan

Tera Sadqa Mast Nazaare
Tere Noor To Chamkan Taare
Tere Naal Ne Sab Roshnaiyaan
Lajpaala Mereya Saiyaan
Tere Naal Baharaan Aiyaan

Lajpaala Mereya Saiyaan
Tere Naal Baharaan Aiyaan

Tu Menu Sohneya Rangeyaa
Main Jinni Waar Wi Mangeyaa
Tu Khayraan Jholi Paiyaan
Lajpaala Mereya Saiyaan
Tere Naal Baharaan Aiyaan

Lajpaala Mereya Saiyaan
Tere Naal Baharaan Aiyaan

Eho Kehnde Ne Aashiq Saare
Tere Warge Laal Pyaare
Kaddon Jammdiyan Ne Nit Maiyaan
Lajpaala Mereya Saiyaan
Tere Naal Baharaan Aiyaan

Lajpaala Mereya Saiyaan
Tere Naal Baharaan Aiyaan

Kaddi Turrda Te Kaddi Rukda
Chand Badlaan Ohle Lukda
Tere Mukh Diyan Wekh Safaiyaan
Lajpaala Mereya Saiyaan
Tere Naal Baharaan Aiyaan

Lajpaala Mereya Saiyaan
Tere Naal Baharaan Aiyaan

Tu Kita Karam Kareemaa
Tenu Lay Gayi Naal Halima
Hath Maldiyaan Reh Gaiyan Daiyaan
Lajpaala Mereya Saiyaan
Tere Naal Baharaan Aiyaan

Lajpaala Mereya Saiyaan
Tere Naal Baharaan Aiyaan

Har Ghaus, Abdaal, Qutub Nu
Dainda Ay Maula Sab Nu
Tere Aal Da Sadqa Saiyaan
