1: Lajpal Nabi Mere Darda Di Dawa Dena
2:
Lajpal Nabi Mere
Darda Di Dawa Dena
Jad Waqt E Nazaa Aave
Daaman Di Hawa Dena

Mai Naat Teri Padna
Mai Zikr Tera Karna
Is Zikr Di Barkat Naal
Meri Qabr Wasa Dena

Dil Ronda Hai Jandene
Jad Lok Madine Nu
Hun Saanu Vi Yaa Aaqa
Darbaar Dikha Dena

Sarkaar Di Mehfil Vich
Jholiyan Bicha Baithe
Laj Rakh Laive Lajpaala
Khali Na Utha Dena

Mare Chaliya Ve Ro Ro Ke
Wich Hijr De Mehbooba
Hun Saanu Vi Ya Aaqa
Dedaar Kara Dena

Saaim Di Tamanna Hai
Rawe Aake Madine Vich
Paawe Taibe De Kutteyan De
Pairanch Bitha Dena

Khairat Ata Karna,
Sarkar Di Marzi Aay.
Mera Tay Si Kam Mangna,
Jholi Nu Wicha Dena.

Aasi Di Tamanna Aay,
Rahwe Aake Madiney Wich.
Bhawe Taiba De Kutteyan De,
Qadmaan Wich Bitha Dena.

1: Lam Ya’ati Naziro Kafi Nazrin
2:
Lam Ya’ati Naziro Kafi Nazrin,
Misle To Na Shud Paida Jaana.
Jag Raaj Ko Taaj Torey Sar So,
Hai Tujh Ko Shahey Do Sara Jaana.

Ana Fi Atshiv Wa Sakha Ka Atam,
Aey Gesu-Aey Paak, Aey Abr E Karam,
Barsan Haare Rimjhim, Rimjhim,
Do Boond Idhar Bhi Gira Jaana.

Al Bahro Alaa Wal Mavjo Tagha,
Man Bekaso Tufaan Hosh Ruba,
Manjdhaar Mein Houn Bigri Hai Hawaa,
Mori Nayya Paar Laga Jaana.

Ar Rooho Fida Ka Fazid Harka,
Yak Shola Digar Barzan Ishqa,
Mora Tan, Man, Dhan, Sab Phoonk Diya,
Yeh Jaan Bhi Pyaare Jala Jaana.

Al Qalbo Shyjivm Wal Hamo Shujut,
Dil Dar Chuna Jaan Zer Chuno,
Pat Apni Bhi Pat Mein Kaaisay Kahoun,
Mera Koun Hai Teray Siva Jaana.

Bas Khaama-Aey Khaam Nawaaey Raza,
Na Yeh Taraz Meri Na Yeh Rang Mera,
Irshaade Ahibba Na’atik Tha,
Nachaar Is Raah Para Jaana.

Subhan Allah Ma Ajmala Ka,
Ma Ahsaana Ka, Ma Akmala Ka,
Kithay Mehr-E-Ali Kithay Teri Sana,
Gustaakh Akhiyan Kithay Ja Ariyan.

Ya Shamso Nazrate Ila Layli,
Chun Ba Tai’bah Rasi Arze Ba Kuni,
Tori Jyot Ki Jhal, Jhal Jag Mein Rachi,
Meri Shab Ne Na Din Hona Jaana.

Laka Badrun Fil Wajhil Ajmal,
Khat Haaley Maah Zulf Abre Ajal,
Tore Chandan Chandra Par Kundal,
Rehmat Ki Bharan Barsa Jaana.

Ya Kaafelati Zidi Ajalak,
Rahme Bar Hasrate Tishna Labak,
Mora Jiyera Larje Dharak, Dharak,
Tai’bah Se Abhi Na Suna Jaana.

Waahan Li Suway’aatin Zahabat
Aa Ahde Huzoor Baar Gahat
Jab Yaad Aawat Mohe Karna Parat
Dardaawah Madeene Kaa Jaanaa

1: Likh Raha Hoon Naate Sarwar Sabz Gumbad Dekh Kar
2:
Likh Raha Hoon Naate Sarwar Sabz Gumbad Dekh Kar
Kaif Taari Hai Qalam Par Sabz Gumbad Dekh Kar

Hai Muqaddar Yaawri Par Sabz Gumbad Dekh Kar
Phir Na Kyun Jhoome Sanaagar Sabz Gumbad Dekh Kar

Masjide Nabwi Pe Pohonche Marhaba Salle Ala
Ho Gaya Jaari Zubaan Par Sabz Gumbad Dekh Kar

Aap Ki Galiyon Ke Mangte Mujh Se To Ache Rahe
Hai Sakoon Unko Mayassar Sabz Gumbad Dekh Kar

Aap Se Bus Aap Hi Ko Maangta Hai Ya Nabi
Aap Ka Adna Gadagar Sabz Gumbad Dekh Kar

Dhoop Rozaana Madina Choomti Hai Jhoom Kar
Aur Lipat Jaati Hai Jaakar Sabz Gumbad Dekh Kar

Aah! Aye Attar Tujhse Itna Bhi Na Ho Saka
Jaan Kar Deta Nichawar Sabz Gumbad Dekh Kar

1: Likha Hai Ek Zaifa Thi Ke Jo Mekkah Me Rahti Thi
2:
Likha Hai Ek Zaifa Thi Ke Jo Mekkah Me Rahti Thi
Wo In Baton Ko Sunti Thi Magar Khamosh Rahti Thi
Wo Sunti Thi Muhammad Hai Koi Hashim Gharane Me
Wo Kahta Hai Khuda Bas Ek Hai Sare Zamane Me

Wo Sunti Thi Hubul Ki Laat Ki Tazleel Karta Hai
Wo Apne Haq Ke Farmane Ki Yun Tameel Karta Hai
Wo Sunti Thi Jo Uske Saath Hai Wo Hai Ghulam Uska
Musalman Ho Hi Jata Hai Jo Sunta Hai Kalaam Uska

Likha Hai Wo Zaifa Ek Din Kaaba Me Jaa Pahunchi
Hubul Ke Paaon Par Sar Rakh Ke Usne Ye Dua Mangi
Main Tujh Ko Poojti Hun Aur Khuda Bhi Tujh Ko Kahti Hun
Bara Afsos Hai Jo Aaj Kal Main Ranj Sahti Hun

Wo Gham Ye Hai Muhammad Hai Koi Hashim Gharane Me
Wo Kahta Hai Khuda Bas Ek Hai Saare Zamane Me
Mita Do Uski Hasti Ko Na Le Phir Koi Naam Uska
Jigar Chhalni Hua Jata Hai Sun Sun Kar Kalam Uska

Dua Karke Uthi Sajde Se Aur Wo Apne Ghar Ayi
Samajhti Thi Ye Dil Me Ab Meri Ummeed Bhar Ayi
Zaifa Ko Khushi Thi Ab Hubul Bijli Gira Dega
Muhammad To Muhammad Saathiyon Ko Bhi Mita Dega

Magar Kuchh Din Guzarne Per Na Jab Ummeed Bhar Ayi
Dua Karke Hubul Se Apne Dil Me Khoob Pachhtayi
Garaz Tarqeeb Usne Soch Lee Ye Khud Hi Ghar Aa Kar
Ke Chhorungi Ye Basti Mai Rahungi Aur Kahin Ja Kar

Garaz Ek Din Subah Ko Usne Apni Ek Gathri Lee
Nikal Kar Ghar Se Apne Aur Darwaze Pe Aa Baithi
Zaifa Sochti Thi Ab Koi Mazdoor Milta Hai
Use Yeh Kya Khaber Thi Ek Khuda Ka Noor Milta Hai

Fareeza Subah Ka Karke Ada Sarkar Do Aalam
Chale Jaate The Kaaba Ki Taraf Wo Rahmat-E-Alam
Jalon Me Aap Ke Shams-O-Qamar Maloom Hote The
Paye Tasleem Sajde Me Shajar Maloom Hote The

Zaifa Muntazir Mazdoor Ki Baithi Thi Ghabrayi
Yakayak Samne Se Chaand Si Surat Nazar Ayi
Zaifa Ne Kaha Beta Yahan Aana Bata Kya Naam Hai Tera
Kaha Mazdoor Hoon Amma Bata Kya Kaam Hai Tera

Kaha Mazdoor Hai Agar Tu To Chal Gathri Meri Lekar
Main Khush Kar Dungi Aye Mazdoor Mazdoori Teri Dekar
Ye Sun Kar Aapne Gathri Utha Kar Apne Sar Par Li
Zaifon Ki Madad Karna Ye Aadat Thi Payamber Ki

Garaz Gathri Ko Lekar Manzil-E-Maqsood Par Ayi
Kaha Dil Se Ke Aye Dil Ab Teri Ummed Bhar Aayi
Kaha Beta Jo Thi Dil Me Tamanna Ho Gayi Puri
Muhammad To Muhammad Sathiyon Se Ho Gayi Doori

Lagi Dene Jo Mazdoori Zaifa Aap Ko Us Dam
To Farmane Lage Us Dam Huzur-E-Sarwar-E-Aalam
Ye Koi Kaam Hai Amma Mai Lun Ab Jiski Mazdoori
Koi Agar Our Khidmat Ho To Wo Bhi Main Karun Poori

Ye Farmate Huye Ki Aapne Jane Ke Tayyari
Zaifa Se Ijazat Chahate Then Rahmat-E-Baari
Zaifa Ne Kaha Beta Zara Thahro Chale Jaana
Mujhe Ek Baat Kahni Hai Zara Sun Kar Chale Jaana

Yaqeen Jaano Ki Ab Makkah Me Jhagra Hone Wala Hai
Main Samjhati Hun Tujh Ko Isliye Tu Bhola Bhala Hai
Wo Makke Me Qabeela Hashmi Naam-O-Laqab Wale
Wohi Beta Jo Hain Sardar Abdul Muttalib Wale

Unhi Me Ek Jawan Hai Jo Suna Jaata Hai Saahir Hai
Ke Is Fan Me Magar Beta Wo Apne Khoob Mahir Hai
Wo Asar Hota Hai Jiske Dil Tukhm-E-Ulfat Bo Ke Rahta Hai
Jo Sunta Hai Kalam Uska Wo Uska Hoke Rahta Hai

Hamesha Bach Ke Chalna Usse Bole Koi Naam Uska
Naseehat Hai Yehi Meri Na Sunna Tu Kalam Uska
Nabi Budhiya Ke Dil Me Noor-E-Wahdat Bharne Wale Then
Naseehat Sun Rahe Then Jo Naseehat Karne Wale Then

Zaifa Ne Kaha, ‘beta Bhala Kya Naam Hai Tera’
Tera Aaghaz Kya Hai Aur Kya Anjaam Hai Tera
Kaha Hazrat Ne Budhiya Se, ‘tujhe Kya Naam Batlaun’
Main Kya Kaam Batlaun, Main Kya Anjaam Batlaaun

Main Banda Hun Khuda Ka Aur Mujassam Noor-E-Zad Hoon
Kaha Gardan Jhuka Kar Aapne, ‘mai Hi Muhammed Hun’
Main Hoon Maasoom Duniya Me Mera Dushman Zamana Hai
Khuda Waahid Hai Aalam Me Mujhe Bas Ye Batana Hai

Ye Sunna Tha Ke Bas Aakhon Se Aansu Ho Gaye Jaari
Nabi Ke Ishq Ki Ek Chot Si Dil Per Lagi Kaari
Zaifa Ne Kaha Beta Karo Mushkil Meri Aasan
Mai Aisi Jeet Ke Sadqe Me Aisi Haar Ke Qurban

Hua Phir Haal Par Uske Jo Fazle Eezan-E-Baari
Zaifa Ke Zubaan Se Khud Ba Khud Kalma Hua Jari
Laailaha Illallah Muhammadur Rasululah
Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam

1: Lillah Ab Kardo Karam
2:
Lillah Ab Kardo Karam
Lillah Ab Kardo Karam
Sadqa Hasnayn Ka Do,
Warna Mar Jaeinge Ham

Lillah Ab Kardo Karam
Lillah Ab Kardo Karam

Aey Sarwar E Deen Aap Sa Koi Haseen
Aey Sarwar E Deen Aap Sa Koi Nahin
Dono Aalam Mein Nahi,
Husn E Yusuf Ki Qasam

Lillah Ab Kardo Karam
Lillah Ab Kardo Karam

Chah Gaey Ab Abre Karam
Ho Geya Khatam E Sitam
Mitt Gaey Ranj O Alam
Aa Gaey Shah E Umam

Lillah Ab Kardo Karam
Lillah Ab Kardo Karam

Chand Mein Jo Hai Chamak
Phool Mein Jo Hai Mahak
Aur Yeh Rang E Dhanak
Sab Hai Muhtaj E Karam

Lillah Ab Kardo Karam
Lillah Ab Kardo Karam

Aaey Din Phir Se Bhale
Qaafile Taiba Chale
Sab Gaey, Reh Gaey Ham
Jaane Kab Hoga Karam

Lillah Ab Kardo Karam
Lillah Ab Kardo Karam

Chor Kar Aap Ka Dar
Jaein Sarkar Kidar
Sadqa Hasnayn Ka Do,
Warna Mar Jaeinge Ham

Lillah Ab Kardo Karam
Lillah Ab Kardo Karam

Aya Sidrah Ka Maqam,
Bola Aqa Se Ghulam
Aage Bhar Sakta Nahi
Tere Qadmon Ki Qasam

Lillah Ab Kardo Karam
Lillah Ab Kardo Karam

Jo Hai Nabiyon Ka Nabi
Hashmi Mutalabi
Ik To Rakhega Wohi,
Mujh Kamine Ka Bharam

Lillah Ab Kardo Karam

1: Lo Jhoom Ke Naam Muhammad Ka
2:
Lo Jhoom Ke Naam Muhammad Ka
Is Naam Se Raahat Hoti Hai
Is Naam Ke Sadqe Baithe Hain
Is Naam Se Barkat Hoti Hai

Ye Shaane Karam Allahu Ghani
Allah Ka Diya Dete Hain Nabi
Deke To Sadaa De Kar Koi
Har Cheez Inaayat Hoti Hai

Mausam To Badalte Rehte Hain
Armaan Machalte Rehte Hain
Dekhe Kis Waqt Madine Mein
Jaane Ki Soorat Hoti Hai

Naaton Ke Sajaate Hain Gajre
Padte Hain Salaamon Ke Naghme
Koi Maane Maane Na Maane
Apni To Ibaadat Hoti Hai

Khush Bakht Musaafir Taiba Ke
Ho Saamne Jab Darbaare Nabi
Yoon Dekho Gumbad Ko Jaise
Quran Ki Tilaawat Hoti Hai

Apne Dukh Dard Museebat Mein
Dunya Mein Hazaaron Rote Hain
Jo Yaade Nabi Mein Askh Gire
Us Ashk Ki Qeemat Hoti Hai

Apne To Niyaazi Apne Hain
Ghairon Ne Bhi Hum Se Pyaar Kiya
Sab Name Nabi Ka Sadqa Hai
Apni Jo Izzat Hoti Hai

1: Lokan De Zamane Te Dildar
2:
Lokan De Zamane Te Dildar Batere Ne
Sarkar Di Son Sanu Sarkar Batere Ne

Sarkar De Ik Dam Ne Jannat Wich Le Jana
Ki Hoya Je Mere Jaye Gunahgar Batere Ne

Hasnayn Da Hara De Sarkar Huni Ao
Is Mehfil Wich Baithe Bimaar Batere Ne

Jis Waqt Khuda Kehna Mang Lo Jo Wi Mangna
Mushtaq Main Keh Dena Sarkar Batere Ne

Ik Tu Hi Te Nai Nasir Sarkar Da Mastana
Tere Jaye Sohne De Mehkhwar Bathere Ne

1: Lou Madine Ki Tajalli Se Lagaye Huye Hain
2:
Lou Madine Ki Tajalli Se Lagaye Huye Hain
Dil Ko Hum Matla E Anwaar Banaye Huye Hain

Kashtiya Apni Kinaare Se Lagaye Huye Hain
Wo Kya Doobe Jo Muhammad Ki Tiraye Huye Hain

Sharm E Isyaan Se Nahi Saamne Jaaya Jaata
Ye Bhi Kya Kam Hai Tere Shehar Mein Aaye Huye Hain

Ik Jhalak Aaj Dikha Ghumbad E Khazra Ke Makee
Kuch Bhi Hain Door Se Deedar Ko Aaye Huye Hain

Qabr Ki Neend Se Uthna Koyi Aasaan Na Tha
Hum To Mehshar Mein Unhe Dekhne Aaye Huye Hain

Naam Aate Hi Abu Bakro Umar Ka Lab Par
Kyu Bigadta Hai Wo Pehlu Mein Sulaye Huye Hain

Haazir O Naazir O Noor O Bashar O Ghaib Ko Chor
Shukr Kar Wo Tere Aybo Ko Chupaye Huye Hain

Kyu Na Palla Tere A'amal Ka Bhari Ho Naseer
Ab To Meezan Pe Sarkaar Bhi Aaye Huye Hain

1: Lutf Unka Aam Ho Hi Jayega
2:
Lutf Unka Aam Ho Hi Jayega
Shaad Har Nakaam Ho Hi Jayega

Jaan De Do Wa'ada E Deedar Par
Naqd Apna Daam Ho Hi Jayega

Shaad Hai Firdous Yani Ek Din
Qismat E Khuddam Ho Hi Jayega

Yaad Reh Jayengi Ye Be-Baakiya
Nafs Tu To Raam Ho Hi Jayega

Be Nishano Ka Nishaan Mit-Ta Nahi
Mit-Te Mit-Te Naam Ho Hi Jayega

Yaad E Ghesu Zikr E Haq Aah Kar
Dil Me Paida Laam Ho Hi Jayega

Ek Din Aawaz Badlenge Ye Saaz
Chah-Chaha Kohram Ho Hi Jayega

Sailo Daaman Sakhee Ka Thaam Lo
Kuch Na Kuch In'aam Ho Hi Jayega

Yaad E Aabru Karke Tadpe Bulbulo
Tukde Tukde Daam Ho Hi Jayega

Mufliso Unki Gali Me Jaa Pado
Baagh E Khuld Ikraam Ho Hi Jayega

Gar Yuhi Rehmat Ki Taawile Rahi
Madh(A) Har Ilzaam Ho Hi Jayega

Baada Khwari Ka Samaa Bandhne To Do
Shaikh Durd-Aasham Ho Hi Jayega

Gham To Unko Bhulkar Lipta Hai Yu(N)
Jaise Apna Kaam Ho Hi Jayega

Mit Ki Gar Yuhi Raha Karz E Hayaat
Jaan Ka Nilaam Ho Hi Jayega

Aaqilo Un Ki Nazar Seedhi Rahe
Borwo Ka Bhi Kaam Ho Hi Jayega

Ab To Layi Hai Shafa'at Afw Par
Badhte Badhte Aam Ho Hi Jayega

Ay Raza Har Kaam Ka Ik Waqt Hai
Dil Ko Bhi Aaram Ho Hi Jayega

1: Maah E Rabi Ul Awwal Aaya
2:
Maah E Rabi Ul Awwal Aaya
Rabb Ki Rehmat Saath Me Laaya

Peer Ka Din Tareekh Hai Baarah
Farsh Pe Chamka Arsh Ka Taara

Aaj Ki Raat Baraat Rachi Hai
Aamena Ke Ghar Dhoom Machi Hai

Ghar Me Hoore Darr Pe Malak Hai
Jinke Qatare Ta-B-Falak Hai

Thandi Hawa Ka Jhonka Aaya
Shour Macha Ik Salle Alaa Ka

Lo Ab Uthi Gard E Savari
Paide Hue Mehboob E Baari

Rehmat E Aalam Noor E Mujassam
Sallallahu Alaihe Wasallam

Tum Bhi Utho Ab Waqt E Adab Hai
Zikre Wiladat Shahe Arab Hai

Takht Hai Unka Taaj Hai Unka
Dono Jahan Pe Raaj Hai Unka

Jinno Malak Hai Unke Sipahi
Rab Ki Khudai Me Inshahi

Unche Unche Yaha Jhukte Hai
Saare Unhi Ka Muh Takte Hai

Shaho Gada Hai Unke Sawaali
Fakhr Hai Sabko Inki Ghulami

Kaabe Ki Zeenat Inhi Ke Dam Se
Taibah Ki Rounak Inke Qadam Se

Kaaba Ki Kya Saare Jaha(N) Me
Dhoom Machi Hai Kono Makaa(N) Me

Aamena Bi Ko La'al Mubarak
Daayi Haleema Ko Baal Mubarak

Tumko Khaleelullah Mubarak

1: Mawlaya Salli Wassalim (Maher Zain)
2:
Mawlaya Salli Wassalim Da’iman Abadan

Salawatu Allahi ‘aleeh

All The Poetry Ever Written
Every Verse And Every Line
All The Love Songs In The World
Every Melody And Rhyme
If They Were Combined
They Would Still Be Unable To Express
What I Want To Define
When I Try To Describe My Love For You

Chorus

Every Sound And Every Voice
In Every Language Ever Heard
Each Drop Of Ink That Has Been Used
To Write Every Single Word
They Could Never Portray
Everything I Feel In My Heart And Want To Say
And It’s Hard To Explain
Why I Could Never Describe My Love For You

Chorus

There’s Not A Single Person
Who Can Ever Match His Worth
In Character And Beauty
To Ever Walk On Earth
I Envy Every Rock And Tree
And Every Grain Of Sand
That Embraced His Noble Feet
Or That Kissed His Blessed Hands

Ya Rasool Allah
Ya Habiba Allah
Grant Us The Chance To Be With Him
We Pray To You Allah

2:

2:

1: Mehboob Ki Mehfil Ko Mehboob Sajate Hain
2:
Mehboob Ki Mehfil Ko Mehboob Sajate Hain
Aate Hain Wohi Jin Ko, Sarkar Bulate Hain

Woh Log Khuda Shahid, Qismat Ke Sikandar Hain
Jo Sarware Alam Ka, Milad Manate Hain

Aqa Ki Sanah Khwani, Dar Asl Ibadat Hai
Hum Naat Ki Surat Mein, Qur’an Sunate Hain

Jin Ka Bhari Duniya Mein, Koi Bhi Nahin Wali
Unko Bhi Mere Aqa, Sine Se Lagate Hain

Jo Sarware Alam Ko, Lajpal Samajhte Hain
Daman Talab Bhar Kar, Mehfil Se Woh Jate Hain

Me-Khwaro Chaley Jana, Me-Khwanae Sarwar Mein
Woh Jamey Talab Sab Ko; Bhar, Bhar Ke Pilate Hain

Allah Ke Khazanon Ke, Malik Hain Nabi Sarwar
Yeh Sach Hai Niyazi, Hum Sarkar Ka Khate Hain

1: Mera Dil Aur Meri Jaan Madine Waale
2:
Mera Dil Aur Meri Jaan Madine Waale
Tujh Pe Saw Jaan Se Qurbaan Madine Waale

Bar De Bar De Mere Aqaa Meri Jholi Bar De
Ab Na Rakh Be Saro Samaan Madine Waale

Tera Dar Chor Ke Jaa O To Kaha Jaa O
Mere Aqaa Mere Sultaan Madine Waale

Phir Tamanna-E Ziyaarat Me Kiya Dil Be Chain
Phir Madine Ka He Armaan Madine Waale

Sabz Ghunbad Ki Fazaaon Mey Bula Lo Mujh Ko
Tera Ghaafil Hei Pareeshan Madinay Waale

Sub Ke Matloob Ka Mahboob He Matloob He Too

1: Mera Dil Aur Meri Jaan Ya Rasoolallah
2:
Mera Dil Aur Meri Jaan Ya Rasoolallah!
Tum Pe Sao Jaan Se Qurban Ya Rasoolallah!!

Fida Hai Tum Pe Meri Jaan Ya Rasoolallah!
Tumhi Ho Deen Aur Imaan Ya Rasoolallah!!

Tumhari Naat Ke Sadqe Me Sarware Aalam!
Mili Hai Mujhko Yeh Pehchan Ya Rasoolallah!!

Meri Majaal Hi Kya Mai Tumhari Naat Likhu!
Tumhari Mad’h(Naat) Hai Qur’an Ya Rasoolallah!!

Mataa-E-Deen Bhi Duniya Bhi Humko Tumse Mili!
Mila Hai Tumse Hi Rehman Ya Rasoolallah!!

Liya Hai Aapne Daaman Me Mujhse Aasi Ko!
Bahot Bada Hai Yeh Ehsan Ya Rasoolallah!!

Kisey Sunau Mai Sarkar Daastaan E Alam!
Tumhi Ho Dard Ke Darmaan Ya Rasoolallah!!

Tumhare Rauza-E-Anwar Ki Shaan Ka Kya Kehna!
Hai Jibrael Bhi Darbaan Ya Rasoolallah!!

Khuda Ki Khalq Me Khulq-E-Azeem Tum Jaisa!
Nahi Hai Dusra Insaan Ya Rasoolallah!!

Nahi Hai A’hsanu Minka Koi Zamaane Me!
Yeh Bole Hazrat-E-Hassaan Ya Rasoolallah!!

Bulalo Jald Madeene Me Dil Tadapta Hai!
Madeena Dekhle Rizwan Ya Rasoolallah!!

1: Mera Dil Tadap Raha Hai Mera Jal Raha Hai Seena
2:

Nahi Maalo Zar To Kya Hai Mai Gharib Hoon Yahi Na
Mere Ishq Mujh Ko Le Chal Tuhi Janibe Madina Madina

Mujhe Gardisho Na Chedo Mera Hai Koi Jaha Me
Mai Abhi Pukar Lunga Nahi Door Hai Madina Madina

1: Mera Nabi Lajawaab Hain
2:
Nabiyon Me Gulaab Hai
Rashke Maahtaab Hai
Rab Ka Intekhaab Hai
Mera Nabi Lajawaab Hai

Daamaad Jin Ka Sher-E-Khuda Bu Turaaab Hai
Barkat, Karam, Shifa Ka Khazeena Luaab Hai
Jinke Ghulam Shaho Ki Azmat Ko Maat De
Kya Shaan Unki Jinka Paseena Gulaab Hai

Yaseen O Taha Naam Hai Jinke Qur’an Me
Ashaar Ka Sunau Main Unke Bayaan Me
Woh Hi Hai Muzzammil Ha Mudassir Bhi Wohi Hai
Taakat Kaha Se Laau Main Apni Zabaan Mein

Shaqq-Ul-Qamar Ka Mojiza Qurbaan Jaaiye
Toota Hua Dil Jod Ne Is Dar Pe Aaiye
Woh Jaante Hai Dil Me Chupe Raaz Humare
Sab Milke Zara Josh Me Naara Lagaiye

Hai Meem Ye Kehta Ke Muhammad Hi The Dulha
Hai Ain Ka Kehna Ke Safar Arsh Ka Woh Tha
Hai Ra Se Aya Raat, Alif Kehta Hai Allah
Ye Jeem Kahe Jaagte Dekha Tha Woh Jalwa.

Rizwan Kya Bayaan Kare Shaan Tumhari
Khud Saahibe Qur’an Kare Madha Tumhari
Alhamd Se Wannaas Talak Padhte Jaaiye
Har Nuqtaye Qur’an Kahe Naat Tumhari

1: Mera To Sab Kuch Mera Nabi Hai
2:
Mera Roop Wi Nai, Mera Rang Wi Nai,
Menu Madni Manaun Da Dhang Wi Nai.
Mera Ishq Wi Rumi Warga Nai,
Meri Jaami Wangu Torr Wi Nai.
Par Main Qasm Khuda Ki Khana Waan,
Menu Sohne Jeya Koi Hor Wi Nai.
Kyunke Mera To Sab Kuch Mera Nabi Hai.
Mera To Sab Kuch Mera Nabi Hai.

Lokan De Horr Sahare Ne,
Par Mera Toh Sab Kuch Mera Nabi Hai.
Mera To Sab Kuch Mera Nabi Hai.

Seahiyan Mujh Mein, Daagh Mujh Mein,
Jalley Ussi Ke Chiragh Mujh Me.
Assasa-E-Qalb-O-Jaan Wohi Hai.
Mera To Sab Kuch Mera Nabi Hai.
Tera To Sab Kuch Tera Nabi Hai.

“mere Gunahon Pe Uska Parda,
Woh Meri Dhaal Mera Sahara.”
Woh Meri Manzil Bhi, Humsafar Bhi.
Woh Saamne Bhi, Pass-E-Nazar Bhi.
Wohi Mujhe Door Se Pukare,
Ussi Ki Parchayi Ruh Par Bhi.
Woh Rang Mera, Woh Meri Khushboo.
Main Usski Muthi Ka Eik Jugnu.
Woh Mere Andar Ki Roshni Hai.

Ussi Ke Qadmon Mein Rah Meri,
Ussi Ki Pyaasi Hai Chah Meri.
Ussi Ki Mujrim Meri Khatayein,
Ussi Ki Rehmat Gawah Meri.
Ussi Ka Gham Mujhko Saath Rakhe,
Wohi Mere Dil Pe Haath Rakhe.
Woh Dard Bhi Hai, Sukoon Bhi Hai.
Mera To Sab Kuch Mera Nabi Hai.

Azal Ke Chehre Pe Noor Uska,
Zahoor-E-Alaam Zahoor Uska.
Khud Uski Awaaz Gufta-E-Haqq,
Khud Uski Tanhai Toor Uska.
Bohat Se Aalimaqaam Aaye,
Khuda Ke Baad Uska Naam Aaye.
Woh Awwaleen Hai Woh Akhreen Hai.
Mera To Sab Kuch Mera Nabi Hai.

Na Mujhse Baar-E-Ammal Uthe Ga.
Na Azl Hi Saath Koi Dega.
Aggar Kahega To Roz-E-Mehshar,
Khuda Se Mera Nabi Kahega.
Siyahiyaan, Daagh Saaf Karde.
Isse Bhi Maula Maaf Karde.
Yeh Mera Ashiq Hai, Warsi Hai.
Mera To Sab Kuch Mera Nabi Hai.

1: Mera Wird E Lab Hai Nabi Nabi Mera Dil Maqam E Habeeb Hai
2:
Mera Wird E Lab Hai Nabi Nabi, Mera Dil Maqam E Habeeb Hai
Mai Mariz E Ishq E Rasool Hoon, Wo Habeeb Mera Tabeeb Hai

Main Behak Sakoon Yeh Majaal Kiya, Mera Rahmnuma Koi Aur Hai,
Mujhe Khoob Jaan Lein Manzilein, Ye Shikasta Pa Koi Aur Hai.

Jo Tumhari Jali Se Muttasilm, Hai Sutho Ke Picche Khajil Khajil,
Nahi Main Nahin Woh Marize Dil, Na Meray Siwa Koi Aur Hua.

Mein Buron Say Laakh Bura Sahi, Magar Un Say Hai Mera Waasta
Meri Laaj Rakhna Mere Khuda, Ye Tayray Habeeb Ki Baat Hai

Hai Tujhe Khabar Shahe Einoaan, Meri Wajhe Raahate Qalbo Jaan,
Na Tere Siwa Koi Aur Tha, Na Tere Siwa Koi Aur Hai.

Main Jo Door Arze Haram Se Tha, Hoi Khulde Gosh Haseen Sada,
Hai Isi Mein Majide Be Nawa, Ke Yeh Kaafila Koi Aur Hai.

Tayray Zikr Ki Hai Ye Barkatayn Mere Bigray Kam Sanwar Ga-Ay
Jahaan Teri Yaad Ho Dilnasheen Wahiin Rahmaton Ka Nazool Hai

Teri Deed Jisko Naseeb He Wo Naseeb Qaabil E Deed Hai
Tera Daykhna Mayri Eid He Tera Rukh Kalaam E Majeed Hai

Ho Daruud Tujh Pay Bhi Aminah Tere Chaand Par Bhi Salam Ho
Teri Goad Kitni Azeem Hai Mila Tujh Ko Maah E Tamaam Hai

Hai Ye Aarzu Jo Ho Surkhru Milay Do Jahaan Ki Aabru
Meyn Kahun Ghulam Huun Apka Wo Kahayn Kay Hamko Qabul Hai

Meri Iltija Hai Yeh Dosto, Kabhi Tum Jo Soove Haram Chalo,
To Bana Ke Sarko Qadam Chalo, Ke Yeh Rasta Koi Aur Hai

Ye Ghumaan Tha Kahin Saal Say, Yeh Yaqeen Hai Kahin Roz Se,
Meray Dil Se Ghumbad E Sabz Ka, Yeh Muamla Koi Aur Hai.

Aaway Karma Wali Fayr O Gharii Phira Meyn Madinay Gali Gali
Fayr Saadi Wi Howay Haazri Saaday Waastay Koii Dua Karay

Balaghal Ula Bikamali Kasha Fadduja Bijamalihi
Hasunat Jamiu Hisaalihi Sallu Aleyhi Wa Aalihi.

1: Meray Sohneya Madinay Vich Rehn Valea
2:
Meray Sohney’a Madinay Vich Rehn Vale’a
Meray Sohney’a Madinay Vich Rehn Vale’a

Kadi Meri Vi Tamana Poori Kardey
Madinay Vich Rehn Vale’a,
Meray Sohney’a Madinay Vich Rehn Vale’a

Dam Dam Yaad Teri Diil Vich Rehndi’ey,
Rohndi’ya Ney Akhiya Tey Neendar Na Pendi’ey
Sanu Sabz Gumbad Dikh’ladey,
Kadi Meri Vi Tamana Poori Kardey
Madinay Vich Rehn Vale’a,
Meray Sohney’a Madinay Vich Rehn Vale’a

Kali Kali Zulf Tey Ankh Mastani’ey,
Sohney’a Hai Saab Teri Duniya Deewani’ey
Eyk Noori Jaalakh Dikh’ladey,
Kadi Meri Vi Tamana Poori Kardey
Madinay Vich Rehn Vale’a,
Meray Sohney’a Madinay Vich Rehn Vale’a

Sadqa Shahida Da Dur Hovan Duriya,
Sadlo Jii Kowl Mukh Javan Majbooriya
Sarey Suthey Naseeb Jaga Dey,
Kadi Meri Vi Tamana Poori Kardey
Madinay Vich Rehn Vale’a,
Meray Sohney’a Madinay Vich Rehn Vale’a

Hijr Di Raat Lambi Keray Pasey Java Main,
Dill Diya Gaala Keynu Adaab Suna Va Main
Tuhi Sunley Kowl Bulaley,
Kadi Meri Vi Tamana Poori Kardey
Madinay Vich Rehn Vale’a,
Meray Sohney’a Madinay Vich Rehn Vale’a

1: Mere Aaqa Aao Ke Muddat Hui Hai
2:
Mere Aaqa Aao Ke Muddat Hui Hai,
Teri Rah Me Ankhiya Bichate Bichate.
Teri Hasrato Me Teri Chahato Me,
Bade Din Hue Ghar Sajaate Sajaate.

Mera Hai Ye Imaan Ye Mera Yaqeen Hai,
Mere Mustafa Sa Na Koi Haseen Hai.
Ke Rukh Unka Dekha Hai Jab Se Qamar Ne,
Nikalta Hai Munh Ko Chupate Chupate.

Qayamat Ka Manzar Bada Pur Khatar Hai,
Magar Mustafa Ka Jo Deewana Hoga.
Woh Pul Se Guzar Jaayega Wajd Karte,
Ye Naara Nabi Ka Lagate Lagate.

Mere Lab Pe Maula Na Koi Sadaa Hai,
Faqat Mujh Nikamme Ki Yehi Dua Hai.
Meri Rooh Nikle Dar-E-Mustafa Pe,
Ghame Dil Nabi Ko Sunate Sunate.

Ye Maana Ke Ik Din Aani Qaza Hai,
Magar Dosto Tumse Ye Iltijaa Hai.
Shehre Muhammad Ki Har Ek Gali Se,
Jaanaza Uthana Ghumate Ghumate.

Hai Kaabe Ki Azmat Bhi Apni Jagah Par,
Magar Dil Me Haakim Tamanna Yahi Hai.
Jo Mil Jaaaye Naqshe Kafe Paaye Ahmed,
To Mar Jaaye Sar Ko Jhukate Jhukate.

Mere Aaqa Aao Ke Muddat Hui Hai,
Teri Rah Me Ankhiya Bichate Bichate.
Teri Hasrato Me Teri Chahato Me,
Bade Din Hue Ghar Sajaate Sajaate.

Yeh Dil Jab Se Ishq E Nabi Mein Para Hai,
Na Din Ki Khabar He Na Shab Ka Pata Hai
Ab Tu Basarat Be Kam Ho Gaye Hai,
Teray Gham Mein Aansu Bahate Bahate

1: Mere Aaqa Da Husno Jamal
2:
Mere Aaqa Da Husn O Jamal Subhanallah
Nahi Sohne Di Koi Misaal Subhanallah

Asi Karna Ey Aaqa Da Mil Ke Zikr
Jeda Chaunda Ey Jannat Wich Paawe Shajjar
Oh Mil Ke Kahe Mere Naal Subhanallah

Jinna Kaabe Di Chat Te Wi Ditti Azaan
Ohdi Saare Ghulama Cho Wakhri Ey Shaan
Mere Aaqa Da Aashiq Bilal Subhanallah

Aayi Makke Wich Aakhir Te Dayi Halima
Jadon Aaqa Nu Bhaaya Te Thehri Kitte Na
Aaye Halima Teri Oonthni Di Chaal Subhanallah

Jidde Zikr Nu Kita Buland Khuda Ne
Ohnu Kaun Ghatawe Ohnu Kaun Mitawe
Nahi Aydi Kisse Di Majjaal Subhanallah

Sadda Karna Ey Ahmad Ne Zikr E Nabi
Aes Zikr E Nabi Toh Bin Ey Kuch Wi Nai
Rawe Nisbat Je Naatan De Naal Subhanallah

Mere Aaqa Da Husn O Jamal Subhanallah
Nahi Sohne Di Koi Misaal Subhanallah

1: Mere Aaqa Ka Husno Jamaal
2:
Mere Aaqa Ka Husno Jamaal
Subhanallah Subhanallah
Nahi Sohne Koi Misal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

Hogai Jispe Aaqa Ki Nazre Karam
Kaaba Bhi Chumta Hai Usi Ke Qadam
Mere Aaqa Ka Hai Wo Bilaal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

Mulqe Faras Ka Aatash Kada Bhuj Gaya
Aur Qaaba Bhi Tazeem Ko Jhuk Gaya
Aaya Jab Aamina Bee Ka Laal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

Ummey Mabud Ke Ghar Mustafa Jab Gaye
Sookhi Bakri Ke Thun Doodh Se Bhar Gaye
Kar Diya Aaqa Ne Malamaal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

Aay The Qatl Karne Umar Jis Ghadi
Chhut Ke Talwaar Qadmo Me Khud Gir Padi
Deykha Jab Mustafa Ka Jamaal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

Dhoom Se Din Nabi Ka Manaya Karo
Najdiyo Ko Hamesha Jalaya Karo
Arey Masto Machao Dhamaal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

Unki Ulfat Ki Shamaye Jalaya Karo
Geet Unki Muhabbat Ke Gaya Karo
Roz-O-Shab Ho Yahi Apna Haal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

Leyke Makke Se Jabke Haleema Chali
Uontni Me Ajab Jaan Si Padh Gayi
Mere Aaqa Ka Hai Ye Kamaal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

Marz E Isiya Se Aaqa Shifa Chahiye
Hai Khabar Aapko Humko Kya Chahiye
Ya Nabi Aapki Bas Raza Chahiye
Aapke Dar Pe Aake Qaza Chahiye
Poora Kar Dijaye Mera Sawaal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

Bu Bakar Me Hai Sidq O Safa Dekhiye
Aur Umar Me Hai Adlo Wafa Dekhiye
Unki Usma Me Shaane Sakha Dekhiye
Babul Ilm Aur Sheyre Khuda Dekhiye
Sab Me Hai Mustafa Ka Kamaal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

Noor E Awwal Hai Shamsudduha Aap Hai
Naiyyare Burje Badrudduja Aap Hai
Bu Bakar Bhi Na Samjhe Ke Kya Aap Hai
Ya Nabi Jo Hai Baad’az Khuda Aap Hai
Koi Laaye Kaha Se Misaal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

Qutb E Kokan Ke Dar Pe Gada Aaye Hai
Lene Khairaat Is Shab Yaha Aaye Hai
Apne Dilme Tamanna Sabhi Laaye Hai
Aaj Kar Denge Ye Malamaal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

Murshidi Shah Akhtar Ki Khairaat Hai
Ishq Ki Tere Daaman Me Saugaat Hai
Rashid E Razvi Kya Teri Auqaat Hai
Jo Bhi Kuch Hai Faqat Naat Ki Baat Hai
Naate Sarvar Ka Hai Ye Kamaal
Subhanallah Subhanallah

1: Mere Aaqa Ki Hai Shaan Sabse Alag
2:
Mere Aaqa Ki Hai Shaan Sabse Alag
Jaise Rutbe Me Qur’an Sabse Alag

Shaane Khairul Basher Khatamul Ambiya
Ik Payambar Ik Insaan Sabse Alag

Shafqate Be-Sabab Rehmate Be-Talab
Unki Bakshish Ka Unwaan Sabse Alag

Arsh Qadmo Me Payvand Poshak Me
Hai Do Aalam Ke Sultaan Sabse Alag

Unko Dekha Nahi Fir Bhi Pehchan Le
Meri Aankho Ka Imaan Sabse Alag

Unke Darr Ke Gada Sar Pe Taaje Ana
Hum Faqeero Ki Pehchan Sabse Alag

Naat Kehte Hai Dil Ki Zameeno Me Hum
Shayar Apna Hai Maidan Sabse Alag

1: Mere Aaqa Mere Sultan Madine Waale
2:
Mere Aaqa Mere Sultan Madine Waale
Tum Pe Sau Jaan Se Qurbaan Madine Waale

Dekh Kar Aap Ke Gumbad Ka Wo Haseen Manzar
Nikle Dil Se Sabhi Armaan Madine Waale

Zaa-Ir E Qabr E Munawwar Ki Shafaa’at Hogi
Hai Yahi Aap Ka Farmaan Madine Waale

Na’at Mey Likhta Rahoon Na’at Faqat Parhta Rahoon
Ho Yahi Zeest Ka Saamaan Madine Waale

Khidmat E Deen Ke Jazbe Ko Salaamat Rakhna
Taake Barhta Rahe Imaan Madine Waale

Shakir E Razvi Pe Aaqa Ho Nigah-E-Rehmat
Yeh Bechaara Hai Pareshaan Madine Waale

1: Mere Aqa Dete Hain
2:
Mere Aqa Dete Hain
Jholi Sab Ki Bhar Te Hain
Jis Ne Manga Us Ne Paya
Mere Aqa Dete Hain

Mangte Khali Haath Na Lotein
Kitni Mili Khairat Na Poocho
Un Ka Karam Hia Un Ka Karam Hai
Un Ke Karam Ki Baat Na Poocho

Ishq-E-Nabi Ko Nain Ki Daulat
Ishq-E-Nabi Baqshih Ki Zamaanat
Isse Badkar Dast-E-Talab Mein
Hai Koi Saughaat Na Poocho

Rashke Jina Taiba Ki Galiyaan
Har Zarra Firdos Badama
Charo Taraf Anwaar Ka Alam
Rehmat Ki Barsaat Na Poocho

Zahir Me Taskeen-E-Dil O Jaan
Batin Me Mehraaj-E-Dil O Jaan
Naam-E-Nabi Phir Naam-E-Nabi Hai
Naam-E-Nabi Ki Baat Na Poocho

Main Kya Aur Kya Meri Haqiqat
Yeh Sab Hai Sarkar Ki Nisbat
Main To Bura Hoon Lekin Meri
Laaj Hai Kis Ke Haath Na Poocho

Haal Agar Kuch Apna Sunaya
Un Ke Karam Ka Shikwa Ho Ga
Main Apne Halaat Mein Khush Hoon
Mujh Se Mere Halaat Na Poocho

Akhir Main Bas Itna Kahoon Ga
Jaag Utha Ashkon Ka Muqadar
Yaad-E-Nabi Mein Rote Rote
Kaise Kati Hai Raat Na Poocho

1: Mere Dil De Werhe Udikan De Dere
2:
Mere Dil De Werhe, Udikan De Dere
Te Hanjoa De Dive, Akhan De Banere

Ay Sunji Haveli, Te Dukhan De Saaye
Kadi Aa Mukao, Ghama De Hanere

Ae Dunya Di Dal Dal, Choun Kad Ke Te Molaa
Naseeban’ach Likh De, Madine De Phere

Moafi Mile Gi, Dare Mustafa Te
Nadamat De Athroo, Wagawan Di Dher Ay

Ita,at Khuda Di, Ita,at Mustafa Di
Ae Farmaya Rabb Ne, Jo Tere O Mere

Riaz Ae Madeena, Di Koil Je Howan
Karan Oth Ke Koo Koo, Swere Swere

1: Mere Dil Pe Sarkar Chaye Hue Hai
2:
Mere Dil Pe Sarkar Chaye Hue Hai
Rag-O-Pay Me Meri Samaye Hue Hai

Madine Me Jab Se Aaye Hue Hai
Do Aalam Ko Dil Se Bhulaye Hue Hai

Jo Taiba Me Daaman Bichaye Hue Hai
Maze Khuld Ke Bas Wo Paye Hue Hai

Jin Aakhon Se Aansoo Bahaye Hue Hai
Un Aakhon Me Sarkar Aaye Hue Hai

Jo Sarak Se Dil Lagaye Hue Hai
Wo Har Gham Ko Dil Se Bhulaye Hue Hai

Mukaddar Fiza Thi Mu'attar Hui Hai
Mere Ghar Me Sarkar Aaye Hue Hai

Dil Aaqa Ke Khadmoun Me Wo Leke Aaye
Bajaz Dil Jo Sab Kuch Lutaye Hue Hai

Unhe Muttaqui Log Kehte Hai Shayad
Jo Taiba Me Dhoni Rumaye Hue Hai

1: Mere Mehboob Ka Meelad Manane Walo
2:
Mere Mehboob Ka Meelad Manane Walo
Khush Hua Tum Pe Khuda Bazm Sajane Walo

Tum Ko Paigham Madine Se Hai Aane Wala
Ho Gaya Tum Pe Karam Naat Sunane Walo

Unki Zulfon Ki Qasam Loge Muraade Saari
Unki Sarkaar Mein Daaman Ko Bichaane Walo

Apne Honton Pe Duroodon Ke Taraane Rakhna
Shahe Kaunain Ke Darbaar Mein Aane Walo

Ya Rasoolallah Ke Naaro Ko Sajaalo Lab Par
Ghar Mein Sarkaar Ko Bulaane Walo

Haq Ne Tatheer Ka Khal’at Hai Sajaaya Tum Ko
Aye Mere Paak Muhammad Ke Gharane Walo

Loot Lo Aapki Rehmat Ke Khazaane Saaim
Sadqa Mehboob Ki Aamad Ka Lutaane Walo

1: Mere Nabi Ne Itna Nawaza
2:
Mere Nabi Ne Itna Nawaza Jhuk Geya Sar Shukrane Mein
Lamha Lamha Guzra Mera Un Ki Yaad Manane Mein

Thori Thori Peeta Rahounga Kab Tak Tere Mehfil Mein
Mekhana Hai Daal De Saqi Aaj Mere Peymane Mein

Apni Nazar Ke Jaam Pila Kar Sab Kay Hosh Urra Saqi
Mekharon Kee Bheer Lagee Hey Aaj Terey Mekhanay Main

Rabb Ka Hai Ihsan Niazi Aur Yeh Khaas Inayat Hey
Jeewan Gariyan Beet Rahee Hein Peet Kee Preet Nibhanay Main

1: Mere Sarkaar Madine Me Bulaatey Rehna
2:
Mere Sarkaar Madine Me Bulaatey Rehna
Gham E Duniya Gham E ‘uqba Se Bachate Rehna

Koi Mushkil Nahi Aisee Jo Na Taali Tum Ney
Mere Daata Meri Bigdi Ko Banaate Rehna

Hashr Ki Pyaas Mujhe Jab Ke Pareshan Karde
Jaam E Kauthar Ka Mujhe Aap Pilaate Rehna

Kaash Jalwa Mere Aaqa Jo Dikhaayain Mujh Ko
Me To Kehdunga Isey Aap Dikhaate Rehna

Koi Neki Nahi Daaman Me Mere Ya Madani
Mujh Siyaahkaar Ko Sarkaar Nibhaate Rehna

Hai Masaa-Ib Me Ghiree Aap Ki Ummat Aaqa
Zulm-O-Zaalim Se Ise Aap Bachaate Rehna

Aaj Phir Se Mujhe Taiba Ka Banaaya Zaa-Ir
Meri Qismat Ko Isee Tarha Jagaate Rehna

Dar Pe Sarkaar Ke Haazir Hain Gulam E Ajami
Laaj Is Ki Mere Mukhtaar Bachaate Rehna

Aaj Taiba Se Chala Hoon Mein Watan Ki Jaanib
Apne Dar Par Mere Mukhtar Bulaate Rehna

Wehshat-E-Qabr Se Ghabraaye Jo Shakir Aaqa
Thapkiyaan Deke Use Aap Sulaate Rehna

1: Mere Sarkaar Mere Ghar Ko Sajaaney Aaein
2:
Mere Sarkaar Mere Ghar Ko Sajaaney Aaein
Dil Ki Duniya Main Woh Anwaar Lutaane Aaein

Joh Khazaan Daar Parhaa Rotaa Hai Ik Jhoownke Ko
Us Kii Jaanib Bhii Bahaaron Keh Zamaane Aaein

Shiddat E Peyaas Hai Ik Bosyah E Paa Ki Jin Ko
Aese Peyaason Ko Bhii Diidar Karaane Aaein

Taab E Furqat Bhii Qiyamat Hai Mujhe Wasl Keh Baad
Woh Mere Ghar Seh Nah Jane Keh Bahaane Aaein

Jin Keh Biimar Ho Muddat Se Woh Aein Ge Zuruur
Un Kii Galiyon Seh Hawaaein Yeh Bataane Aaein

Jin Ki Umeed Peh Tufano Main Ham Kud Parhe
Naa Khuda Kashtiyon Ko Paar Lagaane Aaein

Raat Bhar Yaad Sitaaron Neh Keyaa Ro Ro Kar
Kaash Woh Chand Merii Bazm Sajaane Aaein

Aey Madinay Keh Musaafir Dar E Jibriil Keh Paas
Kehnaa Gham Khaar Seh Ham Haal Sunaane Aaein

1: Mere Sarkar Ka Chehra
2:
Khuda Ki Nazron Mein Rehta
Mere Sarkar Ka Chehra

Mere Sarkar Ka Chehra

Hue Ummat Mein Voh A’la
Sahaba Ban Gaye Voh Log

Mere Sarkar Ka Chehra

Hazaron Parde The Haaye

Mere Sarkar Ka Chehra

Mere Sarkar Ka Chehra

Bilal E Habshi Hai Kaba Ki
Chat Per Rukh Kahan Karte

Mere Sarkar Ka Chehra

Nakeeron Ne Jo Pucha

Ujagar Jhoom Kar Bola
Mere Sarkar Ka Chehra

1: Mere Sarkar Ke Gesu
2:
Mere Rab Ko Bhi Hai Pyare Mere Sarkar Ke Gesu

Main Bara Ameer O Kabeer Hoon

Main Gham O Alam Mein Hoon Mubtala

Mera Do Jahan Mein Tere Siwa

Mere Saamne The Jo Sar Nigoon

1: Meri Baat Ban Gayi Hai Teri Baat Karte Karte
2:
Meri Baat Ban Gayi Hai Teri Baat Karte Karte
Tere Sheher Me Mai Aau Teri Naat Padhte Padhte

Tere Ishq Ki Badaulat Mujhe Zindagi Mili Hai
Mujhe Maut Aaqa Aaye Tera Zikr Karte Karte

Kis Cheez Ki Talab Hai Na Hai Aarzoo Bhi Koi

1: Meri Barbaad Basti Ko Basaa Do Ya Rasoolallah
2:
Meri Barbaad Basti Ko Basaa Do Ya Rasoolallah
Kinare Par Meri Kashti Laga Do Ya Rasoolallah

Mere Taareek Dil Par Noor Ki Barsaat Ho Jaaye
Mere Qalbe Siyaah Ko Jagmaga Do Ya Rasoolallah

Mera Maskan Madina Ho Mera Madfan Madina Ho

1: Meri Dhadkan Mein Ya Nabi Meri Saanson Mein Ya Nabi
2:
Meri Dhadkan Mein Ya Nabi Meri Saanson Mein Ya Nabi

1: Meri Jholi Ko Bharde Aye Khuda
2:
Meri Jholi Ko Bharde Aye Khuda Sadqe Muhammad Ke
Gunahgaron Ka Bhi Kar De Bhala Sadqe Muhammad Ke

Hamare Haal Pe Daata Karam Apna Sadaa Rakhna
Tuhi Shaitaan Se Imaan Waalon Ko Bacha Rakhna

Samajhti Hai Ye Dunya Apna Hum Imaan De Denge

Teri Rehmat Ko Ro Ro Ke Hum Aye Maalik Jagaa Denge

Jahaan Me Be Sahaaron Ko Faqat Tera Sahaara Hai
Nahi Hai Koi Bhi Apna Bas Ik Tu Hi Humara Hai

Meri Kashti Hai Toofaan Me Kinaare Par Laga Dena

1: Meri Jholi Mein Rehte Hain Sada Tukde Muhammad Ke
2:
Meri Jholi Mein Rehte Hain Sada Tukde Muhammad Ke

Padi Hai Kya Mujhe Shahon Ke Dar Se Jaake Mai Maangun
Khilata Hai Mujhe Mera Khuda Tukde Muhammad Ke

Meri Jholi Mein Rehte Hain Sada Tukde Muhammad Ke

Inhe Khaakar Abu Bakr O Umar Usman Bante Hain
Ye Rutbe Mein Hain Kuch Aise Juda Tukde Muhammad Ke

Meri Jholi Mein Rehte Hain Sada Tukde Muhammad Ke

Hain Shehre Ilm Khud Aaqa Ali Hain Uska Darwaza

Meri Jholi Mein Rehte Hain Sada Tukde Muhammad Ke

Mere Maula Ali O Fatima Hasnain Ke Sadqe
Meri Naslon Ko Bhi Karna Ata Tukde Muhammad Ke

Meri Jholi Mein Rehte Hain Sada Tukde Muhammad Ke

Koi Salmaane Faras Aur Janaabe Qur Se Pooche Ke
Wafadaaron Ko Milte Hai Sada Tukde Muhammad Ke

Meri Jholi Mein Rehte Hain Sada Tukde Muhammad Ke

Mere Raste Ki Har Muskil Guzzar Jati Hai Qutraa Kar

1: Meri Saari Izzat Muhammad Se Hai
2:
Meri Saari Izzat Muhammad Se Hai
Ye Daulat Ye Shohrat Muhammad Se Hai

Ye Mera Sukhan Ye Meri Khamoshi
Qalam Ki Ye Rif’at Muhammad Se Hai

Mujhe Chahte Hai Sabhi Toot Kar
Ye Nazre Inayat Muhammad Se Hai

Hai Thandak Nigaho Me Aur Noor Bhi
Dilo Me Hararat Muhammad Se Hai

Na Kyun Saara Aalam Ho Un Par Fida
Ke Aalam Me Rehmat Muhammad Se Hai

Abu Bakr Siddique Ka Martaba
Aur Inki Sadaqat Muhammad Se Hai

Woh Farooq E Aazam Umar Ba Safa
Aur Unki Adaalat Muhammad Se Hai

Hussain Ibne Haider Ki Har Ek Ada
Aur Unki Shahadat Muhammad Se Hai

Woh Meraj O Meelad Ki Sa’ate
Woh Khalwat Ye Jalwat Muhammad Se Hai

Woh Roza Namaz Ho Ke Haj O Zakaat
Ye Zauke Ibaadat Muhammad Se Hai

Tilawat Sakhawat Duroodo Salaam
Sabhi Me Halawat Muhammad Se Hai

Woh Gaus O Qutub Hon Ke Abdaal Hon

1: Meri Ulfat Madine Se Yun Hi Nahi
2:

Jab Nazar Suye Taiba Rawana Hui
Saath Dil Bhi Gaya Saath Jaan Bhi Gai
Mein Muneer Ab Rahunga Yaha Kisliye
Mera Sara Asasa Madine Mein Hai

1: Muhammad Mazhar E Kaamil Hain Haq Ki Shaan E Izzat Ka
2:
Muhammad Mazhar E Kaamil Hain Haq Ki Shaan E Izzat Ka,
Nazar Aata Hay Is Kasrat Mein Kuch Andaaz Wahdat Ka.

Yahi Hay Asl E Aalam E Maadah Ijaad E Khalqat Ka,
Yahaan Wahdat Mein Barpa Hay Ajab Hangaama Kasrat Ka.

Gadaa Bhi Muntazir Hay Khuld Mein Nekon Ki Da’wat Ka,
Khuda Din Khair Sey Laaye Sakhi Key Ghar Ziyafat Ka.

Gunah Maghfoor, Dil Raushan, Khanak Aankhein, Jigar Thanda,
Ta’ala Allah Maah E Taiba Aalam Teri Tal’at Ka.

Na Rakhi Gul Key Josh E Husn Ne Gulshan Mein Jaa Baaqi,
Chatakta Phir Kahaan Ghuncha Koi Baagh E Risaalat Ka.

Barhaa Ye Silsila E Rahmat Ka Daur E Zulf E Waala Mein
Tasalsal Kaale Koson Reh Gaya Isiyan Ki Zulmat Ka.

Saf E Maatam Uthe Khaali Ho Zindaan Tootein Zanjeerain,
Gunahgaaro Chalo Mawla Ne Dar Khola Hay Jannat Ka.

Sikhaaya Hay Yeh Kis Gustaakh Ne Aaina Ko Yaa Rab,
Nazaarah Rooye Jaanaan Ka Bahaana Kar Key Hairat Ka.

Idhar Ummat Ki Hasrat Par Udhar Khaaliq Ki Rahmat Par,
Niraala Taur Hoga Gardish E Chashme Shafa’at Ka.

Barhein Is Darja Maujein Kasrat E Afdaal E Waala Ki,
Kinaarah Mil Gaya Is Neher Sey Daryaa E Wahdat Ka.

Kham E Zulf E Nabi Saajid Hay Mehraab E Do Abru Mein,
Ke Yaa Rab Tu Hi Waali Hay Siyah Kaaraan E Ummat Ka.

Madad Aay Joshish E Girya Baha De Kooh Aur Sehra,
Nazar Aa Jaaye Jalwah Be Hijaab Us Paak Turbat Ka.

Hue Kam Khwaabi-E-Hijraan Mein Saaton Parde Kam Khwaabi,
Tassawwur Khoob Baandha Aankhon Ne Astaar E Turbat Ka.

Yaqeen Hay Waqt E Jalwah Laghzishain Paaye Negah Paaye,
Mile Josh E Safaaye Jism Sey Paa Bos Hazrat Ka.

Yahaan Chirka Namak Waa Marham E Kafoor Haath Aaya,
Dil E Zakhmi Namak Parwardah Hay Kis Ki Malaahat Ka.

Ilaahi Muntazir Hoon Woh Khiraam E Naaz Farmaaein,
Bicha Rakha Hay Farsh Aankhon Ne Kam Khwaab E Basaarat Ka.

Na Ho Aaqa Ko Sajdah Adam O Yusuf Ko Sajdah Ho,
Magar Sad E Zaraay’ E Daab Hay Apni Shari’at Ka.

Zabaan E Khaar Kis Kis Dard Sey Un Ko Sunaati Hay,
Tarapna Dasht E Taiba Mein Jigar Afgaar Furqat Ka.

Sirhaane Un Key Bismil Key Ye Betaabi Ka Matam Hay,
Shahe Kausar Tarahham Tishnah Jaata Hay Ziyaarat Ka.

Jinhein Marqad Me Taa Hashr Ummati Keh Kar Pukaroge,
Hamain Bhi Yaad Kar Lo Un Mein Sadqa Apni Rahmat Ka.

Woh Chamke Bijliyan Yaa Rab Tajalli Haaye Jaanaan Sey,
Ke Chashm E Toor Surma Ho Dil Mushtaaq Rooyat Ka.

Raza E Khasta Josh E Behr E ’isiyaan Sey Na Ghabraana,
Kabhi To Haath Aajaayega Daaman Unki Rahmat Ka.

Tum Awal Aur Aakhir Ibtidaa Tum Intihaa Tum Ho

Khuda Kehte Nahi Banti Juda Kehte Nahi Banti
Khuda Par Us Ko Chora He Wahi Jaane Ke Kya Tum Ho

Anaa Min Haamid-O-Haamid Raza Min Ni Ke Jalwo Se
Bi Hamdilla Raza Haamid He Aur Haamid Raza Tum Ho

1: Muhammad Mustafa Salle Ala Ki Aaj Mehfil Hai
2:
Muhammad Mustafa Salle Ala Ki Aaj Mehfil Hai
Habeebe Kibriya Salle Ala Ki Aaj Mehfil Hai

Padho Salle Ala Salle Ala Salle Ala Har Dam
Ke Mehboobe Khuda Salle Ala Ki Aaj Mehfil Hai

Wuzu Se Aaye Baithe Ba Adab Bheje Durood Unpar
Jahaan Ke Rehnuma Salle Ala Ki Aaj Mehfil Hai

Farishte Aalame Baala Se Sun Sun Kar Ye Kehte Hain
Chalo Noore Khuda Salle Ala Ki Aaj Mehfil Hai

Huwe Hai Jis Ke Faize Noor Se Donon Jahaan Raushan
Usi Shamsud Duha Salle Ala Ki Aaj Mehfil Hai

Nikala Jis Ne Chashma Aab Ka Ungli Se Jungle Mein
Usi Behre Sakha Salle Ala Ki Aaj Mehfil Hai

Duayen Mangle Jo Mangni Ho Haq Se Aye Akbar
Tere Mushkil Kusha Salle Ala Ki Aaj Mehfil Hai

1: Muhammad Mustafa Tum Ho Muhammad Mujtaba Tum Ho
2:
Muhammad Mustafa Tum Ho Muhammad Mujtaba Tum Ho
Makeene Gumbade Khazra Shahe Har Do Sara Tum Ho

Sallallahu Ala Muhammad Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam

Makame Mustafa Nabiyon Ne Baite Quds Me Dekha
Sabhi Hai Muqtadi Aur Har Nabi Ke Muqtada Tum Ho

Sallallahu Ala Muhammad Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam

Pade Yasrab Paaye Naaz Wo Taiba Hua Fauran
Dil E Beemaar Ki Khatir Dawa Tum Ho Shifa Tum Ho

Sallallahu Ala Muhammad Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam

Jaha Bhar Me Musalma Hai Giriftare Bala Aaqa
Karo Nazar E Karam Ke Daafaye Jumla Bala Tum Ho

Sallallahu Ala Muhammad Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam

Suna Farmaane Rab Jaauka Hazir Ho Gaye Hai Hum
Khuda Ke Baad Bando Ka Yakinan Aasra Tum Ho

Sallallahu Ala Muhammad Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam

Tumhare Darpe Hazir Hoke Shakir Arz Karta Hai
Tumhi Hajat Rawa Ho Aur Mere Mushkil Kusha Tum Ho

Sallallahu Ala Muhammad Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam

1: Muhammad Naam Pe Qurban Meri Jaan Ho Jaey
2:
Muhammad Naam Pe Qurban Meri Jaan Ho Jaey
Isi Ke Sadqay Mein Kaamil Mera Iman Ho Jaey

Mere Mushkil Kusha Hasanain Ka Sadqa Ata Kar De
Balaen Door Hon Mushkil Meri Aasan Ho Jaey

Mere Aamal Ka Badla Tabahi Hay Magar Piyaray
Mein Jannat Ko Sidharon Jo Tera Farmaan Ho Jaey

Madinay Paak Ke Kutton Ki Khidmat Ka Sharaf Paaon
Sagaan-E-Taybah Ka Khadim, Meri Pehchan Ho Jaey

Mein Jaun Daar-E-Faani Se Mera Emaan Salamat Ho
Teri Chahat Teri Ulfat Mera Saman Ho Jaey

Mere Shafay' Sawali Hun Nijaat-E-Aakhirat Ka Mein
Sar-E-Mehshar Shafa’at Ka Teri Aey’laan Ho Jaey

Mein Hun Sunni, Rahun Sunni, Jeeun Sunni, Marun Sunni
Karam Aey Sayyid-E-Aalam Tera Ihsaan Ho Jaey

Teri Naatien Parrhun Teri Sana Mein Mast Ho Jaon
Paey Akhtar Nigaah-E-Hazrat-E-Hassan Ho Jaey

Teri Madh-O-Sana Sunn Kar Sarray Munkir Karay Maatam
Magar Jab Bhi Koi Sunni Sunay Farhaan Ho Jaey

Khurooj-O-Rafz Ke Shar Se Mera Aur Meri Naslon Ka
Salamat Deen-O-Iman Aey Mere Sultan Ho Jaey

Mein Baghdad-E-Mu’alla Aanay Ko Tayyar Hun Kab Se
Izn Bas Haazri Ka Az Shah E Jeelan Ho Jaey

Bareilly Hziri Dun Phr Chaloon Ajmer Ko Khwajah
Raza Ke Faiz Se Mujh Par Tera Faizan Ho Jaey

Mere Ghous O Raza Ka, Mere Khwaja, Mere Daata Ka
Mere Murshid Ka Mujh Pe Daaimi Faizan Ho Jaey

Meri Naslain Chalain Raah E Sunan Par Taa Dam E Aakhir
Meri Aulaad Aaqa Aalim-E-Quran Ho Jaey

Karam Karna Karam Walay Bharam Rakhna Bharam Walay
Teri Namoos Pe Qurban Yeh Irfan Ho Jaey

1: Muhammad Nabina (Arabic Version)
2:
Muhammad Nabina
Binuru Atina
Min Makkah Habibi Nuru Sata' Aal Madinah
Min Salla Salatu, Wet'hala Bsifatu
Ya Bakht Elli Fdhelou Mechi, Yechfa'alu Fimamatu

Muhammad Our Prophet Guides Us With His Light
From Makkah, O Beloved His Light Was Glowing Over Madinah
He Who Prays His Prayers And Tries To Imitate His Attitudes
Oh How Lucky He Is Who Walks In His Presence
And Gains His Intercession After Death

Ya Imamna Ya Ameen
Ya Sanad Lil Muslimeen
Ya Habibi Ya Muhamad Ya Ibn Abdullah.
Tammet Irrisalat Tamam, Wel Habib Misk Elkhitam
Tul Hayati Wfslati Bad'i Assalli Warah

Oh Our Imam, The Trustworthy One
Oh Guardian & Support To All Muslims
Oh My Beloved Muhammad (S.a.w), The Son Of Abdullah
You Completed The Prophecies Completely
And The Beloved One Is The Sweetest Seal (Of The Prophets)

Min Awel Youm Fi O'mri, Seme't Abuya Wommi Bisallu Aalih
Allah Umma Salli Aalih
Habbibni Fil Iman, Hassesni Bil Amen, We T'ala't Bih
Allahuma Salli Wasallem Wabarek Aalih
Allahuma Salli Wasallem Wabarek Aalih
Nefsi Achufak Fil Manam... Ya Rasulallah.
Waabki Aala Kitfak Wanam... Ya Habiballah.
Wanul Charaf Lu'a Sohbitak
Wakhatti Fi Sfuf Ummitak
Wat'hama Fik

Throughout All My Life And In My Prayers, I Make A Supplication To Pray Behind Him [in The Next Life]
From The First Day In My Life That I Heard My Mother And Father Praying Upon Him
He Endeared Faith To Me, Granted Peace To Me & Made Me Love Him
Oh Allah Send Blessings & Peace Upon Him
Oh Allah Send Blessings & Peace Upon Him
I Wish To See You In My Dreams, O Messenger Of God
And I Cry On Your Shoulder & Sleep There, O Beloved Of God
And I Attain Honor With Your Accompaniment
And I Walk Among The Ranks Of Your Ummah
And I Am Protected By You

Ya Habibi Ya Taha, Ya Nagat Mel Mataha
Ghayart Edonya Fi I'inina Bin Lila Wdhu'haha
Min Salla Salatu, Wet'hala Bsifatu
Ya Bakht Elli Fdhelou Mechi, Yechfa'alu Fimamatu

Oh Beloved, O Pure One, You Who Had Survived The Maze
You Changed The World In Our Eyes Between A Night And Its Morning [referring To The Night Journey]
He Who Prays His Prayers And Tries To Improve His Attributes
How Lucky Is He Who Walks In His Shadow
And Adds To Him With His Death

1: Muhammad Nabiyyina (Urdu Version)
2:
Muhammad Nabiyyina, Muhammad Nabiyyina,
Ya Shahe Madina, Ya Shah-E-Madina
Teri Judai Mein Pal Pal Jalta Hai Yeh Seena,
Muhammada, Muhammada, Muhammada, Muhammada

Yeh Betaab Nigaahein,
Har Damm Ashq Bahaaye,
Dil Deta Hai Sadaaye,
Qadmon Mein Bulaaye,
Gardish Mein Hai Sitaara, Mushkil Ho Gaya Jeena.

Muhammada, Muhammada, Muhammada, Muhammada

Tez Bohat Hai Dhaara,
Mera Koun Sahaara,
Kar Do Ek Ishaara,
Toofan Banne Kinaara
Tere Hawale Hai Aaqa, Yeh Mera Safeena.

Muhammada, Muhammada, Muhammada, Muhammada

Waqt-E-Naza Jab Aa Jaaye,
Mujh Pe Karam Yeh Ho Jaaye,
Aal-E-Aba Ke Ho Saaye,
Naam Tera Lab Pe Jab Aaye,
Mohsin Ko Ho Jaaye Ata, Bas Khaak-E-Madina.

Muhammada, Muhammada, Muhammada, Muhammada

Muhammad Nabiyyina, Muhammad Nabiyyina,
Ya Shah-E-Madina, Ya Shah-E-Madina
Teri Judai Mein Pal Pal Jalta Hai Yeh Seena,
Muhammada, Muhammada, Muhammada, Muhammada

1: Muhammad Se Dil Ko Laga Kar To Dekho
2:
Muhammad Se Dil Ko Laga Kar To Dekho
Muqaddar Zara Aazma Kar To Dekho

Zara Unko Dil Me Basa Kar To Dekho
Zara Khud Ko Dil Se Bhula Kar To Dekho

Mala'ik Qadam Choom Lenge Tumhare
Zara Unki Basti Me Jaa Kar To Dekho

Idhar Saari Duniya Jhuka Degi Sar Ko
Sar Apna Udhar Tum Jhuka Kar To Dekho

Andhere Badal Jaayen Ge Raushni Se
Charagh-E-Mohabbat Jala Kar To Dekho

Wahi Wo Numaya Hai Surat Me Unki
Zara Parda-E-Meem Utha Kar To Dekho

Muqaddar Badal Ta Hai Unke Karam Se
Unhe Haal Apna Suna Kar To Dekho

Na Andwoh'e Mehshar Na Dozaq Ki Parwah
Bas Ek Baar Tum Muskura Kar To Dekho

Tumhari Mohabbat Ne Kya Kar Diya Hai
Zara 'muttaqui` Ko Bula Kar To Dekho

1: Mujh Ko Sarkar Ka Aastan Mil Gaya
2:
Mujh Ko Sarkar Ka Aasta(N) Mil Gaya
Main Zamee(N) Tha Mujhe Aasman Mil Gaya

Main Zameen Tha Mujhe Aasman Mil Gaya

Aap Ko Maang Kar Aur Maangu Mai Kya
Mustafa Mil Gaye Kul Jahan Mil Gaya

Main Zameen Tha Mujhe Aasman Mil Gaya

Ham Musibat Mein Ho Dil Dukhe Aapka
Dekho Kaisa Hamein Mehrban Mil Gaya

Main Zameen Tha Mujhe Aasman Mil Gaya

Hum Se Ache Hai Bas Wo Kabootar Jinhe
Us Gali Me Kaheen Ashiyaan Mil Gaya

Main Zameen Tha Mujhe Aasman Mil Gaya

Taaj Daron Ke Mehlo Ko Mera Salaam
Mujko Taiba Darul Ama Mil Gaya

Main Zameen Tha Mujhe Aasman Mil Gaya

Aake Baitha Hoon Dehleez-E-Sarkaar Par
Maine Jo Chaha Mujh Ko Yaha Mil Gaya

Main Zameen Tha Mujhe Aasman Mil Gaya

Hum The Gumnaam Apni Qabar Tak Na Thi
Aap Aye To Apna Nishaan Mil Gaya

Main Zameen Tha Mujhe Aasman Mil Gaya

Aapke Dar Ki Khayrat Kya Mil Gayi X 3
Mujh Se Pucho To Sara Jahan Mil Gaya

Main Zameen Tha Mujhe Aasman Mil Gaya

Mere Sarkaar Ki Sab Inayaat Hai
Tuj Ko Altaf Range Bayaan Mil Gaya

Main Zameen Tha Mujhe Aasman Mil Gaya

1: Mujh Ko Taiba Bulaa Hi Lete Hain
2:
Mujh Ko Taiba Bulaa Hi Lete Hain
Apna Mangta Banaa Hee Lete Hain

Mere Haalaat Unpe Hain Roshan
Tab To Bigri Banaa Hi Lete Hain

Koi Husn E ‘amal Nahi Phir Bhi
Mere Aaqa Nibhaa Hi Lete Hain

Jab Tadaptaa Hai Deed Ko Koi
Apna Jalwa Dikhaa Hi Dete Hain

Apne Shakir Ki Laaj Rakhte Hain
Apna Mehmaan Banaa Hee Lete Hain

1: Mujh Ko Taiba Main Bula Lo Shahe Zamani
2:
Mujh Ko Taiba Main Bula Lo Shah-E-Zamani
Shah-E-Zamani Aka Maki Madani
Dil Ki Hasrat Yeh Nikalo Shah-E-Zamani

Nagar Nagar Aur Dagar Dagar Phirta Hoon Mara Mara
Mujh Dukhiya Ka Is Duniya Main Koi Nahin Sahara
Tumhi Senay Say Laga Lo Shah-E-Zamani
Shah-E-Zamani Aqa Makki Madani

Dil Ki Hasrat Yeh Nikalo Shah-E-Zamani

Jo Bhi Aya Tumhare Dar Par Lauta Kabhi Na Khali
Har Mangte Ki Jholi Tumne Rehmat Se Bhar Daali
Tum Ho Aise Hi Dayalu Shahe Jamani
Hum Ko Taiba Me Bulalo Shahe Jamani

Dil Ki Hasrat Yeh Nikalo Shah-E-Zamani

Teri Ziarat Kay Hain Talib Kardo Dur Yeh Doori
Humain Dikha Do Apna Jalwa Kardo Hasrat Puri
Chehra Noorani Dikhado Shah-E-Zamani
Shah-E-Zamani Aka Maki Madani

Dil Ki Hasrat Yeh Nikalo Shah-E-Zamani

Haryale Gunbat Ka Manzar Jannat Se Hai Pyara
Kabay Ka Kaba Hai Roza Pyaray Nabi Tumhara
Jali Rozay Ki Dikha Do Shah-E-Zamani
Shah-E-Zamani Aka Maki Madani

Dil Ki Hasrat Yeh Nikalo Shah-E-Zamani

Rotay Rotay Omer Guzari Milan Ki Sham Na Aaee
Kiya Mairay Aaka Aap Ko Mairee Ata Pasand Na Aaee
Phir Kuoon Tum Nay Dair Lagaee Shah-E-Zamani
Shah-E-Zamani Aqa Makki Madani

Dil Ki Hasrat Yeh Nikalo Shah-E-Zamani

Dua Karo Sab Milkar Ki Shahbaz Madine Jaye
Jaakar Yeh Darbar E Nabi Me Apne Sees Navaye
Kehna Qadmo Me Bulalo Shahe Jamani
Hum Ko Taiba Me Bulalo Shahe Jamani

Dil Ki Hasrat Yeh Nikalo Shah-E-Zamani

1: Mujh Mein Unki Sana Ka Saleeqa Kahaan
2:
Mujh Mein Unki Sana Ka Saleeqa Kahaan
Woh Shaahe Do Jahaan Woh Kahaan Main Kahaan
Un Ka Mad-Ha Saraa Khaaliqe Asraa
Woh Rasoole Zamaan Woh Kahaan Main Kahaan

Un Ke Daaman Se Wabasta Meri Nijaat
Unpe Qurbaan Meri Hayaato Mamaat
Main Gunahgaar Woh Shaafaye Aasiyaan
Bekason Ki Amaan Woh Kahaan Main Kahaan

Woh Madina Nagina Jo Hai Arsh Ka
Woh Madina Bharam Jo Bana Farsh Ka
Woh Madina Jahaan Rehmate Bekaraan
Main Bhi Pahuchu Wahaan Woh Kahaan Main Kahaan

Shak Nahi Aye Riyaz Is Mein Hargiz Zara
Main Saraapa Khata Woh Saraapa Ata
Naam Un Ka Rahe Kyun Na Wirde Zubaan
Hai Jo Taskine Jaan Woh Kahaan Main Kahaan

1: Mujh Pe Maula Ka Karam Hai Unki Naatein Parhta Hoon
2:
Sallay Ala Nabiyenna Sallay Ala Muhammadin
Sallay Ala Shafiyena Sallay Ala Muhammadin

Mujh Pe Maula Ka Karam Hai Unki Naatein Parhta Hoon
Daaman Apna Rab Ki Rehmat Se Mein Har Dum Bharta Hoon

Mein Sadqay Ya Rasoolallah
Mein Sadqay Ya Habiballah

Dhoom Unn Ki Naat Khuwaani Ki Machatay Jayeinge
Ya Rasoolallah Ka Na’ra Lagatay Jayeinge
Na’t Khuwaani Maut Bhi Hum Se Chura Sakti Nahi
Qabr Mein Bhi Mustafa Ke Geet Gaatay Jayeinge

Mujh Pe Maula Ka Karam Hai Unki Naatein Parhta Hoon
Daaman Apna Rub Ki Rehmat Se Mein Har Dum Bharta Hoon

Kitna Bara Hai Mujh Pe Ye Ahsaan-E-Mustafa
Kehte Hain Log Mujh Ko Sana Khuwaan-E-Mustafa

Mujh Pe Maula Ka Karam Hai Unki Naatein Parhta Hoon
Daaman Apna Rub Ki Rehmat Se Mein Har Dum Bharta Hoon

Beher-E-Bakhshish Pass Apne Kuch Nahi Iske Siva
Umar Bhar Naatein Suneinge Aur Sunatay Jayeinge
Naat Khuwani Ka Nasha Nas Nas Mein Aisa Chah Gaya
Qabr Mein Bhi Geet Ubaid Ab Mustafa Ke Gayeinge

Mujh Pe Maula Ka Karam Hai Unki Naatein Parhta Hoon
Daaman Apna Rub Ki Rehmat Se Mein Har Dum Bharta Hoon

Koi Guftugu Ho Lab Per Tera Naam Agaya Hai
Tera Zikr Kartay Kartay Ye Maqaam Agaya Hai
Jissay Peekay Sheikh Sa’di Balaghal Ula Pukarein
Mere Dast-E-Na Tawaan Mein Wohi Jaam Agaya Hai

Mujh Pe Maula Ka Karam Hai Unki Naatein Parhta Hoon
Daaman Apna Rub Ki Rehmat Se Mein Har Dum Bharta Hoon

Tera Wasf Bayaan Ho Kisse Teri Kon Karega Barayei
Iss Gard-E-Safar Mein Gum Hai Jibreel-E-Ameen Ki Rasayei
Aey Raza Khud Sahib-E-Qur’an Hai Madaah-E-Rasool
Tujhse Kab Mumkin Hai Phir Midhat Rasoolallah Ki

Mujh Pe Maula Ka Karam Hai Unki Naatein Parhta Hoon
Daaman Apna Rub Ki Rehmat Se Mein Har Dum Bharta Hoon

Jitna Diya Sarkar Ne Mujhko Itni Meri Auqaat Nahi
Ye Tou Karam Hai Unka Warna Mujhe Mein Tou Aisi Baat Nahi
Ghaur Tou Kar Sarkar Ki Mujhper Kitni Khaas Inayat Hai
Kausar Tou Hai Unka Sana Khuwaan Ye Ma’mooli Baat Nahi

Mujh Pe Maula Ka Karam Hai Unki Naatein Parhta Hoon
Daaman Apna Rub Ki Rehmat Se Mein Har Dum Bharta Hoon

Gham Nahi Chordey Ye Saara Zamana Mujhko
Mere Aaqa Tou Hain Seenay Se Laganay Ke Liye
Bakhsh Dei Naat Ki Daulat Mere Aaqa Ne Mujhe
Kitnay Pyara Waseela Sarkar Ko Paanay Ke Liye

Mujh Pe Maula Ka Karam Hai Unki Naatein Parhta Hoon
Daaman Apna Rub Ki Rehmat Se Mein Har Dum Bharta Hoon

Seenay Mein Bhara Hai Teri Naaton Ka Khazana
Aalam Mein Lutata Hoon Kamayei Tere Dar Ki

Mujh Pe Maula Ka Karam Hai Unki Naatein Parhta Hoon
Daaman Apna Rub Ki Rehmat Se Mein Har Dum Bharta Hoon

Sadayein Duroodon Ki Aatei Raheingi
Jinhein Sunke Dil Shaad Shaad Hota Rahega
Khuda Ahl-E-Sunnat Ko Aabaad Rakhay
Muhammad Ka Milad Hota Rahega

Mujh Pe Maula Ka Karam Hai Unki Naatein Parhta Hoon
Daaman Apna Rub Ki Rehmat Se Mein Har Dum Bharta Hoon

Ab Ke Baras Bhi Hoonton Pe Unki Sana Rahei
Ab Ke Baras Bhi Wajd Mein Ghar Ki Fiza Rahei
Ab Ke Baras Bhi Madha Ke Khiltay Rahay Gulab
Ab Ke Baras Bhi Kasht-E-Dil-O-Jaan Sawar Rahi
Ab Ke Baras Bhi Lab Pe Taraana Tha Naat Ka
Ab Ke Baras Bhi Chaar Sou Mehki Saba Rahi

Ab Ke Baras Bhi Sheher-E-Sukhan Mein Thei Ronaqein
Ab Ke Baras Bhi Raqs Mein Meri Sada Rahi
Ab Ke Baras Bhi Shayr-O-Sukhan Se Theu Dosti
Ab Ke Baras Bhi Doston Hamd-O-Sana Rahei
Ab Ke Baras Bhi Tazkira-E-Mustafa Rahei
Ab Ke Baras Bhi Guftugu Sallay Ala Rahei

Mujh Pe Maula Ka Karam Hai Unki Naatein Parhta Hoon
Daaman Apna Rub Ki Rehmat Se Mein Har Dum Bharta Hoon

Awaaz Ubaid Teri Bafaizan-E-Naat Hee
Seenon Mein Aashiqan-E-Nabi Ke Utar Gayei

1: Mujhay Ataa Koii Naam Hoga Issi Tawaqqo Pay Ji Raha Huun
2:
Mujhay Ataa Koii Naam Hoga, Issi Tawaqqo Pay Ji Raha Huun
Mayra Bhi Koii Maqaam Hoga, Issi Tawaqqo Pay Ji Raha Huun

Madina E Paak Kay Safar Mayn Wo Marhalay Aa-Ayn Gay Yaqeenan
Safar Simatt Kar Dogaam Hoga, Issi Tawaqqo Pay Ji Raha Huun

Jahaan Ghulamaan E Mustafa Kay Hazaar Haan Qaafilay Rukayn Gay
Wahaan Mayra Bhi Qayaam Hoga, Issi Tawaqqo Pay Ji Raha Huun

Huzur Ki Bazm E Khaas Hogi Huzur Say Arz E Haal Hogi
Mujhay Bhi Izn E Kalaam Hoga, Issi Tawaqqo Pay Ji Raha Huun

Huzur Farma-Ayn Gay Yay Mujh Say, Hamayn Bhi Naatayn Sunaaii Ja-Ayn
Qaseedah Gustar Ghulaam Hoga, Issi Tawaqqo Pay Ji Raha Huun

1: Mujhe Apna Bana Lo Tum Khudara Ya Rasoolallah
2:
Mujhe Apna Bana Lo Tum Khudara Ya Rasoolallah
Karo Lutfo Karam Ka Ik Ishaara Ya Rasoolallah

Na Chedo Mujhko Aada Tum Ghulaam-E-Shaah-E-Bathaa Hu
Chali Aayegi Nusrat Gar Pukaara Ya Rasoolallah

Chupaao Jab Ke Daaman Mein Ghulaamo Ko Sar-E-Mahshar
Mile Mujko Bhi Chaadar Ka Kinaara Ya Rasoolallah

Tumhi Ho Qaasim-E-Ne’mat Milee Tum Se Hi Sab Ne’mat
Tumhare Tukdo Par Mera Guzaara Ya Rasoolallah

Ataa Ilme Ladunni Ho Mujhe Sadqe Me Haidar Ke
Jihaalat Ko Ho Mujh Se Ab Kinara Ya Rasoolallah

Meri Jholi Mein Sadqa Ghaus Ka Rakhde Huzoor-E-Man
Isi Ummeed Par Daaman Pasaara Ya Rasoolallah

Banaa Kar Saail-E-Taiba Meri Qismat Jagaayi Hai
Bulandi Par Hai Shaqkir Ka Sitaqra Ya Rasoolallah

Karo Maqbool Sunni Dawate Islami Ko Aaqa
Kare Hai Arz Ye Shakir Tumhara Ya Rasoolallah

1: Mujhe Bhi Madine Bula Mere Maula
2:
Mujhe Bhi Madine Bula Mere Maula
Karam Ki Tajalli Dikhaa Mere Maula
Bohot Bekaraari Ke Alam Me Hu Mai
Meri Bekaraari Mita Mere Maula

Suna Hai Madina Karam Hi Karam Hai
Tu Rakhta Jahan Main Sabhi Ka Bharam Hai
Tujhay Wasta Tere Pyare Nabi Ka
Meri Ab Tho Bigri Bana Mere Mola

Jisay Tu Nay Chaha Main Us Pay Fida Hoon
Main Tere Muhammad Ke Der Ka Gada Hoon
Tujhe Wasta Sayyed-E-Karbala Ka
Mujhe Her Bala Se Bacha Mere Mola

Muhammad Ko Tu Ne Jo Quran Deya Hai
Karoroon Diloon Main Mukamal Chupa Hai
Ay..quran Ke Khaliq Guzarish Hay Tujh Se
Mere Dil Main Quran Basa Mere Mola

Nigaho Se Pinhaa Kyun Manzil Meri Hai
Kyu Majdhar Me Naao Meri Phasi Hai
Khathaoo Ka Mara Bhi Paale Ga Sahil
Gar Aabid Ke Dil Me Samaa Mere Maula

Yeh Dono Jahan Tere Zer-E-Aser Hai
Jo Tujh Ko Na Maanain Bare Bekhaber Hai
Naheen Jante Jho Tere Ghazab Ko
Unhe Ghaflatoon Se Jaga Mere Mola

Shafa’t Ka Wada Keya Tu Nay Jis Se
Gunnah Gaaar Umeed Rekhtey Hai Tujh Se
Shafa’t Kerain Tujh Ss Ummat Ki Aqa
Tu Kerna Sabhi Ka Bhala Mere Mola

Meri Mushkile Gar Tera Ibtegha Hai
To Har Gham Qasam Se Khushi Ka Sama Hai
Gunaho Ki Mere Agar Ye Saza Hai
To Phir Mushkilo Ko Mita Mere Maula

1: Mujhe Dar Pay Phir Bulana Madani Madine Wale
2:
Mujhe Dar Pay Phir Bulana, Madani Madine Wale
Mae Ishq Bhi Pilana, Madani Madine Wale

Meri Aankh Me Samana, Madani Madine Wale
Banay Dil Tera Thikana, Madani Madine Wale

Teri Jab Ke Deed Hogi, Jabhi Meri Eid Hogi
Mere Khwaab Me Tum Ana, Madani Madine Wale

Mujhe Sab Sata Rahe Hain, Mera Dil Dukha Rahe Hain
Tumhi Hausla Badhana, Madani Madine Wale

Mere Sab Azeez Chootay, Mere Yaar Bhi To Roothay
Kaheen Tum Na Rooth Jana, Madani Madine Wale

Mai Agar Chay Hoon Kamina, Tera Hoon Shahe Madina
Mujhe Seenay Se Lagana, Madani Madine Wale

Tere Dar Se Shaha Behtar, Tere Aastaan Say Badhkar
Hai Bhala Koee Thikana, Madani Madine Wale

Tera Tujh Se Hoon Sawali, Shaha Phairna Na Khali
Mujhe Apna Tum Banana, Madani Madine Wale

Yeh Mareez Mar Raha Hai, Tere Haath Me Shafa Hai
Ai Tabeeb Jald Aana, Madani Madine Wale

Tu Hi Anbiya Ka Sarwar, Tu Hi Do Jahaan Ka Yawar
Tu Hi Reh-Baray Zamana, Madani Madine Wale

Tu Hai Be-Kasaun Ka Yawar, Ai Mere Ghareeb Parwar
Hai Sakhi Tera Gharana, Madani Madine Wale

Tu Khuda Ke Baad Behtar, Sabhi Say Mere Sarwar
Tera Haashmi Gharana, Madani Madine Wale

Teri Farsh Par Hukumat, Teri Arsh Par Hukumat
Tu Shahinsha E Zamanah, Madani Madine Wale

Tere Khalq Sab Say A’ala, Tera Husn Sab Say Pyara
Fida Tujh Pay Sab Zamanah, Madani Madine Wale

Kahoon Kis Say Aah Jakar, Sunay Kaun Mere Dil-Bar
Mere Dard Ka Fasana, Madani Madine Wale

Ba-A’ata E Rabb Daem, Tu Hi Rizq Ka Hai Qasim
Hai Tera Sab Aabo-Danah, Madani Madine Wale

Mai Ghareeb Bay-Sahara, Kahaan Aur Hai Guzara
Mujhe Aap Hi Nibhana, Madani Madine Wale

Yeh Karam Bada Karam Hai, Tere Haath Me Bharam Hai
Sar-E-Hashr Bakhsh-Wana, Madani Madine Wale

Kabhi Jau Ki Moti Roti, To Kabhi Khajoor Pani
Tera Aisa Sada Khana, Madani Madine Wale

Hai Chataee Ka Bichona, Kabhi Khaak Hi Pay Sona
Kabhi Haath Ka Sar-Hana, Madani Madine Wale

Teri Saadgi Pay Lakho, Teri Aajizi Pay Lakho
Ho Salaam-E-Ajizana, Madani Madine Wale

Mile Naza Me Raahat, Rahoon Qabr Me Salamat
Tu Azaab Say Bachana, Madani Madine Wale

Ai Shafi E Roz E Mehshar! Hai Gunah Ka Bojh Sar Par
Mai Phasaan Mujhe Bachana, Madani Madine Wale

Gup Andheri Qabr Me Jab, Mujhe Chor Kar Chale Sab
Meri Qabr Jug Magana, Madani Madine Wale

Mere Shah! Waqt E Rukhsat, Mujhe Meetha Meetha Sharbat
Teri Deed Ka Pilana, Madani Madine Wale

Pas Marg Sabz Gumbad, Ki Huzoor Thandi Thandi
Mujhe Chaoon Me Sulana, Madani Madine Wale

Mere Walidain Mehshar Mein, Go Bhool Jae Sarwar
Mujhe Tum Na Bhool Jana, Madani Madine Wale

Shaha Tangi Badi Hai, Yahaan Dhoop Bhi Kadi Hai
Shahe Hauz E Kauthar Aana, Madani Madine Wale

Mujhe Aafatun Ne Ghera, Hai Musibataun Ka Dayra
Ya Nabi Madad Ko Aana, Madani Madine Wale

Koee Is Taraf Bhi Phera, Ho Ghamaun Ka Door Andhera
Ai Sarapa Noor Aana, Madani Madine Wale

Kooe Pae Bakht War Gar, Hai Sharaf Shahi Se Badhkar
Teri Na’al E Pak Uthana, Madani Madine Wale

Mera Seena Ho Madina, Mere Dil Ka Aabgina
Bhi Madina Hi Banana, Madani Madine Wale

Ai Habeeb E Rabbe Bari, Hai Gunah Ka Bojh Bhari
Tumhi Hashr Me Churana, Madani Madine Wale

Meri Adatein Ho Behtar, Banu Sunnatun Ka Paikar
Mujhe Muttaqi Banana, Madani Madine Wale

Shaha Aisa Jazbah Paoon, Ke Mai Khoob Seekh Jaoon
Teri Sunnatein Sikhana, Madani Madine Wale

Tere Naam Par Ho Qurbaan, Meri Jaan Jane Jana
Ho Naseeb Sar Katana, Madani Madine Wale

Teri Sunnatun Par Chalkar, Meri Rooh Jab Nikal Kar
Chale Tum Gale Lagana, Madani Madine Wale

Hai Muballigh Aqa Jitne, Karo Door Unse Fitne
Buri Maut Say Bachana, Madani Madine Wale

Mere Ghouse Ka Waseela, Rahe Shaad Sab Qabeela
Inhe Khuld Me Basana, Madani Madine Wale

Mere Jis Qadar Hai Ahbaab, Inhe Karde Shaha Betaab
Milay Ishq Ka Khazana, Madani Madine Wale

Meri Anay Wali Naslein, Tere Ishq Hi Me Machlein
Unhe Nake Tum Banana, Madani Madine Wale

Milay Sunnataun Ka Jazbah, Mere Bhai Choray Maula
Sabhi Dadiyaan Mu’ndhaana, Madani Madine Wale

Mere Jis Qadar Hai Behne, Sabhi Kaash Burqa Pehne
Ho Karam Shahe Zamana, Madani Madine Wale

Do Jahaan Kay Khazanay, Diye Haath Me Khuda Ne
Tera Kaam Hai Lutana, Madani Madine Wale

Teri Gham Me Kaash Attar, Rahe Har Ghadi Giraftaar
Gham E Maal Say Bachana, Madani Madine Wale

1: Mujhe Mere Aaqa Bulaate Rahenge
2:
Mujhe Mere Aaqa Bulaate Rahenge
Madine Ka Mangta Banaate Rahenge

Dikhaa Sabz Gumbad To Boli Yeh Aankhen
Ke Palkon Ke Moti Lutaate Rahenge

Jinhey Ishq E Ahmed Ki Daulat Mili Hai
Unhen Simt E Jannat Bulaate Rahenge

Mujhe Qabr Ki Ab Nahi Koi Wehshat
Huzoor Apna Jalwah Dikhaate Rahenge

Hai Ai’zaaz Chaukhat Pey Baitha Hoon Unki
Yeh Qaasim Hain Ne’mat Lutaate Rahenge

Huwa Tum Pey Ramzan Mey Naazil Yeh Qur’an
Sunain Gey Usey Aur Sunaate Rahenge

Baney Wird E Salley ‘alaa Jis Ki ‘aadat
Usey Apna Keh Kar Bulaate Rahenge

Hai Shakir Ko Aaqa Karam Par Bharosa
Yahaan Bhi Wahaan Bhi Bachaate Rahenge

1: Mujhe Taiba Mein Le Jao Madina Yaad Aya Hai
2:
Mujhe Taiba Mein Le Jao Madina Yaad Aya Hai,
Mere Aqa Ko Bulwaao Madina Yaad Aya Hai,

Teri Mehfil Sajate Hai Tere Ham Geet Gaate Hai
Sarre Mehfil Chale Aao Madina Yaad Aya Hai,

Chale Hai Kafile Taiba Akela Chor Kar Mujh Ko
Mujhe Taiba Mein Ponchao Madina Yaad Aya Hai,

Teri Furkat Ne Mara Hai Teri Rehmat Sahara Hai
Kareebe Maarg Houn Aao Madina Yaad Aya Hai,

Meri Mayiyat Ko Le Jaao Madina Paak Mein Yaaro
Mujhe Taiba Mein Dafnaao Madina Yaad Aya Hai,

Hoyi Hai Jaan Ki Dushman Tere Tahir Ki Ye Duniya
Isse Kamli Mein Chupaao Madina Yaad Aya Hai,

Ye Tahir Tera Dewana Teri Ummat Ka Khadim Hai
Mission Is Ka Bhi Pahlaao Madina Yaad Aya Hai,

Gunah Garo, Khatakaro, Seyakaro Ke Aqa Ho
Na Jelani Ko Tukhrao Madina Yaad Aya Hai,

Meri Tehreekiye Dil Ka Madawa Tera Ana Hai
Mere Aqa Chale Aao Madina Yaad Aya Hai,

Teri Umaat Ko Mil Kar Gherouen Se Apno Ne Lota Hai
Issi Azmat Ko Lotao Madina Yaad Aya Hai,

Main Jetaa Roz Marta Hoon, Judaa’ii Seh Naheen Saktaa
Meray Aqa Ko Batlaao, Madinah Yaad Ayaa Hai

Madina Yaad Aya Hai, Madina Yaad Aya Hai
Madina Yaad Aya Hai, Madina Yaad Aya Hai

1: Mujko Darpesh Hai Fir Mubarak Safar Kaafla Fir Madine Ka Taiyyar Hai
2:
Mujko Darpesh Hai Fir Mubarak Safar Kaafla Fir Madine Ka Taiyyar Hai
Nakiyo Nahi Ka Nahi Tosha Nahi Faqat Meri Jholi May Ashqo Ka Ik Haar Hai.

Jurm Isyan Pe Apne Lajata Hua, Aur Ashqe Nadamat Bahata Hua
Teri Rehmat Pe Nazre Jamata Hua, Dar Pe Hazir Ye Tera Gunahgaar Hai

Koi Sajdo Ki Saugat Hai Na Koi Sohzo Taqwa Mere Paas Sarkar Hai
Chal Pada Hoo Madine Ki Janib Magar Haii Sar Par Gunaho Ka Ambar Hai.

Mujrimo Ko Saha Bakswata Hai Ti Sari Ummat Ki Bigdi Banata Hai Tu
Gam Ke Maaro Ko Seene Lagata Hai Tu Bekaso Gamzado Ka Tu Gamkhwar Hai

Tera Shani Kahan Shah E Kono Makan, Mujsa Aashin Ummat May Hoga Kahan
Tere Afwa Karam Shah E Do Jahan, Kya Koi Mujse Badhkar Bhi Haqdaar Hai.

Thokare Darbadar Kab Talak Khaoo May, Fir Madine Muqaddar Se Kab Aaoo May
Kash Qadmo May Sarkaar Mar Jaoo May, Ya Nabi Ye Tamnna E Attar Hai.

1: Mujrim Huwa Hai Haazir Jaali Ke Saamne
2:
Mujrim Huwa Hai Haazir Jaali Ke Saamne
Nazre Karam Ho Naazir Jaali Ke Saamne

Jurm O Gunaah Mere Had Se Siwaa To Kya Gham
Bulwaa Liyaa He Aakhir Jaali Ke Saamne

Hasnayn Ke Tasadduq Qismat Chamak Gayi Ab
Mangtey Huwe Jo Haazir Jaali Ke Saamne

Ban Jaaye Uski Bigri Jis Par Nazar Hey Daali
Iss Waaste Hoon Haazir Jaali Ke Saamne

Kyun Kar Phiroon Mai Dar Dar Jab Hoon Tera Gadaagar
Mangtaa Hoon Aagaya Phir Jaali Ke Saamne

Maqbool Hogi Beshak Har Ek Duaein Teri
Maangi He Jo Bhi Shakir Jaali Ke Saamne

1: Munawwar Meri Aankho Ko Mere Shamshudduha Kar De
2:
Munawwar Meri Aankho Ko Mere Shamshudduha Kar De
Ghamo Ki Dhoop Me Wo Saayae Zulfe Dota Kar De

Jahaan Bani Ataa Kar De Bhari Jannat Hiba Kar De
Nabi Mukhtare Qul Hai Jiss Ko Jo Chahe Ataa Kar De

Jahan Me Unki Chalti Hai Wo Dam-Me Kya Se Kya Kar De
Jameen Ko Aasmaa Kar De Suraiya Ko Sara Kar De

Fazaa Me Udne Waale Yu Na Itraye Nida Kar De
Wo Jab Chahe Jise Chahe Usme Farma Rawa Kar De

Meri Mushkil Ko Yu Aasaa Mere Muskil Kusha Kar De
Har Aik Mauje Balaa Ko Mere Maula Nakhuda Kar De

Ataa Ho Bekhudi Mujhko Khudi Meri Hawa Kar De
Mujhe Yu Apni Ulfat Me Mere Maula Fanaa Kar De

Jahaan Me Aam Paighame Shahe Ahmad Raza Kar De
Palat Kar Peeche Dekhe Fir Se Tajdeede Wafa Kar De

Nabi Se Jo Ho Begana Use Dil Se Juda Kar De
Pidar Madar Biradar Maalo Jaan Un Par Fida Kar De

Kisi Ko Wo Hasaate Hain Kisi Ko Wo Rulaate Hain
Wo Yu Hi Aazmate Hain Wo Ab To Faisla Kar De

Gile Taibah Me Mil Jau Gulome Milke Khiljau
Hayaate Jaavedaani Se Mujhe Yu Aashna Kar De

Mujhe Kya Fikr Ho Akhtar Mere Yaawar Hain Wo Yaawar
Balao Ko Meri Jo Khud Giraftare Balaa Kar De

1: Muntazir Dono Aalam The Jin Ke Liye
2:
Muntazir Dono Aalam The Jin Ke Liye
Aaye Wo Aur Faili Khushi Har Taraf
Unke Aate Hi Zulmat Ke Badal Chaten
Chayi Tauheed Ki Roshni Har Taraf

Aaye Jibreel Noorie Sawari Liye
La Makaa(N) Ki Taraf Mustafa Chal Diye
Farsh Se Arsh Tak Noor Hi Noor Tha
Dono Aalam Me Thi Sar Khushi Har Taraf.

Noor Kaisa Wo Gaare Hira Se Chala
Aaj Tak Jiski Nooraniyat Kam Nahi
Kitne Seene Me Wo Noor Mehfooz Hai
Chan Rahi Hai Wohi Raushni Har Taraf.

Taajdare Madina Chale Badr Ko
Teen Sau Terah(313) Noorie Sipaahi Liye
Utre Jibreel Malkooti Lashkar Liye
Khil Uthi Fatha Ki Chandni Har Taraf.

Jab Uhad Me Mere Aaqa Zakhmi Hue
Khalbali Mach Gayi Saare Ashaab Me
Chand Taiba Ka Palbhar Ko Kya Chup Gaya
Cha Gayi Thi Faza Me Maatami Har Taraf.

Ye Lua’be Nabi Ka Hi Ajaaz Tha
Dukhti Aankhen Ali Ki Bhali Ho Gayi
Baabe Khaibar Ukhaada Ba Chasme Zadan
Goonj Utha Naara E Haidari Har Taraf.

Sabz Gumbad Ki Ranaaiya Kya Kahu
Mamba E Noor Hai Qibla E Ahle Dil
Yaan Wo Aaram Farmaan Hai Jinke Liye
Rab Ne Takhleeq Ki Zindagi Har Taraf.

Urse Sayyed Miyan Ka Wo Shohra Hua
Is Qadar Ra’ub Barkaatiyat Ka Badha
Saare Dushman Pareshano Hairan Hai
Unke Halqo Me Hai Khalbali Har Taraf.

Nazmi Tere Liye Naat Ne’mat Bani
Ye Meem E Muhammad Ka Ajaaz Hai
Noor O Nikhat Ka Haamil Hai Tera Qalam
Kar Raha Hai Jo Zikre Nabi Har Taraf.

1: Muraadein Mil Rahi Hain Shaad Shaad Unka Suwali Hai
2:
Muraadein Mil Rahi Hain Shaad Shaad Unka Suwali Hai
Labo(N) Par Iltija Hai Haath Mein Rouze Ki Jaali Hai

Teri Soorat Teri Seerat Zamane Se Nirali Hai
Teri Har Har Adaa Praye Daleel E Be-Misaali Hai

Wo Hain Allah Waale Jo Tujhe Waali Kahein Apna
Ke Tu Allah Waala Hai Tera Allah Waali Hai

Faqeero(N) Be-Nawao(N) Apni Apni Jholiya(N) Bhar Lo
Ke Bara Bat Raha Hai Faiz Par Sakaar E Aali Hai

Nikala Kab Kisi Ko Bazme Faiz E Aam Se Tumne
Nikali Hai To Aane Waalo(N) Ki Hasrat Nikali Hai

Khuda Shahid Ke Rouz E Hashr Ka Khatka Nahi Rehta
Mujhe Jab Yaad Aata Hai Ke Mera Koun Waali Hai

Hasan Ka Dard O Dukh Mouquf Farma Kar Bahaali Do
Tumhare Haath Mein Dunya Ki Mouqufi Bahaali Hai

1: Muskura Do Do Alam Badal Jaega
2:
Muskura Do Do Alam Badal Jaega
Yeh Nizame Do Alam Sambhal Jaega
Ya Nabi Ya Nabi…
Ya Nabi Ya Nabi…

Aap Ae Zamana Fida Hogeya
Arsh Jhuk Kar Adab Se Khara Hogeya
Lamakan Pe Bhi Shor Bhapha Hogeya
Aaj Paida Habibe Khuda Hogeya

Kyoun Manaye Na Id-E-Milad Nabi
Aaj Ke Din The Ae Hamare Nabi
Aisi Rahmat Karam Ki Si Baad Chali
Asiyon Ko Kare Ik Nazr Mein Wali

Aaj Jhumo Ke Ae Hain Khayr Ul-Bashar
Aaj Gao Ke Thanda Hai Rabb Ka Sahar
Un Ke Hote Hue Ke Sadr Kya Fikr
Waste Hamare Kya Ji Qadr

Torre Qadmoun Ko Chumo Yeh Dil Ki Lagan
Torre Jute Uthane Ko Machle Yeh Man
Torre Pao Dabao Kahe Mera Man
Shaha Kuch To Mujhe Mere Man Ki Lagan

Zaate Ahmad Se Dil Ko Taharat Mille
Dil Ko Taskin, Ruh Ko Sarawat Mille
Dil Lagane Se Tum Ko Phir Allah Mille
Woh Muhammad Hain Unse Sab Kuch Mille

Torri Chokat Pe Baitha Rahun Har Ghari
Torra Darwaza Khatta Rahun Har Ghari
Torri Naatein Shaha Main Likhoun Har Ghari
Torri Rahmat Ko Takta Har Ghari

1: Mustafa Aa Gaey Mustafa Aa Gaey
2:
Chaar Su Rahmatoon Ke Ujaale Huwey
Bazm-E-Kowneyn Ke Peyshwaa Aa Gaey
Zaraey Aflaak Se Baatein Karney Lagey
Mustafa Aa Gaey Mustafa Aa Gaey

Gham Ke Maarey Huwey Muskaraaney Lagey
Zulmatoon Ke Makeen Jagmagaane Lagey
Be Kasoon Ke Muqaddar Thekaaney Lagey
Sab Ke Muhsin Habeeb-E-Khuda Aa Gaey

Hazrat-E-Musa Jin Ko Taraste Rahey
Ibn-E-Maryam Bhi Jin Ki Khabar Dey Gaey
Pehley Aaey Huwey Jin Ke Peechay Kharhey
Aaj Woh Khaatim-Ul-Anmbiya Aa Gaey

Be Zabaanon Ko Tarz-E-Sadaa Bakhsh Di
Fani Insaaniyat Ko Baqaa Bakhsh Di
Dushman-E-Jaan Ki Har Ik Khata Bakhsh Di
Ban Key Rehmat Shafi-Ul-Waraa Aa Gaey

Shab Gazeedah Ko Nur-E-Sahar De Diya
Kor-E-Deedah Ko Zowq-E-Nazar De Diya
Be Nawa Ko Dua Ka Asar De Diya
Saari Makhlooq Ka Aasra Aa Gaey

Zikr Keysey Karon Wasf Sarkar Ka
Kya Bayan Ho Samaan Un Ke Darbaar Ka
Dil Zahuri Bana Matla’ Anwaar Ka
Jab Tasawwur Mein Woh Dilrubaa Aa Gaey

1: Mustafa Aap Ke Jaisa Koi Aaya Hi Nahi
2:
Mustafa Aap Ke Jaisa Koi Aaya Hi Nahi
Ata Bhi Kaise Jab Allah Ne Banaya Hi Nahi

Koi Sani Na Hai Rab Ka Na Mere Aaqa Ka
Ek Ka Jism Nahi Ek Ka Saya Hi Nahi

Zulf Vallayl Hai, Rukh Wadduha Mazad Aakhen
Is Tarha Rab Ne Kisi Ko Bhi Sajaya Hi Nahi

Aap Ne Jab Se Nawaza Hai Ya Rasulallah
Maine Daman Kisi Chokhat Pe Bichhaya Hi Nahi

Jisne Sarkar Ke Chehre Ki Ziyarat Ki Hai
Us Ki Nazron Me Koi Aur Samaya Hi Nahi

Jab Kha Kabr Me Sarkar Ne Ye Mera Hai
Fir Farishto Ne Mujhe Haath Lagaya Hi Nahi

Laut Kar Aa Gaya Makke Se Madine Na Gaya
Kaise Jata Tuje Aaqa Ne Bulaya Hi Nahi

Jabse Darwaze Pe Likha Maine Ala Hazrat
Koi Gustakh E Nabi Ghar Mere Aya Hi Nahi

Jab Talak Pusht Pe Shabbir Rahe Aye Faizy
Sar Ko Sajde Se Payambar Ne Uthaya Hi Nahi

----------------- Version -----------------

Mustafa Aap Ke Jaisa Koi Aaya Hi Nahi
Aap Ke Jaisa Koi Rab Ne Banaya Hi Nahi

Har Fazilat Mein Hai Yakta Mere Madani Aaqa
Aapka Saani To Kya Aapka Saaya Hi Nahi

Lamha Lamha Mere Aaqa Ki Inayat Mujh Par
Mujh Ko Tanhaai Ka Ehsaas Dilaya Hi Nahi

Aapki Shaan Rosool E Arabi Kya Kehna
Khali Daman Kisi Mangta Ko Phiraya Hi Nahi

Shab E Meraj Ke Dulha Ke Siwa Auro Ko
Apna Jalwa Mere Maula Ne Dikhaya Hi Nahi

Wo To Kuch Asia Karam Karte Hai Mujh Aasi Par
Zindagi Mein Gham Maine Uthaya Hi Nahi
