Dil Madine Se Palta Kar Kabhi Aaya Hi Nahi

1: Mustafa E Zaat E Yakta Aap Hain
2:
Mustafa E Zaat E Yakta Aap Hain
Yak Ne Jisko Yak Banaya Aap Hain

Aabo Gil Mein Noor Ki Pehli Kiran
Jaane Aadam Jaane Hawwa Aap Hain

La Makaan Tak Jis Ki Phaili Raushni
Wo Charaage Aalam Aara Aap Hain

Hai Namak Jis Ka Khameer E Husn Mein
Wo Maleehe Husn Aara Aap Hain

Naazish E Arsho Waqaar E Arshiyaan
Saahibe Qausain O Adna Aap Hain

Aap Ki Tal'at Khuda Ka Aaina
Jis Mein Chamke Haq Ka Jalwa Aap Hain

Aap Jaisa Koyi Ho Sakta Nahi
Apni Har Khoobi Mein Tanha Aap Hain

Aapko Rab Ne Kiya Apna Habeeb
Saari Khalqat Ka Khulasa Aap Hain

Aapki Tal'at Ko Dekha Jaan Di
Qabr Mein Pohcha To Dekha Aap Hain

Aapki Khatir Banaye Do Jahaan
Apni Khatir Jo Banaya Aap Hain

Jaan Tui Jaanam Qaraare Jaan Tui
Jaane Jaan Jaane Maseeha Aap Hain

Aapse Khud Aap Ka Saail Hun Main
Jaane Jaan Meri Tamanna Aap Hain

Bar Darad Aamad Gada Behre Salaam
Ho Bhala Akhtar Ka Daata Aap Hain

1: Mustafa Ka Khuda Aur Khud Mustafa
2:
Mustafa Ka Khuda Aur Khud Mustafa
Kyu Kahu Mera Koi Sahara Nahi

Unke Dar Ka Gada Aur Mayoos Ho,
Mere Sarkar Ko Yeh Gawara Nahi.

Mai Madine Se Lekin Bohot Door Hu
Yeh Khalish Mere Dil Ko Gawara Nahi

Aap Ka Ishq Hai Ishq E Rab Ul Ula
Aap Ka Zikr Hai Khaas Zikre Khuda
Khud Khuda Ne Yeh Quran Me Ailaan Kiya
Joh Tumhara Nahi Woh Hamara Nahi

Thokaro Ke Siwa Aur Payega Kya
Jiski Manzil Ko Koi Na Ho Rahnuma
Apni Manzil Pe Hargiz Na Pahuchega Woh
Hath Me Jike Daaman Tumhara Nahi

Ism E Ahmed Ki Ta`azim Ke Munqeero
Unki Azmat Ko Quran Me Dekh Lo
Be Laqab Unka Ism E Mubarak Kabhi
Unke Ma`bood Ne Bhi Pukara Nahi

Aql E Jinn O Bashar Ka Yaha Zikr Kya
Sidrah Waale Jaha Dang O Hairan Hai
Rif`at E Mustafa Ki Mile Hadh Kisse
Yeh Who Dariya Hai Jiska Kinara Nahi

Wohi Roaze Pe Bulwayege Ek Din
Aye Sikandar Zara Sabr Se Kaam Le
Unke Dar Ka Gadha Aur Mayoos Ho
Mere Sarkar Ko Yeh Gawara Nahi

Ya Nabi Apni Ulfat Ki Soughaat De,
Apni Shayan-E-Shah Mujhko Khayraat De.
Iss Se Matlab Nahi Hai, Siwa Ho Ke Kamm,
Shaala Wasda Raawe Tera Sohna Haram.

Mere Haathon Mein Kaasa Hai Umeed Ka,
Hoon Bhikari Shaha Teri Deed Ka.
Ik Jhalak Hi Dikha De Nabi Mohtasham,
Shaala Wasda Rawe Tera Sohna Haram.

Mere Haathon Mein Kaasa Hai Umeed Ka,
Hoon Bhikari Shaha Teri Deed Ka.
Main Gada-E-Haram, Tu Nabi Mohtasham,
Shaala Wasda Rawe Tera Sohna Haram.

1: Mustafa Khairul Wara Ho
2:
Mustafa Khairul Wara Ho
Sarware Har Do Sara Ho

Apne Achho Ka Tasadduq
Hum Bado(N) Ko Bhi Niba Ho

Kiske Fir Ho Kar Rahe Hum
Gar Tumhi Humko Na Chaho

Badd Ha(N)se Tum Unki Khaatir
Raat Bhar Rouo Karaho

Badd Kare Har Dam Burayi
Tum Kaho Unka Bhala Ho

Hum Wahi Nashusta Ru Hai
Tum Wahi Bahre Ataa Ho

Hum Wahi Shayane Rad Hai
Tum Wahi Shaan E Sakhaa Ho

Hum Wahi Be Sharmo Badd Hai
Tum Wahi Kaan E Haya Ho

Hum Wahi Nange Zafa Hai
Tum Wahi Jaan E Wafa Ho

Hum Wahi Kabil Saz Ke
Tum Wahi Rehme Khuda Ho

Charkh Badle Dahar Badle
Tum Badalne Se Wara Ho

Ab Hume Ho Sahw Hasha
Aisi Bhulo Se Juda Ho

Umr Bhar To Yaad Rakha
Waqt Par Kyu Bhulna Ho

Waqte Paidaish Na Bhule
Qaif Yansa Kyo Kaza Ho

Ye Bhi Maula Arz Kar Du
Bhul Agar Jaao To Kya Ho

Wo Ho Jo Tum Par Gira(N) Hai
Wo Ho Jo Hargiz Na Chaho

Wo Ho Jiska Naam Lete
Dushmano Ka Dil Bura Ho

Wo Ho Jiske Radd Ki Khaatir
Raat Din Wakf E Dua Ho

Mar Mite Barbaad Bande
Khana Aabad Aagh Ka Ho

Shaad Ho Ibleese Mal-U(N)
Ghum Kise Is Kahar Ka Ho

Tumko Wo Wallah Tum Ko
Jaan O Dil Tum Par Fida Ho

Tumko Ghum Se Haq Bachaye
Ghum Adu Ko Jaa(N) Guza Ho

Tumse Ghum Ko Kya Ta'alluk
Be-Kaso Ke Ghumzada Ho

Haq Durude Tum Pe Bheje
Tum Mudaam Usko Saraho

Wo Ataa De Tum Ataa Lo
Wo Wahi Chahe Jo Chaho

Bar Tu Uu Paashad Tu Bar Ma
Ta Abad Ye Silsila Ho

Kyu Raza Mushkil Se Dariye
Jab Nabi Mushkil Kusha Ho

1: Mustafa Se Jab Tumhara Silsila Mil Jayega
2:
Mustafa Se Jab Tumhara Silsila Mil Jayega
Khud Ba Khud Aye Dhoodne Waaalo Khuda Mil Jayega

Kya Bataoon Unke Dar Pe Jaake Kya Mil Jayega
Jo Talab Hogi Talab Se Bhi Siwaa Mil Jayega

Gham Nahi Gum Ho Bhi Jayein, Raahe Firdouse Baree
Mustafa Ka Naam Lunga, Raasta Mil Jayega

Unke Sadqe Mein Khuda Se Maang Kar Dekhe Koi
Mudda’i Ke Lab Hilenge Mudda’a Mil Jayega

Naam Unka Waqte Muskhil Le Ke Dekho To Zaraa
Na Umeedi Mein Bhi Dil Ko Aasra Mil Jayega

1: Muzdabaad Aye Aasiyo Shaafe Shahe Abraar Hai
2:
Muzdabaad Aye Aasiyo Shaafe' Shahe Abraar Hai
Tehniyat Aye Mujrimo Zaate Khuda Gaffaar Hai

Arsh Sa Farshe Zamee(N) Hai Farshe Pa Arshe Baree(N)
Kya Niraali Tarz Ki Naame Khuda Raftaar Hai

Chand Shaq Ho Ped Bole(N) Jaanwar Sajde Kare(N)
'baarak-Allah' Marjaye Aalam Yehi Sarkaar Hai

Jin Ko Suye Aasmaa(N) Failaa Ke Jal Thal Bhar Diye
Sadqa Un Haatho(N) Ka Pyare Hum Ko Bhi Darkaar Hai

Lab Julaale Chashmaye Kun Mein Gundhe Waqte Khameer
Murde Zinda Karna Aye Jaa(N) Tum Ko Kya Dushwaar Hai

Gore Gore Paau(N) Chamka Do Khuda Ke Waaste
Noor Ka Tadka Ho Pyare Gor Ki Shab Taar Hai

Tere Hi Daaman Pe Har Aasi Ki Padti Hai Nazar
Ek Jaane Be Khata Par Do Jahaa(N) Ka Baar Hai

Joshe Toofaa(N) Behre Be Paayaa(N) Hawa Na-Saazgaar
Nooh Ke Maula Karam Kar Le To Beda Paar Hai

Rehmatullil Aalamee(N) Teri Duhaai Dab Gaya
Ab To Maula Be Tarah Sar Par Gunah Ka Baar Hai

Hairate(N) Hain Aaina Daare Wufoore Wasfe Gul
Un Ke Bulbul Ki Khamoshi Bhi Labe Izhaar Hai

Goonj Goonj Utthe Hain Nagmaate Raza Se Bostaa(N)
Kyun Na Ho Kis Phool Ki Midhat Mein Waa Minqaar Hai

1: Na Aasmaan Ko Yun Sar Kashida Hona Tha
2:
Na Aasmaan Ko Yun Sar Kashida Hona Tha
Huzoore Khaake Madina Khameeda Hona Tha

Agar Gulon Ko Khaza Na Raseeda Hona Tha
Kanaare Khaare Madina Dameeda Hona Tha

Huzoor Unke Khilafe Adab Thi Betaabi
Meri Umeed! Tujhe Aarmeeda Hona Tha

Nazara Khaake Madina Ka Aur Teri Aankh
Na Is Qadar Bhi Qamar Shokh Deeda Hona Tha

Kanaare Khaake Madina Mein Rahate Mili
Dile Hazee(N)! Tujhe Ashke Chakeeda Hona Tha

Panahe Daamane Dashte Haram Mein Chain Aata
Na Sabre Dil Ko Gazale Rameeda Hona Tha

Ye Kaise Khulta Ki Unke Siwa Shafee’ Nahi
Abas Na Auro Ke Aage Tapeeda Hona Tha

Hilaal Kaise Na Banta Ki Maahe Kaamil Ko
Salaame Abruye Shah Me Rameeda Hona Tha

La Amla Anna Jahannam Tha Wa’daye Azli
Na Munkiro Ka Abas Bad Aqeeda Hona Tha

Naseem Kyun Na Shameem Unki Taiba Se Laati
Ki Subhe Gul Ko Gireeba(N) Dareeda Hona Tha

Tapakta Range Junoo(N) Ishqe Shah Me Har Gul Se
Rage Bahaar Ko Nishtar Raseeda Hona Tha

Baja Tha Arsh Pe Khaake Mazare Paak Ko Naaz
Ki Tujhsa Arsh Nashee(N) Aafreeda Hona Tha

Guzarte Jaan Se Ik Shore ‘ya Habeeb’ Ke Saath
Fugaa(N) Ko Naalaye Halqe Bureeda Hona Tha

Mere Kareem Gunah Zahar Hai Magar Aakhir
Koi To Shahde Shafa’at Chasheeda Hona Tha

Jo Sange Dar Pe Jabee(N) Saaiyon Mein Tha Mitna
To Meri Jaan Sharaare Jaheeda Hona Tha

Teri Qaba Ke Na Kyun Neeche Neeche Daaman Ho
Ki Khaaksaaro Se Ya(N) Kab Kasheeda Hona Tha

Raza Jo Dil Ko Banana Tha Jalwa Gaahe Habeeb
To Pyare Qaide Khudi Se Raheeda Hona Tha

1: Na Arsh Aiman Na Inni Zaahib Mein Mehmaani Hai
2:
Na Arsh Aiman Na 'inni Zaahib' Mein Meh-Maani Hai
Na Lutfe 'udnu Ya Ahmed' Naseebe 'lan-Taraanee' Hai

Naseebe Dostaa(N) Gar Unke Dar Par Maut Aani Hai
Khuda Yoon Hi Kare Phir To Humesha Zindagaani Hai

Usi Dar Par Tadapte Hain Machalte Hain Bilakte Hain
Utha Jaata Nahin Kya Khoob Apni Na-Tawaani Hai

Har Ik Deewaro Dar Par Mehr Ne Ki Hai Jabee(N) Saaee
Nigaare Masjide Aqdas Mein Kab Sone Ka Paani Hai

Tere Mangta Ki Khaamoshi Shafa'at Khwaah Hai Uski
Zabaane Be Zabaani Tarjumaane Khasta Jaani Hai

Khule Kya Raaze Mehboobo Muhib Mastaane Gaflat Par
Sharaabe 'qad-Ra-Al-Haq' Zaibe Jaame 'man-Ra-Aanee' Hai

Jahaa(N) Ki Khaak-Roobi Ne Chaman-Aara Kiya Tujh Ko
Saba Humne Bhi Un Galiyon Ki Kuch Din Khaak Chaani Hai

Shahaa Kya Zaat Teri Haq Numa Hai Farde Imqaa(N) Mein
Ki Tujhse Koi Awwal Hai Na Tera Koi Saani Hai

Kahaa(N) Us Kushke Jaane Jinaa(N) Mein Zar Ki Naqqashee
Iram Ke Taaire Range Pareeda Ki Nishaanee Hai

'ziyabun Fee Thiyaabin' Lab Pe Kalma Dil Mein Gustaakhi
Salaam Islaamo Mulhid Ko Ki Tasleeme Zabaani Hai

Ye Aksar Saath Unke Shaa-Nao Miswaak Ka Rehna
Bataata Hai Ki Dil-Resho(N) Pe Zaaid Meherbaani Hai

Isi Sarkaar Se Dunya Wa Dee(N) Milte Hai Saail Ko
Yahi Darbaare Aali Kanze Aamaalo Amaani Hai

Duroode Soorate Haala Muheete Maahe Taiba Hain
Barasta Ummate Aasi Pe Ab Rehmat Ka Paani Hai

Ta'aa-Lallah Istigna Tere Dar Ke Gadaaon Ka
Ki Inko Aar Farro Shaukate Saahib Kiraani Hai

Woh Sargarme Shafa'at Hain Araq Afshaa(N) Hai Peshaani
Karam Ka Itr Sandal Ki Zamee(N) Rehmat Ki Ghaani Hai

Yeh Sar Ho Aur Woh Khaake Dar Woh Khaake Dar Ho Aur Ye Sar
Raza Woh Bhi Agar Chaahen To Ab Dil Mein Yeh Thaani Hai

1: Na Baharein Na Hi Gulzaar Nazar Aate Hain
2:
Na Baharein Na Hi Gulzaar Nazar Aate Hain
Jiss Taraf Dekh Lo Sarkar Nazar Aate Hain

Aaj Bik Jaun, Ke Yeh Mauka Na Ayega Kabhi
Aaj Woh Khud Hi Kharidaar Nazar Aate Hain

Aise Lagta Hai Mere Aaqa Challe Aate Hain
Raqs Karte Dar-O-Deewar Nazar Aate Hain

Ankh Se Ansoo Nahi, Sajde Gira Karte Hain
Jab Tere Gumbad-O-Minaar Nazar Aate Hain

Jis Ki Qismat Mein Ho Taiba Ki Galli Ke Phere
Woh Na Jannat Ke Tallabgaar Nazar Aate Hain

Aise Lagta Hai Mere Aaqa Challe Aate Hain
Wajd Karte Dar-O-Deewar Nazar Aate Hain

Qadmon Ka Kaam Hai Yeh Dagmaagate Hain
Dil To Gir Jaayein Jahaan Wahin Parre Rehte Hain

Unke Aane Ki Gharri Hai Woh Hain Aane Waale
Mere Sarkar Ki Mehfil Ko Hum Saajaye Hue Hain

Maine Meraj Ki Shab Baat Yeh Jaani Hai Sammi
Jo Ho Dilbar Unhein Dildaar Nazar Aate Hain

Na Baharein Na Hi Gulzaar Nazar Aate Hain
Jiss Taraf Dekh Lo Sarkar Nazar Aate Hain

1: Na Chedo Zirk E Jannat Ab Madinah Yaad Aya Hai
2:
Na Chedo Zirk E Jannat Ab Madinah Yaad Aya Hai
Nabi Ka Sabz Gumbad Dil Ki Aankhaon Me Samaya Hai

Mila Karti Hai Mooh Maange Muradein Unke Rauze Par
Ghulamau Ne Tere Dar Se Jo Maanga Hai Woh Paya Hai

Khuda Ki Sultanat Ke Tum Ho Dulha Ya Rasoolullah
Tumhare Waaste Rabb Ne Yeh A’alam Sajaya Hai

Shabe Asra Mubarak Baad Dee Yeh Hooraun Ne
Muhammed Ko Khuda E Pak Ne Dulha Banaya Hai

Namazaun Me Azaan Me Kalmah Me Aur Arsh Par Har Ja
Khuda Ne Naam Tera Naam Se Apne Milaya Hai

Zameen Ko Cheerte Daude Huwe Aae Hai Khidmat Me
Darakhtaun Ne Isharah Aapka Jis Waqt Paya Hai

Tumhari Zaat Par Kyun Kar Bharosa Ho Na Alam Ko
Gunah-Garaun Ko Tumne Naar E Dozakh Se Bachaya Hai

Ijabat Ne Liya Bosah Tumhare Pyare Hotaun Ka
Dua Ke Waaste Jis Waqt Tum Ne Lab Hilaya Hai

Koee Pur Saane Haal Apna Nahi Hai Ya Rasoolullah
Jo Apna Hai To Tu Hai Aur Baqi Sab Paraya Hai

Sana E Mustafa Woh Bhi Rawayat E Sahiha Se
Jameele Qadri Kya Khoob Tere Paas Maya Hai

1: Na Ho Aram Jis Bimar Ko Saarey Zamaaney Sey
2:
Na Ho Aram Jis Bimar Ko Saarey Zamaaney Sey
Utha Ley Jaaey Thori Khak Unkey Aastaney Sey

Tumharey Dar, Ke Tukron Sey, Bara Palta Hai Ik Aalam
Guzaara Sab Ka Hota Hey, Issee Muhtaj Khaaney Sey.

Koi Firdous Ho Ya Khuld Ho, Hum Ko Ghalat Mutlab
Lagaya Ab To Bistar Aap Hee Key Aastaney Sey.

Na Kyun Un Kee Taraf Allah, So So Piyaar Sey Deykey.
Jo Apni Aankey Maltey Hain, Tumhaarey Aastaney Sey.

Tumhaarey To Woh Ihsaan Aur Na-Farmaaniyan Apni
Hamein To Sharam See Aathi Hai Tum Ko Munh Dikhaaney Sey

Bahaarey Khuld Sadqey Ho Rahi Hey Ruuh-E Aashiq Par
Killi Jaatee Hain Kaliyan Dil, Teree Muskaraney Sey

Zamin Thori See Dey Dey Bahr-E Madfan Un Key Kuchey May
Laga Dey Merey Piyaaray Meri Mittee Bhi Tikaaney Sey

Falak Ka Hai Jo Zaahir Uss Sey Kehta Hai Naseeb Us Ka
Arey Ghaafil Kaza Behtar,yahaan Say Phir Ke Jaaney Sey

Bulalo Apney Dar Par Ab, To Hum Khaanah Nadoshoo Ko
Phirey Kub Tak Zaleel-O Khwaar Be Dar Dar Tikaaney Sey

Na Pahunchey Un Key Kadmoh Tak, Na Kuch Husn-E Amal Hee Hey
Hassan Kiya Puchtey Ho Hum Gayeh Guzrey Zamaaney Sey

Na Ho Araam Jis Bimaar, Ko Saarey Zamanay Sey
Utha Ley Jaaey Thori Khaak Unkey Aastaney Sey.

1: Na Kaleem Ka Tasawwur Na Khiyaale Ture Sinaa
2:
Na Kaleem Ka Tasawwur Na Khiyaal-E-Tur-E-Sinaa
Meri Aarzu Muhammad Meri Justuju Madinah

Main Gadaae Mustafa Hun Meri Azmatein Nah Poocho
Mujhe Deykh Kar Jahannam Ko Bhi Aa Geya Paseenah

Mujhe Dushmano Nah Cherho Mera Koi Hai Jahaan Main
Main Abhi Pukaar Lun Ga Naheen Dur Hai Madinah

Main Mareez-E-Mustafa Hun Mujhe Cherho Nah Tabibo
Meri Zindagi Jo Chaaho Mujhe Le Chalo Madinah

Meray Dubne Main Baqi Nah Koi Kasar Rahi Thi
Kahaa “almadad Muhammad” Tho Ubhar Geyaa Safinah

Siwaa Is Ke Meray Dil Mein Koi Aarzu Nahein Hai
Mujhe Mowt Bhi Jo Aaey Tho Ho Saamne Madinah

Kabhi Aey Shakeel Dil Se Nah Mite Khiyaal-E-Ahmad
Isi Arazu Mein Marna Isi Arazu Mein Jeena.

1: Naare Dozakh Ko Chaman Kar De Bahare Aariz
2:
Naare Dozakh Ko Chaman Kar De Bahare Aariz
Zulmate Hashr Ko Din Kar De Nahare Aariz

Main To Kya Cheez Hoon Khud Sahibe Qur’an Ko Shaha
Laakh Mushaf Se Pasand Aayi Bahare Aariz

Jaise Qur’an Hai Wird Use Gule Mehboobi Ka
Yun Hi Qur’aa(N) Ka Wazifa Ha Waqare Aariz

Garche Qur’aa(N) Hai Na Qur’aa(N) Ki Barabar Lekin
Kuch To Hai Jis Pe Hai Woh Madha Nigaare Aariz

Toor Kya Arsh Jale Dekh Ke Woh Jalwaye Garm
Aap Aariz Ho Magar Aainaye Daare Aariz

Turfa Aalam Hai Woh Qur’an Idhar Dekhe(N) Udhar
Mushafe Paak Ho Hairane Bahare Aariz

Tarjama Hai Ye Sifat Ka Woh Khud Aainaye Zaat
Kyun Na Mushaf Se Zyada Ho Waqare Aariz

Jalwa Farmaye(N) Rukhe Dil Ki Siyahi Mit Jaye
Subha Ho Jaaye Ilahi Shabe Taare Aariz

Naame Haq Par Kare Mehboob Dilo Jaa(N) Qurbaa(N)
Haq Kare Arsh Se Ta Farsh Nisaare Aariz

Mushk Bu Zulf Se Rukh Chehre Se Baalo(N) Mein Shu-Aa’
Mo’jiza Hai Halabe Zulfo Tataare Aariz

Haq Ne Bakhsha Hai Karam Nazre Gadaya(N) Ho Qabool
Pyare Ik Dil Hai Woh Karte Hain Nisaare Aariz

Aah Be Mayagiye Dil Ki Raza-E-Mohtaj
Le Kar Ik Jaan Chala Bahre Nisaare Aariz

1: Naat Sarkar Ki Parta Hoon Mein
2:
Naat Sarkar Ki Parta Hoon Mein
Bas Issi Baat Say Ghar Mein Meri Rahmat Hogi
Ik Tera Naam Waseela He Mera
Ranj O Gham Mey Bhi Iss Naam Sey Rahat Hogi

Ye Suna Hey Kay Bahot Ghor Andheri Hogi
Qabar Ka Khowf Na Rakna Ey Dil
Waha Sarkar Ke Chehre Ki Ziarat Hogi

Kabhi Yaseen Kabhi Tauha Kabhi Walail Aaya
Jis Ki Kasmein Mera Rab Khata Hai
Kitni Dil Kash Meray Mehboob Ki Surat Hogi.

Hashr Ka Din Bhi Ajab Dekhne Wala Hoga
Zulf Lehra Key Wo Jab Ayengey
Phir Qiyamat Mein Bhi Ik Aur Qiayamat Hogi

Unko Mukhtar Banaya Hai Merey Mola Ney
Khuld Mein Bas Wahi Ja Sakta Hein
Jisko Hasnain Kay Nana Ki Ijazat Hogi

Do Jahan Main Usay Phir Koun Panah Main Lay Le Ga
Ho Ga Ruswa Wo Sar-E-Hashr Jisay
Syeda Zahra Kay Bachoon Say Adawat Hogi.

Unki Chokhat Pay Pare Hain To Bari Mauj Main Hain
Laut Kay Aayein Gay Jab Us Dar Say
Meray Dil Tu Hi Bata Kiya Teri Halat Ho Gi.

Rushk Say Dur Kharey Dekhtay Houn Gay Zahid
Jab Sar E Hashr Gunahgaroon Par
Meray Aaqa Ka Karam Ho Ga Inayat Ho Gi.

Mayray Sarkaar Bulaa Ain Gay, Un Ki Chokat Pay,
Wo Nazaara Phir May Daykoon Ga,
Daykh Kar Gumbad E Khazra, Mayri Ulfat Hogi

Mera Daman To Gunahoon Say Bhara Hai Altaf
Ik Sahara Hai Kay Hum Teray Hain
Isi Nisbat Say Sar E Hashar Shafa’at Ho Gi.

1: Naat Sunta Rahoon Naat Kehta Rahoon
2:
Naat Sunta Rahoon Naat Kehta Rahoon
Aankh Purnam Rahay Dil Machalta Rahay
Najm-E-Naam-E-Muhammad Zuban Par Rahay
Zikr Hota Rahay Saans Chalta Rahay

Baisaharoon Ka Koi Sahara Nahin
Mustafa Kay Siwa To Guzara Nahin
Unki Chasm-E-Karam Ho To Kuch Ghum Nahin
Chahay Sara Zamana Badalta Rahay

Ishq Ahmad Si Duniya Main Naimat Nahin
Mal O Zar Ki Bhi Koi Haqiqat Nahin
Badshaoon Say Behtar Bhikari Hai Woh
Unkay Dar Pay Tukrhoon Pay Jo Palta Rahay

Kiya Bhala Asakay Zindagi Kay Mazay
Door Reh Kar Habib-E-Khuda Say Mujhay
Uski Halat Karoon To Karoon Kia Biyan
Har Ghari Jo Furkat Main Jalta Rahay

Yeh Dua Hai Salamat Sada Ghum Rahay
Ta Abad Rab Tais-E-Qayam Rahay
Aatishay Ishq Har Dum Bharhakti Rahay
Khoon Roota Rahoon Dil Pighalta Rahay

Mustafa Ki Nazar Jis Gharhi Ho Gaee
Uski Takdeer Khoti Khari Hogaee
Usko Thukrae Sara Jahan Bhi Agar
Girne Wala Magar Phir Sanbhalta Rahay

Najm Ki Ae Khuda Aarzoo Hai Yehi
Aashiq-E-Zaar Ki Aabroo Hai Yehi
Aakhri Waqt Sar Unkay Kadmoon Pay Ho
Deed Hoote Rahay Dum Nikalta Rahay

1: Nabi Ka Jashn Aaya Chaand Taaron Jhoomtay Rehna
2:
Nabi Ka Jashn Aaya Chaand Taaron Jhoomtay Rehna
Nabi Ke Naam Per Ae Naamdaaron Jhoomtay Rehna

Jahaan Mein Noor Leykar Noor Wala Aanay Wala Hai
Meray Hamraah Tum Bhi Dil Ke Taaron Jhoomtay Rehna

Galli Koochay Sajadena Harray Jhanday Lagadena
Taqaaza Ishq Ka Hai Mere Yaaron Jhoomtay Rehna

Nabi-E-Sarwar-E-Konain Ki Aamad Ke Lamhoon Mein
Durood-E-Pak Parhtay Parhtay Saaron Jhoomte Rehna

Musawaat-O-Akhuwat Ka Payaam-E-Dil Nasheen Laaye
Khushi Mein Aey Ghareebon Maaldaaron Jhoomte Rehna

Woh Aaye Gham Qaday Mein Ek Khushi Ki Roshni Phooti
Khuda Ke Shukar Mein Aey Gham Ke Maaron Jhoomte Rehna

Khushi Ik Dil Pe Hai Chaayei Wiladat Ki Ghari Aayei
Arey Aey Gul Aaro Maah Paaron Jhoomte Rehna

Bujhay Na Ishq-E-Ahmed Ki Agan Qalb-E-Ujagar Se
Dharakna Aur Ae Dil Ke Shararon Jhoomte Rehna

1: Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai
2:
Meri Kismat Jagaane Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai,
Hazaaron Gham Mittaa Nay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai.
Ya Rasool Allah Ya Habeeb Allah

Ghamo Ki Doop Ho Ya Phir Hawaa-Ain Tayz Chaltee Ho,
Mayray Iss Aashiyaan Nay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai,
Hazaaron Gham Mittaa Nay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai.

Khushi Ho Ya Koee Gham Ho, Nabi Ka Naam Layta Ho,
Kay Har Ik Gham Bulaanay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai,
Hazaaron Gham Mittaa Nay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai.

Nabi Ka Naam Layta Hoon, Sukoon-E-Qalb Miltaa Hai,
Nabi Kay Iss Deewaanay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai,
Hazaaron Gham Mittaa Nay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai.

Jo Poocha Kamli Waalay Nay, Kahaa Siddeeq Akbar Nay,
Mayray Saaray Garaanay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai,
Hazaaron Gham Mittaa Nay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai.

Soolagti Aag Par Habshi, Kay Honton Say Sadaa Aa Ee,
Mayree Bigree Banaanay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai,
Hazaaron Gham Mittaa Nay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai.

Yayhee Kehta Hai Shahid Be, Yayhee Sab Log Kehtay Hai,
Kay Iss Saaray Zamaanay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai,
Hazaaron Gham Mittaa Nay Ko, Nabi Ka Naam Kaafi Hai.

1: Nabi Kay Ishq Nay Jis Ko Haseen Banaaya Hai
2:
Nabi Kay Ishq Nay Jis Ko Haseen Banaaya Hai
Wohi Fareed, Wohi Data Ban Kay Aaya Hai

Jahaa Kahee Bhi Kadam Maira Dagmagaaya Hai
Sahaara Denay Karam Aapka He Aaya Hai

Sata Sakkay Gee Na Humko Ye Garmiy-E-Mehsher
Hamaaray Ser Pay Habeebay Khuda (S.a.w.w) Ka Saaya Hai

Issi Tamanna May Jeeta Hoo Koi Ye Keh Day Ya Rasoolallah
Challo Challo Tumhai Sarkaar Nay Bulaaya Hai

Bura Samajh Kay Jahaan Nay Jo Tak Diya Jiss Ko
Tairey Karam Nay Ussay Bhi Gallay Lagaaya Hai

Farishtay Aatay Hain Rehmat Kay Uss Kay Ghar Jiss Nay
Tumhari Zikr Ki Mehfil Say Ghar Sajaaya Hai

Jo Sang Kha Kay Bhi Ta’if May Muskuraaya Hai
Wo Koi Aur Nahi Aamna Ka Jaaya Hai

Ghammay Habeebay Khuda Nay Jissay Nawaaz Diya
Aleem Aalamay Gham May Bhi Muskuraaya Hai

Nabi Kay Ishq Nay Jis Ko Haseen Banaaya Hai
Wohi Fareed, Wohi Data Ban Kay Aaya Hai

1: Nabi Ki Yaad Se Roshan Maere Dil Ka Nagina Hai
2:
Nabi Ki Yaad Se Roshan Maere Dil Ka Nagina Hai
Wo Mayray Dil Mean Rehtay Heyn Mayra Dil Bhi Madina Hai

Madinay Ki Judaii Meyn Sulagta Mayra Seena Hai
Parrha Huun Duur Teba Say Yay Jeena Keisa Jeena Hai

Nabi Ki Aal Ka Sadqa Jahaan Ki Nay’matayn Maango
Khuda Say Maangnay Ka Yay Barrha Achha Qareena Hai

Jhukoon Kyun Gheyr Kay Dar Par Kisi Say Bhik Kyun Maangun
Mayray Daaman Meyn Ishqay Sarwaray Deen Ka Khazeena Hai

Nazar Afroz Hai Ranginiay Fardos Ki Laykin
Jo Taskinay Dil O Jaan Hai Wo Aqa Ka Madina Hai

Hamay Khatra Nahiin Koii Niazi Duub Janay Ka, Kay
Ham Jis Meyn Heyn Betthay Wo Muhammd Ka Qareena Hai

1: Nabi Sarware Har Rasoolo Wali Hai
2:
Nabi Sarware Har Rasoolo Wali Hai
Nabi Raazdaare Ma-Allahi-Lee Hai

Woh Naami Ki Naame Khuda Naam Tera
Raufo Raheemo Aleemo Ali Hai

Hai Betaab Jis Ke Liye Arshe Aa'zam
Woh Is Reh-Rawe Laa Maqaa(N) Ki Gali Hai

Nakeerain Karte Hain Taa'zeem Meri
Fida Hoke Tujh Par Ye Izzat Mili Hai

Talaatum Hai Kashti Pe Toofaane Gham Ka
Yeh Kaisi Hawaaye Mukhaalif Chali Hai

Na Kyunkar Kahoon Ya Habeebi Agithni
Isi Naam Se Har Museebat Tali Hai

Saba Hai Mujhe Sar-Sare Dashte Taiba
Isi Se Kali Mere Dil Ki Khili Hai

Tere Charon Hardum Hai Yak Jaan Yak Dil
Abu Bakr Faarooq Usmaa(N) Ali Hai

Khuda Ne Kiya Tujh Ko Aagaah Sab Se
Do Aalam Mein Jo Kuch Khafi Wa Jali Hai

Karoon Arz Kya Tujh Se Aye Aalimussirr
Ki Tujh Par Meri Haalate Dil Khuli Hai

Tamanna Hai Farmaaiye Roze Mehshar
Ye Teri Rihaayi Ki Chitthi Mili Hai

Jo Maqsad Ziyarat Ka Bar Aaye Phir To
Na Kuch Qasd Keeje Ye Qasde Dili Hai

Tere Dar Ka Darbaa(N) Hai Jibreele Aa'zam
Tera Madha Khwaa(N) Har Nabi Wa Wali Hai

Shafa'at Kare Hashr Me Jo Raza Ki
Siwa Tere Kisko Ye Qudrat Mili Hai

1: Nabiyun Nabiyun Nabiyun Nabi
2:
Yaa Wajeehad Deenee Wal Karamee
Wa Halefal Ilmee Wal Hikamee
Nabiyun Nabiyun Nabiyun Nabi (2times)

Ya Rasool Allahee Salamun Alayk
Ya Rafee’aa Shanee Wa Darajee
Rasulun Rasulun Rasulun Rasul(2 Times)

Yaa Wafeeyal Ahadi Wa Deemaee
Waa Hamidas Sayi Wa Shiyami
Aminun Aminun Aminun Amin(2 Times)

Ya Rasul Allahee Ya Imdatanaa
Ya Imaamal Ambiyaa Il Umanaa
Khatimun Khatimun Khatimun Khatimun(2 Times)

Wal Fakeedil Mhadi Muttarifun
Minhu Bil Lflaasi Wal Adami
Rahimun Rahimun Rahimun Rahim(2 Times)

Wa Salaatulaahi Khaaliqinaa
Tataghash-Sha Sayyidal Umamee
Mustafa Mustafa Mustafa Mustafa(2 Times)

Ahmadal Mukharee Sayyidinaa
Addadal Auraqi Wad Diyami
Kamilun Kamilun Kamilun Kamil(2 Times)

Khaira Annal Fadla Muntaqabun
Min Azimil Fadli Wal Karamee
Karimun Karimun Karimun Karim(2 Times)

1: Naematein Baanta Jis Samt Woh Zeeshaan Gaya
2:
Naematein Baant-Ta Jis-Samt Woh Zeeshaan Gaya
Saath Hii Munshi-E-Rahmat Ka Qalamdaan Gaya

Lay Khabr Jald Kay Ghairon Kii Taraf Dhayaan Gaya
Mere Mawla, Mere Aaqa, Tere Qurbaan Gaya

Aah Woh Aankh Jo Nakaame Tamanna Hi Rahi
Haye Wo Dil Jo Tere Darr Se Pur-Armaan Gaya

Dil Hai Voh Dil Jo Teri Yaad Se Mamoor Raha
Sar Hai Voh Sar Jo Tere Qadmon Pe Qurbaan Gaya

Unhe Jaana, Unhe Maana Na Rakha Gair Se Kaam
Lillahil Hamd Main Duniya Se Musalmaan Gaya

Aur Tum Par Mere Aaqa Kii 'inaayat Na Sahii
Najdiyo Kalimah Parhaanay Ka Bhi Ehsaan Gaya

Aaj Lay Unki Panaah, Aaj Madad Maang Unsay
Phir Na Maaneingay, Qayamat Mein Agar Maan Gaya

Uff Re Munkir Ye Badha Joshe Ta-Assub Aakhir
Bheed Me Haath Se Kambakht Ke Imaan Gaya

Jaan O Dil Hosh O Khird Sab Tau Madinay Paunchay
Tum Nahin Chaltay Raza Saara Tou Saamaan Gaya

1: Nahi He Koi Duniya Main Hamara Ya Rasool Allah
2:
Nahi He Koi Duniya Main Hamara Ya Rasool Allah
Faqat Hay Aap Hee Ka Ik Sahara Ya Rasool Allah

Sarapa Maaseaat Hoon Baar Hay Bay Had Gunahoon Ka
Bachana Nar-E-Dozakh Say Khuda Raa Ra Rasool Allah

Talatum Khaiz Hay Daria Bhanwar Main Hay Mairi Kashti
Nazar Aata Naheen Koi Kinara Ya Rasool Allah

Faqat Aamal Kay Badlay Naan Paye Ga Koi Janat
Naan Ho Ga Jab Talak Tera Ishara Ya Rasool Allah

Haqeeqat Main Bohat Berh Kar Hay Arsh-E-Mo’ala Sey
Zameen Jiss Par Ho Naqsh-E-Paa Tumhara Ya Rasool Allah

Tarapta Hay Maira Dil Aur Tarasti Hain Bohat Aankhaien
Bula Loophir Madinay Main Dobara Ya Rasool Allah

Gunahgaaraan-E-Ummat Ka Khajal Hoona Saza Pana
Tairi Rehmat Ko Kab Ho Ga Gawara Ya Rasool Allah

Dam-E-Aakhir Zara Hassam Par Itna Karam Karna
Keh Uss Kay Lab Par Hoo Kalma Tumhara Ya Rasool Allah

Naheen Hay Koi Dunia Main Hamara Ya Rasool Allah
Faqat Hay Aap Hee Ka Ik Sahara Ya Rasool Allah

1: Nahi Tumsa Koi Haseen Ya Muhammad
2:
Nahi Tumsa Koi Hasee(N) Ya Muhammad
Jhuka Te Hai Yousuf Jabee(N) Ya Muhammad

Nasha Paye Aqdas Ka Ho Jis Zameen Par
Hai Jannat Hamari Wahi Ya Muhammad

Ho Duniya Wo Deen Khabar Ho Ya Ke Mehshar
Nazar Aa Rahe Ho Tumhi Ya Muhammad

Khuda Ki Qasam Ab Na Uth'the Gi Hargis
Jhuki Hai Jo Dar Par Jabee(N) Ya Muhammad

Musalmaan Kya Kafiroune Hamesha
Pukaara Hai Tumko Amee(N) Ya Muhammad

Kuch Itne Ho Nazdeek Tum Apne Rab Se
Habeeb-E-Khuda Ho Tumhi Ya Muhammad

Ho Duniya Ke Aqba Do Aalam Me Aaqa
Milega Na Tumsa Kahee(N) Ya Muhammad

Wohi To Hai Dil Me Basaane Ke Laayaq
Wo Nazrein Jo Tum Tak Gayi Ya Muhammad

Ye Allah Ne Khud Hi Farma Diya Hai
Rahega Hamesha Ye Dee(N) Ya Muhammad

Tumhare Ghulamoun Me Hai Muttaqui Bhi
Karam Uspe Ya Shahe Dee(N) Ya Muhammad

1: Nai Koii Auqaat Oganhaar Di
2:
Nai Koii Auqaat Oganhaar Di
Jeho Jaii Wi Haan Mein Haan Sarkaar Di

Kyun Phiraan Mein Mangtiyaan Ton Mangdi
Mein Te Mangti Haan Khuda De Yaar Di

Allah Di Sonh Saani Koii Bhukh Naiin
Bhukhh Hei Te Hei Tere Deedaar Di

Onaan Nuun Changi Naiin Lagdi Koii Shei
Jhalk Wekhi E Jinna Sarkaar Di

Koii Sun Ke Khush Naiin Hunda Na Howe
Gal Karni E Assaan Sarkaar Di

Mehrbaanaa Sohniyaa Man Mohniyaa
Wekh Ja Haalat Kade Beemaar Di

Jo Mili Izzat Niyaazi Jag Tay
Mehrbaani Hei Ayh Sab Sarkaar Di

1: Namey Muhammad Kitna Mitha Mitha Lagta Hai
2:
Namey Muhammad Kitna Mitha, Mitha Lagta Hai
Donon Jahan Sarkar Ka Sadqa Aisa Lagta Hai

Yade Nabi Ka Gulshan Mehka, Mehka Lagta Hai
Mehfil Mein Maujud Hain Aqa Aisa Lagta Hai

Namey Muhammad Kitna Mitha, Mitha Lagta Hai
Donon Jahan Sarkar Ka Sadqa Aisa Lagta Hai

Lab Par Naghmey Salley Ala Ke Hathon Mein Kashkol
Dekho To Sarkar Ka Mangta Kaisa Lagta Hai

Namey Muhammad Kitna Mitha, Mitha Lagta Hai
Donon Jahan Sarkar Ka Sadqa Aisa Lagta Hai

Ghauso, Qutb, Abdaal, Qalandar, Sab Unke Mohtaj
Mera Aqa Sab Waliyon Ka Aqa Lagta Hai

Namey Muhammad Kitna Mitha, Mitha Lagta Hai
Donon Jahan Sarkar Ka Sadqa Aisa Lagta Hai

Yade Nabi Mein Har Dam Rona Achchha Lagta Hai
Hum Bhi Taibah Jaengey Ab Aisa Lagta Hai

Namey Muhammad Kitna Mitha, Mitha Lagta Hai
Donon Jahan Sarkar Ka Sadqa Aisa Lagta Hai

Yade Nabi Mein Rone Wala Hum Diwanon Ko
Lakh Paraya Ho Woh Phir Bhi Apna Lagta Hai

Namey Muhammad Kitna Mitha, Mitha Lagta Hai
Donon Jahan Sarkar Ka Sadqa Aisa Lagta Hai

Unke Dar Se Palne Wale, Apna Aap Jawab
Koi Ghaus Al Azam, Koi Khwaja Lagta Hai

Namey Muhammad Kitna Mitha, Mitha Lagta Hai
Donon Jahan Sarkar Ka Sadqa Aisa Lagta Hai

Siddique-O-Umar, Usman-O-Ali, Aur Khalid-O-Zaid-O-Bilal
Baithe Hon Darbare Nabi Mein Kaisa Lagta Hai

Namey Muhammad Kitna Mitha, Mitha Lagta Hai
Donon Jahan Sarkar Ka Sadqa Aisa Lagta Hai

Zikre Nabi Se Raushan Anjum, Sara Jag Pur Noor
Salley Ala Tum Parh Ke Dekho Kaisa Lagta Hai

Namey Muhammad Kitna Mitha, Mitha Lagta Hai
Donon Jahan Sarkar Ka Sadqa Aisa Lagta Hai

1: Namey Muhammad Salley Ala Ankhon Ki Thandak Dil Ki Jila
2:
Namey Muhammad Salley Ala, Ankhon Ki Thandak Dil Ki Jila
Aao Unka Zikr Karein, Jo Hai Dafa-Aey Ranjo Bala

Jin Ko Unka Qurb Mila Hai, Ban Gaye Hadi-O-Raah Numa
Sab Par Unki Chashme Karam Hai, Wah Re Shaane Judo Sakha

Dekh Ke Apni Farze Amal Ko, Aasi Jab Sharmaen Gey
Ummat Se Kuch Pyar Hai Aisa, Khud Woh Karam Farmaen Gey

Un Par Apna Tan Man Warun, Warun Husne Kouno Makaa’n
Haasil Unke Sadqey Mein Hai, Izzat-O-Azmat Naam-O-Nishan

Mehfiley Naat Ki Baat Na Pucho, Khud Woh Karam Farmatey Hain
Jin Pe Karam Hota Hai Unka, Unke Din Phir Jate Hain

Unki Bhik Pe Sab Paltey Hain, Unke Mungtey Shahon Gada
Dar Se Koi Khali Na Lauta, Daata Ki Yeh Shaane Ata

Jab Koi Mushkil Pesh Aai Hai, Dil Ne Unko Pukara Hai
Anjum Apna To Yeh Yaqin Hai, Unka Karam Ho Jata Hai

Namey Muhammad Salley Ala, Ankhon Ki Thandak Dil Ki Jila
Aao Unka Zikr Karein, Jo Hai Dafa-Aey Ranjo Bala

1: Naseeban Waaleyan Nu Yaar De Dedaar Hondey Ne
2:
Naseeban Waaleyan Nu Yaar,
De Dedaar Hondey Ne
Tarap De Nein Jo Aj Yaaro,
Oh Kal Darbaar Hondey Ne

Gunahgaaran Ghareeban Ley,
Dine Raati Dua Karni
Aenu Kehnde Ney Ghamkhaari
Te Inj Ghamkhaar Hondey Ne

Sawaari Karan Ley Jinno,
Milan Kande Muhammad Dey
Nawabi/shaahi Is No Kehnde Ney,
Te Inj Sardaar Hondey Ne

Hussain Ibne Ali Daseya,
Lutaa Ke Ghar Da Ghar Saara
Raza Je Yaar Di Howe,
Kadooun Inkaar Hondey Ne

1: Nazar Ik Chaman Se Do Chaar Hai Na Chaman Chaman Bhi Nisaar Hai
2:
Nazar Ik Chaman Se Do Chaar Hai Na Chaman Chaman Bhi Nisaar Hai
Ajab Uske Gul Ki Bahaar Hai Ki Bahaare Bulbule Zaar Hai

Na Dile Bashar Hi Figaar Hai Ki Malak Bhi Uska Shikaar Hai
Yeh Jahaa(N) Ki Hazda Hazaar Hai Jise Dekho Uska Hazaar Hai

Nahi Sar Ki Sajda Kuna(N) Na Ho Na Zabaa(N) Ki Zamzamaa Khwaa(N) Na Ho
Na Woh Dil Ki Uspe Tapaa(N) Na Ho Na Woh Seena Jis Ko Qaraar Hai

Woh Hai Bheeni Bheeni Waha(N) Mahak Ki Basa Hai Arsh Se Farsh Tak
Woh Hai Pyari Pyari Waha(N) Chamak Ki Waha(N) Ki Shab Bhi Nahaar Hai

Koi Aur Phool Kaha(N) Khile Na Jagah Hai Joshishe Husn Se
Na Bahaar Aur Pe Rukh Kare Ki Jhapak Palak Ki To Khaar Hai

Yeh Saman Yeh So-Sano Yaasman Yeh Banfasha Sumbulo Nastaran
Gulo Sarwo Laalah Bhara Chaman Wohi Ek Jalwa Hazaar Hai

Yeh Saba Sanak Woh Kali Chatak Yeh Zabaa(N) Chahak Labe Joo Chalak
Yeh Mahak Jhalak Yeh Chamak Damak Sab Usi Ke Dam Ki Bahaar Hai

Wohi Jalwa Shahar Ba Shahar Hai Wohi Asle Aalamo Dahar Hai
Wohi Bahar Hai Wohi Lahar Hai Wohi Paat Hai Wohi Dhaar Hai

Woh Na Tha To Baagh Mein Kuch Na Tha Woh Na Ho To Baagh Ho Sab Fanaa
Woh Hai Jaan Jaan Se Hai Baqaa Wohi Bun Hai Bun Se Hi Baar Hai

Yeh Adab Ki Bulbule Benawa Kabhi Khul Ke Kar Na Sake Nawaa
Na Saba Ko Tez Rawish Rawa Na Chalakti Nehro(N) Ki Dhaar Hai

Ba Adab Jhuka Lo Sare Wilaa Ki Main Naam Loo(N) Gulo Baagh Ka
Gule Tar Muhammade Mustafa Chaman Un Ka Paak Dayaar Hai

Wohi Aankh Un Ka Jo Munh Take Wohi Lab Ki Mehw Ho Na'at Ke
Wohi Sar Jo Unke Liye Jhuke Wohi Dil Jo Un Pe Nisaar Hai

Yeh Kisi Ka Husn Hai Jalwagar Ki Tapaa(N) Hain Khoobon Ke Dile Jigar
Nahi(N) Chaak Jaibe Gulo Sahar Ki Qamar Bhi Seena Figaar Hai

Wohi Nazre Shah Mein Zare Nikoo Jo Ho Unke Ishq Mein Zard Roo
Gule Khuld Usse Ho Rang Joo Yeh Khazaa(N) Woh Taaza Bahaar Hai

Jise Teri Saffe Ni'aal Se Mile Do Niwaale Nawaal Se
Woh Bana Ki Uske Ugaal Se Bhari Saltanat Ka Udhaar Hai

Woh Uthi(N) Chamak Ke Tajalliyaa(N) Ki Mita Di Sab Ki Tajalliyaa(N)
Dilo Jaa(N) Ko Bakhshi Tasalliyaa(N) Tera Noor Baarido Haar Hai

Rusulo Malak Pe Durood Ho Wohi Jaane Unke Shumaar Ko
Magar Ek Aisa Dikha To Do Jo Shafi'e Roze Shumaar Hai

Na Hijaab Charkho Maseeh Par Na Kaleemo Toor Nihaa(N) Magar
Jo Gaya Hai Arsh Se Bhi Udhar Woh Arab Ka Naaqa Suwaar Hai

Woh Teri Tajalliye Dilnasheen Ki Jhalak Rahe Hain Falak Zamee(N)
Tere Sadqe Mere Mahe Mubee(N) Meri Raat Kyun Abhi Taar Hai

Meri Zulmate(N) Hain Sitam Magar Tera Mah Na Mehr Ki Mehr-Gar
Agar Ek Cheent Pade Idhar Shabe Daaj Abhi To Nahaar Hai

Gunahe Raza Ka Hisaab Kya Woh Agarche Laakhon Se Hain Siwaa
Magar Aye Afooww Tere Afw Ka Na Hisaab Hai Na Shumaar Hai

Tere Deene Paak Ki Woh Ziya Ki Chamak Uthi Rahe Istafaa
Jo Na Maane Aap Sakar Gaya Kahi(N) Noor Hai Kahi(N) Naar Hai

Koi Jaan Bas Ke Mahak Rahi Kisi Dil Mein Us Ke Khatak Rahi
Nahi Uske Jalwe Mein Yak-Rahi Kahi(N) Phool Hai Kahi(N) Khaar Hai

Woh Jise Wahabiya Ne Diya Hai Laqab Shaheedo Zabeeh Ka
Woh Shaheede Lailaaye Najd Tha Woh Zabeehe Taige Khiyaar Hai

Yeh Hai Dee(N) Ki Taqwiyat Us Ke Ghar Yeh Hai Mustaqeem Siraate Shar
Jo Shaqee Ke Dil Mein Hai Gaau Khar To Zabaa(N) Pe Choodha Chamaar Hai

Woh Habeeb Pyara To Umr Bhar Kare Faizo Jood Hi Sar Basar
Are Tujh Ko Khaaye Tape Sakar Tere Dil Mein Kis Se Bukhaar Hai

Woh Raza Ke Neze Ki Maar Hai Ki 'adoo Ke Seene Mein Ghaar Hai
Kise Chaara Jooee Ka Waar Hai Ki Ye Waar Waar Se Paar Hai

1: Nibhaalo Tum Nibhaalo Tum Nibhaalo Ya Rasool Allah
2:
Nibhaalo Tum Nibhaalo Tum Nibhaalo Ya Rasool Allah
Bulaalo Ab Madine Mey Bulaalo Ya Rasool Allah

Satate Hain Jo Duniya Wale Is Ka Kuch Nahi Hain Gham
Mujhe Bas Apna Keh Kar Tum Bulaalo Ya Rasool Allah

Sunehri Jaaliyon Key Saamne Pohcha Hoon Mey Aaqa
Mujhe Apni Ziyaarat Tum Karaado Ya Rasool Allah

Meri Qismat Buree Ho To Khudara Tum Bhalee Kardo
Sanwaaro Meri Qismat Ko Sanwaaro Ya Rasool Allah

‘ataa Ho ‘ilm Ki Daulat ‘ataa Ho Deed Ki Daulat
Damey Aakhir Madina Bhi ‘ataa Ho Ya Rasool Allah

Shafa’at Ka Sawali Hoon Sawali Hoon Mai Rehmat Ka
Ijaabat Se Nawaazo Tum Nawaazo Ya Rasool Allah

Mo’in-E-Raah-E-Taiba Hain Mere Khwaja Mo’inuddeen
Mo’in-E-Raah-E-Jannat Bhi Banaado Ya Rasool Allah

Tasadduq Ghaus E A’azam Ka Tawassul A’ala Hazrat Ka
Baqee-E-Paak Ke Qaabil Banaado Ya Rasool Allah

Nigah-E-Mufti-E A’azam Ney Zinda Kardiya Dil Ko
Unhi Ka Saath Mehshar Me ‘ataa Ho Ya Rasool Allah

Tamanna Ye Liye Jaata Hai Aaqa Shakir E Razvi
Ise Izne Madina Phir ‘ataa Ho Ya Rasool Allah

1: Nigaare Ambiya Ban Kar Muhammad Mustafa Aaye
2:
Nigaare Ambiya Ban Kar Muhammad Mustafa Aaye
Rasoole Do Sara Ban Kar Muhammad Mustafa Aaye

Zamee(N) Se Ta Falak Ik Noor Ka Sailaab Aaya Hai
Nabi Mahe Laqa Ban Kar Muhammad Mustafa Aaye

Bahaare Aa Gayi Hai Aamina Ke Paak Hujre Mein
Karaare Walida Ban Kar Muhammad Mustafa Aaye

Gareebon Bekason Ka Bebason Ka Aasra Ban Kar
Yateemon Ki Dua Ban Kar Muhammad Mustafa Aaye

Unhe Qad-Jaa-Akum Noorun Kaha Hai Rabbe Aalam Ne
Sarapa Noor Ka Ban Kar Muhammad Mustafa Aaye

Hui Thi Aap Hi Se Ibtida Imkaane Aalam Ki
Hain Sab Ki Intiha Ban Kar Muhammad Mustafa Aaye

Andhere Mit Gaye Saara Jahaa(N) Raushan Hua Saaim
Ziyaaon Ki Ziya Ban Kar Muhammad Musfafa Aaye

1: Noor Se Apne Sarwar E Aalam Duniya Jagmagane Aaye
2:
Noor Se Apne Sarwar E Aalam Duniya Jagmagane Aaye
Ghum Ke Maaro Dukhyaro Ko Seene Se Lagane Aaye

Noore Nigare Ambiya, Mere Huzoor Aa Gaye
Shano Nishaan E Kibriya Mere Huzoor Aa Gaye

Nikhra Hua Hai Rue Gul Faili Hui Hai Bue Gul
Banke Bahaar E Jaa(N) Fiza Mere Huzoor Aa Gaye

Arsh E Baree Ki Rounake Farsh E Zamee Par Aa Gayi
Sajde Ko Jhuk Gaya Aasmaa(N) Mere Huzoor Aa Gaye

Ashqo Se Bhar Ke Jholiya Aankhe Bicha Do Raah Me
Salle Alaa Ki Do Sadaa Mere Huzoor Aa Gaye

Chatki Hui Hai Chaandni Faili Hui Hai Roshni
Dariya Rawa(N) Hai Noor Ka Mere Huzoor Aa Gaye

Mehfil Ko Ab Sawaar Lo Dil Ka Chaman Nikhar Lo
Kardo Charaga Jaa-Baja Mere Huzoor Aa Gaye

Sayim Kalaam E Zouk Se Kalbo Nazar Ko Shauk Se
Raho(N) Me Aaj Do Bicha Mere Huzoor Aa Gaye

1: Noor Wala Aya Hai
2:
Noor Wala Aya Hai
Noor Lay Kar Aya Hai
Sara Alam May Yah Dekho Kaisa Noor Chaya Hai

Ass Salato Was Salamo Alay Kay Ya Rasoolallah
Ass Salato Was Salamo Alay Kay Ya Habiballah

Jab Talak Yah Chand Tare Jheel Meelate Jayange
Tab Talak Jasne Wiladat Hum Manate Jayange

Naate Mahbooba Khuda Sunte Sunate Jayange
Ya Rasoolallah Ka Nara Lagate Jayange

Char Janib Hum Diye Ghee Kay Jalate Jayange
Ghar Toh Ghar Sara Mohalle Ko Sajate Jayange

Eid A Milad-Un-Nabi Ki Shab Charaga Kar Kay Hum
Kabr A Noor-A-Mustafa Say Jagmagate Jayenge

Tum Karo Jasnay Wiladat Ki Kushi May Roshni
Woh Tumhari Gor-A-Teera Jagmagata Jayenge

Hashr May Zayre Livay Hamd-A-Attar Hum
Naat-E-Sultana Madina Gongunate Jayenge

Zikr-E-Milad E Mubarak Kaise Chore Hum Bhala
Jinka Khate Hai Unhi Ke Geet Gaate Jayenge

1: Noori Mehfil Pe Chadar Tani Noor Ki
2:
Noori Mehfil Pe Chadar Tani Noor Ki,
Noor Phela Huwa Aaj Ki Raat Hai.
Chandni Mein Hain Dubay Huwey Do Jahan,
Kon Jalwa Numa Aaj Ki Raat Hai.

Farsh Per Dhoom Hai, Arsh Per Dhoom Hai
Badnasibi Hai Uski Jo Mehroom Hai,
Phir Milay Gi Yeh Shab Kisko Maloom Hai
Aam Lutfay Khuda Aaj Ki Raat Hai.

Abray Rehmat Hai Mehfil Pay Chaye Huwey
Aasman Say Malaik Hain Aaye Huey
Khud Muhammed Hain Tashreef Laye Huwey
Kis Kadar Jaan Fiza Aaj Ki Raat Hai.

Manglo Mang Lo Chashme Tar Mang Lo
Dard E Dil Aur Husn E Nazar Manglo
Kamli Wale Ki Nagri Mein Ghar Manglo
Mangnay Ka Maza Aaj Ki Raat Hai.

Momino Aaj Ganj E Sakha Lutlo
Lutlo Aie Marizo Shifa Lootlo
Asiyo Rehmat E Mustafa Lootlo
Babay Rehmat Khula Aaj Ki Raat Hai.

Khoob Honay Do Ashkoon Ki Barsat Ko
Do Salami Muhammed Ki Barat Ko
Choom Lo Chum Lo Aaj Ki Raat Ko
Shab Qadar Kay Guman Aaj Ki Raat Hai.

Waqt Laye Khuda Sabh Madinay Chalein
Lutnay Rehmatoon Kay Khazinay Chalein
Sabh Ki Manzil Ki Janib Safinay Chalein
Meri Sa’aim Dua Aaj Ki Raat Hai.

1: Noori Mukhra Te Zulfan Ne Kaliyan
2:
Noori Mukhra Te Zulfa’an Ne Kaliyan
Rab Bhejda Durood’an Diyan Daaliyan

Pyaar Mere Aaqa Da Seene Wich Howe
Juggi Ek Rehn Layi Madine Wich Howe
Banda Raj Raj Ke Chumme Fer Jaliyan
Rab Bhejda Durood’an Diyan Daaliyan

Noori Mukhra Te Zulfa’an Ne Kaliyan
Rab Bhejda Durood’an Diyan Daaliyan

Beliya Huzoor Diyan Mehfila’n Sajaya Kar
Din Raat Sohne Te Darood Tu Pounchaya Kar
Ghar Rehn Giyan Sada Khush Haliya’n
Rab Bhejda Durood’an Diyan Daaliyan

Noori Mukhra Te Zulfa’an Ne Kaliyan
Rab Bhejda Durood’an Diyan Daaliyan

Pak Qura’n Deyan Akhr’an Noon Wekh Lo
Soorta’an No Wekho Ya Ke Sattran No Wekh Lo
Jiven Aqa Diyan Zulfa’an Ne Kaliya’an
Rab Bhejda Durood’an Diyan Daaliy

Noori Mukhra Te Zulfa’an Ne Kaliyan
Rab Bhejda Durood’an Diyan Daaliy

Sadqa Nawasiya’an Da Sad Lo Madine Wich
Thand Paa Lawa’n Aaqa Balde Main Seene Wich
Chumma Jeunde Jeunde Roze Diyan Main Jaliya’n
Rab Bhejda Durood’an Diyan Daaliy

Noori Mukhra Te Zulfa’an Ne Kaliyan
Rab Bhejda Durood’an Diyan Daaliy

1: Nooriyo Aao Zara Qasmi Jalsa Dekho
2:
Nooriyo Aao Zara Qasmi Jalsa Dekho
Noori Chehro Se Naya Noor Chalakta Dekho

Shah E Qasim Ka Yeh Darbar Sajaa Shaahana
Noor In’aam Har Ek Gaam Pe Bat Ta Dekho

Nisbate Apni Yaha Aake Karo Mustahkam
Arze Marehra Me Barkat Ka Dariya Dekho

Achche Suthre Ki Tab O Taab Pe Waari Jau
Aale Ahmed Ka Har Ek Simt Ujala Dekho

Qadri Maikada Phir Saj Gaya Marehra Me
Maye Baghdad Se Har Jaam Chalakta Dekho

Qutbe Kaaki Ki Tausat Se Mili Chishtiyat
Meer Sughra Me Rukhe Khwaja Ka Jalwa Dekho

Arze Marehra Pe Ajmer Ke Noori Saaye
Khwaja E Chishti Ka Mazboot Ye Qila Dekho

Aao Barkaatiyo Murshid Ke Kareeb Aa Jao
Aur Nazdeek Se Noorani Yeh Chehra Dekho

Peer Ka Chehra Sajaaye Rakho Dil Ke Andar
Chashme Dil Kholo Zara Peer Ko Qibla Dekho

Peere Bepeer Ko Tum Peer Na Karna Apna
Bikne Barkat Me Bas Zikr Raza Ka Dekho

Partawe Kilke Raza Hai Miya Nazmi Ka Qalam
Iski Tehreer Me Bas Rang Raza Ka Dekho

1: Paat Woh Kuch Dhaar Ye Kuch Zaar Hum
2:
Paat Woh Kuch Dhaar Ye Kuch Zaar Hum
Ya Ilaahi Kyun Kar Utre Paar Hum

Kis Bala Ki Mai Se Hain Sarshaar Hum
Din Dhala Hote Nahi(N) Hushiyaar Hum

Tum Karam Se Mushtari Har Aib Ke
Jin Se Na Maqboole Har Bazaar Hum

Dushmano(N) Ki Aankh Mein Bhi Phool Tum
Dosto(N) Ki Bhi Nazar Mein Khaar Hum

Lagzishe Pa Ka Sahara Ek Tum
Girne Waale Lakho(N) Na Hanjaar Hum

Sadqa Apne Baazuo Ka Al Madad
Kaise Tode(N) Ye Bute Pindaar Hum

Dam Qadam Ki Khair Aye Jaane Maseeh
Dar Pe Laaye Hain Dile Beemar Hum

Apni Rehmat Ki Taraf Dekhe Huzoor
Jaante Hain Jaise Hain Badkaar Hum

Apne Mehmaano(N) Ka Sadqa Ek Boond
Mar Mite Pyaase Idhar Sarkaar Hum

Apne Kooche Se Nikala To Na Do
Hain To Had Bhar Ke Khudai Khwar Hum

Haath Uthakar Ek Tukda Aye Kareem
Hain Sakhi Ke Maal Mein Haqdaar Hum

Chandni Chatki Hai Unke Noor Ki
Aao Dekhe(N) Saire Tooro Naar Hum

Himmat Aye Zo’f Unke Dar Par Gir Ke Ho(N)
Be Takalluf Saayae Deewar Hum

Ba Ata Tum Shah Tum Mukhtar Tum
Benawa Hum Zaar Hum Nachaar Hum

Tumne To Laakhon Ko Jaane(N) Fer Di(N)
Aisa Kitna Rakhte Hain Aazaar Hum

Apni Sattari Ka Ya Rab Waasta
Ho(N) Na Ruswa Bar Sare Darbaar Hum

Itni Arze Aakhri Keh Do Koi
Naav Tooti Aa Pade Manjdhaar Hum

Muh Bhi Dekha Hai Kisi Ke Afw Ka
Dekh O Isyaa(N) Nahi Be Yaar Hum

Main Nisaar Aisa Muslamaa(N) Kijiye
Tod Daale(N) Nafs Ka Junnaar Hum

Kab Se Failaye Hain Daaman Taige Ishq
Ab To Paaye(N) Zakhm Daaman Daar Hum

Sunniyat Se Khatke Sab Ki Aankh Mein
Phool Hokar Ban Gaye Kya Khaar Hum

Na Tuwani Ka Bhala Ho Ban Gaye
Naqshe Paaye Taalibaane Yaar Hum

Dil Ke Tukde Nazre Haazir Laaye Hain
Aye Sagaane Koochaye Dildaar Hum

Qismate Sauro Hira Ki Hirs Hai
Chahte Hain Dil Mein Gehra Gaar Hum

Chashm Poshi Wa Karam Shaane Shuma
Kaare Ma Bebaaki Wa Israar Hum

Fasle Gul Sabza Saba Masti Shabaab
Chchode(N) Kis Dil Se Dare Khummar Hum

Maikada Chut-Ta Hai Lillah Saaqiya
Ab Ke Saagar Se Na Ho(N) Hoshiyaar Hum

Naazishe Karte Hain Aapas Mein Malak
Hain Ghulamane Shahe Abraar Hum

Lutf Az Khud Raftagi Ya Rab Naseeb
Ho Shaheede Jalwaye Raftaar Hum

Unke Aage Da’waye Hasti Raza
Kya Bake Jaata Hai Ye Har Baar Hum

1: Parda Rukhe Anwar Se Jo Utha Shabe Meraj
2:
Parda Rukhe Anwar Se Jo Utha Shabe Meraj
Jannat Ka Hua Rang Do Baala Shabe Meraj

Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj

Hooron Ne Bhi Gaaya Hai Tarana Shabe Meraj
Khaliq Ne Muhammad Ko Bulaya Shabe Meraj

Khursheed O Qamar Arzo Sama Arsh O Malaik
Kisne Nahi Paya Tera Sadqa Shabe Meraj

Aye Rehmate Aalam Teri Rehmat Ke Tasadduq
Har Ek Ne Paaya Tera Sadqa Shabe Meraj

Jis Waqt Chali Shahe Madina Ki Sawaari
Sajde Mein Jhuka Arshe Mu’alla Shabe Meraj

Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj

Mehmaan Bulane Ke Liye Apne Nabi Ko
Allah Ne Jibreel Ko Bheja Shabe Meraj

Ye Shaane Jalaalat Ke Nihaayat Hi Adab Se
Jibreel Ne Aaqa Ko Jagaaya Shabe Meraj

Jibreel Bhi Hairaan Huwe Dekh Ke Rutba
Sidra Se Qadam Jab Ke Badhaya Shabe Meraj

Jibreel Take Ho Gaye Sarkaar Rawaana
Woh Takta Huwa Reh Gaya Sidra Shabe Meraj

Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj

Yun Masjide Aqsa Me Namaaz Usne Padhai
Talib Se Mile Padke Dogana Shabe Meraj

Har Ek Nabi Balke Sab Aflaq Ke Qudsi
Padte The Shahensha Ka Qutba Shabe Meraj

Muddat Se Jo Armaan Tha Woh Aaj Nikaala
Hooron Ne Kiya Khoob Nazaara Shabe Meraj

Dulha The Muhammad To Barati The Ferishte
Is Shaan Se Pohche Mere Maula Shabe Meraj

Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj

Jab Pohche Maqaam E Fatadalla Pe Muhammad(Saw)
Qaliq Se Raha Kuch Bhi Na Parda Shabe Meraj

Arsh O Malak O Arzo Sama Jannat O Dozaq
Us Shah Ne Har Cheez Ko Dekha Shabe Meraj

Bhejoon Ga Mai Ummat Ko Teri Quld Me Pehle
Haq Ne Kiya Mehboob Se Waada Shabe Meraj

Us Me Se Jameel E Razvi Ko Bhi Ataa Ho
Rehmat Ka Bata Qaas Jo Hissa Shabe Meraj

Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj Shabe Meraj

1: Parho Durood Ke Molood Ki Ghari Aayi
2:
Parho Durood Ke Molood Ki Ghari Aayi
Ya Rasool Allah Salla Alaik
Ya Habib Allah Sallim Alaik
Aye Sarkar Aye Mere Dil Daar Aye

Har Ek Saa’at-O-Lamha Hai Qeemti Is Ka
Har Ek Raat Se Barh Kar Mila Isay Rutba
Isi Liye To Ye Shab Behtreen Kehlaayi

Khuda Ka Shukr Karo Or Parho Durood Un Per
Ke Aaj Laaye Hain Tashreef Hadi-O-Rehbar
Zamanay Bhar Mein Hai Mash’hoor Jin Ki Yaktayi

Chhatay Hain Badal-E-Ghum Khushian Sath Laayi Hain
Har Ek Chehray Pe Ab Muskurahat Aayi Hai
Har Ek Dil Mein Khushi Ki Baji Hai Shehnai

Jahan Mein Subz Parchamon Ki Bahar Aayi Hai
Aur Aashiqon Ne Makaan Har Gali Sajaai Hai
Hai Shaad Shaad Nabi Ka Har Ek Tamannayi

Jahan Goonj Utha Marhaba K Naaron Se
Khushi Hai Kaisi Na Poocho Ye Ghum K Maaron Se
Yehi Wohi Raat Hai Jo Kaif Ka Samaan Layi

Unhi K Dar Se Darya-E-Jood Behtay Hain
Wo Aaye Jo Nahi Saail Ko Nahi Kehte Hain
Sakhawat Aisi Ataa Rab Ne In Ko Farmayi

Shab-E-Wiladat-E-Sarkar Ka Hai Ye Sadqa
Ke Mil Gaya Hai Sana Ka Ubaid Ko Jazba
Musafir Is Ki Ye Mehnat Jabeen To Rang Laayi

1: Payaam Leke Jo Aayi Saba Madine Se
2:
Payaam Leke Jo Aayi Saba Madine Se
Marize Ishq Ki Laayi Dawa Madine Se

Mile Humare Bhi Dil Ko Jilaa Madine Se
Ke Mehro Maah Ne Paayi Ziya Madine Se

Tumhari Ek Jhalak Ne Kiya Use Dilkash
Farogh Husn Ne Paayi Shaha Madine Se

Bata De Koi Kisi Aur Se Bhi Kuch Paaya
Jise Mila Jo Mila Woh Mila Madine Se

Tamam Shaaho Gada Pal Rahe Hai Us Dar Se
Mili Jahaan Ko Rozi Sadaa Madine Se

Woh Aaya Khuld Me Jo Aa Gaya Maine Me
Gaya Woh Khuld Se Jo Chal Diya Madine Se

Na Chain Paayega Ye Ghamzada Kisi Soorat
Mareeze Gham Ko Milegi Shifa Madine Se

Lagao Dil Ko Na Duniya Me Har Kisi Shai Se
Ta'alluq Apna Ho Kaabe Se Ya Madine Se

Chaman Se Phool Khile Murda Dil Bhi Jee Utthe
Naseem Khuld Se Aayi Hai Ya Madine Se

Madina Chasmaye Aabe Hayaat Hai Yaaron
Chalo Humesha Ki Le Lo Baqaa Madine Se

Humare Dil Ko To Bhaaya Hai Taiba Hi Zaahid
Tumhe Hai Makka To Hoga Siwaa Madine Se

Chale Jo Taiba Se Muslim To Khuld Me Pahuche
Ki Seedha Khuld Ka Hai Raasta Madine Se

Tumhare Qadmon Pe Sar Sadqe Jaan Fida Ho Jaaye
Na Laaye Phir Mujhe Mera Khuda Madine Se

Teri Habeeb Ka Pyara Chaman Kiya Barbaad
Ilahi Nikle Ye Najdi Bala Madine Se

Suno To Gaur Se Aayi Sadaa Madine Se,
Kareen Hai Rehmat O Fazl E Khuda Madine Se

Jo Aaya Le Ke Gaya Kaun Lauta Khaali Haath,
Bataa De Koi Suna Ho Jo 'laa' Madine Se

Tere Naseeb Ka Noorie Milega Tujh Ko Bhi
Le Aaye Hissa Ye Shaaho Gada Madine Se.....!!

1: Pekar E Dilruba Ban Kay Aaya
2:
Pekar E Dilruba Ban Kay Aaya,
Ruh E Arzo Sama Ban Kay Aaya
Sab Rasul E Khuda Ban Kay Aa-Ay,
Wo Habeeb E Khuda Ban Kay Aaya

Hazrat E Amina Ka Dulaara,
Wo Haleema Ki Aankhon Ka Taara
Wo Shikasta Dilon Ka Sahaara,
Bay Kason Ki Dua Ban Kay Aaya

Dast E Qudrat Nay Esa Sajaya,
Husn E Takhleeq Ko Rashk Aaya
Jiss Ka Paya Kisi Nay Na Paya,
Wo Khuda Ki Raza Ban Kay Aaya

Taajdaaron Nay Di He Salami,
Baadshahon Nay Ki He Ghulaami
Bay Misaal Uss Ka Ism E Giraami,
Mujtaba Mustafa Ban Kay Aaya

Wo Nabi Rahmat E Aalameen Hai,
Jo Bhi Unkay Zair E Nagiin Hai
Esa Ghamkhuar Daykha Nahiin He,
Jesa Kherulwara Ban Kay Aaya

He Zahoori Barri Shan Unki,
Madah Karta He Quraan Unki
Naat Parrta He Hassaan Unki,
Jo Mayra Rahnuma Ban Kay Aaya

1: Peshe Haq Muzda Shafaat Ka Sunaate Jaayenge
2:
Peshe Haq Muzda Shafaat Ka Sunaate Jaayenge
Aap Rote Jaayenge Hum Ko Hansaate Jaayenge

Dil Nikal Jaane Ki Jaa Hai Aah Kin Aankhon Se Woh
Hum Se Pyaso Ke Liye Dariya Bahate Jaayenge

Kusht-Gaane Garmiye Mehshar Ko Woh Jaane Maseeh
Aaj Daaman Ki Hawa De Kar Jilaate Jaayenge

Gul Khilega Aaj Ye Unki Naseeme Faiz Se
Khoon Rote Aayenge Hum Muskurate Jaayenge

Haan Chalo Hasrat Zado Sunte Hain Woh Din Aaj Hai
Thi Khabar Jis Ki Ki Woh Jalwa Dikhaate Jaayenge

Aaj Eide Aashiqaa(N) Hai Gar Khuda Chahe Ki Woh
Abroo E Paiwasta Ka Aalam Dikhaate Jaayenge

Kuch Khabar Bhi Hai Faqeero Aaj Woh Din Hai Ki Woh
Ne’mate Khuld Apne Sadqe Mein Lutaate Jaayenge

Khaak Uftado Bas Un Ke Aane Hi Ki Der Hai
Khud Woh Gir Kar Sajda Mein Tum Ko Uthate Jaayenge

Wus’ate Di Hain Khuda Ne Daamane Mehboob Ko
Jurm Khulte Jaayenge Aur Woh Chupaate Jaayenge

Lo Woh Aaye Muskurate Hum Aseeron Ki Taraf
Khirmane Isyaa(N) Par Ab Bijli Giraate Jaayenge

Aankh Kholo Ghamzado Dekho Woh Giryaa(N) Aaye Hain
Lauhe Dil Se Naqshe Gham Ko Ab Mitaate Jaayenge

Sokhta Jaano(N) Pe Woh Purjoshe Rehmat Aaye Hain
Aabe Kausar Se Lagi Dil Ki Bujhaate Jaayenge

Aaftaab Unka Hi Chamkega Jab Auro(N) Ke Charaag
Sar-Sare Joshe Balaa Se Jhil-Milaate Jaayenge

Paaye Koobaa(N) Pul Se Guzrenge Teri Aawaaz Par
Rabbe Sallam Ki Sadaa Par Wajd Laate Jaayenge

Sarware Dee(N) Leeje Apne Na-Tawaano Ki Khabar
Nafso Shaitaa(N) Sayyida Kab Tak Dabaate Jaayenge

Hashr Tak Daalenge Hum Paidaaishe Maula Ke Dhoom
Misle Faaras Najd Ke Qil-Ae Giraate Jaayenge

Khaak Ho Jaaye(N) Adoo Jal Kar Magar Hum To Raza
Dam Mein Jab Tak Dam Hai Zikr Unka Sunaate Jayenge

1: Phir Ke Gali Gali Tabaah
2:
Phir Ke Gali Gali Tabaah Thokare(N) Sab Ki Khaye Kyun
Dil Ko Jo Aql De Khuda Teri Gali Se Jaaye Kyun

Rukhsate Qaafila Ka Shor Gash Se Humain Uthaye Kyun
Sote Hain Unke Saaye Mein Koi Humain Jagaaye Kyun

Baar Na The Habeeb Ko Paalte Hii Gareeb Ko
Royen Jo Ab Naseeb Ko Chain Kaho Ganwaye Kyun

Yaade Huzoor Ki Qasam Gaflate Aish Hai Sitam
Khoob Hai Qaide Gham Mein Hum Koi Humein Chchudaye Kyun

Dekh Ke Hazrate Ghani Fail Padhe Fakeer Bhi
Chaayi Ab To Chauni Hashr Hi Aa Na Jaaye Kyun

Jaan Hai Ishqe Mustafa Roz Fuzoo(N) Kare Khuda
Jis Ko Ho Darf Ka Maza Naaze Dawa Uthaye Kyun

Hum To Hain Aap Dil Figaar Gham Mein Hansi Hai Na Gawaar
Ched Ke Gul Ko Nau Bahaar Khoon Humein Rulaye Kyun

Yanto Yun Hi Tadap Ke Jaaye(N) Ya Wohi Daam Se Chchudaaye(N)
Minnate Gair Kyun Uthaye(N) Koi Taras Jataaye Kyun

Unke Jalaal Ka Asar Dil Se Lagaaye Hai Qamar
Jo Ki Ho Lot Zakhm Par Daaghe Jigar Mitaaye Kyun

Khush Rahe Gul Se Andaleeb Khaare Haram Mujhe Naseeb
Meri Bala Bhi Zikr Par Phool Ke Khaar Khaye Kyun

Garde Malaal Agar Dhule Dil Ki Kali Agar Khile
Barq Se Aankh Kyun Jale Rone Pe Muskuraye Kyun

Jaane Safar Naseeb Ko Kis Ne Kaha Maze Se Ho
Khatka Agar Sehar Ka Ho Shaam Se Maut Aaye Kyun

Ab To Na Rok Aye Ghani Aadate Sag Bigad Gayi
Mere Kareem Pehle Hi Lukmaye Tar Khilaye Kyun

Raahe Nabi Me Kya Kami Farshe Bayaaz Deeda Ki
Chadare Zil Hai Malgaji Zere Qadam Bichaye Kyun

Sange Dare Huzoor Se Hum Ko Khuda Na Sabr De
Jaana Hai Sar Ko Jaa Chuke Dil Ko Karaar Aaye Kyun

Hai To Raza Niraa Sitam Jurm Pe Gar Lajaaye Hum
Koi Bajaaye Soze Gham Saaze Tarab Bajaaye Kyun

1: Pooch Te Kya Ho Madine Se Mai Kya Laya Hoon
2:
Pooch Te Kya Ho Madine Se Mai Kya Laya Hoon
Apni Aankhaun Mein Madine Ko Basa Laya Hoon

Dil Bhi Mera Hai Waheen Jaan Bhi Meri Hai Waheen
Apne Kaandhaun Par Apne Laashay Ko Utha Laya Hoon

Jisne Choome Hai Qadam Sarwaray Do ‘alam Ke
Khaak E Taibah Ko Mai Apni Palkuan Pay Saja Laya Hoon

Saya E Gumbade Khazra Me Ada Karke Namaaz
Apne Sar Ko Mai Arsh Ka Hum Paya Bana Laya Hoon

Shah-E-Kaonain Ki Midhat Ka Mila Hai Ye Sila
Apni Bigri Hui Taqdeer Bana Laya Hoon

Taiba-O-Batha Ke Purnoor Manazar Lekar
Safha-E-Dil Pe Mai Tasweer Bana Laya Hoon

Jaan O Dil Wahaan Rakh Ke Amanath Ki Tarha
Phir Wahaan Janay Ke Asbaab Bana Laya Hoon

1: Poochte Kya Ho Arsh Par Yun Gaye Mustafa Ke Yun
2:
Poochte Kya Ho Arsh Par Yu'n Gaye Mustafa Ke Yu'n
Kaif Ke Parr Jaha'n Jale Koyi Bataye Kya Ke Yu'n

Qasre D(A)na Ke Raaz Me Aqle To Gum Hai Jaisi Hai
Ruhe Qudus Se Poochiye Tum Ne Bhi Kuch Suna Ke Yu'n

Maine Kaha Ki Jalwa E Asl Me Kis Tarah Gume
Subha Ne Noore Mehr Me Mitt Ke Dikha Diya Ke Yu'n

Haaye Re Zouq E Bekhudi Dil Jo Sambhalne Sa Laga
Chak Ke Mahak Me Phool Ki Gir Ne Lagi Sabaa Ke Yu'n

Dil Ko De Nooro Daaghe Ishq Phir Mai Fida Do Neem Kar
Maana Hai Sun Ke Shaqqe Maah Aankho Se Ab Dikha Ke Yu'n

Dil Ko Hai Fikr Kis Tarah Murde Jhilate Hai Huzoor
Ay Mai Fida Laga Kar Ek Thokar Use Bataa Ke Yu'n

Baagh Me Shukre Wasl Tha Hijr Me Haay Haay Ghul
Kaam Hai Unke Zikr Se Khair Wo Yu'n Hua Ke Yu'n

Jo Kahe She'aro Paase Shar'a Dono Ka Husn Kyu'n Kar Aaye
La Use Paishe Jalwa E Zam Zame Raza Ke Yu'n

1: Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah Ya Habib Allah
2:
Ya Rasool Allah Ya Habeeb Allah
Ya Rasool Allah Ya Habeeb Allah

Nabi Ka Jhanda Lay Kar Niklo Dunia Par Chaa Jawo
Nabi Ka Jhanda Aman Ka Jhanda Ghar Ghar Main Lehrawo

Ya Habib-E-Kibria Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Marhaba Ya Mujtaba Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Badlian Rehmat Ki Chaien Bondiaan Rehmat Ki Ayeen
Ab Muradain Dil Paieen Aamad Shah-E-Arab Hay
Tajdar-E-Anmbia Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Mursaleen Kay Paishwa Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Tum Bhi Kar Kay Un Ka Charcha Apnay Dil Chamkawo
Oonchay Main Ooncha Nabi Ka Jhanda Ghar Ghar Main Lehrawo

Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah Ya Habib Allah

Abr-E-Rehmat Cha Gia Hay Kabay Pay Jhanda Gara Hay
Bab-E-Rehmat Aaj Wa Hay Aamad-E-Shah-E-Arab Hay
Ya Shah-E-Arz-O-Sama Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Sarwaray Har Dosara Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Tum Bhi Kar Kay Un Ka Charcha Apnay Dil Chamkawo
Oonchay Main Ooncha Nabi Ka Jhanda Ghar Ghar Main Lehrawo

Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah Ya Habib Allah

Aa Gaey Khair-Ul-Wara Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Aaye Shah-E-Anmbia Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Tum Bhi Kar Kay Un Ka Charcha Apnay Dil Chamkawo
Oonchay Main Ooncha Nabi Ka Jhanda Ghar Ghar Main Lehrawo

Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah Ya Habib Allah

Momino Waqt-E-Adab Hay Aamad-E-Mehboob-E-Rab Hay
Jaaye Adab-O-Tarab Hay Aamad Shah-E-Arab Hay
Razdar-E-Kibria Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Mazhar-E-Rab-Ul-Ulla Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Amina Kay Dilruba Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Aye Haleema Kay Pia Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba

Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah Ya Habib Allah

Aanay Wala Hay Woh Piara Dono Alam Ka Sahara
Kaabay Kay Hajat Rawa Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Aye Mairay Mushkil Kusha Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Tum Bhi Kar Kay Un Ka Charcha Apnay Dil Chamkawo
Onchay Main Oncha Nabi Ka Jhanda Ghar Ghar Main Lehrawo

Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah Ya Habib Allah

Soyee Qismat Jagg Uthi Aour Sub Ki Bigri Bun Gayee
Bab-E-Rehmat Wa Huwa Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Aatay Hee Sajday Main Gir Kar Rabi Habli Ummati
Arz Haq Say Kar Dia Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Khoob Jhoomo Aasio Woh Muskaraty Aa Gaaye
Shafe Rooz-E-Jaza Ahlann Wa Sahlann Marhaba
Tum Bhi Kar Kar Kay Unn Ka Charcha Apnay Dil Chamkawo
Oonchay Main Ooncha Nabi Ka Jhanda Ghar Ghar Main Lehrawo

Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah Ya Habib Allah

-------------------Other Version------------------------

Tum Bhi Kar Key Unka Charcha, Apney Dil Chamkaaow
Uchay Mey Ucha Nabi Ka Jhanda
Azmat Wala Nabi Ka Jhanda
Pyara Pyara Nabi Ka Jhanda
Ghar Ghar Mey Lehraaow

Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah Ya Habib Allah

Ya Rasool Allah Ke Naare Se Hum Ko Pyaar Hai
Hum Ne Ye Naara Lagaya Apna Bera Paar Hai

Mai Wo Sunni Hoon Jameel-E-Qadri Marne Ki Baad
Mera Lasha Bhi Kahega As Salaatu Was Salaam

Rabbi Habli Ummati Kehte Hue Paida Hue
Haq Ne Farmaaya Ke Bakhsha As Salaatu Was Salaam

But Shikan Aaya Ye Kehkar Sar Ke Bal But Gir Pare
Jhoom Kar Kehta Tha Kaba As Salaatu Was Salaam

Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah, Ya Habib Allah

Nabi Ka Jhanda Le Kar Niklo Dunya Par Cha Jao
Nabi Ka Jhanda Aman Ka Jhanda Ghar Ghar Par Lehrao

Pukaro Ya Rasulallah, Ya Habiballah

Lab Par Naat Paak Ka Nagma Kal Bhi Tha Aur Aaj Bhi Hai
Mere Nabi Se Mera Rishta Kal Bhi Tha Aur Aaj Bhi Hai
Nabi Ka Jhanda Ooncha Rahega Naara Ye Hi Lagao
Nabi Ka Jhanda Aman Ka Jhanda Ghar Ghar Par Lehrao

Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah, Ya Habiballah

Qirya Qirya Basti Basti Zikr Nabi Ka Aam Karo
Nabi Ki Azmat Ke Gun Gao Wird Ye Subho Shaam Karo
Nabi Ka Jhanda Ooncha Rahega Naara Ye Hi Lagao
Nabi Ka Jhanda Aman Ka Jhanda Ghar Ghar Par Lehrao

Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah, Ya Habiballah

Rang Barange Jhanday Choro Thaam Lo Gunbad Wala
Hum Sab Par Raazi Ho Jayega Piyara Madani Aaqa
Iss Jhanday Ke Saye Talay Tum Mil Kar Qadam Barhao
Nabi Ka Jhanda Aman Ka Jhanda Ghar Ghar Par Lehrao

Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah, Ya Habiballah

Ya Rasool Allah Ke Naaray Se Hum Ko Piyaar Hai
Hum Ne Ye Naara Lagaya Apna Bera Paar Hai
Khuld Me Hoga Hamara Dhaakla Iss Shaan Se
Ya Rasulallah Ka Naara Lagatay Jayenge

Pukaro Ya Rasool Allah, Ya Habiballah

Sabz Hilali Parcham Yaro Hum Ko Jaan Se Piyara Hai
Iss Par Gunbad-E-Khizra Hoga Ye Manshoor Hamara Hai
Iss Gunbad Ke Saye Talay Tum Sab Ek Ho Jao
Nabi Ka Jhanda Aman Ka Jhanda Ghar Ghar Par Lehrao

Pukaro Ya Rasulallah, Ya Habiballah

1: Pul Se Utaro Raah Guzar Ko Khabar Na Ho
2:
Pul Se Utaaro Raah Guzar Ko Khabar Na Ho
Jibreel Par Bichaye To Par Ko Khabar Na Ho

Kaanta Mere Jigar Se Ghame Rozgaar Ka
Yun Kheench Lijiye Ke Jigar Ko Khabar Na Ho

Fariyaad Ummati Jo Kare Haale Zaar Mein
Mumkin Nahi Ki Khaire Bashar Ko Khabar Na Ho

Kehti Thi Ye Buraaq Se Uski Subuqrawi
Yun Jaaiye Ki Garde Safar Ko Khabar Na Ho

Farmate Hain Ye Dono Hain Sardare Do Jahaan
Aye Murtaza! Ateeqo Umar Ko Khabar Na Ho

Aisa Guma De Unki Wila Mein Khuda Humein
Dhoonda Kare Par Apni Khabar Ko Khabar Na Ho

Aa Dil ! Haram Ko Rokne Waalon Se Chupke Aaj
Yoon Uth Chalen Ki Pehluoo Bar Ko Khabar Na Ho

Taire Haram Hain Ye Kahi(N) Rishta Bapaa Na Ho
Yoon Dekhiye Ki Taare Nazar Ko Khabar Na Ho

Aye Khaare Taiba ! Dekh Ki Daaman Na Bheeg Jaaye
Yoon Dil Mein Aa Ki Deedaye Tar Ko Khabar Na Ho

Aye Shauqe Dil ! Ye Sajda Gar Unko Rawa Nahi
Achcha ! Woh Sajda Keeje Ki Sar Ko Khabar Na Ho

Unke Siwa Raza Koi Haami Nahi Jahaa(N)
Guzra Kare Pisar Pe Pidar Ko Khabar Na Ho

1: Purnoor Hai Zamana Subhe Shabe Wiladat
2:
Purnoor Hai Zamana Sub-He Shabe Wiladat
Parda Utha Hai Kiska Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Jalwa Hai Haq Ka Jalwa Sub-He Shabe Wiladat
Saaya Khuda Ka Saaya Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Fasle Bahaar Aayi Shakle Nigaar Aayi
Gulzar Hai Zamana Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Phoolo Se Baagh Mehke, Shakho Pe Murg Chehke
Ahde Bahar Aaya Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Dil Jag-Maga Rahe Hai, Qismat Chamak Uthi Hai
Faila Naya Ujala Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Aayi Nayi Hukumat Sikka Naya Chalega
Aalam Ne Rang Badla Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Ruhul Amee(N) Ne Gaada Kaabe Ki Chat Pe Jhanda
Ta-Arsh Uda Pharera Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Padhte Hai Arsh Waale, Sunte Hai Farsh Waale
Sultane Nou Ka Khutba Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Din Fir Gaye Hamare, Sote Naseeb Jaage
Khursheed Hi Wo Chamka Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Pyare Rabi-Ul Awwal, Teri Jhalak Ke Sadqe
Chamka Diya Naseeba Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Noushah Banau Unko, Dulha Banau Unko
Hai Arsh Tak Ye Shohra Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Shadi Rachi Hui Hai, Bajte Hai Shadiyane
Dulha Bana Wo Dulha Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Hushiyar Ho Bhikari, Nazdeek Hai Suvaari
Na Keh Raha Hai Danka Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Aamad Ka Shor Sunkar, Ghar Aate Hai Bhikari
Ghere Khade Hai Rasta Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Har Jaan Muntazir Hai, Har Deed Rah-Nigaar Hai
Gouga Hai Marhaba Ka Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Teri Chamak Damak Se Aalam Chamak Raha Hai
Mere Bhi Bakht Chamka Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

Baata Hai Do Jaha(N) Me Tune Ziya Ka Baada
De De Hasan Ka Hissa Sub-He Shabe Wiladat

1: Pyaari Maa Mujh Ko Teri Dua Chahiye
2:
Pyaari Maa Mujh Ko Teri Dua Chahiye
Tere Anchal Ki Thandi Hawaa Chahiye

Lori Gaa Gaa Ke Mujh Ko Sulati Hain Tu
Muskura Ke Sawere Jagati Hain Tu
Mujh Ko Iss Ke Siwa Aur Kya Chahiye

Pyaari Maa Mujhko Terii Dua Chahiye
Tere Aanchal Ki Thandi Hawaa Chahiye

Tere Mumtaa Ke Saaye Main Phoolo Phalo
Thaam Ker Teri Ungli Main Badhta Chaloo
Aasra Bas Tere Pyar Ka Chahiye

Pyari Maa Mujh Ko Teri Dua Chahiye
Tere Anchal Ki Thandi Hawa Chahiye

Teri Khidmat Se Duniya Main Azmat Meri
Tere Pairo Ke Niche Hai Jannat Meri
Umar Bhar Sar Pe Sayaa Tera Chahiye

Pari Maa Mujh Ko Teri Dua Chahiye
Teri Anchal Ki Thandi Hawa Chahiye

1: Qadam Qadam Pe Khuda Ki Madad Pohanchti Hai
2:
Qadam Qadam Pe Khuda Ki Madad Pohanchti Hai
Durood Se Mere Dil Ko Rasad Pohanchti Hai

Ye Aasmaan Bhi Wahan Tak Nahi Pohanch Sakta
Jahan Tak Aap K Qadmon Ki Hadd Pohanchti Hai

Sir Apna Paaye Risalat Ma’aab Per Rakh Doon
To Aasmaan Pe Bulandi-E-Qadd Pohanchti Hai

Juloos-E-Ishq-E-Nabi Ka Ho Jis Taraf Se Guzar
Mere Junoon Ko Bhi Lay Kar Khirad Pohanchti Hai

Durood Ka Dia Jata Hai Jub Sawab Mujhe
Bahisht Tak Meri Do Guz Lahad Pohanchti Hai

Salaam-O-Naat Muzaffar Yahan Mein Parhta Hoon
Qubooliat Ki Haram Se Sanad Pohanchti Hai.

1: Qadmoun Mein Bula Leejiye Ya Nabi Madine Mein
2:
Qadmoun Mein Bula Leejiye, Ya Nabi Madine Mein
Kaash Mein Challa Jaon, Aaj He Madeenay Mein

Samnay Jo Aathi Hai, Muskura Kay Aathi Hai
Ehtraam Kerthi Hai, Mauth Bhi Madeenay Mein

Dosto Dua Ki Jiye, Pir Mujh Ko Bula Lein Wo
Hai Meri Dua, Jaein Aap Sab Madinay Mein

Bhejiye Darood Un Par, Bhejiye Salam Un Par
Aapni Roz Lagwayeh, Haazri Madinay Mein

Ab Meri Nigaon Mein, Har Tharaf Madina Hai
Meri Dil Ki Kulthi Hai, Har Gali Madinay Mein

Is Kadar Barastha Hai, Noor Sabz Ghumbad Par
Raat Ko Bhi Raithi Hai, Roshni Madinay Mein

Qadmoun Mein Bula Leejiye Ya Nabi Madeenay Mein
Kaash Mein Challa Jaon, Aaj He Madeenay Mein

1: Qafile Ne Suye Taiba Kamar Aaraayi Ki
2:
Qafile Ne Suye Taiba Kamar Aaraayi Ki
Mushkil Aasaan Ilahi Meri Tanhai Ki

Laaj Rakhli Ta-Maye Afw Ke Saudaayi Ki
Aye Main Qurbaa(N) Mere Aaqa Badi Aaqaai Ki

Farsh Ta Arsh Sab Aaina Zamaair Haazir
Bas Qasam Khaaiye Ummi Teri Daanaai Ki

Shash Jihat Samte Muqaabil Shabo Roz Ek Hi Haal
Dhoom Wannajm Mein Hai Aap Ki Beenaai Ki

Paansau (500) Saal Ki Raah Aisi Hi Jaise Do Gaam
Aas Hum Ko Bhi Lagi Hai Teri Shinwaai Ki

Chand Ishaare Ka Hila Huqm Ka Baandha Sooraj
Wah Kya Baat Shaha Teri Tuwaanaai Ki

Tang Thehri Hai Raza Jis Ke Liye Wus’ate Arsh
Bas Jahag Dil Mein Hai Us Jalwaye Harjaai Ki

1: Qareeb E Mustafa Hai Koii Koii
2:
Qareeb E Mustafa Hai Koii Koii
Mazay Yay Luutt-Ta He Koii Koii

Bashar Samjha Unhayn Laakhon Nay Laykin
Haqeeqat E Aashna He Koii Koii

Ghaneemat Jaan Jitni Bhi Mili He
Kay Mekhaana Khula He Koii Koii

Madinay Pohnchtay Hain Yuun To Laakhon
Par, Madina Dekhta He Koii Koii

Tayray Rozay Ki Noori Jaaliyon Ko
Nazar Say Choomta Hai Koi Koi

Jise Dekho Wo Dam Bharta Hai Unka
Lekin Ba Wafaa Hai Koi Koi

1: Qaseeda E Mearaj
2:
Woh Sarwar E Kishwar E Risalat Jo Arsh Per Jalwah Gar Huye Thay
Naye Nirale Tarab Kay Saaman Arab Ke Mehman Kay Liye Thay.

Bahar Hai Shadiyan Mubarak Chaman Ko Aabadiyan Mubarak
Malak Falak Apni Apni Lay Main Yeh Ghar Ana Dil Ka Boltay Thay.

Wahan Falak Per Yahan Zameen Main Rachi Thi Shaadi Machi Thi Dhoomein
Udhar Say Anwar Hastay Aatay Idhar Say Naf-Haat Ooth Rahay They.

Yeh Joot Padti Thi Unkay Rukh Ki Kay Arsh Tak Chandni Thi Chhatki
Woh Raat Kya Jagmaga Rahi Thi Jagah Jagah Nasb Aainay They

Nayi Dulhan Ki Phaban Main Kaaba Nikhar Kay Sanwara Sanwar Kay Nikhra
Hajar Key Sadqay Kamar Key Eik Til Main Rang Lakhoon Banao Key They.

Nazar Main Dulha Key Pyaray Jalway Haya Say Mehrab Sir Jhukaye
Siyah Parday Kay Moun Per Aanchal Tajaliye Zaat E Bahat Say Thay.

Khushi Kay Badal Umand Kay Aaye Diloon Kay Taoos Rang Laye
Woh Naghma E Naat Ka Samaan Tha Haram Ko Khud Wajd Aa Rahe Thay

Yeh Jhooma Mizab E Zar Ka Jhoomer Kay Aa Raha Kaan Per Dhalak Ker
Phuhar Barsi To Moti Jhar Ker Hatim Ki Gaud Mein Bharay They.

Dulhan Ki Khushboo Say Mast Kapray Nasim E Gustakh Aanchloon Say
Gilaf E Mushkeen Jo Oord Raha Tha Ghazal Naafe Basaa Rahay Thay.

Pahadiyoon Ka Woh Husn E Taz'ee Woh Oonchi Choti Woh Nazo Tamqeen
Saba Say Sabzah Main Lehrein Aateen Dupattay Dhani Chunay Huye Thay.

Naha Kay Nehroon Nay Woh Chamakta Libas Aabay Rawan Ka Pehna
Ki Mauj E Chadiyaan Thi Dhaar Lachka Habab E Tabaan Kay Thal Takay Thay.

Purana Purdag Malgaja Tha Utha Diya Farsh Chandni Ka
Hajoom E Tare Nigah Say Kosoon Qadam Qadam Farsh Baadley Thay.

Ghubar Ban Ker Nisaar Jayein Kahan Ab Uss Rah Guzar Ko Payein
Hamaray Dil Huriyoon Ki Aankhein Farishtoon Kay Per Jahan Biche Thay.

Khuda Hee Day Sabr Jaan E Purgham Dikhaoon Kyun Kar Tujhay Woh A'alam
Jab Unko Jhurmat Main Lakay Qudsi Jinaa Ka Dulha Bana Rahay Thay.

Utar Ker Unkay Rukh Ka Sadqa Yeh Noor Ka But Raha Tha Bada
Kay Chand Suraj Machal Machal Ker Jabeen Ki Khairat Mangtay Thay.

Wohi To Ab Tak Chalak Raha Hai Wohi To Joban Tapak Raha Hai
Nahanay May Jo Gira Tha Pani Katoray Taroon Nay Bhar Liye Thay.

Bacha Jo Talwoon Ka Unkay Dhouwan Bana Woh Jannat Ka Rang O Roghan
Jinhoon Nay Dulha Ki Payi Utran Woh Phool Gulzar E Noor Kay Thay.

Khabar Yeh Tehweelay Maher Ki Thi Kay Rut Sunhani Ghadi Phiray Gee
Wahan Ki Poshak Zay-Bay Tan Ki Yahan Ka Joda Badha Chukay Thay.

Tajaliy E Haq Ka Sehra Sar Per Salat O Tasleem Ki Nichawar
Do Roya Qudsi Paray Jama Kar Kharhay Salami Kay Waastay Thay.

Jo Hum Bhi Waan Hotay Khaq E Gulshan Lipat Kay Qadmoon Say Ley Tay Utran
Magar Karein Kiya Naseeb Main To Yeh Namuradi Kay Din Likhay Thay.

Abhi Na Aaye Thay Pusht E Zeen Tak Kay Sir Hui Maghfirat Ki Shallak
Sada Shafa't Nay Di Mubarak! Gunaah Mastana Jhoomtay Thay.

Ajab Na Tha Rakhsh Ka Chamakna Gazal E Dam Khurdasa Bhadakna
Shuaein Bukkay Urha Rahi Theen Tadapte Ankhoon Pay Saieqay Thay.

Hujum E Umeed Hai Ghatao Muradein Day Kar Inhein Hatao
Adab Ki Baagein Liye Badhao Malaika May Yeh Ghal Ghale Thay.

Uthi Jo Garde Rahe Munawar Woh Noor Barsa Kay Raaste Bhar
Ghiray Thay Badal Bharay Thay Jal Thal Umand Kay Jangle Ubal Rahay Thay.

Sitam Kiya Kaisi Mat Kathi Thi Qamar Woh Khak Unkay Rah Guzar Ki
Utha Na Laya Kay Miltay Miltay Ye Daagh Sab Dekhte Mite They

Burraq Kay Naqshe Sum Kay Sadqe Woh Gul Khilaye Kay Saray Rastey
Mehaktay Gulban Mehakte Gulshan Hare Bhare Lahlaha Rahe Thay.

Namaz E Aqsa Main Tha Yehi Seer Ayan Houn Ma'ni E Awwal Akhir
Key Dast Basta Hain Pichey Hazir Jo Salatanat Aagay Kar Gaye Thay.

Yeh Unki Aamad Ka Dab-Daba Tha Nikhar Her Shaiy Ka Ho Raha Tha
Nujoom O Aflak Jam O Mina Ujaltay Thay Khangaltey They.

Naqab Ultay Woh Mehr E Anwar Jalal O Rukhsar Garmiyoon Per
Falak Ko Hebat Say Tap Charhi Thi Tapaktay Anjum Kay Aablay Tha

Yeh Joshishe Noor Ka Asar Tha Key Aabay Gohar Qamar Qamar Tha
Safaey Rah Say Phisal Phisal Kar Sitare Qadmon Pay Laut'tay Thay.

Badha Ye Lehra Kay Behr O Wahdat Key Dhul Gaya Naam E Raige Kasrat
Falak Key Teloon Ki Kiya Haqeeqat Yeh Arsh O Kursi Do Bulbule Thay.

Woh Zill E Rehmat Woh Rukh Key Jalwe Ke Taare Chupte Na Khilne Paate
Sunehri Zarbaft Udi Atlas Yeh Than Sab Dhoop Chaoon Ke The.

Chala Woh Serve E Chamaan Kharamaa Na Ruk Saka Sidra Say Damaan
Palak Jhapakti Rahi Woh Kab Kay Sab Aeno Aan Say Guzar Chuke Thay.

Jhalak See Eik Qudsiyoon Per Aayi Hawwaa Bhi Daman Ki Phir Na Payi
Sawari Dulha Ki Dur Pohnchi Barat Main Hosh Hi Gaye Thay.

Thakay Thay Ruhul Amin Key Bazu Chuta Woh Daman Kahan Woh Pehloo
Rikab Chooti Ummeed Tuti Nigah E Hasrat Key Walwaley Thay.

Ravish Ki Garmi Ko Jis Ney Socha Dimag Say Eik Bhabuka Phoota
Khirad Key Jungle Main Phool Chumka Dahar Dahar Ped Jal Rahe Thay.

Jiloo Main Jo Murgay A'qal Uray Thay Ajab Booray Haloon Girtay Partay
Woh Sidrah Hee Per'rahay Thay Thak Kar Charha Dam Tewar Aa Gaye Thay.

Qavi They Nurgan E Waham Kay Per Uray To Urdnay Ko Aur Dam Bhar
Utha'ee Seenay Ki Aisi Thokar Kay Khoonay Andesha Th'oo'ktay Thay.

Suna Yeh Itnay Mein Arsh E Haq Nay Kay Lay Mubarak Ho Taaj Waley
Wohi Qadam Khair Say Phir Aaye Jo Pehle Taaj E Sharaaf Tere Thay.

Yeh Sunkay Bay Khud Pukar Utha Nisar Jaoon Kahan Hain Aaqa
Phir Unkay Talwoon Ka Paoon Bosa Yeh Meri Aankhon Kay Din Phire Thay.

Jhuka Tha Mujre Ko Arsh E Aala Gire They Sajde May Bazme Bala
Yeh Aankhein Qadmoon Say Mal Raha Tha Woh Girde Qurbaan Ho Rahay Thay

Ziyaein Kuch Arsh Per Yeh Aaein Kay Sari Qindileen Jhilmilayeen
Huzoor E Khurshid Kya Chamaktay Chairagh Moun Apna Dekh Tay Thay.

Yehi Sam'an Tha Kay Paikay Rehmat Khabar Yeh Laya Kay Chaliye Hazrat
Tumhari Khatir Kushada Hain Woh Jo Kalim Per Band Rastaay Thay.

Badh Ay Muhammad Qaree Ho Ahmed Qareeb Aa Sarwar E Mumajjad
Nisar Jaoon Yeh Kiya Nida Thi Yeh Kiya Samaan Tha Yeh Kiya Mazay Thay.

Tabarakallah Shan Teri Tujhi Ko Zaiba Hai Bay Niyazi
Kahin To Woh Josh E Lan-Tarani Kaheen Takazay Visal Kay Thay.

Khirad Say Keh Do Kay Sir Jhuka Le Gumaan Say Guzray Guzarnay Walay
Pare Hain Yahan Khud Jaihat Ko Laalay Kisay Bataye Kidhar Gaye Thay.

Surag Aino Mataa Kahaan Tha Nishan E Kaifo Illa Kahan Tha.
Na Koi Rahi Na Koi Sathi Naa Sang E Manzil Naa Merhalay Thay.

Udar Say Payham Taqazay Aana Idhar Say Mushkil Qadam Barhana
Jalal O Haibat Ka Saamna Tha Jamalo Rehmat Ubhartay Thay.

Barhay To Lekin Jhee-Jhaktay Dartay Haya Say Jhuktay Adab Say Ruktay
Jo Qurb Unhi Ki Ravish Pay Rakhtay To Lakhoon Manzil Kay Fasilay Thay

Per Unka Barhna To Naam Ko Tha Haqeeq'tan Fail Tha Udhar Ka
Tanazuloon Mein Taraki Afza Dana Tadalla Key Silsilay Thay.

Hua Yeh Aakhir Kay Aik Bajra Tamojay Bahrey Hoo Mein Ubhra
Dana Ki Godi Mein Unko Lekar Fana Kay Langar Utha Diye Thay.

Kisay Milay Ghat Ka Kinara Kither Say Guzra Kahan Utra
Bhara Jo Misle Nazar Tarara Woh Apni Aankhoon Say Khud Chupay Thay.

Uthay Jo Qasray Dana Kay Parde Koi Khabar Dey To Kiya Khabar Day
Wahan To Ja Hee Nahin Duee Ki Na Keh Kay Woh Bhi Na Thay Aray Thay.

Woh Baag Kuch Aisa Rang Laya Kay Guncha O Gul Ka Faraq Uthaya
Girah Mein Kal'liyoon Ki Baag Phoolay Guloon Kay Takmay Lagay Huay Thay

Muhito Markaz Mein Faraq Mushkil Rahe Na Faasil Khutoot E Wasil
Kamaan E Hairat Mein Sir Jhukaye Ajeeb Chakar Mein Da'eray Thay.

Hijab Uhnay Mein Lakhoon Parde Har Aik Parday Main Lakhon Jalway
Ajab Ghari Thi Kay Waslo Furqat Janam Kay Bichray Galay Milay Thay.

Zabanein Sukhi Dikha Kay Mojein Tarap Rahi Thien Kay Pani Paein
Bhanwar Ko Yeh Zofay Tashnagi That Kay Halqay Aankhoon Mein Par Gaye Thay.

Wohi Hai Awwal Wohi Hai Aakhir Wohi Hai Batin Wohi Hai Zahir
Usi Kay Jalway Usi Say Milnay Usi Say Uski Taraf Gaye Thay.

Kaman E Imakan Kay Jhutay Nukto Tum Awwal Akhir Ki Phair Mein Ho
Muhit Ki Chal Say To Pucho Kidhar Say Aaye Kidhar Gaye Thay.

Udhar Say Theen Nazray Shah Namaz'ain Idhar Say Inaam E Khusravi Mein
Salam O Rehmat Kay Haar Gundh Ker Glue E Pur Noor Mein Paray Thay.

Zabaan Ko Intezar Guftan To Gos Ko Hasrat E Shunidan
Yahan Jo Kehna Tha Keh Liya Tha Jo Baat Sun'ni Thi Sun Chukay Thay.

Woh Burj E Batha Ka Mahpara Bahishat Ki Sair Ko Sidhara
Chamak Pay Tha Khuld Ka Sitara Kay Iss Qamar Kay Qadam Gaye Thay.

Suroor E Maqdam Ki Roshni Thi Kay Tabishoon Say Mah E Arab Ki
Jina Kay Gulshan Thay Jhaar Farshi Jo Phool Thay Sab Kanwal Banay Thay.

Tarab Ki Nazish Kay Haan Lachakiye Adab Woh Bandish Kay Hill Na Sakiye
Yeh Josh E Ziden Tha Keh Poday Kasha Kish E Arah Kay Talay Thay.

Khuda Ki Qudrat Keh Chand Haq Kay Karoroon Manzil Mein Jalwa Kar Kay
Abhi Na Taroon Ki Chaoon Badli Keh Noor Kay Tarkay Aa Liye Thay.

Nabi E Rehmat Shafi E Ummat Raza Pay Lillah Ho Inayat
Isay Bhi Unn Khal'atoon Say Hisa Jo Khas Rehmat Kay Waan Bate Thay

Sana E Sarkar Hai Wazifa Qabool E Sarkar Hai Taman'na
Na Shayari Ki Hawas Na Parwah Radi Thi Kiya Kaisay Kafiye Thay.

1: Rashk Aaye Kyun Na Apni Chaah Par
2:
Rashk Aaye Kyun Na Apni Chaah Par
Jaan Deta Hoon Rasool Allah Par

Manzile Maqsood Tumko Chahiye
Aaiye Phir Mustafa Ki Raah Par

Ham Ishara Dekhte Hai Aap Ka
Aap Rakhiye Nigh Mehar Wo Mah Par

Jiske Sar Me Aap Ka Sauda Nahi
Haif Hai Us Daanish-E-Gumrah Par

Laut Kar Taiba Se Hum To Aagaye
Dil Magar Thaira Hua Hai Raah Par

Ek Tawajjaye Mustafa Ya Mustafa

Khuld Se Har Be-Adab Mehroom Hai
Ye Raqm Hai Har Dil Aagah Par

Jaan Deta Hai Rasool Allah Par

1: Rashke Qamar Hu Range Rukhe Aftaab Hu
2:
Rashke Qamar Hu Range Rukhe Aftaab Hu
Zarra Tera Jo Ay Shahe Gardu Janaab Hu

Durre Najaf Hu Gohare Paak E Khushab Hu
Yani Turaabe Rah Guzare Bu Turab Hu

Gar Aankh Hu To Abr Ki Chashme Par Aab Hu
Dil Hu To Bark Ka Dile Pur Izteraab Hu

Khooni Jigar Hu Ta-Ir E Be Aashiya(N) Shaha
Range Pardi-E Rukhe Ghul Ka Jawab Hu

Be Aslo Be Sabaat Hu Bahre Karam Madad
Parwarda E Kinaare Saraabo Hubaab Hu

Ibrat Feza Hai Sharme Gunah Se Mera Sukut
Goya Lab E Khamoshe Lahad Ka Jawab Hu

Kyo Naala Soz Le Karu Kyu Khoon E Dil Piyu
Seekh E Kabaab Hu Na Mai Jaame Sharab Hu

Dil Basta Bekaraar Jigar Chaak Ashkbaar
Guncha Hu Ghul Hu Barke Tapaa(N) Hu Sahaab Hu

Daava Hai Sabse Teri Shafa'at Pe Beshtar
Daftar Me Aasiyo Ke Shahe Intekhab Hu

Maula Duha-I Nazro Se Gir Kar Jalaa Ghulam
Ashqe Mizaa(N) Raseeda-E Chashme Kabaab Hu

Mitt Jaye Ye Khudi To Wo Jalwa Kaha Nahi
Darda Me Aap Apni Nazar Ka Hijaab Hu

Sadke Hu Uspe Naar Se Dega Jo Mukhlesi
Bulbul Nahi Ki Aatishe Ghul Par Kabaab Hu

Kaalib Tahi Kiye Hamaa Aaghosh Hai Hilaal
Ay Shehsuware Taibah Me Teri Rikaab Hu

Kya Kya Hai Tujhse Naaz Tere Qasr Ko Ki Mai
Ka'abe Ki Jaan Arshe Baree Ka Jawaab Hu

Shaha Bujhe Sakar Mere Ashko Se Taa-N Mai
Aabe Ab(A)s Chakida E Chashme Kabaab Hu

Mai To Kaha Hi Chahu Ke Banda Hu Shah Ka
Par Luft Jab Hai Keh De Agar Wo Janab 'hu'

Hasrat Me Khaaq Bosi E Taibah Ki Ay Raza
Tapka Jo Chashme Mehar Se Wo Khoon E Naab Hu

1: Rehmat Ka Dar Khula Hae Darbar E Mustafa Me
2:
Rehmat Ka Dar Khula Hae Darbar E Mustafa Me
Bakhshish Ka Silsila Hai Darbar E Mustafa Me

Khamoshyo Ko Meri Sunte Hai Sarwar E Deen
Bin Mange Mil Raha Hai Darbar E Mustafa Me

Ab Dil Ki Dhadkane Haen Sarkar Ke Hawale
Awaz Kab Rawa Hai Darbar E Mustafa Me

Subh O Masa Farishte Aate Hain Hazri Ko
Noorani Qafla Hai Darbar E Mustafa Me

Ek Bheeni Bheeni Khushbu Saanso Me Bas Gayi Hai
Dil Bhi Mehak Raha Hai Darbar E Mustafa Me

Main Arz Kar Raha Hu Sarkar Sun Rahe Hain
Kaisaa Haseen Sama Hai Darbar E Mustafa Me

Salle Ala Nabiyyina Salle Ala Muhammadin
Sab Ki Yahi Sada Hai Darbar E Mustafa Me

Kaisi Azeem Ne’mat Paayi Hai Tu Ne Rizwan
Tu Naat Padh Raha Hai Darbar E Mustafa Me

1: Rehmat Ka Hai Darwaza Khula Maang Are Maang
2:

2:

1: Rifate Mustafayi Par Arsh Ki Aql Dang Hai
2:
Rif’ate Mustafayi Par Arsh Ki Aql Dang Hai
Unki Har Ek Adaa Me Kya Mehboobiyat Ka Rang Hai

Khushbu E Mustafa Se Hai Dono Jahaan Ki Nikhaten
Jumbishen Lab Ki Wo Adaa Mushafe Khush Tarang Hai

Milta Hai Mustafa Ka Dar Aale Rasool Ke Tufail
Marehra Se Madine Tak Roohani Ek Surang Hai

Aagaz Se Akheer Tak Qur’an Hai Na’ate Mustafa
Mehboob Ke Bayaan Ka Kaisa Anokha Dhang Hai

Mehboobe Qibriya Ki Zaat Wajibe Ehteraam Hai
Tauheen Unki Jo Kare Usse Hamari Jang Hai

Wal Lailo Wad Duha Se Hai Aaqa Ke Zulfo Rukh Murrad
Dil Noor Jism Noor Hai Noorani Ang Ang Hai

Kaisi Thi Saire Laamakan Jo Tha Nihan Huwa Ayaan
Ruhulameen Se Poochiye Kaise Ka Aaj Sung Hai

Nazmi Kiye Hi Jayega Milaade Mustafa Bayaan
Isko Kabhi Na Chchedna Sunni Bada Dabang Hai

Nazmi Ko Naar Ki Taraf Le Chale Jab Malaaika
Aaqa Kahenge Chchod Do Ye To Mera Malang Hai

2:

1: Rounaq E Bazme Jahaan Hai Aashiqane Sokhta
2:
Rounaq E Bazme Jahaan Hai Aashiqane Sokhta
Keh Rahi Hai Shamma Ki Goya Zabaan E Sokhta

Jisko Kurse Mehr Samjha Hai Jahaa(N) Ay Mun-Emo
Unke Khwane Jood Se Hai Ek Naan E Sokhta

Maahe Mann Hai Nayyar E Mehshar Ki Garmi Ta-Bakey
Aatish E Isyaa(N) Me Khud Jalti Hai Jaan E Sokhta

Barke Angushte Nabi Chamakti Thi Uss Par Ek Baar
Aaj Tak Hai Seena E Mah Me Nishaan E Sokhta

Mehre Aalam Taab Jhukta Hai Paye Tasleem Roz
Peshe Zarrate Mazaar E Be-Dilaane Sokhta

Kucha E Ghesu E Jaana Se Chale Thandi Naseem
Baalo Par Afsha Ho Ya Rab Bulbulane Sokhta

Bahre Haq Ay Bahre Rehmat Ik Nigah E Lutfbaar
Ta-Ba-Key Be Aab Tadpe Mahiyane Sokhta

Ru-Kshe Khursheede Mehshar Ho Tumhare Faiz Se
Is Sharare Seena E Shaidayi-Aane Sokhta

Aatishe Tar Daamani Ne Dil Kiye Kya Kya Kabaab
Khizr Ki Jaa(N) Ho Jila Do Mahiyane Sokhta

Aatish E Gulha E Taibah Par Jalane Ke Liye
Jaan Ke Taalib Hai Pyare Bulbulane Sokhta

Lutf E Barke Jalwa E Mearaj Laaya Wajd Me
Shola E Zavvaala Sa(N) Hai Aasman E Sokhta

Ay Raza Mazmoon Soze Dil Ki Rif'at Ne Kiya
Is Zameen E Sokhta Ko Aasmaan E Sokhta

1: Rubaaiyaat By Aala Hazrat
2:
Aate Rahe Ambiya 'kama-Qeela- Lahum'
'wal Khaatamu Haqqu Kum' Ki Khaatim Huye Tum
Ya'ni Jo Hua Daftare Tanzeel Tamaam
Aakhir Mein Hui Mohr Ki 'akmaltu Lakum'

Shab Lihya Wa Shaarib Hai Rukhe Roshan Din
Gesu Wa Shabe Qadro Baraate Momin
Mizgaa(N) Ki Safe Chaar Hain Do Abroo Hain
'wal Fajr' Ke Pehlu Mein 'layalin Ashr'

Allah Ki Sarta Ba Qadam Shaan Hain Yeh
Insa Nahi(N) Insaan Woh Insaan Hain Yeh
Qur'an To Imaan Batata Hai Inhe
Imaan Yeh Kehta Hai Meri Jaan Hain Yeh

Bosa Gahe Ashaab Woh Mehre Saami
Woh Shaanaye Chap Mein Us Ki Ambar Faami
Yeh Turfa Ki Hai Kaaba E Jaano Dil Mein
Sange Aswad Naseeb Rukne Shaami

Kaabe Se Agar Turbate Shah Faazil Hai
Kyun Baayi Taraf Uske Liye Manzil Hai
Is Fikr Mein Jo Dil Ki Taraf Dhyaan Gaya
Samjha Ki Woh Jism Hai Yeh Markade Dil

Tum Jo Chaaho To Qismat Ki Musibat Tal Jaaye
Kyun Kar Kahoon Saa'at Se Qayaamat Tal Jaaye
Lillah Utha Do Rukhe Raushan Se Naqaab
Maula Meri Aayi Hui Shaamat Tal Jaaye

Yaa(N), Shuba Shabeeh Ka Guzarna Kaisa
Be Misl Ki Timsaal Sanwarna Kaisa
In Ka Mu-Taalliq Hai Taraqqi Pe Mudaam
Tasveer Ka Phir Kahiye Utarna Kaisa

Yeh Shah Ki Tawaazo' Ka Taqaazaa Hi Nahi
Tasveer Kheence Unko Ganwaara Hi Nahi
Maa'naa Hain Yeh Maani Ki Karam Kya Maane
Kheencha To Yaha Kisi Se Thehra Hi Nahi

1: Rukh Din Hai Ya Mehre Samaa
2:
Rukh Din Hai Ya Mehre Samaa, Ye Bhi Nahi Wo Bhi Nahi
Shab Zulf Ya Mushke Khuta, Ye Bhi Nahi Wo Bhi Nahi

Mumkin Me Ye Qudrat Kaha, Waajib Me Abdiyat Kaha
Haira(N) Hu Ye Bhi Hai Khata, Ye Bhi Nahi Wo Bhi Nahi

Haq Ye Ki Hai Abde Ilah Aur Aalam E Imkaa(N) Ke Shah
Barzakh Hai Wo Sirre Khuda, Ye Bhi Nahi Wo Bhi Nahi

Bulbul Ne Ghul Unko Kaha, Kumree Ne Sarve Jaanfiza
Hairat Ne Jhunjhla Kar Kaha Ye Bhi Nahi Wo Bhi Nahi

Khursheed Tha Kis Zour Par Kya Badh Ke Chamka Tha Qamar
Be-Parda Jab Wo Rukh Hua Ye Bhi Nahi Wo Bhi Nahi

Dar Tha Ki Isyaa(N) Ki Saza Ab Hogi Ya Rouze Jaza
Dee Unki Rehmat Ne Sadaa Ye Bhi Nahi Wo Bhi Nahi

Koyi Hai Naazo Zuhad Par Ya Husne Tauba Hai Sipar
Yaa(N) Hai Faqat Teri Ataa Ye Bhi Nahi Wo Bhi Nahi

Din Lahv Me Khona Tujhe, Shab Subha Tak Sona Tujhe
Sharme Nabi Khaufe Khuda Ye Bhi Nahi Wo Bhi Nahi

Rizq E Khuda Khaya Kiya, Farmaan E Haq Taala Kiya
Shukre Karam Tarse Saza Ye Bhi Nahi Wo Bhi Nahi

Hai Bulbule Rangi Raza Ya Tutiye Nagma Saraa
Haq Yeh Ki Wasif Hai Tera Ye Bhi Nahi Wo Bhi Nahi

1: Rukh E Mustafa Ko Dekha
2:
Rukh E Mustafa Ko Dekha To Diyon Ne Jalna Seekha
Yeh Karam Hai Mustafa Ka Shab E Gham Ne Dhalna Seekha

Yeh Zameen Ruki Hui Thi Yeh Falak Thama Hua Tha
Chale Jab Mere Muhammad To Jahan Ne Chalna Seekha

Bara Khush Naseeb Hoon Main Meri Khush Naseebi Hay Daikho
Shah-E-Anbiya Kay Tukrhoon Pe Hay Main Palna Sekha

Man Gira Nahin Jo Ab Tak Ye Kamal-E-Mustafa Hay
Meri Zaat Nay Nabi Say Hay Sadaa Sanbhalna Sekha

Mera Dil Barha Hi Bay Has Tha Kabhi Nahi Ye Tarhpa
Suni Naat Jab Nabi Ki To Ye Dil Machlna Sekha

Main Talash Main Tha Rabb Ki Kahan Dhoondhta Main Us Ko
Lia Naam Jab Nabi Ka To Kuda Say Milna Sekha

Man Raha Khalash Muzafar Darr-E-Pak Mustafa Par
Meri Jazzb-E-Aashiqi Nay Kahan Ghar Badalna Sekha

1: Rusul Unhi Ka To Muzdah Sunane Aaye Hai
2:

Jo Chahenge Jise Chahenge Ye Use Denge

Jo Gir Rahe The Unhe Naibo Thaam Liya
