1: Sambhal Jaa Aye Dile Muztar Madina Aane Wala Hai
2:
Sambhal Jaa Aye Dile Muztar Madina Aane Wala Hai
Lutaa Aye Chashme Tar Gohar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Qadam Ban Jaaey Mera Sar Madina Aane Wala Hai
Bichhoon Reh Mai Nazar Ban Kar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Jo Dekhein Un Ka Naqshe Paa Khuda Se Woh Nazar Maangoon
Charaghe Dil Chaloon Lekar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Karam Unka Chalaa Yoon Dil Se Kehta Raahe Taiba Mein
Dile Muztar Tasalli Kar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Nichaawar Hai Madine Ki Yeh Mera Dil Meri Aankhen
Nichaawar Hoon Madina Par Madina Aane Wala Hain

Ilaahi Main Talabgaare Fanaa Hoon Khaake Taiba Main
Ilaahi Kar Nisaare Dar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Madine Ko Chala Main Beniyaaze Rehbare Manzil
Rahe Taiba Hai Khud Rehbar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Mujhe Kheenche Liye Jaataa Hai Shouqe Kooncha'e Jaana
Khinchaa Jaata Hoon Mein Yaksar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Woh Chamka Gumbade Khazraa Woh Shaire Pur Ziya Aaya
Dhale Ab Noor Main Pekar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Jahaan Se Bekhabar Ho Kar Chalo Khulde Madina Main
Chalo Ab Hosh Ki Peekar Madina Aane Wala Hain

Madeene Mein Khule Baabe Hayaate Nau Batarze Nau
Badal Daalo Kohan Daftar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Zara Aye Markabe Umre Rawaan Chal Barq Ki Soorat
Dikha Parwaaz Ke Jowhar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Talabgaare Madina Tak Madina Khud Hi Aajaaye
Tu Duniya Se Kinaara Kar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Madina Aagaya Ab Der Kya Hai Sirf Itni Si
Tu Khaali Kar Yeh Dil Ka Ghar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Falak Shaayad Zameen Par Rehgaya Khaake Guzar Bankar
Bichhe Hai Raah Mein Akhtar Madina Aane Wala Hai

Ghubaare Raahe Anwar Kis Qadar Purnoor Hai Akhtar
Tani Hai Noor Ki Chaadar Madina Aane Wala Hai

1: Sanu Koji Vekh Na Chad Ve
2:
Sanu Koji Vekh Na Chad Ve
Tussan Bhaleya De Hath Lajj Ve

Asan Chandna Tuada Dar Na
Tuade Qadman De Vich Marna
Sanu Roz E Hashr Da Darna
Sade Tussan Wakeel Te Judge Ve

Sanu Tuadi Zaat Te Maan Ae
Qurban Tussan Ton Sadi Jaan Ae
Tuada Mukh Jivein Quran Ae
Tuadi Deed Ae Sada Hajj Ve

Tuade Naa Nun Choomde Lab Ve
Wichon Disda Sanu Rab Ve
Hath Ban Ke Naal Adab De
Tuadi Deed Karan Raj Raj Ve

1: Sar Se Paa Tak Har Adaa Hain Lajawaab
2:
Sar Se Paa Tak Har Adaa Hain Lajawaab
Khoobrooyo Me Nahi Tera Jawaab

Husn Hain Bemisal Surat Lajawaab
Me Fida Tum Aap Ho Apna Jawaab

Pooche Jaate Hain Amal Me Kya Kahoo
Tum Sikaa Jao Mere Maula Jawaab

Palte Hain Hum Se Nikamme Beshumaar
Hain Kahi Us Aastaane Ka Jawaab

Roz E Mahshar Aik Tera Aasra
Sab Sawaalo Ka Jawaab E Lajawaab

Me Yad E Baydaa Ke Sadqe Ae Kaleem
Par Kahaa Un Ki Kaf E Paa Ka Jawaab

Kya Amal Tu Ne Kiye Us Ka Suwaal
Teri Rahmat Chaahi Hain Mera Jawaab

Mehr O Maa Zare Hain Un Ki Raah Ke
Kaun De Naqsh E Kaf E Paa Ka Jawaab

Tum Se Us Beemaar Ko Sehat Mile*
Jis Ko Dede Hazrat E Esa Jawaab

Dekh Rizwaan Dasht E Taiba Ki Bahaar
Meri Jannat Ka Na Paaye Ga Jawaab

Shor Hain Lutf O Ataa Ka Shor Hain
Maangne Waala Nahi Sunta Jawaab

Jurm Ki Paataash Paate Ahle Jurm
Ulti Baato Ka Na Ho Seeda Jawaab

Par Tumhare Lutf Aare Aagaye
De Diya Mahshar Me Bepursish Jawaab

Ae Hasan Mehw E Jamaal E Rooh E Dost
Ae Nakeerain Is Se Phir Lena Jawaab

1: Sar Sue Rouza Jhuka Phir Tujhko Kya
2:
Sar Sue Rouza Jhuka Phir Tujhko Kya
Dil Tha Sajid Najdiya Phir Tujhko Kya

Baith-Te Uth-Te Madad Ke Waaste
Ya Rasool Allah Kaha Phir Tujhko Kya

Ya Garaz Se Choot Ke Mahje Zikr Ko
Naam E Paak Unka Japa Phir Tujhko Kya

Bekhudi Me Sajda E Darr Ya Tawaaf
Jo Kiya Achha Kiya Phir Tujhko Kya

Unko Tamlee Ke Malikul Mulq Se
Maalik E A'alam Kaha Phir Tujhko Kya

Unke Naam E Paak Par Dil Jaano Maal
Najdiya Sab T(A)j Diya Phir Tujhko Kya

Ya Ibadi Kehke Humko Shah Ne
Apna Banda Kar Liya Phir Tujhko Kya

Dev Ke Bando Se Kab Hai Ye Khitaab
Tu Na Unka Hai Na Tha Phir Tujhko Kya

La Ya'udun Aage Hoga Bhi Nahi
Tu Alag Hai Daaima Phir Tujhko Kya

Dashte Gardo Peshe Taiba Ka Adab
Makka Sa Tha Ya Siwa Phir Tujhko Kya

Najdi Marta Hai Ke Kyu Ta'azeem Ki
Ye Hamara Deen Tha Phir Tujhko Kya

Dev Tujhse Khush Hai Phir Hum Kya Kare
Humse Hai Raazi Khuda Phir Tujhko Kya

Dev Ke Bando Se Humko Kya Garaz
Hum Hai Abad E Mustafa Phir Tujhko Kya

Teri Dohzakh Se To Kuch Cheena Nahi
Khuld Me Pohcha Raza Phir Tujhko Kya

1: Sar Ta Ba Qadam Hai Tan E Sultane Zaman Phool
2:
Sar Ta Ba-Qadam Hai Tan E Sultane Zaman Phool
Lab Phool, Dahan Phool, Zakan Phool, Badan Phool

Sadqe Me Tere Baagh To Kya Laye Hai Ban Phool
Iss Guncha E Dil Ko Bhi To Imaa Ho Ki Ban Phool

Tinka Bhi Hamare To Hilaye Nahi Hilta
Tum Chaho To Ho Jaye Abhi Kohe Mehan Phool

Wallah Jo Mil Jaye Mere Ghul Ka Paseena
Maange Na Kabhi Itr Na Fir Chahe Dulhan Phool

Dil-Basta Wa Khu-Gashta Na Khusbu Na Latafat
Kyo Guncha Kahu Hai Mere Aaqa Ka Dehan Phool

Shab Yaad Thi Kin Daanto Ki Shabnam Ki Dam E Subh(A)
Shokhane Bahari Ke Jada-U Hai Kiran Phool

Dandaan O Lab O Zulf O Rukhe Shah Ke Fidayi
Hai Durre Adan La'ale Yaman Mushke Khotan Phool

Bu Hoke Nahi Ho Gaye Taabe Rukhe Shah Me
Lo Ban Gaye Hai Ab To Haseeno Ka Dahan Phool

Ho Baare Gunah Se Na Khazil Doshe Azeeza(N)
Lillah Meri Na'ash Kar Aaye Jane Chaman Phool

Dil Apna Bhi Shaidayi Hai Us Naakhun E Paa Ka
Itna Bhi Mahe Nou Pe Na Ay Charkhe Kuhan Phool

Dil Khol Ke Khu Ro Le Game Aarize Shah Me
Nikle To Kahi Hasrat E Khu-Naaba Shudan Phool

Kya Gaaza Mala Garde Madeena Ka Jo Hai Aaj
Nikhre Hue Joban Me Qiyamat Ki Phaban Phool

Garmi Ye Qiyamat Hai Ki Kaante Hai Zabaa(N) Par
Bulbul Ko Bhi Ay Saaqi E Sahba Wa Laban Phool

Hai Kaun Ki Girya Kare Ya Faatiha Ko Aaye
Bekas Ke Uthaye Teri Rehmat Ke Bharan Phool

Dil Ghum Tujhe Ghere Hai Khuda Tujhko Wo Chamkaye
Suraj Tere Khirman Ko Bane Teri Kiran Phool

Kya Baat Raza Us Chamanistaan E Karam Ki
Zahra Hai Kali Jisme Husain Aur Hasan Phool

1: Sare Nabiyan Da Nabi Tu Imam Soneya
2:
Sare Nabiyan Da Nabi Tu Imam Soneya,
Lakha Tere Te Durood Te Salaam Soneya

Tere Sadqe Jahaan Sara Baneya,
Tere Waaste Quraan Saara Baneya
Paya Tere Jeya Kisse-Na Maqaam Soneya,
Lakha Tere Te Durood Te Salaam Soneya

Aay Dar Te Sawali Nu Nahi Moryaa,
Dil Kissey Wi Ghareeb Da Nahi Toryaa
Sab Kawndein Sadqa Tera, Subho O Shaam Sohneya,
Lakha Tere De Durood Te Salaam Sohneya

Tere Warga Habeeb Das Qera Ay,
Ayna Rab De Qareeb Das Qera Ay
Tainu Aeho Jeya Milya Inaam Soneya,
Lakha Tere Te Durood Te Salaam Soneya

Tannu Arsha Te Rab Ne Bulaaya Ay,
Shaan Tere Jeya Hor Kinne Paya Ay.
Hoyi Tere Te Nabuwat Tamaam Soneya,
Lakha Tere Te Durood Te Salaam Sohneya

1: Sarkaar E Do Aalam Ki Nazar Mujh Pe Padi Hai
2:
Sarkaar E Do ‘aalam Ki Nazar Mujh Pe Padi Hai
Pohchaa Hoon Wahan Khuld E Bareen Ki Jo Gali Hai

Aaya Jo Madine Me To Qismat Ne Pukaara
Bigri Huwi Taqdeer Yahan Aake Banee Hai

Qadmon Ko Zara Hosh Se Is Khaak Pe Rakhna
Yeh Koo-E-Nabi Hai Arre Yeh Koo-E-Nabi Hai

Mehshar Ki Karee Dhoop Ka Khatka Nahi Mujh Ko
Chaadar Merey Sarkaar Ke Gesu Ki Tanee Hai

Lillah Mujhe Apna Rukhe Zaibaa Dikhaado
Palkon Me Meyri Deed Ki Khaatir Namee Hai

Aaqa Ke Dar E Paak Ke Mangte Hain Malaa-Ik
Maayoos Nahi Koi Yeh Darbaar E Nabi Hai

De Daaliye Mujh Ko Bhi Ghulaami Ki Sanad Ab
Bakhshish Ko Mere Shah Yeh Khairaat Baree Hai

Shab Rote Huwe Sajde Me Sarkaar Guzaarein
Ummat Ki Ho Bakhshish Yahi Armaan E Nabi Hai

Allah Ko Mehboob Se Kitni Hai Mohabbat
Haan Taaha Wa Yaaseen Me Asraar E Jali Hai

Bulwate Rahe Mujh Ko Madine Me Hamesha
Ummeed Meri Aap Se Sarkaar Yahi Hai

‘aalam Me Musalmaan Pareshaan Hain Pareshaan
Be Chain Nazar Aap Key Dar Pe Hee Jamee Hai

Maange Hee Chale Jaao Yahan Milta Hain Sab Kuch
Kis Cheez Ki Dar Par Mere Maula Ki Kamee Hai

Shakir Na Ho Ghamgeen Teri Jholi Bharain Ge
Moonh Maanga Milega Key Yeh Darbaar E Nabi Hai

1: Sarkaar Yeh Naam Tumhara Sab Namoon Say Hai Piyara
2:
Sarkaar Yeh Naam Tumhara Sab Namoon Say Hai Piyara
Iss Naam Say Chamka Sooraj Aur Chamka Chaand Sitara
Hua Her Suu Khoob Ujala Hua Roshan Alam Sara
Mera Naam Keray Ga Roshan Do Jagg Main Naam Tumhara

Lehroon Nay Meri Yeh Khashti Her Janib Say Hay Gayhri
Sarkaar Khaber Lo Meri Sarkaar Khaber Lo Meri
Milay Mujh Ko Afeeyat Ka Mere Aqa(S.a.w) Jald Kinara
Mera Naam Keray Ga Roshan Do Jagg Main Naam Tumhara

Sa’el Hoon Teray Dar Ka Milay Mujh Ko Bheek Karam Ki
Rekh Laaj Ay Mere Aqa Iss Mere Chashm-E-Naam Ki
Karoon Gumbad-E-Ghazra Ka Phir Ankhoon Say Apni Nazara
Mera Naam Keray Ga Roshan Do Jagg Main Naam Tumhara

Jo Mujh Per Beet Rahi Hay Wo Kiss Ko Kesay Bataoon
Aur Apnay Dil Ki Hikayat Bhala Kiss Ko Ja Ker Sunaoon
Tum Mehram-E-Raaz Ho Mere Meri Daadrasi Ho Khudara
Mera Naam Keray Ga Roshan Do Jagg Main Naam Tumhara

Meri Arz Khudara Sunn Lo Mere Haal Pay Mujh Ko Na Choro
Zara Apni Chashm-E-Inayat Baybass Ki Teraf Bhi Moroo
Baykass Ka Tum Ho Sahara Baycharay Ka Tum Ho Chara
Mera Naam Keray Ga Roshan Do Jagg Main Naam Tumhara

Jab Rab-E-Qadeer Tumhari Keray Khud Hi Midha Saraye
Her Ek Kay Laboon Pay Phir To Tareef Tumhari Aye
Sadd Shuker Kay Zikr Tumhara Rahay Her Dam Wird Hamara
Mera Naam Keray Ga Roshan Do Jagg Main Naam Tumhara

Her Waqt Per Hum Nay Dekha Hay Tumhain To Ma’el
Dar-E-Pak Pay Aya Jab Bhi Kesa Hi Koi Sa’el
Ay Rehmat-E-Alam Tum Nay Usay Ker Hi Leya Hay Gawara
Mera Naam Keray Ga Roshan Do Jagg Main Naam Tumhara

Jab Roz-E-Qayamat Her Aik Bolay Ga Nafsi Nafsi
Aur Daad Kisi Ki Day Ga Mehshar Main Jab Na Koi
Aisay Main Ata Ho Mujh Ko Ay Shahfa-E-Hasher Sahara
Mera Naam Keray Ga Roshan Do Jagg Main Naam Tumhara

Do Apnay Ishq Ki Dolat Tujhay Apni Aal Ka Sadqa
Yeh Riaz Faqeer Azal Say Tere Dar Ka Hi Hay Shaha
Tere Dast-E-Aata Kay Agay Daaman Hay Iss Nay Pasara
Mera Naam Keray Ga Roshan Do Jagg Main Naam Tumhara

1: Sarkar Aap Jaisa Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga
2:
Zamane Bhar Ne Azeem Jana
Qasam Khuda Ki Azeem Jana
Nahi Hai Unsa Koi Nahi Hai
Hamare Aaqa Azeem Tar Hai

Sarkar Aap Jaisa Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga
Jaise Hai Aap Waisa Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Bakhshish Ko Asiyon Ki Duniya Me Aake Fauran
Sajde Me Jaane Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Meraj Ke Safar Me Ummat Ko Yaad Karke
Aasu Bahane Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Jab Jhoom Kar Hai Toote Pyase To Ungliyon Se
Darya Bahane Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Insaan To Phir Hai Insaan Par Sari Khalkato Par
Rehmat Lutane Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Bandhe Shikam Pe Pathar Chulah Jale Na Ghar Par
Phir Bhi Khilane Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Tha Ek Hi To Pyala Sattar Jo The Sahaba
Sabko Pilane Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Mehshar Ki Dhup Me Bhi Unke Siwa Karam Se
Saya Dilane Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Allah Wo Kayamat Aur Pyas Ki Wo Shiddat
Kausar Pilane Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Yume Hisaab Jis Dam Sakhti Hume Rulaye
Aasaan Karane Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

La Taqnatu Hai Muzda Hum Par Karam Ka Parda
Bakhshish Karane Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Mutthi Me Bu Jehel Ki Bejaan Kankari Ko
Kalma Padhane Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Ungli Ek Ishare Se Chand Shaq Hua Hai
Suraj Phirane Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Jab Nafsi Nafsi Saare Abraar Khehte Honge
Humko Bachne Wala Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

Duniya Se Kheh De Rizwan Tu Hai Ghulame Hassan
Unse Bhala Sanakhawn Koi Tha Na Hai Na Hoga

1: Sarkar Bulaye Qadmon Me
2:
Hazir Ho Dare Aqdas Pe Gada
Sarkar Bulayein Qadmon Mein
Mohtaaj Pe Ho Rehmat Ki Rida
Sarkar Bulaye Qadmon Mein

Woh Izn Salaami Ka Mujh Ko
Ik Kaife Dawaami Ka Mujh Ko
Dhadkan Dhadkan Ki Hai Ye Dua
Sarkar Bulaye Qadmon Mein

Taareeki Mere Gunaahon Ki
Sab Ud Jaaye Jo Aa Jaaye
Zulmat Ko Meri Ho Noor Ata
Sarkar Bulaye Qadmon Mein

Mai Pyaas Ke Sehra Me Khoya
Kaante Se Halaq Me Chubte Hain
Ho Sabz Sunehre Jaam Ata
Sarkar Bulaye Qadmon Mein

Jaaunga Ujaagar Qadmon Mein
Phir Chulunga Mein Arshe Baree
Ho Jaayenge Mere Arzo Samaa
Sarkar Bulaye Qadmon Mein

Wo Lamhe Aeyen Qurbat Ke
Simtee Ho Sadhiyan Lamhon Mein
Takhta Hoon Jadah Rehmat Ka
Sarkar Bulayein Kadmon Mein

1: Sarkar Jaante Hai
2:
Kis Lab Pe Kya Dua Hai, Sarkar Jaante Hai,
Kis Ke Dilo Main Kya Hai, Sarkar Jaante Hai,

Murda Hai Ya Ke Zinda, Bache Hai Ya Ke Bacha
Pukhta Hai Ya Ke Kacha, Or Kis Ka Hai Ye Nutfa
Kis Ko Bhala Khabar Hai, Majboor Har Bashar Hai
Maa Ke Shikam Mai Kya Hai, Sarkar Jaante Hai

Shakhe Khujoor Lekar, Qabro Pe Dalte Hain,
Mayyat Ki Har Sazaa Ko, Pal Bhar Main Taalte Hai,
Murda Hai Kis Jage Ka, Iska Hai Majara Kya
Qabro Mai Haal Kya Hai, Sarkar Jaante Hai

Kabhi Swaad Keh Rahe Hai, Kabhi Qaaf Keh Rahe Hai,
Kabhi Ayn Keh Rahe Hai, Kabhi Haa Keh Rahe Hai,
Jibreel Keh Rahe Hai, Ye Raazgi Ki Baatein
Maana Mafhoom Kya Hai, Sarkar Jaante Hai

Meraj Ka Safar Hai, Sarkar Ja Rahe Hai,
Sidrah Se Aage Jaake, Tashreef Laa Rahe Hai,
Meraj Hai Haqiqat, Imaan Hai Ye Warna
Parde Main Kya Rakha Hai, Sarkar Jaante Hai

Sidra Pe Leke Pohnche, Jibreel Saath Chore,
Mujhko Na Kuch Pataa Hai, Kehte Hain Haath Jore
Aage Huzoor Jaaye, Ye Meri Intehaa Hai,
Sidrah Ke Aage Kya Hai, Sarkar Jaante Hai

Shisho Ke Ghar Me Rehkar, Pathar Uchaalte Hai
Ushaaqe Mustafa To, Taqdeer Taalte Hai,
Haamil Rab Hai Khaaliq, Mere Mustafa Hai Maalik
Qismat Mai Kya Likha Hai, Sarkar Jaante Hai

***********************************************
*****************other Version*****************

Aye Najdiya Tu Chahe Jitni Kare Ibaadat
Teri Har Ek Fitrat Sarkar Jaante Hai

Ahmad Raza Ko Najdi Tu Kya Samajh Sake Ga
Kaise Hai Ala Hazrat Sarkar Jaante Hai

Mushkil Me Jab Pukara Faoran Madad Ko Aaye
Kis Haal Me Hai Ummat Sarkar Jaante Hai

Sidra Tak Aake Bole Ab Mai Na Ja Saku Ga
Jibreel Ki Haqiqat Sarkar Jaante Hai

Tum Apni Bachiyon Ko Hargiz Na Boj Samjho
Beti Hai Ghar Ki Rehmat Sarkar Jaante Hai

Maa Baap Ke Adab Ka Karte Hai Log Daawa
Karta Hai Koun Qidmat Sarkar Jaante Hai

Khaibar Ukhaar Pheka Moula Ali Ne Pal Me
Sher-E-Khuda Ki Taaqat Sarkar Jaante Hai

Aye Hai Must Par Jab Sajde Ko Tool Kardi
Ibn-E-Ali Ki Azmat Sarkar Jaante Hai

Maidaan-E-Karbala Me Kab Hogi Kaise Hogi
Shabeer Ki Shahadat Sarkar Jaante Hai

In Najdiyon Se Kehdo Jaakar Shoaib Ab Tum
Kab Aaye Gi Qayamat Sarkar Jaante Hai

1: Sarkar Jeya Sohna
2:
Sarkar Jeya Sohna Na Aya Na Awna Ey
Na Rab Ney Banaya Ey Na Rab Ney Banawna Ey

Weykho Jee Har Ik Shey Tey Peya Nur Barasta Ey
Lag Da Ey Huney Eytay Sarkar Ney Awna Ey

Sarda Ey Sarey Koi, Larda Ey Larey Koi
Sunniya Ney Tey Gaj Waj Key Milad Manawna Ey

Jee Karda Ey Mar Jawa Jis Din Da Suniya Ey
Wich Qabr Dey Aqa Ney Deedar Karowna Ey

Ungli Nu Halawndey Ney Pey Chan Nu Bulawndey Ney
So Rab Di Ey Chan Falki Aqa Da Khilona Ey

Ban Jaani Ey Gal Teri Wich Hashr Dihaarey Dey
Jadun Sohney Aqa Ney Tanuw Gal Nal Lawna Ey

Munkar Odun Nas Jaan Dey Mushkil Wich Pas Jandey
Ey Sunni Jadu Wi Tu Nara Haidri Lana Ey

Rab Aap Banaya Ey Dildaar Bara Sohna
Naley Khud Farmaya Ey Mera Yaar Bara Sohna

Sab Daayan Halimah Nu Hayrat Nal Puch Diyan San
Kithun Ley Key Aa’ee Ey Dildaar Bara Sohna

Mey Unj Tey Maari Aa Meri Kuli Maari Ey
Meri Gowd Wich Nabiyan Da Sardar Bara Sohna

Sarkar Jeya Sohna Na Aya Na Awna Ey
Na Rab Ney Banaya Ey Na Rab Ney Banawna Ey

1: Sarkar Ke Hum Deewane Hain
2:
Sarkar Ke Hum Deewane Hain
Sarkar Ke Hum Kehlate Hain
Sarkar Ka Sadqa Peete Hain
Sarkar Ka Saqda Khate Hain

Yeh Un Ki Nigahein Rahmat Hain
Yeh Maal-O-Zar Ki Baat Nahin
Bas Wohi Madine Jaate Hain
Sarkar Jinhein Bulwate Hain

Jab Mauj Mein Woh Aa Jate Hain
Bigdhi Sab Ki Ban Jati Hai
Jab Un Ka Karam Ho Jata Hai
Din Mangton Ke Phir Hi Jate Hain

Fiazan Ek Akela Mai Hi Nahi
Karta Kamli Wale Ki Sana
Kya Ghous-E-Jali Kya Mehr-E-Ali
Sab Geet Unhi Ke Gate Hai

Kya Khoob Suhana Mausam Tha
Jibril Manadi Karte The
Tashreef Muhammad Latein Hain
Tashreef Muhammad Latein Hain

Lajpaal Madine Wale Ke
Andaaz Sakhawat Kya Kehna
Dunya Ke Shahanshah Is Dar Par
Ban Ban Ke Bhikari Aate Hain

1: Sarkar Ke Qadmon Mein
2:
Allah Ne Pohnchaya Sarkar Ke Qadmon Mein
Sadd Shukar Keh Mein Phir Aaya Sarkar Ke Qadmon Mein

Rad Kaisay Bhala Hogi Ab Koi Dua Meri
Mein Rub Ko Pukar Aaya Sarkar Ke Qadmon Mein

Kuch Der Salaami Ko Thehraya Mawaja Par
Phir Mujhko Adab Laaya Sarkar Ke Qadmo Me

Kuch Kehne Se Pehle Hee Puri Hoi Har Khuwahish
Jo Socha Wohi Paaya Sarkar Ke Qadmon Mein

Kuch Lamhay Huzoori Ke Paaye Tou Ye Lagta Hai
Ik Umar Guzaar Aaya Sarkar Ke Qadmon Mein

Mujh Jaisa Tahee Damaan Kiya Nazar Ko Lejaata
Ik Naat Suna Aaya Sarkar Ke Qadmon Mein

Sarkar Salaami Ko Har Saal Talab Kije
Yeh Arz Bhi Kar Aaya Sarkar Ke Qadmo Me

Yaad Aayei Sabih Apni Har Aik Khata Mujh Ko
Amaal Pe Sharmaaya Sarkaar Ke Qadmon Mein

-----------------Version-------------------

Kuch Aisa Sukoon Paya Sarkar Ke Qadmo Me
Dil Kaif Se Bahar Aaya Sarkar Ke Qadmo Me

Masjid Ka Har Ek Chappa Wallah Noorani Hai
Kuch Noor Ajab Paya Sarkar Ke Qadmo Me

Ramzan E Madina Ki Raunaq Hi Niraali
Iftaar Bhi Kar Aaya Sarkar Ke Qadmo Me

Ab Meri Duao Me Kuch Kaif Nirala Hai
Aasu Jo Baha Aaya Sarkar Ke Qadmo Me

Bheje The Salaamo Ke Ehbaab Ne Jo Tohfe
Mai Peysh Wo Kar Aaya Sarkar Ke Qadmo Me

Sarkar Qayamat Me Qausar Bhi Pilayenge
Zam Zam To Mai Pe Aaya Sarkar Ke Qadmo Me

Sab Kuch To Unhi Ka Hai Mai Nazar Hi Kya Karta
Bas Naat Suna Aaya Sarkar Ke Qadmo Me

Rizwan Ki Ye Kismat Hai Tu Inka Sana Khawa Hai
Paaya Hai Ye Sarmaya Sarkar Ke Qadmo Me

1: Sarkar Yun Laga Hai Tumhe Dekhne Baad
2:
Sarkar Yun Laga Hai Tumhe Dekhne Baad
Allah Ko Pa Liya Hai Tumhe Dekhne Ke Baad

Dunya Ki Bheer Mein Kahin Gum Ho Gaya Tha
Apna Pata Chala Hai Tumhe Dekhne Ke Baad

Husne Jahan Hai Garche Hasin Se Hasin Tarr
Nazron Mein Kab Jacha Hai Tumhe Dekhne Ke Baad

Aya Jo Teri Bazm E Mohabbat Mein Eik Baar
Tera Hi Ho Gaya Hai Tumhe Dekhne Ke Baad

Dil Hai Keh Manta Hi Nahi Ab Kisi Ki Baat
Deewana Ho Gaya Hai Tumhe Dekhne K Baad

Aisa Hasin Aisa Nahi Koi Khoob Ruh
Dil Ne Mujhe Kaha Hai Tumhe Dekhne Ke Baad

Bhule Se Bhi Na Jaunga Kisi Ghaur Ki Taraf
Yeh Mera Faisla Hai Tumhe Dekhne Ke Baad

1: Sarkare Do Alam Ke Rukh Par
2:
Sarkare Do Alam Ke Rukh Par,
Anwaar Ka Alam Kya Hoga
Jab Zulf Ka Zikr Hai Qur’an Mein,
Rukhsar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Mehboobe Khuda Ke Jalwon Se,
Iman Ki Ankhen Raushan Hain
Bin Dekhey Hi Jab Yeh Alam Hai,
Didar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Jab Unke Gada Bhar Detey Hain,
Shahane Zamana Ki Jholi
Mohtaj Ki Jab Yeh Halat Hai,
Mukhtar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Hai Naam Mein Unka Itna Asar,
Ji Uthte Hai Murdey Bhi Sun Kar
Woh Haal Agar Khud Puchein To,
Bimar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Jab Unke Ghulamon Ke Dar Par,
Jhukte Hain Salaati-Ne Alam
Phir Koi Bataey Aqa Ke,
Darbar Ka Alam Kya Ho Ga

Jab Sunke Sahaba Ki Baaten,
Kuffar Musalman Hote Hain
Phir Donon Jahan Ke Sarwar Ki,
Guftar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Taibah Se Hawa Jab Ati Hai,
Bekal Ko Sukun Mil Jata Hai
Is Paar Ka Jab Yeh Alam Hai,
Us Par Ka Alam Kya Hoga

Sarkare Do Alam Ke Rukh Par,
Anwaar Ka Alam Kya Hoga
Jab Zulf Ka Zikr Hai Qur’an Mein,
Rukhsar Ka Alam Kya Hoga

1: Sarwar Kahoon Ki Maaliko Maula Kahoon Tujhe
2:
Sarwar Kahoon Ki Maaliko Maula Kahoon Tujhe
Baaghe Khaleel Ka Tujhe Zaiba Kahoon Tujhe

Hirmaa(N) Naseeb Hoon Tujhe Ummeed Gah Kahoon
Jaane Muraade Kaane Tamanna Kahoon Tujhe

Gulzaare Quds Ka Gule Rangee Adaa Kahoon
Darmaane Darde Bulbule Shaida Kahoon Tujhe

Subhe Watan Pe Shame Ghareeba(N) Ko Du Sharaf
Bekas Nawaz Gesuo Waala Kahoon Tujhe

Allah Re Tere Jisme Munawwar Ki Taabishe(N)
Aye Jaane Jaa(N) Main Jaane Tajalla Kahoon Tujhe

Be Daag Laalah Ya Qamare Be Kalaf Kahoon
Be Khaar Gulbune Chaman-Aaraa Kahoon Tujhe

Mujrim Hoon Apne Afw Ka Saamaa(N) Karoon Shaha
Ya’ni Shafi E Roze Jazaa Ka Kahoon Tujhe

Is Murda Dil Ko Muzda Hayate Abad Ka Doon
Taabo Tabaano Jaane Maseeha Kahoon Tujhe

Tere To Wasf Aibe Tanahee Se Hain Baree
Hairaa(N) Hoon Mere Shah Main Kya Kya Kahoon Tujhe

Keh Legi Sab Kuch Unke Sana Khwaa(N) Ki Khamoshi
Chup Ho Raha Hai Keh Ke Main Kya Kya Kahoon Tujhe

Lekin Raza Ne Khatme Sukhan Is Pe Kar Diya
Khaaliq Ka Banda Khalq Ka Aaqa Kahoon Tujhe

1: Sarware Ambiya Ki Hai Mehfil Saji
2:
Sarware Ambiya Ki Hai Mehfil Saji
Liji Ye Kuch Maza Jhoom Te Jhoom Te
Aap Suntey Rahey Mein Sunata Rahun
Zikre Salley Ala Jhoom Te Jhoom Te

Wajhey Taskine Alam Hai Yaade Nabi
Dafa-Aey Ranjo Alum Hai Milade Nabi
Aap Bethein Saja Kar Zara Bazm Ko
Hogi Rehmat Khuda Jhoom Te Jhoom Te

Ek Bhi Apne Daman Mein Neki Nathi
Aankh Mein Ashk The Lab Pe Naate Nabi
Mujh Ko Unke Karam Ne Sahara Diya
Unki Aai Ata Jhoom Te Jhoom Te

Girnein Wale Hain Jitne Sambhal Jaengey
Unke Usshaq Sun Kar Machal Jaengey
Kamli Wale Ki Zulfon Ke Le Kar Mahek
Chal Pari Hai Hawa Jhoom Te Jhoom Te

Kuch Nawason Ka Sadqa Ata Kiji Ye
Hum Faqiron Ke Daman Ko Bhar Diji Ye
Naam Sun Kar Tera Tere Darbar Ka
Aa Gaye Hain Gada Jhoom Te Jhoom Te

Ashiqon Haasiley Zindagi Hai Yahi
Zindagi Ki Qasam Bandagi Hai Yahi
Har Ghari Ho Zuban Se Niyazi Agar
Midhate Mustafa Jhoom Te Jhoom Te

Sarware Ambiya Ki Hai Mehfil Saji
Liji Ye Kuch Maza Jhoom Te Jhoom Te
Aap Suntey Rahey Mein Sunata Rahun
Zikre Salley Ala Jhoom Te Jhoom Te

1: Sayyid E Kawnayn Sultan E Jahan
2:
Sayyid-E-Kawnayn, Sultan-E-Jahaa(N)
Zill-E-Yazdaa(N), Shah-E-Dee(N), Arsh Aastaa(N)

Kul Se A'ala, Kul Se Aula, Kul Ki Jaa(N)
Kul Ke Aaqa, Kul Ke Hadi, Kul Ki Shaa(N)

Dil Kusha, Dil Kash, Dil Aara, Dil Sitaa(N)
Kaan-E-Jaan-O-Jaan-E-Jaan-O-Shaan-E-Shaa(N)

Har Hikayat, Har Kinayat, Har Adaa
Har Isharat, Dil Nasheen-O-Dil Nishaa(N)

Dil De, Dil Ko Jaan, Jaa(N) Ko Noor De
Aey Jahaan-E-Jaan-O-Aey Jaan-E-Jahaa(N)

Aankh De, Aur Aankh Ko Didaar-E-Noor
Rooh De Aur Rooh Ko Raah-E-Jinaa(N)

Allah Allah Yaas Aur Aisi Aas Se
Aur Yeh Hazrat Yeh Dar Ye Aastaa(N)

Tu Sanaa Ko Hai, Sanaa Teray Liye
Hai Sanaa Teri Hi Deegar Daastaa(N)

Tu Na Tha Tou Kuch Na Tha, Gar Tu Na Ho
Kuch Na Ho, Tu Hi To Hai Jaan-E-Jahaa(N)

Tu Hai Daata, Aur Auro(N) Se Rajaa
Tu Ho Aaqa, Aur Yaad-E-Digaraa(N)

Jis Tarha Hont Iss Ghazal Se Door Hain
Dil Se Yun Hi Door Ho Har Zinn-0-Zaa(N)

Iltija! Iss Shirk-O-Shar Se Door Rakh
Ho Raza Tera Hi, Gayr Az Een-O-Aa(N)

1: Shah E Madina Mujh Ko Taiba Bulaa Liye Hain
2:
Shah E Madina Mujh Ko Taiba Bulaa Liye Hain
Soyee Huwi Thi Qismat Aaqa Jagaa Diye Hain

Qismat Pe Rashk Meri Karte Hain Sub Farishte
Phir Se Madine Mujh Ko Aaqa Bulaa Liye Hain

Maanga Hai Jo Bhi Jab Bhi Uss Se Siwa Milaa Hain
Jholi Ko Sab Ki Bhar Ke Aaqa Du’a Diye Hain

Ek Ko Mili Sadaqat Ek Ko Mili ‘adaalat
Sadqe Unhi Ka Dedo Daaman Bichaa Diye Hain

‘uthman ‘ali Ka Sadqa ‘ilm O ‘amal ‘ataa Ho
Armaan Liye Yeh Dar Pe Bistar Jamaa Diye Hain

Shakir Pe Jab Bhi Chaaye Huzn O Alam Ke Baadal
Aaqa Nibha Liye Hain Daata Bachaa Liye Hain

1: Shah E Waala Mujhe Taibah Bula Lo
2:
Shah E Waala Mujhe Taibah Bula Lo
Taibah Bula Lo Mujhe Taibah Bula Lo
Devdhi Ka Apni Kutta Bana Lo
Qadmon Se Apne Mujh Ko Laga Lo

Sadqe Mein Sadqe Mein Sadqe Bula Lo
Furqat Ke Maare Ko Pyare Jhila Lo
Pyare Jhila Lo Mujhe Pyare Jhila Lo
Maula Jhila Lo Mujhe Aaqa Jhila Lo

Duniyan Ke Jhaghdo Se Yaksar Chhudaa Kar
Ghairon Ki Ulfat Ko Dil Se Mitaa Kar
Shah E Waala Mujhe Apna Bana Lo
Apna Bana Lo Mujhe Apna Bana Lo

Naikon Ke Sadqe Mein Hum Se Badon Ko
Zaaro Nazaaro Museebat Zadon Ko
Maula Nibhaa Lo Mere Maula Nibhaa Lo
Haan Haan Nibhalo Mere Maula Nibhaa Lo

Hotey Ho Tum Kyu Maayus O Muztar
Kis Waastey Ho Hairaan O Shashdar
Dukh Dard Walo Suno Dukh Dard Walo
Taibah Se Har Ek Apni Dawa Lo

Aankhon Mein Aao Dil Me Samaao
Parda Uthao Jalwa Dikhao
Hasrat Zadaa Ki Pyare Dua Lo
Hasrat Nikalo Meri Hasrat Nikalo

Dolat Hai Nayya Mori Bhavar Mein
Maula Tiraao Aike Nazar Mein
Moori Khabariya Morey Piya Lo
Moko Bachal Lo Piya Moko Bacha Lo

Taaib Hon Najdi Aaib Hon Najdi
Aur Ye Na Ho To Khaaib Hon Najdi
Gaaib Hon Najdi Maula Nikalo
Jaldi Nikalo Inhein Jaldi Nikalo

Ye Noori Muztar Tera Sanaagar
Aur Iska Ghar Bhar Ho Haazir-E-Darr
Apne Gadaagar Ko Darr Par Bula Lo
Amn O Aman Se Hamein Sarwar Bula Lo

1: Shahe Deen Ki Milad Ka Hai Mahina
2:
Shahe Deen Ki Milad Ka Hai Mahina
Nibhaaya Mujhe Aur Bulaaya Madina

Rahe Mujh Pe Rehmat Ka Aaqa Tasalsul
Talab Ka Nahin Mujh Me Daata Qareena

Mubarak Ho Yaum E Wiladat Mubarak
Gulaamon Ki Jaanib Se Aaqa Mubarak

Khudaara ‘ataa Ho Hame Bhi To ‘eidee
Mile Hum Ko Shah Ki Taraf Se Mubarak

Nigah E Karam Mujh Pe Aaqa Ne Daali
Dikhayi Mujhe Apne Rouze Ki Jaali

Mere Dil Ke Armaan Bhi Poore Karenge
Nahin Lauta Is Dar Se Koi Bhi Khaali

Mili Itni Rif’at Ke ‘arsh E Bareen Par
Nishaan E Qadam Hai Ye Uss Ki Jabeen Par

Me Baitha Hoon Qadmon Me Ab To Khudaara
Pade Naqsh E Paa Mere Dil Ki Zameen Par

Khada Hai Hawaadis Me Shakir Tumhaara
Bajuz Aap Ke Ab Nahin Hai Sahaara

Mite Ranj O Gham Ke Hain Jitne Bhi Baadal
Karam Ka Kare Ab Khudaara Ishaara

1: Shahe Kounain Jalwa Numa Ho Gaya
2:
Shahe Kounain Jalwa Numa Ho Gaya
Rang A'alam Ka Bilkul Naya Ho Gaya

Muntakhib Aapki Zaate Waala Hui
Naam E Paak Aapka Mustafa Ho Gaya

Mil Gaya Tujhse Allah Ka Raasta
Haq Se Milne Ka Tu Waasta Ho Gaya

Aisa Aizaaz Kisko Khuda Ne Diya
Jaisa Baala Tera Martaba Ho Gaya

Aisi Nafiz Tumhari Hukumat Hui
Tumne Jis Waqt Jo Kuch Kaha Ho Gaya

Maah Paara Hua Suraj Ulta Phira
Jab Ishara Tumhara Zara Ho Gaya

Tere Hi Noor Se Dono A'alam Bane
Tu Hi To Ibtida Intaha Ho Gaya

Usne Wallah Allah Ko Paa Liye
Jo Koi Tujhpe Dil Se Fida Ho Gaya

Naam Tera Dame Naz'a Jisne Liya
Uska Imaan Par Khaatma Ho Gaya

Ilme Gaibe Nabi Ka Jo Munkir Hua
Kehre Kahhar Me Mubtila Ho Gaya

Dekh Aayi Na Najdi Ke Touheen Se
Tera Chehra To Ulta Tawa Ho Gaya

Naaz Kar Ay Jameel Apni Qismat Par Tu
Khaaq E Nalain E Ahmed Raza Ho Gaya

1: Shahe Madina
2:
Shahe Madina, Shahe Madina, Shahe Madina
Yas Rab Kay Wali Sare Nabi Tere Dar Ke Sawali

Jalwe Hai Sare Terey Hi Dam Se, Aabad Aalam Terey Karam Se
Baqi Har Ek Shay Naqshe Qayali, Sare Nabi Tere Dar Ke Sawali

Terey Liye Hi Dunya Bani Hai, Neele Falak Ki Chadar Tani Hai
Tu Agar Na Hota Dunya Thi Khali, Sare Nabi Tere Dar Ke Sawali

Tune Jahan Ki Mehfil Sajai, Taarikyon Mein Shamma Jalai
Kandhe Pe Tere Kamli Hai Kaali, Sare Nabi Tere Dar Ke Sawali

Mazhab Hai Tera Sab Ki Bhalai, Maslak Hai Tera Mushkil Kushai
Dekh Ke Apni Umat Ki Khasta Haali, Sare Nabi Tere Dar Ke Sawali

Hai Noor Tera Shamso Qamar Mein, Tere Laboon Ki Laali Sahar Mein
Phoolon Ne Teri Khusbu Chura Li, Sare Nabi Tere Dar Ke Sawali

Kaba Ka Kaba Tera Hi Ghar Hai, Tere Karam Pe Sab Ki Nazar Hai
Dikhlade Hum Ko Darbare Aali, Sare Nabi Tere Dar Ke Sawali

Hain Ap Dukhyon Ke Aaqa Sahare, Taje Shafa At Hai Sar Pe Tumhare
Ham Ko Aata Ho Roze Ki Jaali, Sare Nabi Tere Dar Ke Sawali

Taiba Ke Wali Sare Nabi Tere Dar Ke Sawali
Shahe Madina, Shahe Madina, Shahe Madina

1: Shahenshah E Do Aalam Ka Karam Hai
2:
Shahenshah E Do Aalam Ka Karam Hai
Mere Dil Ko Mayassar Unka Gham Hai

Yahi Rehte Hain Woh Jaane Bahaaraan
Ye Dunya Dil Ki Rashke Sad Iram Hai

Ye Darbaare Nabi Hai Jis Ke Aage
Na Jaane Arshe Aazam Kab Se Kham Hai

Bhala Daawe Hain Unse Hum-Sari Ke
Sare Arshe Bari Jin Ka Qadam Hai

Taras Khaao Meri Tishna Labi Par
Meri Pyaas Aur Yeh Ik Jaam Kam Hai

Dile Betaab Ko Behlaau Kaise
Badhegi Aur Betaabi Sitam Hai

Yahaan Kaabu Mein Rakhna Dil Ko Akhtar
Ye Darbaare Shahenshaahe Umam Hai

1: Shan E Ilahi Noor E Haqiqat Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam
2:
Shan E Ilahi Noor E Haqiqat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam
Mazhar E Rehmat Rehmat Hi Rehmat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam

Gesu E Mushki Shame Masarrat, Ruh E Munawwar Subhe Basharat
Chashme Gazali Baada E Ulfat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam

Hoorein Tasaduq Qudsi Hai Hairan, Shaan E Haqiqat Surate Yasdaan
Unko Bana Kar Nazaan Hai Qudrat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam

Faqr Ke Rahi Pet Hai Qali, Lab Pe Tabassum Shukr E Ilahi
Khadmo Me Jinke Daulat O Sarwat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam

Man Raani Shaan Kisi Ki, Maa Ramaita Aan Kisis Ki
Haq Ki Gilimi Shaklo Shabahat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam

------------------------ More ------------------------
----------------------- Verses -----------------------

Saahibe Taaj Khatme Nubuwat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam
Sadre Nasheen Bazme Risalat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam

Unki Gali Ka Zarra Zarra, Mahre Daraqsha Banke Chamka
Faqre Qadam Aflaak Ki Azmat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam

Darse Murawwat Farma Unka, Nue Bashar Par Ehsaan Unka
Aman-O-Muhabbat Unki Hai Shariyat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam

Noor E Jabeen Insaan Ka Chamka, Farq Mita Mohtaaj-O-Ghani Ka
Ek Hue Sarmaaya Wa Mehnat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam

Deen E Mubeen Faizaan Hai Unka, Joke Yaqi Ehsaan Hai Unka
Unke Ke To Dar Ki Khaak Me Hikmat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam

Khurbe Ilahi Sunnat Unki, Husne Amal Hai Taa-At Unki
Haasil E Iman Unki Muhabbat, Salallahu Alayhi Wasallam

1: Shan E Ramzan Jaan
2:
Ramzan Ke Maheene Kaa Ehsaan Utha Ke Dekh
Jo Kuch Kaha Allah Ne Us Ko Nibha Ke Dekh

Jaan-E-Ramzan Jaan Shan-E-Ramzan Jaan

Zindagi Sabr Se Aashna Ho Gai
Shaane Ramzan Deher Main Ayaan Ho Gai
Jo Nazar Main Nahi Tha Kinara Mila
Aisa Maahe Karam Ka Sahaara Mila

Ashq Aankhon Se Daaman Main Aa Ke Gira
Khud Khatakaar Ko Kiya Se Kiya Kar Gaya
Banda Karney Laga Rab Se Yun Guftugu

Allah Hu Allahu Allah Hu Allahu
Shaane Ramzan Aaya Chaar Soo

Maahe Ramzan Yun Aagaya Ban Ke Rehmat Ye Phir Chagaya
Kesay Tujh Se Karoon Samna Gir Raha Hoon Zara Thaamna
Khaali Daaman Liye Aagaya Bin Teray Meray Hasti Hai Kiya
Laaj Rakhna Meri Aye Khuda Waasta Maahe Ramzan Ka

Bas Jhuka Hai Yeh Sar Aur Kya Maagna
Banda Parwar Hai Tu Bas Zara Dekhna
Teri Marzi Ko Paana Meri Justuju

Allah Hu Allahu Allah Hu Allahu
Shaane Ramzan Aaya Chaar Soo

Barkatein Yun Falak Se Utarne Lagi
Kirnay Jaise Zameen Par Bikharne Lagi
Silsila Rehmaton Ka Dua Se Mila
Nematon Ka Yeh Kesa Maheena Mila

Aao Mil Baat Ke Baat Lo Har Khushi
Haan Yeh Hi Hai Ibadat Yeh Hi Bandagi
Shaane Ramzan Hai Dil Kasho Khoob Roo

------------------- More --------------------
------------------ Verses -------------------

Rehmatein Kibriya Jalwa Ghar Hogai
Shan E Ramzan Se Roshan Sahar Hogai
Bandagi Ka Qarina Badal Ne Laga
Qidmate Qalk Ko Dil Machal Ne Laga

Ashq Aankhon Se Daaman Main Aa Ke Gira
Khud Khatakaar Ko Kiya Se Kiya Kar Gaya
Banda Karney Laga Rab Se Yun Guftugu

Allah Hu Allahu Allah Hu Allahu
Shaane Ramzan Aaya Chaar Soo

1: Shan Wala Sohna Nabi Sada Lajpaal Eh
2:
Shan Wala Sohna Nabi Sada Lajpaal Eh
Allahumma Salli Ala Sayyidina Muhammadin

Jhulliyan Hanerian Te Rehmatan Sanwareya
Bujheya Na Diwa Jedha Nabi Sohne Baleya

Naam Nabi De Naal Sadi Jaan Te Pehchan Eh
Is Naam Nal Sada Naam Te Nishan Eh
Sanu Te Huzoor Diyan Nisbatan Ne Paaleya

Barkatan Te Rehmatan Da Ant Nai Hisab Nai
Roz-E-Nabi Da Hor Kite Wi Jawab Nai
Sara Jag Akhiyan Ne Wekheya Te Bhaleya

Kinne Sade Aqa Wangon Sade Lai Rohna Eh
Ohde Jaya Sohna Aya Eh Na Auna Ae
Koi Na Sawali Jithe Buhe Utton Taleya

Qainaat Wich Sada Sohna Bemisaal Eh
Us Da Sahara Rehnda Sade Naal Naal
Jadon Assi Digge Sanu Us Ne Sambhaleya

Sohne Piche Unan Sara Gham Dukh Sehna Ae
Aashiqan Zahoori Kadon Thande Hoke Behna Ae
Jinna Nun Wichone Wali Agg Ne Ubaleya

Shan Wala Sohna Nabi Sada Lajpaal Eh
Allahumma Salli Ala Sayyidina Muhammadin

1: Shehr E Taiba Ke Chaman Ki Har Kalli Ki Khayr Ho
2:
Shehr-E-Taiba Ke Chaman Ki Har Kalli Ki Khayr Ho.
Mere Aaqa Ke Madine Ki Galli Ki Khayr Ho.

Su-E-Taiba Jaa Rahe Hain Kafile Ushaaq Ke.
Har Gadda-E-Mustafa Ki Hazri Ki Khayr Ho.

Maangte Hain Khayr Aksar Log Apne Waste.
Mustafa Ke Labb Pe Hai, Har Ummati Ki Khayr Ho.

Aap Ke Siddique Ka Rutba Rahe Baala Sadda.
Aap Ke Shabbir O Shabbar, Aur ‘ali Ki Khayr Ho.

Jab Bilal-E-Basefa Ko Kafiron Ne Di Saza.
Ishq Bola Tere Ashiq Ki Ashiqi Ki Khayr Ho

Aap Ko Pohncha Diya Jab Ghaar Mein Siddique Ne.
Khud Khuda Bola Tumhari Dosti Ki Khayr Ho.

Karbala Mein Haqq Ada Tune Kiya Islaam Ka.
Aaye ‘ali Ke Laal Teri Bandagi Ki Khayr Ho.

Likh Rahe Hain Jo Sana-E-Mustafa, Nasir Sadda.
Aise Saare Shayaron Ki Shayari Ki Khayr Ho.

Shehr-E-Taiba Ke Chaman Ki Har Kalli Ki Khayr Ho.
Mere Aaqa Ke Madine Ki Galli Ki Khayr Ho.

1: Shore Mahe Nau Sun Kar Tujh Tak Main Dawaan Aaya
2:
Shore Mahe Nau Sun Kar Tujh Tak Main Dawaa(N) Aaya
Saaqi Main Tere Sadqe Mai De Ramaza Aaya

Is Gul Ke Siwa Har Phool Baa Goshe Giraa(N) Aaya
Dekhe Hi Gi Aye Bulbul Jab Waqte Fugaa(N) Aaya

Jab Baame Tajalli Par Woh Nayyare Jaa(N) Aaya
Sar Tha Jo Gira Jhuk Kar Dil Thanjo Tapaa(N) Aaya

Jannat Ko Haram Samjha Aate To Yaha Aaya
Ab Tak Ke Har Ik Ka Muh Kehta Hoo(N) Kahaa(N) Aaya

Taiba Je Siwa Sab Baag Pamale Fana Honge
Dekhoge Chaman Walo! Jab Ahde Khazaa(N) Aaya.

Sar Aur Woh Sang-E-Dar Aankh Aur Woh Bazm-E-Noor,
Zaalim Ko Watan Ka Dhyaan Aaya To Kahan Aaya.

Kuch Naat Ke Tabqe Ka Aalam Hi Niraala Hai
Sakte Me Padi Hai Aql Hairat Me Ghumaa(N) Aaya

Jalti Thi Zamee Kaisi Thi Dhoop Kadi Kaisi
Lo Woh Qade Be Saaya Ab Saaya Qunaa(N)aaya

Taiba Se Hum Ate Hain Kahiye To Jinaa(N) Walo
Kya Dekh Ke Jeeta Hai Jo Waa(N) Se Yaha(N) Aaya

Le Tauqe Alam Se Ab Azad Ho Aye Kumri
Chitthi Liye Bakhshish Ki Woh Sarve Rawa(N) Aaya

Naame Se Raza Ke Ab Mit Jaao Bure Kaamo
Dekho Mere Palle Par Ab Achche Miya(N) Aaya

Badkaar Raza Khush Ho Badkaam Bhale Honge
Woh Achche Miya(N) Pyara Achcho Ka Miya(N) Aaya

1: Shukr E Khuda Ki Aaj Ghari Us Safar Ki Hai
2:
Shukr E Khuda Ki Aaj Ghari Us Safar Ki Hai
Jis Par Nisaar Jaan Falaaho Zafar Ki Hai

Garmi Hai Tap Hai Dard Hai Kulfat Safar Ki Hai
Na Shukr Ye To Dekh Azeemat Kidhar Ki Hai

Kis Khaaqe Paak Ki Tu Banee Khaaqe Pa Shifa
Tujhko Kasam Janab E Maseeha Ke Sarr Ki Hai

Aabe Hayaat E Ruh Hai 'zarqa' Ki Boond Boond
Akseer A'azame Mase Dil Khaaq Darr Ki Hai

Humko To Apne Saaye Me Aaram Hi Se Laaye
Heele Bahane Waalo Ko Ye Rah Darr Ki Hai

Lut-Te Hai Maare Jaate Hai Yu Hi Suna Kiye
Har Baar Di Wo Aman Ki Ghairat Hajar Ki Hai

Wo Dekho Jagmagati Hai Shab Aur Qamar Abhi
Pahro Nahi Ki Bisto Chahrum Safar Ki Hai

Maahe Madina Apni Tajalli Ataa Kare
Ye Dhalti Chandni To Pahar Do Pahar Ki Hai

Mann Zaar-Turbati Wa-J-Bat Lah Shafa'ati
Un Par Durood Jinse Naved In Bashar Ki Hai

Unke Tufail Haj Bhi Khuda Ne Kara Diye
Asl E Muraad Haazri Uss Paak Darr Ki Hai

Ka'abe Ka Naam Tak Na Liya Taibah Hi Kaha
Poocha Tha Humse Jisne Ki Nuhzat Kidhar Ki Hai

Ka'aba Bhi Hai Unhi Ki Tajalli Ka Ayk Zill
Roushan Unhi Se Aks Se Putli Hajar Ki Hai

Hote Kaha Khaleelo Bina Ka'aba Wo Mina
Lau Laak Wale Sahibe Sab Tere Ghar Ki Hai

Maula Ali Ne Vaari Teri Neend Par Namaz
Aur Wo Bhi Asr Sabse Jo A'ala Khatar Ki Hai

Siddeeq Balki Ghaar Me Jaa(N) Uss Pe De Chuke
Aur Hifze Jaa(N) To Jaan Furuze Gurar Ki Hai

Haa(N) Tu Ne Unko Jaan, Unhe Fer Di Namaz
Par Wah To Kar Chuke The Jo Karni Bashar Ki Hai

Sabit Hua Ki Jumla Faraiz Furu'a Hai
Aslul Usool Bandagi Us Taajvar Ki Hai

Shar Khair, Shor Sur, Sharar Dur, Naar Nur
Bushra Ki Baargah Ye Khairul Bashar Ki Hai

Mujrim Bulaye Aaye Hai 'jau-K' Hai Gawah
Phir Radd Ho Kab Ye Shaan Kareemo Ke Darr Ki Hai

Badd Hai Magar Unhi Ke Hai Baaghi Nahi Hai Hum
Najdi Na Aaye Usko Ye Manzil Khatar Ki Hai

Tuf Najdiyat Na Kufr Na Islam Sab Pe Harf
Kafir Idhar Ki Hai Na Udhar Ki Adhar Ki Hai

Haakim Hakeem Daado Dawa De Ye Khuch Na De
Mardood Ye Muraad Kis Aayat Khabar Ki Hai

Shakle Bashar Me Noore Ilahi Agar Na Ho
Kya Kadr Us Khameera E Maao Mad(A)r Ki Hai

Noore Ilahi Kya Hai Muhabbat Habeeb Ki
Jis Dil Me Ye Na Ho Wo Jagah Khufo Khar Ki Hai

Zikre Khuda Jo Unse Juda Chaho Najdiyo
Wallah Zikre Haq Nahi Kunji Sakar Ki Hai

Be Unke Waaste Ke Khuda Kuch Ataa Kare
Haasha Galat Galat Ye Hawas Be-Basar Ki Hai

Maqsood Ye Hai Aadamo Nuuho Khaleel Se
Tukhme Karam Me Saari Karamat Samar Ki Hai

Unki Nubuvvat Unki Ubuvvat Hai Sabko Aam
Ummul Bashar Aroos Unhi Ke Pesar Ki Hai

Zaahir Me Mere Phool Haqeeqat Me Mere Nakhl
Uss Ghul Ki Yaad Me Ye Sadaa Bul Bashar Ki Hai

Pehle Ho Unki Yaad Ki Paaye Jila Namaz
Yeh Kehte Hai Azaan Jo Pichle Pahar Ki Hai

Duniya Mazaar Hashr Jahaan Hai Ghafoor Hai
Har Manzil Apne Chaand Ki Manzil Gafar Ki Hai

Un Par Durood Jinko Hajar Tak Kare Salaam
Un Par Salaam Jinko Tahiyyat Shajar Ki Hai

Un Par Durood Jinko Kase Be-Kasa Kahe
Un Par Salaam Jinko Khabar Be-Khabar Ki Hai

Jinno Bashar Salaam Ko Haazir Hai Assalam
Yeh Bargah Maalik E Jinno Bashar Ki Hai

Shamso Qamar Salaam Ko Haazir Hai Assalam
Khubi Unhi Ki Jyot Se Shamso Qamar Ki Hai

Sab Bahro Bar Salaam Ko Hazir Hai Assalam
Tamlik Unhi Ke Naam To Har Bahro Bar Ki Hai

Sango Shajar Salaam Ko Haazir Hai Assalam
Kalme Se Tar Zabaan Darakhto Hajar Ki Hai

Arzo Asar Salaam Ko Hazir Hai Assalam
Malja Ye Baargah Dua O Asar Ki Hai

Shorida Sarr Salaam Ko Hazir Hai Assalam
Raahat Unhi Ke Qadmo Me Shorida Sarr Ki Hai

Khasta Jigar Salaam Ko Hazir Hai Assalam
Marham Yahi Ki Khaak To Khasta Jigar Ki Hai

Sab Khushko Tar Salaam Ko Hazir Hai Assalam
Ye Jalwa Gaah Maalike Har Khushko Tar Ki Hai

Sab Karro Far Salaam Ko Hazir Hai Assalam
Topi Yahi To Khaaq Pe Har Karro Far Ki Hai

Ahle Nazar Salaam Ko Hazir Hai Assalam
Ye Gard Hi Surma Sab Ahle Nazar Ki Hai

Aansu Baha Ki Beh Gaye Kaale Gunah Ke Dher
Haathi Dubav Jheel Yaha Chashme Tar Ki Hai

Teri Kaza Khaleefa E Ahkaame Zil Jalaal
Teri Raza Haleef Kazawo Kadar Ki Hai

Yeh Pyari Pyari Kyari Tere Khaana Baagh Ki
Sard Isko Aabo Taab Se Aatash Safar Ki Hai

Jannat Me Aa Ke Naar Me Jaata Nahi Koi
Shukre Khuda Naweed Najaato Zafar Ki Hai

Mo'min Hu Mo'mino Pe Rauf Ur Raheem Ho
Sa-Il Hu Sa-Ilo Ko Khushi La-Nahar Ki Hai

Daaman Ka Waasta Mujhe Is Dhup Se Bacha
Mujhko To Shaak Jaado Me Us Duphar Ki Hai

Maa Dono Bhai Bete Bhateeje Azeez Dost
Sab Tujhko Soupe Milk Hi Sab Tere Ghar Ki Hai

Jin Jin Muraado Ke Liye Ahbaab Ne Kaha
Peshe Khabeer Kya Mujhe Haajat Khabar Ki Hai

Unke Sadaqe Mein Tera Hoga Bhala, Le Chal Mujhe

1: Taibah Rashk E Jinah Khuld Zaar
2:
Taibah Rashk E Jinah Khuld Zaar Allah Allah Allah
Jis Tarah Dekhiye Hai Bahar Allah Allah Allah
Allah Allah Allah Allah Allah Allah

Yahan Raat Deen Hai Farishte Utarte
Mazar E Nabi Per Salam Arza Karte
Merhaba Roza E Tajdar Allah Allah Allah

Tabassum May Unke Hai Jannat Ki Kunji,
Ishare May Unke Shafa-At Ki Kunji
Shafa-O-Maunis-O Gamgushar Allah Allah Allah

Sana Unki Aayat E Qur-An May Aayi,
Unhi Ke Liye Rab Ne Duniya Banayi,
Hai Wohi Rehmat-E-Kirdigar Allah Allah

Shafa-At Ka Shehra Bandha Unke Sar Per,
Kiya Rab Ne Unko Ataa Houz-E-Kausar,
Unka Hai Khuld Per Ikhtiyar Allah Allah Allah

Sabhi Ambiya Ko Hai Haajat Unhi Ki,
Hai Bakshish Ka Saman Inayat Unhi Ki,
Mere Aaqa Ki Hai Sab Bahar Allah Allah Allah

Unhe Gaib Ka Ilm Rab Ne Diya Hai,
Khazano Ka Mukhtar Unko Kiya Hai,
Hai Wohi Qasim E Rozgar Allah Allah Allah

Woh Mairaajwale, Wohi Raajwale,
Woh Minhaajwale, Wohi Taajwale,
Jannato Ke Wohi Sehr-E-Yaar Allah Allah Allah

Sadaqat Unhi Ki, Adalat Unhi Ki,
Sakhawat Unhi Ki, Shuja-At Unhi Ki
Hai Wohi Taajwar Taajdar Allah Allah Allah

Wohi Sarwar-E-Kishwar-E-Mursala Hai,
Woh Mamdooh-E-Qur-An, Woh Ima-N Ki Jaan Hai,
Unke Awsaf Hai Beshumar Allah Allah Allah

Woh Ikhlaswale, Woh Ikhlaqwale,
Woh Ejazwale, Woh Misaqwale ,
Shan-E-Rabzi Hashma Bawaqar Allah Allah Allah

Fashat May Yakta Balagat May Yakta
Nabuwat May Yakta, Risalat Yakta,
Aap Hai Yaka-E-Rozgar Allah Allah Allah

Padho Nazmi Unki Sana Padhte Jao,
Har Ek Saans Salle Ala Padhte Jao,
Wajda May Jhoomkar Bar-Bar Allah Allah Allah

1: Taj Walon Ke Saron Par Paye Aqdas Aap Ke
2:
Taj Walon Ke Saron Par Paye Aqdas Aap Ke
Main Bhi Choomon Ga Payambar Paye Aqdas Aap Ke

Aap Ke Qadmon Ke Neeche Narm Pathar Ho Gaye
Kya Kahoon Allahu Akbar Paye Aqdas Aap Ke

Sust Aur Kamro Sawari Tez Ho Jati Wahin
Jab Lagate Eik Thokar Paye Aqdas Aap Ke

Meri Qismat Bhi Khule Gi Mere Ghar Bhi Ayein Ge
Dekhoon Ga Mein Zindagi Bhar Paye Aqdas Aap Ke

Is Liye Makkah Madina Ban Gaye Dono Haram
Aa Gaye Jab Banda Parwar Paye Aqdas Aap Ke

Khak Pay-E-Mustafa Ki Khai Quran Ne Qasm
Tayyib-O-Tahir Munawwar Paye Aqdas Aap Ke

Kya Makan Ho La Makan Tak Chap Hai Qadmain Ki
Sidra-O-Raf Raf Se Uppar Paye Aqdas Aap Ke

Hashr Tak Mit Ta Nahi Hai Mit Gaya Jo Aap Par
Aye Ujagar Thaam Mit Kar Paye Aqdas Aap Ke

1: Tajdar E Haram Ho Nigah E Karam
2:
Kismat Mein Meri Chain Se Jeena Likh De
Doobe Na Kabhi Mera Safeena Likh De
Jannat To Thikana Hai Maghar Duniya Mein
Aye Katib E Taqdeer, Madina Likh De

Tajdar E Haram, Hoo Nigah E Karam
Hum Gareebon Ke Din Bhi Sanwar Jayenge

Hamiy E Bay Kasa, Kya Kahe Ga Jahan
App Kay Dar Se Khali Agar Jayenge

Tajdar E Haram, Nigah E Karam

Chashm E Rahmat Ba Khusha Sooh E Malandaz E Nazar
Aie Quraishi La Khabi O Hashmi O Muttalabi
Tajdar E Haram, Ho Nigaah E Karam

Kya Tumse Kahoon Aie Rab Ke Kuwar
Tum Jaanat Ho Mann Ki Battiyaa
Dar Furqat Toh Aye Ummi Laqab
Kaate Na Katak Hai Ab Ratiyaa
Turi Preet Mein Sudh Bhudh Sab Bisri
Kab Tak Ye Rahegi Be Khabri
Daah E Ka Pigan Duzdi Da Nazar
Kabhi Sun Bhi Toh Lo Humri Batiyaa

Tajdar E Haram, Ho Nigaah E Karam

Koi Apna Nahi Ghum Ke Maare Hain Hum
Aap Ke Dar Pe Faryaad Laye Hain Hum
Ho Nigah E Karam, Warna Chhokat Pe Hum
Aap Ka Naam Le Le Ke Marjayenge

Tajdar E Haram, Nigah E Karam

Maikasho Aao Aao Madine Chalein
Aao Madina Chalein Aao Madina Chalein...
Chashm E Saakiye Kausar Se Peene Chalein
Yaad Rakho Agar, Uth Gayi Ek Nazar
Jitne Khaali Hain Sab Jaam Bhar Jayenge

Tajdar E Haram, Nigah E Karam

Khauf E Toofan Hai, Bijliyo Ka Hai Darr
Sakht Mushkil Hai Aaqa Kidhar Jaye Hum
Ap Hi Gar Na Lenge, Hamari Khabar
Hum Museebat Ke Maare Kidhar Jayege

Tajdar E Haram, Hoo Nigah E Karam
Hum Gareebo Ke Din Bhi Sanwar Jayenge
Tajdar E Haram, Ho Nigaah E Karam

Tajdar E Haram, Nigah E Karam
Tajdar E Haram, Karam Karam

Mai Saahil Hoon Meri Auqaat Kya Hai
Tum Aaqa Ho, Tumhari Baat Kya Hai

Chashm-E-Rahmat-Ba-Khusha
Soohe-Malan Daaz Nazar
Aye Quraishi-La-Kabi Hasmhi-O-Muttalabi
Tajdar-E-Haram, Ho Nigaah-E-Karam

Kehna Saba Huzoor Se, Kehta Hai Ek Ghulam
Bass Ek Nazar Ho, Ek Nazar Ka Sawaal Hai
Ya Mustafa Sallealah, Ya Mustafa Sallealah
Ya Mustafa Sallealah, Ya Mustafa Sallealah

Phir Ujdiyon Ko Laal De,
Jaan Paththaron Mein Daal De
Haavi Ho Mustaqbil Pe Hum,
Maazi Sa Humko Haal De
Daawa Hai Teri Chaah Ka,
Is Ummat-E-Gumraah Ka

Tere Siva Koi Nahi, Ya Rahmat-Al-Lil-Alameen
Ya Mustafa Sallealah, Ya Mustafa Sallealah
Ya Mustafa Sallealah, Ya Mustafa Sallealah
Ya Mustafa, Ya Mujtaba, Eraham-Lana, Eraham-Lana

Dast-E-Hama, Bechara Ra
Daama Tuhi, Pursa Tuhi
Mann Aasiyam, Mann Ajizam
Mann Bekasam, Haal-E-Mara
Ya Shafaye, Roz-E-Jazaa

Pursa Tuhi, Pursa Tuhi
Aye Mushtub-E-Zambar Fishaan
Paike Naseem-E-Sub Haram
Aye Charagar Insanafas
Aye Munise Beemar-E-Gham
Aye Kaasid-E-Parkhundapaye

Tujhko Usi Gul Ki Kasam
Ibnil Tayari Has Saba
Yauman Ila-Ar-Dil-Haram
Ballib Salami Roza Tann
Fi-Han Nabi-Al-Mohtaram

Tajdar-E-Haram, Ho Nigaah-E-Karam
Hum Ghareebon Ke Din Bhi Sanwarjayenge
Haami-E-Bekasaan Kya Kahega Jahan
Aapke Darr Se Khaali Agar Jayenge

Tajalliyon Ki Ajab Hai Fazaa Madine Mein
Nigah-E-Shauk Ki Hai Inteha Madine Mein
Gham-E-Hayat Na Khauf-E-Khazaa Madine Mein
Namaz-E-Ishq Karenge Adaa Madine Mein

Idhar Udhar Na Bhatakte Phiro Khuda Ke Liye
Barah-E-Raas Hai Raahe-E-Khuda Madine Mein
Madine Chalen, Aao Madine Chalen
Isi Mahine Chalen, Chalo Madine Chalen

Maikashon Aao Aao Madine Chalen
Dast-E-Saakhi-E-Kausar Se Peene Chalen
Yaad Rakho Agar, Uthgayi Ek Nazar
Jitne Khaali Hai Sabb Jaam Bharjayenge
Tajdar-E-Haram, Ho Nigaah-E-Karam

Aapke Darr Se Na Koi Khaali Gaya
Apne Daaman Ko Bhar Ke Sawaali Gaya
Ho Habeeb-E-Hazin Par Bhi Aaqa Nazar
Warna Auraq-E-Hasti Bikhar Jayenge
Tajdar-E-Haram, Ho Nigaah-E-Karam
Taaaajdaaar-E-Harammm!!!!!

1: Tala Al Badru Alayna
2:
Tala’al-Badru ‘alayna,
Min Thaniyyatil-Wada’
Wajaba Al-Shukru ‘alayna,
Ma Da’a Li Llahi Da’

English Translation:

O The White Moon Rose Over Us
From The Valley Of Wada’
And We Owe It To Show Gratefulness
Where The Call Is To Allah

Ayyuha Al-Mab’uthu Fina
Ji’ta Bi-Al-Amri Al-Muta’
Ji’ta Sharrafta Al-Madinah
Marhaban Ya Khayra Da’

English Translation:

O You Who Were Raised Amongst Us
Coming With A Work To Be Obeyed
You Have Brought To This City Nobleness
Welcome! Best Call To God’s Way

1: Tamanna E Madina
2:
Madina Madina, Madina Madina…

Hai Itni Shadeed Ab To Tamanna E Madina
Har Sans Se Aati Hai Sada Haaye Madina

Isne Bhi Madina Dekhliya, Usne Bhi Madina Dekhliya
Sab Ne Hi Madina Dekhliya, Wo Din Bhi To Aye Mai Bhi Kahoon
Maine Bhi Madina Dekhliya

Har Saans Se Aati Hai Sada Haaye Madina

Raiyan Jaandeyan Shehr Madine Nun
Sarkar Deya Mehmano Lae Pegham Mera Wi Jawin
Nale Hanjuan Da Nazrana Aakhin
Har Sans Se Aati Hai Sada Haaye Madina

Ae Baad E Saba Pegham Mora Sultan E Madina Ko Dijo
Ke Har Sans Se Aati Hai Sada Haaye Madina

Bimaar Ko Ghaflat Hai Behosh Si Taari Hai
Har Saans Se Aati Hai Sada Haaye Madina

Kadi Ave Ga Din Ya Rab Jadon Bat-Ha Nun Jawan Main
Kadi Tehran Main Makke Wich Madina Ghar Banawan Main
Na Khwahish Khuld Di Dil Wich Na Hooran Di Talab Mainu
Eho Kaafi Ae Jannat Tere Kuche Nun Banawan Main
Madine Waleya Main Nun Wikha Rasta Adine Da
Bana Ke Pair Akhiyan Nun Te Sir De Bhaar Aawan Main

Har Saans Se Aati Hai Sada Haaye Madina

Aqa Mere Aqa Mujhe Taiba Mein Bula Lo
Sone Nahi Deti Hai Tamanna E Madina
Har Saans Se Aati Hai Sada Haaye Madina

Madina Madina, Madina Madina…

Sukun Mile Ga Wahin Jab Madine Jaon Ga
Par Sawal Yeh Hai Ke Main Kab Madine Jaon Ga

Madina Madina, Madina Madina…

Jindh Ghol Ghumawan Main
Ik Wari Sad Sohneya
Fir Murh Ke Na Awan Main

Madina Madina, Madina Madina….

Hai Apna Kaam Madine Ki Aarzoo Rakhna
Phir Unka Kaam Hai Jazbe Ki Aabroo Rakhna

Madina Madina, Madina Madina

Barri Hasrat Hai Tere Dar Utte
Maththa Tek Da Tek Da Mar Jawan
Eade Ishq Da Paal Ke Mach Sohna
Wal Sekh Da Sekh Da Mar Jawan
Painda Dooriyan Da Naal Hanjuan De
Inj Meich Da Meich Da Mar Jawan
Howe Waqt Akheer Te Mukh Sohna
Tedha Wekh Da Wekh Da Mar Jawan

Madina Madina, Madina Madina

Koi Parde Chaliyan De
Sanu Naqshe Nai Bhul De
Taiba Diya Galiyan De

Madina Madina, Madina Madina

Mat Aur Kisi Shehr Ki Rudaad Sunao
Shaida E Madina Hoon, Main Shaida E Madina
Har Saans Se Aati Hai Sada Haaye Madina

-------------Other Version----------------
------------------------------------------

Hai Itni Shadeed Ab To Tamanna E Madina
Har Sans Se Aati Hai Sada Haae Madina

Jaagun To Isi Dhun Mein Rahun Raat Gaye Tak
So Jaaun To Khwabon Mein Nazar Aaye Madina

Mat Aur Kisi Shaher Ki Rudad Sunao
Shaida E Madina Hun Mein Shaida E Madina

Makka Tu Bhi Afzal Hai Magar Itna Batade
Har Shaher Se Bad Kar Muje Kyun Bhaye Madina

Ho Jaae Ata Rakhte Safar Izne Safar Bhi
Ho Jaae Karam Mujpe Ab Aaqa E Madina

Khwahish Hai Ke Ab Jaake Na Lotun Mein Waha Se
Nazish Muje Takdeer Jo Dikhlae Madina

1: Tanam Farsooda Jaa Para
2:
Tanam Farsooda Jaa Para
Ze Hijra, Ya Rasulallah
Dillam Paz Murda Aawara
Ze Isyaa, Ya Rasulallah!

My Body Is Dissolving In Your Separation
And My Soul Is Breaking Into Pieces, Ya Rasulallah!
Due To My Sins, My Heart Is Weak And Becoming Enticed, Ya Rasulallah!

Choon Soo'e Mun Guzar Aari
Manne Miskeen Zanaa Daari
Fida-E-Naqsh-E-Nalainat
Kunam Ja, Ya Rasulallah!

When You Pass By Me Then Even In My Immense Poverty,
Ecstatically, I Must Sacrifice My Soul On The
Impression Of Your Blessed Sandal, Ya Rasulallah!

Ze Jaame Hubb To Mustam
Ba Zanjeere To Dil Bustam
Nu'mi Goyam Ke Mun Bustum
Sukun Daa, Ya Rasulallah!

I Am Drowned In The Taste Of Your Love
And The Chain Of Your Love Binds My Heart.
Yet I Don't Say That I Know This Language (Of Love), Ya Rasulallah!

Ze Kharda Khaish Hairaanam
Siyaa Shud Roze Isyaanam
Pashemaanam, Pashemaanam,
Pashemaanam, Ya Rasulallah!

I Am Worried Due To My Misdeeds;
And I Feel That My Sins Have Blackened My Heart, Ya Rasulallah!
I Am In Distress! I Am In Distress! I Am In Distress! Ya Rasulallah!

Choon Baazoo'e Shafaa'at Raa
Khushaa'i Bar Gunaagara
Makun Mahruume Jaami Raa
Daraa Aan, Ya Rasulallah!

Ya Rasulallah! When You Raise Your Hands To Intercede
For The Sinners, Then Do Not Deprive
Jami Of Your Exalted Intercession.

1: Taron Mein Roshni Mere Nabi Se Hai
2:
Taron Mein Roshni Mere Nabi Se Hai
Chanda Mein Chandi Mere Nabi Se Hai

Kaliyon Mein Tazgi Mere Nabi Se Hai
Phulon Mein Dilkashi Mere Nabi Se Hai

Roshan Jahan Tha Kal Bhi Huzoor Se
Yeh Noor Aaj Bhi Mere Nabi Se Hai

Rangeen Yeh Jahan Tha Kal Bhi Huzoor Se
Jannat Ka Husn Bhi Mere Nabi Se Hai

Chumein Na Kyon Qadam Kaba Bhi Shauk Se
Nisbat Bilal Ki Mere Nabi Se Hai

Woh Jo Na Hon To Kuch Bhi Na Ho Jahan Mein
Dunya Mein Zindagi Mere Nabi Se Hai

Farooq Kyoun Kahon Main Khud To Kuch Nahi
Izzat Hai Jo Meri Mere Nabi Se Hai

1: Tera Khawan Main Tere Geet Gawan
2:
Tera Khawan Mein Tere Geet Gawan Ya Rasulallah
Tera Milad Mein Kyun Na Manawan Ya Rasulallah

Halima Kar Kadi Wekhey Kadi Sarkar Nu Wekhey
Mein Kedi Sej Tere Laiyy Sajawan Ya Rasulallah

Mera Dil Wi Chonda Aye Tusi Mere Wi Ghar Aao
Mein Kede Maan Thi Tennu Bulawan Ya Rasulallah

Jagao Bhag Mere Wi Abu Ayyub De Wagoon
Muqaddar Oas Da Kettho Le Aawan Ya Rasulallah

Mein Kuj Wi Naeen Che Tere Naal Meri Koi Nisbat Naeen
Mein Sab Kuchh Haan Che Mein Tera Sadawan Ya Rasulallah

Suna Hai Aap Har Aashiq Ke Ghar Tashrif Late Hein
Mere Ghar Mein Bhi Ho Jaye Charagan Ya Rasulallah

Madine Paak De Andar Meri Ae Ho Ibadat Aye
Tere Roze To Na Nazran Hatawan Ya Rasulallah
