1: Tera Naam Virde Zubaan Rahay
2:
Tera Naam Virde Zubaan Rahay,
Meri Aur Koi Dua Nahin
Mujhay Apnay Dar Ki Bheek Day,
Kay Teray Khazanay Main Kiya Nahin.

Ho Karam Nawazi Huzoor Ki,
Meray Ghamkaday Mein Bhi Aa Kabhi
Meray Chara Ghar Aie Meray Nabi,
Mera Koi Teray Siwa Nahin.

Yeh Teray Niyazi Ki Eid Hai,
Abhi Aur Hasratay Deed Hai
Isay Choom Lenay Do Jaliyaan,
Abhi Dil To Iss Ka Bhara Nahin.

Rukhay Mustafa Hai Woh Aaina,
Kay Ab Aisa Dusra Aaina
Na Hamari Bazmay Khiyal Mein,
Na Dukanay Aaina Saaz Mein.

Tera Jalwa Paishay Nazar Rahay
Tujhay Dekh Ker Mein Jiya Karoon
Jahan Koi Teray Siwa Na Ho,
Mein Ussi Faza Mein Raha Karoon.

Rukhay Mustafa Woh Kitaab Hai,
Jo Muhabatoon Ka Nisaab Hai
Wohi Meray Paishay Nazar Rahay,
Yehi Raat Din Mein Parha Karoon.

Teri Yaad Meri Namaz Hai,
Teri Yaad Gham Ka Woh Saar Hai
Tera Shukar Rehmatay Do Jahan,
Mein Karoon To Kaisay Aada Karoon.

Jo Kabhi Naseeb Ho Hazri,
To Milay Naseeb Ko Yawareen
Teray Sangay Dar Pay Jhuka Kay Sir,
Mein Namaz E Ishq Aada Karoon.

Mujhay Apna Jalwa Dikhaye Ja,
Meray Dil Mein Aakay Simaye Ja
Mein Sharab E Marafat E Khuda,
Tera Naam Lekay Piya Karoon.

1: Teray Rowzay They Aawan Mey Madinay Wich Rehn Waleya
2:
Teray Rowzay They Aawan Mey, Madinay Wich Rehn Waleya
Jali Aakhiyan Naal Lawan Mey, Madinay Wich Rehn Waleya

Wich Qabr Dey Aaja Lagiyan Towd Nibhaa Jana
Tera Ummati Sada Waan Mey, Madinay Wich Rehn Waleya

Jad Waqt Naza Howey, Bas Teri Nigha Howey
Tera Deedar Pawan Mey, Madinay Wich Rehn Waleya

Sadqah Shaane Kareemi Da Bharam Rakhna Naeemi Da
Teriyan Ne’matan Sanawaan Mey, Madinay Wich Rehn Waleya

Sadqah Shaane Kareemi Da Bharam Rakhna Ham Sab Ka
Teriyan Ne’matan Sunandey Rawa, Madinay Wich Rehn Waleya

1: Tere Daamane Karam Mein Jise Neend Aa Gayi Hai
2:
Tere Daamane Karam Mein Jise Neend Aa Gayi Hai
Jo Fanaa Na Hogi Aisi Use Zindagi Mili Hai

Mujhe Kya Padi Kisi Se Karu Arz Mudda`aa Mai
Meri Lau To Bas Unhi Ke Dare Jood Se Lagi Hai

Woh Jahaan Bhar Ke Daata Mujhe Pher Denge Khaali
Meri Tauba Aye Khuda Ye Mere Nafs Ki Badi Hai

Main Gunaahgaar Hu Aur Bade Martabo Ki Khwaahish
Tu Magar Kareem Hai Jo Teri Banda Parwari Hai

Jo Paye Sawaal Aaye Mujhe Dekh Kar Ye Bole
Ise Chain Se Sulaao Ke Yeh Bandaye Nabi Hai

Main Maru To Mere Maula Ye Malaaika Se Keh De
Koi Is Ko Mat Jagaana Abhi Aankh Lag Gayi Hai

Teri Yaad Thapki Dekar Mujhe Ab Shahaa Sulaa De
Mujhe Jaagte Hue Yoon Badi Der Ho Gayi Hai

Aye Naseeme Kooye Jaana Zaraa Sooye Bad Naseebaan
Chali Aa Khuli Hai Tujh Pe Jo Humaari Bekasi Hai

Tera Dil Shikastah Akhtar Isi Intizaar Mein Hai
Ke Abhi Naweede Waslat Tere Dar Se Aa Rahi Hai

1: Tere Ishq Di Dolat Mil Jaye
2:
Tere Ishq Di Dolat Mil Jaye
Duniya Di Dolat Ki Karnii

Tere Dar Di Gadai Mil Jawe
Shahi Di Shokat Ki Karni

Iho Aarzu Mere Seene Wich
Mar Jiwan Sheher Madine Wich

Bane Qabr Madine Wich Meri
Ithon Di Turbat Kii Karnii

Mil Jawe Madine Diya Galiyan,
Ja Rob Kashi Leyi Je Mainu

Aisi Khidmat Wich Barri Azmat Hai,
Shahaa Di Khidmat Ki Karni

Jindi Naal Tu Raazi, Rab Raazi
Jindie Naal Khafa Tuun Rab Wi Khafa

Teri Chahat Andar Sub Kujj Hy
Kisi Or Di Chahat Kii Karnii

Rahway Merey Labaan Te Teri Sana
Mera Dil Wi Rahway Tera Madha Sara

Parhaan Naatan Teriyan Har Wailay
Kisi Or Di Midhat Ki Karni

Iho Aarzu Riaz Di Aey
Iho Aarzu Puri Ho Jaway

Rahwan Zikr Tera Karda Har Dam
Kise Wele Di Fursat Ki Karni

Tere Ishq Di Dolat Mil Jaye
Duniya Di Dolat Ki Karni

Tere Darr Di Gadaai Mil Jaye
Shahi Di Shokat Ki Karni…

1: Tere Karam Ke Agey
2:
Tere Karam Ke Agey
Meri Zaat Kuch Nahi Hai
Tu Hai Karam Ka Data
Tere Darr Pey Chandni Hai

Tera Darr Hai Mera Kaba
Tera Kucha Meri Jannat
Tere Chehre Ki Tilawat Aqa
Mera Hajje Akbari Hai

Tere Naam Se Ey Aqa
Mujhe Janti Hai Dunya
Tere Naam Ki Badolat, Aqa
Mera Kaam Chal Raha Hai

Meri Laaj Rakhne Wale
Meri Laaj Ko Nibhana
Teri Ik Nazar Ke Sadqey, Aqa
Meri Baat Ban Gayi Hai

Kahan Teri Shaan Aali
Kahan Mujhsa Yeh Sawali
Mujhe Dard Dene Wale, Aqa
Teri Banda Parwari Hai

Tere Naam Ne Ata Ki
Hai Bheek Mustafa Ki
Isi Bheek Per O Saifi
Tera Naam Chal Raha Hai

Ishqe Nabi Mein Barsen
Pal Pal Unhi Ko Tarsen
Rehna Faqat Unhi Ka
Bimaar Chahti Hai

Kya Shan Beyniazi
Haq Ne Tujhe Ata Ki
Tere Darr Ka Jo Bhikari
Dunya Ka Voh Wali Hai

Tu Chahe Jise Dey De
Mehboob Teri Marzi
Mukhtar Banaya Hai
Tujhe Apne Khazanon Ka

Jis Jis Ko Pilai Hai
Mere Aqa Ke Ankhon Se
Voh Bhul Gaya Rasta
Harr Ik Maikhane Ka

Kuch Aisi Pila Dalo,
Murshid Beykhud Bana Dalo
Jo Dekhe Kahe Mujhko
Yeh Hai Mera Diwana

Bhar Bhar Ke Pilaya Hai
Mastanon Ko Ey Murshid
Us Jaam Ke Kuch Qatrey
Mujh Ko Bhi Pila Jana Hai

Tu Chum Ley Kalion Ko
Kafuri Honton Se
Andaz Sikhaya Hai
Khud Rab Ne Jagane Ka

Ik Parda Uthao Na, Ya Rasulallah
Ik Jalwa Dikhao Na
Is Shauqe Mohabbat Ne
Harr Raat Jagaya Hai

1: Tere Naam Pe Waaru Jaan Ya Rasoolallah
2:
Tere Naam Pe Waaru Jaan Ya Rasoolallah
Ye Naara Pyara Lagta Hai, Ye Naara Pyara Lagta Hai
Har Mehfil Me Ye Sajta Hai
Mere Maslak Ki Pehchan Ya Rasoolallah

Lo Jhoom Ke Naam Muhammad Ka
Ye Naam Suhana Lagta Hai
Is Naam Se Raunaq Hoti Hai
Purnoor Zamaana Lagta Hai

Hai Dil Ki Ziya Aankhon Ki Chamak
Is Naam Me Hai Kuch Aisi Mahak
Imaan Ko Mu’attar Kar Jaye
Khushboo Ka Khazana Lagta Hai

Jo Arsh Pe Ahmed Kehlaye
Wo Zaate Muhammad Hai Beshak
Mehmood Aur Haamid Mere Nabi
Hasnain Ka Naana Lagta Hai

Ye Naam Waseela Bakshish Ka
La Raib Zariya Barkat Ka
Wo Khulqe Azeem Allah Allah
Jo Sabse Yagana Lagta Hai

Taha Bhi Wahi Yaseen Bhi Wahi
Wo Bashir-O-Nazeer Hai Salle Ala
Barkat Ka Khazina Naam E Nabi
Har Roz Shabana Lagta Hai

Naato Ki Sajate Hai Mehfil
Padhte Hai Salaamo Ke Nagme
Jab Jab Bhi Liya Hai Naame Nabi
Kya Khoob Tarana Lagta Hai

Kya Wasf Likhe Rizwan Unka
Hai Jinka Khuda Khud Madha Sara
Kuch Husne Amal To Paas Nahi
Bas Unka Deewana Lagta Hai

Tere Naam Pe Waaru Jaan Ya Rasoolallah
Ye Naara Pyara Lagta,ye Naara Pyara Lagta Hai
Har Mehfil Me Ye Sajta Hai
Mere Maslak Ki Pechan Ya Rasoolallah

1: Tere Roze Te Awan Main Madine Sanu Sad Sohneya
2:
Tere Roze Te Awan Main,
Madine Sanu Sad Sohneya
Tere Sadqe Jawan Main,
Madine Sanu Sad Sohneya

Ponch Jawan Je Tere Dawar-E-Shaha
Sabz Gumbad De Wekhan Nazare Shaha
Mana Thandian Chawan Main
Madine Sanu Sad Sonhneya

Arzan Sun Gade Ajiz Kamine Diyan
Wekhan Raj Raj Ke Galiyan Madeene Diyan
Ro Ro Tarle Pawan Main
Madine Sanu Sad Sohneya

Ki Karan Kol Shae Nai Koi Wechan De Lai
Dil Bada Tarsda Roza Wekhan De Lai
Tarsda Mar Na Jawan Main
Madine Sanu Sad Sohneya

Madni Mahi Sajan Diyan Sun Zariyan
Beet Mudatan Gaiyan Aiyan Nai Wariyan
Aa Ke Arzan Sunawan Main
Madine Sanu Sad Sohneya

1: Tere Sadqe Mein Aaqa (Hasbi Rabbi Jallalallah)
2:
Hasbi Rabbi Jallalallah Mafee Qalbi Gayrullah
Noore Muhammad Sallalallah La Ilaha Illallah
Tere Sadqe Mein Aaqa Sare Jahan Ko Din Mila
Be Deenon Ne Kalma Pada La Ilaha Illallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallalallah Mafee Qalbi Gayrullah
Noore Muhammad Sallalallah La Ilaha Illallah

Simte Nabi Bu Jahal Gaya Aaqa Se Usne Ye Kaha
Gar Ho Nabi Batlao Zara Meri Muthi Me Hai Kya
Aaqa Ka Farman Hua Aur Fazle Rehman Hua
Muthi Se Pathar Bola La Ilaha Illallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallallah Maafi Qalbi Ghairullah
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah

Apni Bahen Se Bole Umar Yeh To Bata Kya Karti Thi
Mere Aane Se Pehle Kya Chupke Chupke Padti Thi
Bahen Ne Jab Quran Padha Sunke Qalam E Paak E Khuda
Dil Yeh Umar Ka Bol Utha La Ilaha Illallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallallah Maafi Qalbi Ghairullah
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah

Woh Joh Bilal E Habshi Hein Sarwar E Deen Ka Pyaara Hai
Duniya Ke Har Aashiq Ki Aankhon Ka Woh Taara Hai
Zulm Huwe Kitne Unpar Seene Pe Rakha Pathar
Fir Bhi Lab Pe Jaari Tha Lailaha Illalallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallallah Maafi Qalbi Ghairullah
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah

Mere Nabi Ke Ghulamo Ka Rutba Bara Hai Shaan Baree
Chahen Ghous-E-Azam Ho Ya Ho Data Hajveri
Yaad Nahi Tumhe Wo Manzar Khuwaja Ne Jab Qud Chal Kar
Nawwe (90) Lakh Ko Parhwaya La Ilaha Illallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallallah Maafi Qalbi Ghairullah
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah

Mere Maula Mere Khuda Tu Hi Khaliq Arzo Samaa
Tu Hi Malik Roz-E-Jazaa Mai Hoon Sarapa Jurm-O-Khata
Phir Bhi Tujse Hai Ye Dua Waqt-E-Naza Jab Aaye Mera
Lab Pe Ho Bas Ek Sadaa La Ilaha Illallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallallah Maafi Qalbi Ghairullah
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah

Duniya Ke Insan Sabhi Shirk O Bid’at Karte The
Rab Ke The Bande Fir Bhi Buth Ki Ibadat Karte The
Buth Khaane Hai Tharraye Mere Nabi Hai Jab Aaye
Kehne Lagi Makhlooq E Khuda La Ilaha Illallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallallah Maafi Qalbi Ghairullah
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah

Gulshan Kalma Padte Hai Chidiya Kalma Padti Hai
Duniya Ki Makhlooq Sabhi Zikr Khuda Ka Karti Hai
Kehte Sabhi Hai Jinn O Bashar Kehta Shajar Hai Kehta Hajar
Kehta Hai Patta Patta La Ilaha Illallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallallah Maafi Qalbi Ghairullah
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah

Mere Nabi Ka Hai Mukhda Chand Bhi Jis Par Hai Shayda
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah
Aap Ka Taiba Misle Jina Aur Paseena Mushk-O-Hina
Chaand Se Bhi Raoshan Talwa La Ilaha Illallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallallah Maafi Qalbi Ghairullah
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah

Pehle Musalmano Par Wo Zulm-O-Tashadud Karte The
Shere Rab Me Rehte The Par Boot Ki Ibadat Karte The
Ahle Kufar Ko Macca Se Bhaag Ne Ka Rasta Na Mila
Charo Taraf Jab Goonj Utha La Ilaha Illallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallallah Maafi Qalbi Ghairullah
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah

Kehne Laga Abu Jahal Ke Hum Kabe Me To Jate Hai
Boot Khane Me Mere Bhala Aap Kyun Nahi Aate Hai
Aap Ne Paak Khadam Ko Jab Boot Khane Me Tha Rakha
Bol Uthe Sab Jhoote Khuda La Ilaha Illallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallallah Maafi Qalbi Ghairullah
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah

Aap Waqar-E-Deen E Mubeen Aap Sa Aaqa Koi Nahi
Aap Ke Hi Hai Zair-E-Nadi Chahe Falak Ho Chahe Zameen
Aap Se Aalam Mehek Utha Khatm Hui Zulmat Ki Ghata
Bacha Bacha Kehne Laga La Ilaha Illallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallallah Maafi Qalbi Ghairullah
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah

Lab Par Naat-E-Paak Ka Naghma Kal Bhi Tha Aur Aaj Bhi Hai
Mere Nabi Se Mera Rishta Kal Bhi Tha Aur Aaj Bhi Hai
Aap Jo Aaye Duniya Me Kufr Ki Zulmat Door Hui
Noor Jahan Me Phelgaya La Ilaha Illallah

Hasbi Rabbi Jallallah Maafi Qalbi Ghairullah
Noor E Muhammad Sallallah La Ilaha Illallah

1: Teri Jaaliyoun Ke Niche
2:
Teri Jaaliyoun Ke Niche Teri Rehmatoun Ke Saaye
Jise Dekhni Ho Jannat, Wo Madina Dekh Aye

Lo Chala Houn Main Lahad Mein Mere Mustafa Se Keh Do
Ke Hawa Teri Gali Ki Mujhe Chorne To Aye

Roze Ke Samne Mein Ye Dua’aen Mangtha Tha
Meri Jaan Nikal To Jaye Ye Samaan Badal Na Jaye

Taiba Ko Jaane Wale Tujhe Deta Houn Dua’aen
Dar-E-Mustafa Pei Ja Kar To Jahan Ko Bhul Jaye

Kaisi Wahan Ki Raatein Kaisi Wahan Ki Baatein
Unnhe Poch’ Lo Nabi Ka Jo Madina Dekh Aye

Na Ye Baat Shaan Se Hai Naa Yee Baat Maal-O-Zar Ki
Wohi Jata Hai Madine Aqa Jisse Bulaye

Wahi Ghaam Ghusaar Mera Wo Zahoori Yaar Mera
Meri Qabar Par Jo Aa Ke Naat Nabi Sunaye

1: Teri Wehshaton Se Ae Dil Mujhe Kyun Na Aar Aaye
2:
Teri Wehshaton Se Ae Dil Mujhe Kyun Na Aar Aaye
Tu Unhi Se Door Bhage Jinhein Tujh Pe Pyaar Aaye

Dam-E-Iztirab Mujhko Jo Khayal-E-Yaar Aaye
Mere Dil Main Chain Aaye,to Isse Qarar Aaye

Na Habeeb Se Muhib Ka Kahin Aisa Pyaar Dekha
Woh Bane Khuda Ka Pyaara, Tumhen Jiss Pe Pyaar Aaye

Mujhe Kiya Ho Gham Alam Ka,mujhe Kiya Ho Gham Alam Ka
Ke Ila'aj Gham Alam Ka,mere Gham Gusa'ar Aaye

Jo Chaman Banaye Ban Ko, Jo Jina'a Kare Chaman Ko
Mere Baagh Main Ilahi, Kabhi Woh Baha'ar Aaye

Sabab-E-Gufoor-E-Rehmat Meri Bezubaniyan Hain
Na Fuga'an Ke Dhang Jaano'n, Na Mujhe Pukaar Aaye

Teri Rehmaton Se Kam Hain, Mere Jurm Iss Se Za'aid
Na Mujhe Hisaab Aaye,na Mujhe Shuma'ar Aaye

Tere Sadqe Jaaye Sha'aha Yeh Tera Zaleel Mangta
Woh Waqar Le Ke Jaaye Jo Zaleel-O-Khwar Aaye

Woh Kareem Hain Yeh Sarwar Ke Likha Howa Hai Dar Par
Ke Jisse Lene Hon Do Ala'am Woh Umeed Waar Aaye

Tere Dar Ke Hain Bhikari, Mile Khair Dam Ha Dam Ki
Tera Naam Sun Ke Da'ata, Hum Umeed Waar Aaye

1: Thandi Thandi Hawa Rehmatoon Ki Chali
2:
Thandi Thandi Hawa Rehmatoon Ki Chali
Ban Ke Mouj E Karam, Mustafa Aa Gaye.
Hal Meri Ho Gayein Khud Ba Khud Mushkalein
Saray Aalam Kay Mushkil Kusha Aa Gaye

Aagaye Aagaye Mustafa Aagaye…

Amina Ka Muqadar Sanwara Gaya
Goud Main Chand Jiski Utara Gaya
Hoor O Ghulman Salami Ko Jhuknay Lage
Partay Rizwan Salle Ala Aagaye.

Aagaye Aagaye Mustafa Aagaye…

Dono Aalam Ki Kismat Badalne Lagi
Noor Main Sari Konain Dhalne Lagi
Khush Muqadar Halima Mubarak Tujhe
Goud Mein Teri Khirul Wara Aagaye.

Aagaye Aagaye Mustafa Aagaye…

Ban Gayi Hai Zameen Rashk E Bagh E Jinnah
Sajh Gaye Asman Khil Utha Gul Sitan
Mang Lo Rehmatein Khol Lo Jholiyan
Denay Khairat Hajat Rawan Aagaye.

Aagaye Aagaye Mustafa Aagaye…

Aaj Koi Bhi Sa’im Na Khali Rahe
Sab Muradein Milein Har Musibat Talay
Madni Aaqa Ki Aamad Ka Sadqa Mile
Bheek Leney Ko Hum Ya Khuda Aagaye.

Aagaye Aagaye Mustafa Aagaye…

Thandi Thandi Hawa Rehmatoon Ki Chali
Ban Ke Mouj E Karam, Mustafa Aa Gaye.
Hal Meri Ho Gayein Khud Ba Khud Mushkalein
Saray Aalam Kay Mushkil Kusha Aa Gaye

Aagaye Aagaye Mustafa Aagaye…

1: There Was Merriment And Joy (Madinah Tun Nabi)
2:
There Was Merriment And Joy
A Smile On The Face Of Every Girl And Boy
The Streets Of Yathrib Welcomed In The Prophet Of Allah
Muhammad, Salla Allahu ‘alayhi Wa Sallim

A Full White Moon Shone Down Upon The Land
Rising From The Valley Between The Hills Of Sand
Being Grateful To Allah Was The Prophet’s Demand
Spreading Peace Through The Streets Of Madinah

Madinah Tun-Nabi! Madinah Tun-Nabi!

The City Of The Prophet Is Like Home To Me!
I’ll Travel Through The World, But I Doubt That I Will See
A City With Such Wonder As Madinah

Now The Narrow Winding Roads Are So Full Of History
Streets Shake With The Adhan From Masjid Un-Nabi
I Feel The Shadow Of The Prophet Gently Cooling Me
As I Walk Through The Streets Of Madinah

Madinah Tun-Nabi! Madinah Tun-Nabi!

The City Of The Prophet Is Like Home To Me!
I’ll Travel Through The World, But I Doubt That I Will See
A City With Such Wonder As Madinah

The Man Who Reads Qur’an ‘neath A Date Palm Tree
And The Smile From The Child On The Street Selling Tea
Enchant Me With Their Beauty And Their Simplicity
As I Walk Through The Streets Of Madinah

Madinah Tun-Nabi! Madinah Tun-Nabi!

The City Of The Prophet Is Like Home To Me!
I’ll Travel Through The World, But I Doubt That I Will See
A City With Such Wonder As Madinah

Al Madinatul Munawarah!
Oh Englightened City!

Al Madinatul Munawarah, Even In My Sleep You Call To Me!

Time Has Hurried By, Time Has Travelled On So Fast
And Though Wisdom And Truth Will Always Last
I Wish, I Wish, I Wish, That I Could Climb Into The Past…

…and Live With The Prophet In Madinah!

Madinah Tun-Nabi! Madinah Tun-Nabi!
The City Of The Prophet Is Like Home To Me!
I’ll Travel Through The World, But I Doubt That I Will See
A City With Such Wonder As Madinah

My Heart Is Never Far From The Home Of The Ansar
And The City Of The Prophet, Al-Madinah.

1: Thi Arsh Pe Ahmed Ki Rasayi Shabe Meraj
2:
Thi Arsh Pe Ahmed Ki Rasayi Shabe Meraj
Khaliq Ki Hui Jalwa Numayi Shabe Meraj

Kuch Aisi Hui Jalwa Numayi Shabe Meraj
Shaida Thi Muhammad Pe Khudayi Shabe Meraj

Jo Chaha Nabi Ne Kiya Manzoor Khuda Ne
Har Baat Muhammad Ki Ban Aayi Shabe Meraj

Saath Aana Sake Roohul Amee(N) Bhi To Waha Tak
Aaqa Ne Jaha Paayi Rasaayi Shabe Meraj

Aaqa The Imaam Aur Nabi Sab The Musalli
Ahmed Ne Namaaz Unko Padhayi Shabe Meraj

1: Tooba Mein Jo Sab Sey Oonchi Naazuk Seedhi Nikli Shaakh
2:
Tooba Mein Jo Sab Sey Oonchi Naazuk Seedhi Nikli Shaakh,
Maangun Naat E Nabi Likhne Ko Rooh E Quds Se Aysi Shaakh.

Mawla Gulbun Rahmat Zahra Sibtain Uski Kaliyan Phool,
Siddique O Farooq O Usman O Haidar Har Ek Uski Shaakh.

Shaakh E Qaamat Sheh Me Zulf O Chashm O Rukhsaar O Lab Main,
Sunbul Nargis Gul Pankhariyan Qudrat Ki Kya Phooli Shaakh.

Apne In Baaghon Ka Sadqa Woh Rahmat Ka Paani De,
Jis Sey Nakhl E Dil Mein Ho Paida Pyaare Teri Wilaa Ki Shaakh.

Yaad E Rukh Mein Aahein Kar Key Ban Mein Main Roya Aayi Bahaar,
Jhoomein Naseemein Nisaan Barsa Kaliyan Chatkein Mehki Shaakh.

Zaahir O Baatin Awwal O Aakhir Zeb E Faroo’ O Zain E Usool,
Bagh E Risaalat Mein Hay Tu Hi Gul Ghuncha Jar Patti Shaakh.

Aal E Ahmad Khuzbiyadi Yaa Sayyad E Hamza Kun Madadi,
Waqt E Khazaan E Umre E Raza Ho Barg E Huda Se Na Aari Shaakh

1: Tu Kuja Man Kuja
2:
Tu Kuja Man Kuja Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Tu Ameer-E-Haram Main Fakir-E-Ajam
Tere Gun Aur Ye Lab Main Talab Hi Talab
Tu Ata Hi Ata Tu Kuja Man Kuja
Tu Kuja Man Kuja Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Tu Kuja Man Kuja Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Ilham Hai Jama Tera
Qur’an Imaama Hai Tera
Mimbar Tera Arshe Bari
Ya Rehmatullil Aalameen

Tu Kuja Man Kuja Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Tu Haqeeqat Hai Main Sirf Ahsaas Hu
Tu Samandar Main Bhatkti Hui Pyaas Hu
Mera Ghar Khaak Par Aur Teri Reh Guzar
Sidratul Muntaha Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Tu Kuja Man Kuja Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Khairul Bashar Rutba Tera
Aawaaze Haq Khutba Tera
Aafaaq Tere Saame’een
Saais Gibreele Ameen
Ya Rehmatullil Aalameen

Tu Kuja Man Kuja Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Dagmaga Hoon Jo Halaat Kay Samnay
Aayay Tera Tasawr Mujhay Thamnay
Mairee Khush Kismati Main Tera Umati
Tu Jaza Main Raza Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Tu Kuja Man Kuja Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Tu Hai Ahram-E-Anwar Bandhay Huay
Main Duroodon Ki Dastar Bandhay Huay
Kaba-E-Ishq Tu Main Tere Charsu
Tu Asr Main Dua Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Tu Kuja Man Kuja Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Duriaan Saamnay Say Jo Hathnay Lageen
Jalioon Say Nigahain Lipatnay Lageen
Aansoonoon Ki Zuban Ho Mairee Tarjuman
Dil Say Niklay Sada Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Tu Kuja Man Kuja Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Maira Har Saans To Khoon Nichorhay Maira
Tairee Rehmat Magar Dil Na Toorhay Maira
Kasa-E-Zaat Hoon Tere Khairaat Hoon
Tu Sakhi Main Gada Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Tu Kuja Man Kuja Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Tu Ameer-E-Haram Main Fakir-E-Ajam
Tere Gun Aur Ye Lab Mein Talab Hi Talab
Tu Ata Hi Ata Main Khata Hi Khata
Tu Kuja Man Kuja Tu Kuja Man Kuja

Tu Kuja Man Kuja Tu Kuja Man Kuja

1: Tu Shamme Risalat Hain
2:
Tu Shamme Risalat Hain A’alam Tera Parwana
Tu Mahe Nubuvvat Hain Ay Jalwa E Janana

Jo Saaqi E Kausar Ke Chehre Se Nikaab Uththe
Har Dil Bane Maikhana Har Aankh Ho Paymana

Dil Apna Chamak Utthe Imaan Ki Tal'at Se
Kar Aankhein Bhi Noorani Ay Jalwa E Jaanana

Kyu Zulfe Muambar Se Kooche Na Mahak Uthe
He Panja Qudrat Jab Zulfo Ka Tere Shaana

Tum Aye Chati Baazi Ronak Huwi Phir Taazi
Kaaba Hua Phir Kaaba Kar Daala Tha Butt Khana

Peete Hain Tere Dar Ka, Khate Hain Tere Dar Ka
Pani Hain Tera Pani, Dana Hain Tera Dana

Sarshar Ise Kar De Ik Jaam E Labalab Se
Taa Hashr Rahe Saaqi Aabad Ye Maikhana

Is Darr Ki Huzoori Hi Isyan Ki Dawa Thahri
Hai Zehre Ma Aasi Ka Taibah Hi Shifa Khaana

Har Phool Me Boo Teri Har Sham-A Me Zao Teri
Bulbul Hai Tera Bulbul Parwaana Hai Parwaana

Duniya Mein Hume Tum Ne Jab Apna Banaaya Hai
Mehshar Me Bhi Keh Dena Yeh Hai Mera Deewana

Gir Pad Ke Yaha Pohcha, Mar Mar Ke Ise Paya
Chute Na Ilahi Ab, Sange Dare Jaana Na

Sange Dare Jaana Hain, Thokar Na Lage Kisko
Ay Kash Wo Sun Lete, Mujhse Mera Afsana

Sange Dare Jaana Par, Karta Hu Jabee Sayi
Sajda Na Samajh Najdi, Sar Deta Hu Nazrana

Woh Kehte Na Kehte Kuch Woh Karte Na Karte Kuch
Ay Kash Wo Sunn Lete Mujh Se Mera Afsana

Sarkaar Ke Jalwon Se, Roushan Hain Dile Noori
Ta Hashr Rahe Roshan, Noori Ke Ye Kaash Aana

1: Tum Chalo Hum Chale Sab Madine Chale
2:
Tum Chalo Hum Chale Sab Madine Chale
Jaanibe Taiba Sab Ke Safeene Chale

Maikashon Aao Aao Madine Chale
Baadaye Khuld Ke Jaam Peene Chale

Zindagi Ab Sare Zindagi Aa Gayi
Aakhri Waqt Hai Ab Madine Chale

Unki Shaane Karam Ki Kashish Dekhiye
Kaasa Le Kar Kaha Khusraweene Chale

Jee Gaya Woh Madine Mein Jo Mar Gaya
Aao Hum Bhi Waha Mar Ke Jeene Chale

Khaake Taiba Mein Apni Jagah Ho Gayi
Khoob Muzda Sunaaya Khushi Ne Chale

Raahe Taiba Mein Jab Naatawaan Reh Gaye
Dil Ko Kheencha Kaha Be Kalee Ne Chale

Agle Pichle Sabhi Khuld Mein Chal Diye
Roze Mehshar Kaha Jab Nabi Ne Chale

Be Takalluf Shahe Do Jahan Chaldiye
Sadagi Sai Kaha Jab Kisi Nai Chale

Akhtar E Khasta Bhi Khuld Mai Chal Diya
Jab Sadaa Di Use Murshidi Ne Chale

1: Tum Ko Mai Kya Batau Taiba Nagar Me Kya Hai
2:
Tum Ko Mai Kya Batau Taiba Nagar Me Kya Hai
Bakhshish Karam Ataa Hai Har Dard Ki Dawa Hai

Mangta Ka Haat Uthne Se Pehle Hi Diya Hai
Jo Manga Maine Unse Us Se Siwa Mila Hai

Manzaara Qabri Us Par Waajib Meri Shafa’at
Muzda Yeh Mustafa Ne Kya Khoob Hi Diya Hai

Taiba Ki Har Gali Me Khusboo Basi Hai Unki
Har Ek Gul Yaha Ka Dulha Bana Huwa Hai

Baadal Umad Ke Aaye Jal Thul Huwa Madina
Rehmat Ka Ek Ishara Aaqa Ne Jab Diya Hai

Hai Qiblatain Me Woh Ulfat Ka Raaz Wallah
Qibla Wahi Hai Jisme Mehboob Ki Raza Hai

Qadmain Me Joh Baitha Khudse Hi Poochta Hai
Jannat Yeh Gar Nahi Hai Batlao Aur Kya Hai

Sarkar Fir Bulana Jaisa Bhi Hu Nibhana
Yeh Aaj Waqt E Rukhsat Rizwan Ki Duwa Hai

1: Tum Pe Qurbaan Bulaane Waale
2:
Tum Pe Qurbaan Bulaane Waale
Bakhte Khufta Ko Jagaane Waale

Naar E Dozakh Ka Nahin Khauf Mujhe
Woh Salaamat Hai Bachaane Waale

Koi Pooche Yaa Na Pooche Mujhko
Shaah E Taiba Hai Nibhaane Waale

Garmi – E – Hashr Se Ghabraaye Kyun
Woh Hai Daaman Mein Chupaane Waale

Tere Sadqe Me Meyri Baat Bani
Khoty Sikke Ke Chalaane Waale

Kaif Jannat Ka Milaa Dar Pe Tere
Kyaari Jannat Ki Dikhaane Waale

De Ke Lena Nahi Aadat Teri
Mujhko Jannat Me Bithaane Waale

Hai Mareezon Ki Shifaa Na’at E Nabi
Woh He Burdah Ke Urhaane Waale

Sharbat E Deed Pilaado Aaqa
Jaam E Kausar Ke Pilaane Waale

Ilm E Naaf’i Ki Mile Bheek Mujhe
Rab Ki Ne’mat Ke Lutaane Waale

Hogayi Qabr Munawwar Meri
Rukh E Anwar Ke Dikhaane Waale

Ho Gayi Phir Se Mayassar Chowkhat
Mujhko Qadmon Me Bithaane Waale

Ban Gaye Mere Yahaan Bigde Kaam
Tum Ho Roton Ko Hansaane Waale

Kufr Kaafir Se Chutaa Mulk E Hijaaz
Sham’e Tauheed Jilaane Waale

Phir Chalaa Hoon Main Watan Ki Jaanib
Jald Bulwaana Bulaane Waale

Shakir E Razvi Pe Hai Khaas Karam
Kehte Hai Ab To Zamaane Waale

1: Tumhara Naam Musibat Mein Jab Liya Hoga
2:
Tumhara Naam Musibat Mein Jab Liya Hoga
Hamara Bigda Huwa Kaam Bann Gaya Hoga

Gunahgaar Pe Jab Lutf Aapka Hoga
Kiya Bagair Kiya Be-Kiya Kiya Hoga

Khuda Ka Lutf Huwa Hoga Dastageer Zaroor
Jo Girte Girte Tera Naam Le Liya Hoga

Dikhayi Jayegi Mehshar Mein Shaan E Mehboobi
Ke Aap Hi Ki Khushi Aapka Kaha Hoga

Khuda E Paak Ki Chahenge Agle Pichle Khushi
Khuda E Paak Khushi Unki Chahta Hoga

Kisi Ke Paanv Ki Bedi Ye Kaat-Te Honge
Koyi Aseer E Gham Unko Pukarta Hoga

Kisi Taraf Se Sada Aayegi Huzoor Aao
Nahi To Damm Mein Ghareebo Ka Faysla Hoga

Kisi Ke Palle Pe Ye Honge Waqt E Wazn E Amal
Koyi Ummeed Se Muh Unnka Tak Raha Hoga

Koyi Kahega Duhayi Hai Ya Rasoolallah
To Koyi Thaam Ke Daman Machal Gaya Hoga

Kisi Ko Le Ke Chalenge Firishte Suwe Jaheem
Woh Unka Raasta Phir Phir Ke Dekhta Hoga

Shikashta Pa Hu Mere Haal Ki Khabar Kar Do
Koyi Kisi Ye Ro Ro Ke Keh Raha Hoga

Khuda Ke Waaste Jald Unse Arz E Haal Karo
Kise Khabar Hai Ke Damm Bhar Mein Haaye Kya Hoga

Pakad Ke Haath Koyi Haal E Dil Sunayega
To Ro Ke Qadmo(N) Se Koyi Lipat Gaya Hoga

Zaban Sukhi Dikha Kar Koyi Lab E Kausar
Janaab E Paak Ke Qadmo Pe Gir Gaya Hoga

Nishaan E Khushrave Di Door Ki Ghulamo Ko
Liwaye Hamd Ka Parcham Bata Raha Hoga

Koyi Qareeb E Tarazu Koyi Lab E Kausar
Koyi Siraat Se Unko Pukaarta Hoga

Ye Beqaraar Karegi Sadaa Ghareebo Ki
Muqaddas Aankhon Se Taar Ashq Ka Bandha Hoga

Wo Paak Dil Ke Nahi Jisko Apna Andesha
Hujoom E Fiqr O Taraddud Mein Ghir Gaya Hoga

Hazaar Jaan Fida Narm Narm Pau Se
Pukaar Sun Ke Aseero(N) Ki Daudta Hoga

Azeez Bachhe Ko Maa(N) Jis Tarah Talaash Kare
Khuda Gawah Wahi Haal Aapka Hoga

Khudayi Bhar Inhi Haathon Ko Dekhti Hogi
Zamana Bhar Inhi Qadmo(N) Pe Laut-Ta Hoga

Bani Hai Damm Pe Duhayi Hai Taaj Waale Ki
Ye Ghul Ye Shour Ye Hungame Ja-Ba-Ja Hoga

Maqaam Faasilo(N) Par Kaam Mukhtalif Itne
Ye Din Zuhoor E Kamaal E Huzoor Ka Hoga

Kahenge Aur Nabi 'iz Habu Ila Gayri'
Mere Huzoor Ke Lab Par 'ana Laha' Hoga

Dua E Ummate Badkaar Wird E Lab Hogi
Khuda Ke Saamne Sajdeh Mein Sarr Jhuka Hoga

Ghulam Unki Inayat Se Chayn Mein Honge
Aduu Huzoor Ka Aafat Mein Mubtala Hoga

Main Unke Dar Ka Bhikari Hu Fazl E Maula Se
Hasan Faqeer Ka Jannat Mein Bistara Hoga

1: Tumhare Joodo Karam Ka Koi Hisaab Nahi
2:
Tumhare Joodo Karam Ka Koi Hisaab Nahi
Tumhare Husn Ka Jag Me Koi Jawaab Nahi

Ataa Kiya Jo Khuda Ne Tumhe Mere Aaqa
Yaqeenan Uski Tarah Aur Koi Kitaab Nahi

Tumhare Qadmon Me Dono Jahaan Ki Behbood
Tumhare Dar Se Phira Jo Wo Kaamyaab Nahi

Tumhi Habeeb Ho Rab Ke Tumhe Chuna Rab Ne
Tumhari Misl Shaha Koi Intekhaab Nahi

Tumhare Dar Pe Mila Phir Se Haziri Ka Sharaf
Sukoon Zahn Me Hai Dil Me Izteraab Nahi

Magar Ye Kooch Ka Manzar To Hai Qayamat Khaiz
Ke Aankhen Nam Hain Aur Is Dil Ko Ab Hai Taab Nahi

Jo Apni Jaame Jam Aankhon Se Wo Pilate Hain
Jahaa Me Uski Tarah To Koi Sharaab Nahi

Karaya Deed Unhe Jaagte Me Aaqa Ne
Raza Ke Ishq O Mahabbat Ka Koi Jawab Nahi

Shifa Ali Ko Ho Aashobe Chashm Se Fauran
Luaabe Aaqa Ke Jaisa Koi Luaab Nahi

Jo Chashma Aaqa Ki Ungli Se Ho Gaya Jari
Jahaan Me Us Ki Tarah Aur Koi Aab Nahi

Ghulamiye Shahe Kaunain Me Jo Milta Hai
Kisi Bhi Kaam Me Aisa Koi Sawaab Nahi

Unhi Ka Noor Hai Maaho Fataab Me Shakir
Hai Jag Me Kuun Jo Is Dar Se Faizyaab Nahi

1: Tumhare Zarre Ke Partau Sitaarhaye Falak
2:
Tumhare Zarre Ke Partau Sitaarhaye Falak
Tumhare Na’al Ki Naqis Misal Ziyaae Falak

Agarche Chaale Sitaro Se Pad Gaye Laakhon
Magar Tumhari Talab Me Thake Na Paaye Falak

Sare Falak Na Kabhi Taab Aastaa(N) Pahucha
Ki Ibtidaaye Bulandi Thi Intihaaye Falak

Ye Mitke Unki Ravish Par Hua Khud Unki Ravish
Ki Nakshe Paaye Zamee(N) Par Na Saute Paaye Falak

Tumhari Yaad Me Guzri Thi Jaagte Shab Bhar
Chali Naseem, Hue Band Deedhaaye Falak

Na Jaag Utthe Kahi(N) Ahle Baqi Kachchi Neend
Chala Ye Narm Na Nikli Sadaye Paaye Falak

Ye Unke Jalwe Ne Ki(N) Garmiya(N) Shabe Asra
Ki Jab Se Charkh Mein Hain Nuqra-O Tilaaye Falak

Mere Gani Ne Jawahir Se Bhar Diya Daaman
Gaya Jo Kaasaye Mah Le Ke Shab Gadaaye Falak

Raha Jo Qaane-A Yak Naane Sokhta Din Bhar
Mili Huzoor Se Kaane Guhar Jazaaye Falak

Tajammule Shabe Asra Abhi Simat Na Chuka
Ki Jab Se Waise Hi Kotal Hain Sabzhaaye Falak

Khitabe Haq Bhi Hai Dar Baabe Khalq Min Ajalik
Agar Idhar Se Dame Hamd Hai Sadaaye Falak

Ye Ahle Bait Ki Chakki Se Chaal Seekhi Hai
Rawaa(N) Hai Be Madade Dast Aasitaaye Falak

Raza Ye Naate Nabi Ne Bulandiya(N) Bakhshi
Laqab 'zameene Falak' Ka Hua 'samaaye Falak'

1: Tumhari Hi Chaukhat Mera Ek Sahara
2:
Tumhari Hi Chaukhat Mera Ek Sahara
Tumhare Hi Tukdo Mein Mera Guzara

Bhawar Mein Phasi Hai Ye Ummat Ki Kashti
Ata Kardo Isko Khudara Kinara

Mitey Dam Zadan Mein Mere Saare Iseeya
Agar Aap Ek Baar Kardo Ishaara

Mujhe Haath Uthhane Se Pehle Mila Hai
Tumhi Ne Shaha Haal Mera Sawara

Mujhe Kaash Aaye Mayyesar Wo Lamha
Karu Main Shahe Ambiya Ka Nazara

Guzaru Umar Khidmat E Deen Mein Ya Rab
Karu Jaan O Dil Deen Ki Khatir Nisaara

Mile Gar Madine Mein Do Gaz Zameen To
Main Kar Bathu Saare Jaha Se Kinara

Dam E Wapsi Jab Madine Mein Pohchu
Na Lautu Main Su E Watan Phir Dobara

Mere Mustafa Ab Karam Ki Nazar Ho
Khada Hai Ye Chaukhat Pe Shakir Tumhara

1: Uchiyan Ne Shaana Sarkaar Diyan
2:
Uchiyan Ne Shaana Sarkaar Diyan,
Sohne Man Mohne Manthaar
Saare Nabi Ne Mere Nabi Toun,
Thalle Thalle Mere Nabi Diyan Shaanan Balle Balle

Rab Sohne Ne Ay Kainat Banayi Ai
Yaar Di Khathir Saari Kaydh Rachai Ai
Ghallan Bathan Saariyan Nai Piyar Diyan
Sohne Man Mohne Manthaar Diyan
Saare Nabi Ne Mere Nabi Toun,
Thalle Thalle Mere Nabi Diyan Shaanan Balle Balle

Mere Te Vi Keeta Karam Da Saya Ay,
Main Je Mandre Nu Vi Seenai Laya Ay
Lajpaaliyan Ne Sarkaar Diyan
Uchiyan Nay Shaanan Sarkaar Diyan
Saare Nabi Ne Mere Nabi Toun,
Thalle Thalle Mere Nabi Diyan Shaanan Balle Balle

Allah Di Rehmat Da Baddal Warya Ay,
Mahe Rabi Ul Awwal Da Chand Chareya Ay
Ruthan Aiyan Jagh Te Bahaar Diyan
Sohne Man Mohne Manthaar Diyan
Saare Nabi Ne Mere Nabi Toun,
Thalle Thalle Mere Nabi Diyan Shaanan Balle Balle

Jagh Saara Audi Aal De Sadke Pal Da Ai,
Har Paasse Panjtan Da Langhar Chal Da Ay
Lagiyan Nay Maujan Sansaar Diyan,
Sohne Man Mohne Manthaar Diyan
Saare Nabi Ne Mere Nabi Toun,
Thalle Thalle Mere Nabi Diyan Shaanan Balle Balle

1: Ummataan O Siyaah Kaarehaa
2:
Door Az Kooye Saahib-E-Kausar,
Chashm Daarad Che Ashkbaarehaa.

Dar Firaaq-E-Tu Yaa Rasoolallah,
Seenah Daarad Che Bey Qaraarehaa.

Zulmat Aabaad-E-Gowr Raushan Shud,
Daagh-E-Dil Raast Noor Baarehaa.

Che Kunad Nafs Pardah Dar Mawlaa,
Choon Tooyi Garm-E-Pardah Daarehaa.

Sag-E-Kooye Nabi-O-Yak Nak-Hey,
Man-O-Taa Hashr Jaan Nisaarehaa.

Saufa Yu’teeka Rabbuka Tardaa,
Haq Namoodat Che Paasdaarehaa.

Daaram Aay Gul Bayaad-E-Zulf-O-Rakht,
Sahar-O-Shaam Aah-O-Zaarehaa.

Taa Zeh Lutf-E-Tou Bar Raza Har Dam,
Marham-E-Kuhnah Dil Figaarehaa.

1: Unki Jaame Jam Aankhen Sheesha Hai Badan Mera
2:
Unki Jaame Jam Aankhen Sheesha Hai Badan Mera
Unki Band Mutthii Me Saara Baakpan Mera

Arze Gang Meri Hai Khittaye Jaman Mera
Mai Gulame Khwaja Hu Hind Hai Watan Mera

Aashiqe Nabi Hu Mai Warise Ali Hu Mai
Maila Ho Na Payega Hashr Tak Kafan Mera

Naate Mustafa Kehna Naate Mustafa Sunna
Mujhko Bakshwayega Haa Yahi Chalan Mera

Hashr Me Nida Hogi Yeh Gulam Kiska Hai
Mujh Ko Dekhe Aur Kehde Ya Shahe Zaman Mera

Arsh Jhoom Jhoom Utha Qudsiyo Ko Wajd Aaya
Naate Mustafa Me Jab Khul Gaya Dahan Mera

Taaqe Dil Pe Rakhi Hai Shamma Ishqe Ahmed Ki
Noor Ki Shuaon Se Bhar Gaya Hai Man Mera

Aap Chahe Ho Jaaye Saari Mushkile Aasan
Aap Chahe Mit Jaaye Ranj Aur Mihan Mera

Lamha Lamha Yaad Unki Saans Saans Zikr Unka
Haan Yahi To Rehta Hai Aaj Kal Jatan Mera

Maine Saare Kaam Apne Mustafa Ko Saupe Hai
Kya Bigaad Payega Daure Pur Fitan Mera

Waqfe Zikre Ahmed Ho Ta Abad Qalam Ya Rab
Hashr Tak Rahe Jaari Chashma E Sukhan Mera

Azmate Mere Aage Sajda Rez Ho Jaye
Unke Dar Se Choo Jaye Kash Pairahan Mera

Kab Talak Duhayi Doon Bekasi Ke Aalam Me
Bhagya Kab Sanwarenge Paak Panjatan Mera

Hashr Me Taraazu Par Tole Jayenge Aamal
Kaam Aahi Jayega Naat Ka Ye Fan Mera

Arsh Se Pare Jaakar Mustafa Ne Batlaya
Ye Zamee Bhi Meri Hai Aur Hai Gagan Mera

Gulshane Madina Se Nazmi Mujh Ko Nisbat Hai
Ek Ek Kali Meri Gul Mera Chaman Mera

1: Unki Lagan Dil Me Basaenge
2:
Unki Lagan Dil Me Basaenge
Nabi Nabi Kehte Madina Chale Jayenge
Naato Ki Mehfil Sajaenge
Nabi Nabi Kehte Madina Chale Jayenge

Ek Din Chalegi Gulamo Ki Toli
Salle Ala Salle Ala Ki Hogi Booli
Naat E Nabi Hum Gungunaenge
Nabi Nabi Kehte Madina Chale Jayenge

Aaqa Ke Shehr Me Khajuro Ki Chao Me
Dil Kash Havao Me Muatar Fazao Me
Chota Sa Ek Ghar Banaenge
Nabi Nabi Kehte Madina Chale Jayenge

Khusiyo Ke Ja Hai Koi Gham Nahi Hai
Taiba Nagar Khuld Se Kam Nahi Hai
Zam Zam Se Har Ghadi Nahaenge
Nabi Nabi Kehte Madina Chale Jayenge

Taiba Nagar Ke Kash Hum Ho Kabutar
Minaar O Gumbad Hamara Jo Ho Ghar
Roze Ka Phira Lagaenge
Nabi Nabi Kehte Madina Chale Jayenge

Parwaz Ko Baal O Par De De Ya Rab
Naat Padhne Ka Hunar De Ya Rab
Aaqa Ko Jakar Sunaenge
Nabi Nabi Kehte Madina Chale Jayenge

Ek Roz Dundhegi Rehmat Bahana
Apna Bhi Palte Ga Raahi Zamana
Dil Ki Lagi Dar Par Bujhaenge
Nabi Nabi Kehte Madina Chale Jayenge

1: Unki Mahak Ne Dil Ke Gunche Khila Diye Hai
2:
Unki Mahak Ne Dil Ke Gunche Khila Diye Hai
Jis Raah Chal Diye Kunche Basa Diye Hai.

Jab Aa Gayi Hai Joshe Rehmat Per Unki Ankhen
Jalte Buja Diye Hai, Rote Hansa Diye Hai.

Ek Dil Hamara Kya Hai, Aazaar Uska Kitna
Tumne To Chalte Phirte Murde Jila Diye Hai.

Unke Nisar Koi Kaisi Hi Ranj May Ho
Jab Yaad Aa Gaye Hai Sab Gam Bhoola Diye Hai.

Humse Faqir Bhi Abb Feri Ko Oothte To Honge,
Abb To Gani Ke Dar Pe Bistar Jama Diye Hai.

Asra May Guzre Jis Dam Baide Pe Qudsiyo Ke
Hone Lagi Salami Parcham Jhooka Diye Hai.

Aane Do Ya Doobo Do Abb To Tumhari Jaanib
Kasti Tumhi Pe Chhodi Lanagr Ootha Diye Hai.

Dulha Se Itna Keh Do Pyare Sawari Roko
Mushkil May Hai Baraati Purkhaar Wadiye Hai.

Allah Kya Jahannam Abb Na Shard Hoga
Ro Ro Ke Mustafa Ne Dariya Baha Diye Hai.

Mere Karim Se Gar Khatra Kisi Ne Manga
Dariye Baha Diye Hai Dur Be Baha Diye Hai

Mulke Shuqan Ke Shahi Tumko Raza Mussllam
Jis Simt Aa Gaye Ho Sikke Bitha Diya Hai

1: Utha Do Parda Dikha Do Chehra Ke Noore Baari Hijab Me Hai
2:
Utha Do Parda Dikha Do Chehra Ke Noore Baari Hijab Me Hai
Zamana Taarik Ho Raha Hai Ki Mehr Kab Se Nikaab Me Hai

Nahi Wo Meethi Nigaah Waala Khuda Ki Rehmat Hai Jalwa Farma
Ghazab Se Unke Khuda Bachaye Jalaal E Baari Etaab Me Hai

Jali-Jali Bu Se Uski Paida Hai Sozish E Ishqe Chashme-Wala
Kabaabe Aahu Me Bhi Na Paaya Maza Jo Dil Ke Kabaab Me Hai

Unhi Ki Bu Maya E Saman Hai Unhi Ka Jalwa Chaman Chaman Hai
Unhi Se Ghulshan Mehek Rahe Hai Unhi Ki Rangat Ghulab Me Hai

Teri Julu Me Hai Maahe Taibah Hilaal Har Margo Zindagi Ka
Hayaat Jaa(N) Ka Rikab Me Hai Mamaate A'ada Ka Daab Me Hai

Siy(A)h Libasane Daare Duniya Wa Sabz-Poshane Arshe Aala
Har Ik Hai Unke Karam Ka Pyasa Ye Faiz Unki Janaab Me Hai

Wo Ghul Hai Lub-Haye Naazuk Unke Hazaaro Jhadte Hai Phool Jinse
Ghulab Ghulshan Me Dekhe Bulbul Ye Dekh Ghulshan Gulaab Me Hai

Jali Hai Soze Jigar Se Jaa(N) Tak Hai Taalib E Jalwa E Mubarak
Dikha Do Wo Lab Ki Aab E Haiwa(N) Ka Lutf Jinke Khitaab Me Hai

Khade Hai Munkar Nakeer Sarr Par Na Koi Haami Na Koi Yaavar
Bata Do Aakar Mere Payamabar Ki Sakht Mushkil Jawab Me Hai

Khuda E Kahhar Hai Ghazab Par Khule Hai Badd-Kariyo(N) Ke Daftar
Bacha Lo Aa Kar Shafe'e Mehshar Tumhara Banda Azaab Me Hai

Kareem Aisa Mila Ki Jiske Khule Hai Haath Aur Bhare Khazane
Batao Ay Mufliso Ki Fir Kyu Tumhara Dil Izterab Me Hai

Gunah Ki Tareekiya Ye Chayi Umad Ke Kaali Ghata-E Aayi
Khuda Ke Khursheed Mehr Farma Ki Zarra Bas Ijteraab Me Hai

Kareem Apne Karam Ka Sadqa La-Eeme Be Qadr Ko Na Sharma
Tu Aur Raza Se Hisaab Lena Raza Bhi Koi Hisaab Me Hai

1: Wah Kya Joodo Karam Hain
2:
Wah Kya Joodo Karam Hain Shahe Bat-Ha Tera
Nahi Sunta Hi Nahi Maangne Waala Tera

Dhaare Chalte Hain Ataa Ke Wo Hain Qatra Tera
Tare Khilte Hain Sakhaa Ke Wo Hain Zar-Ra Tera

Faiz Hain Ya Shahe Tasneem Nirala Tera
Aap Pyaso Ke Tajas-Sus Me Hain Dariya Tera

Agniyan Palte Hain Dar Se Wo Hain Bada Tera
Asfiya Chalte Hain Sar Se Wo Hain Rasta Tera

Farsh Waale Teri Shaukat Ka Uloo Kya Jaane
Khusrava Arsh Pe Udta Hain Pharera Tera

Aasmaan Khwan, Zameen Khwan Zamana Mehmaan
Sahibe Khana Laqab Kiska Hain Tera Tera

Main To Maalik Hi Kahunga Ke Ho Maalik E Habeeb
Ya’ani Mehboobo Muheeb Me Nahi Mera Tera

Tere Qadmo Me Jo Hain Ghair Ka Muh Kya Dekhe
Kaun Nazro Pe Chadhe Dekh Ke Talwa Tera

Bahre Sa-Il Ka Hu Sa-Il Na Kuwe Ka Pyasa
Khud Bujha Jaye Kaleja Mera Cheeta Tera

Chor Haakim Se Chupa Karta Hain Ya Uske Khilaf
Tere Daamam Me Chupe Chor Anokha Tera

Aankhein Thandi Ho Jigar Taze Ho Jaan-E-Sairaab
Sachhe Suraj Wo Dil-Aara Hai Ujala Tera

Dil Abas Khauf Se Patta Sa Uda Jaata Hai
Palla Halka Sahi Bhari Hai Bharosa Tera

Aik Main Kya Mere Isyaan Ki Haqeeqat Kitni
Mujhse Sau Laakh Ko Kaafi Hain Ishara Tera

Muft Paala Tha Kabhi Kaam Ki Aadat Na Padee
Ab Amal Poochte Hain Haaye Nikamma Tera

Tere Tukdo Se Pale Ghair Ki Thokar Pe Na Daal
Jhidkiya Khaaye Kaha Chor Ke Sadqa Tera

Khwaro Bimaro Khatavaro Gunahgaar Hu Main
Rafe’ao Nafe’ao Shafe’a Lakab Aaqa Tera

Meri Taqdeer Buri Ho To Bhali Karde Ki Hain
Mahwo Isbaat Ke Daftar Me Kadoda Tera

Tu Jo Chahe To Abhi Mayl Mere Dil Ke Dhule
Ke Khuda Dil Nahi Karta Kabhi Mayla Tera

Kiska Muh Takiye Kaha Jaiye Kis Se Kahiye
Tere Hi Qadmo Pe Mitt Jaye Yeh Paala Tera

Tu Ne Islam Diya Aaqa Tu Ne Jama’at Me Liye
Tu Kareem Ab Koi Phirta Hain Atiyya Tera

Maut Sunta Hu Sitam Talkh Hain Jahraaba-E Nab
Kaun La De Mujhe Talwo Ka Ghusala Tera

Door Kya Janiye Bad-Kaar Pe Kaise Guzre
Tere Hi Dar Pe Mare Be-Kaso Tanha Tera

Tere Sadqe Mujhe Ik Boond Bohat Hain Teri
Jis Din Achho Ko Mila Jam Chalakta Tera

Haram-O-Taibah Wa Baghdad Jidhar Kije Nigah
Jyot Padti Hain Teri Noor Hain Chanta Tera

Teri Sarkaar Me Laata Hain Raza Usko Shafe’a
Jo Mera Ghous Hain Aur Laadla Beta Tera

----------------- Other -----------------
---------------- Version ----------------

Koi Duniya E Ata Me Nahi Hamta Tera
Ho Jo Hatim Ko Mayassar Ye Nazara Tera
Keh Uthe Dekh Ke Bakhshish Me Ye Rutba Tera
Wah Kya Joodo Karam Hai Shahe Batha Tera
Nahi Sunta Hi Nahi Mangne Wala Tera.

Kuch Bashar Hone Ke Naate Tujhe Khud Sa Jaane
Aur Kuch Mahaz Payaami Hi Khuda Ka Jaane
Inki Aukaat Hi Kya Hai Ke Ye Itna Jaane
Farsh Wale Teri Shaukat Ka Uloo Kya Jaane
Kusrawa Arsh Pe Udta Hai Pharera Tera.

Kai Pushton Se Ghulami Ka Ye Rishta Hai Bahaal
Yahi Tifli Aur Jawaani Ke Bitaaye Maho Saal
Ab Budhape Me Khudara Hume Yoon Dar Se Na Taal
Tere Tukdon Pe Pale Ghair Ki Thokar Pe Na Daal
Jhidkiya Khaaye Kaha Chchod Ke Sadqa Tera.

Ghame Dauran Se Ghabraiye To Kisse Kahiye
Ab Apni Uljhan Kise Batlaiye Kisse Kahiye
Cheer Kar Dil Kise Dikhlaiye Kisse Kahiye
Kiska Muh Takiye Kaha Jaaiye Kisse Kahiye
Tere Hi Qadmon Pe Mit Jaaye Ye Paala Tera.

Nazre Ushshaqe Nabi Hai Ye Mera Harfe Ghareeb
Mimbare Waaz Pe Ladte Rahe Aapas Me Khateeb
Ye Aqeeda Rahe Allah Kare Mujh Ko Naseeb
Mai To Maalik Hi Kahunga Ke Ho Maalik Ke Habeeb
Yani Mehboobo Muhib Me Nahi Mera Tera.

Tujh Se Har Chand Woh Hai Qadro Fazaail Me Rafee'
Kar Naseer Aaj Magar Fikre Raza Ki Tausee'
Paas Hai Uske Shafa'at Ka Waseela Bhi Waqee'
Teri Sarkar Me Laata Hai Raza Usko Shafee'
Jo Mera Gaus Hai Aur Laadla Beta Tera.

1: Wasf Kya Likhe Koi Us Mahbatey Anwaar Ka
2:
Wasf Kya Likhe Koi Us Mahbatey Anwaar Ka
Mehro Mah Me Jalwa Hai Jis Chand Se Rukhsar Ka

Arshe Aazam Pe Pharera Hai Shahe Abraar Ka
Bajta Hai Kaunain Me Danka Mere Sarkaar Ka

Do Jahaan Me Bat’ta Hai Baada Usi Sarkaar Ka
Dono Aalam Paate Hain Sadqa Usi Darbaar Ka

Jaari Hai Atho Pahar Langar Saqi Darbaar Ka
Faiz Par Har Dam Hai Dariya Ahmade Mukhtaar Ka

Rozaye Waala E Taiba Makhzane Anwaar Hai
Kya Kahu Aalam Me Tujh Se Jalwa Gaahe Yaar Ka

Dil Hai Kiska Jaan Kiski Sab Ke Maalik Hai Wohi
Dono Aalam Par Hai Qabza Ahmade Mukhtaar Ka

Faq Ho Chehra Mehro Mah Ka Aise Muh Ke Samne
Jis Ko Qismat Se Mile Bosa Teri Paizaar Ka

Laat Mari Tumne Duniya Par Agar Tum Chahate
Silsila Sone Ka Hota Silsila Kohsaar Ka

Main Teri Rehmat Ke Qurban Aye Mere Amno Amaan
Koi Bhi Pursa Nahi Hai Mujh Se Bad Kirdaar Ka

Hai Ma'asi Had Se Bahar Phir Bhi Zahid Gham Nahi
Rehmate Alam Ki Ummat Banda Hoon Ghaffar Ka

Tu Hai Rehmat Baabe Rehmat Tera Darwaaza Hua
Saaya E Fazle Khuda Saaya Teri Deewaar Ka

Kaaba O Aqsa O Arsh O Khuld Hai Noorie Magar
Hai Niraala Sab Se Aalam Jalwa Gaahe Yaar Ka

1: Wasfe Rukh Unka Kiya Karte Hai
2:
Wasfe Rukh Unka Kiya Karte Hai, Shar-He Wash-Shamso Zuha Karte Hai
Unki Hum Madd-Ho Sana Karte Hai, Jinko Mahmood Kaha Karte Hai

Maahe Shak Gashta Ki Soorat Dekho, Kaap Kar Mehr Ki Raj'at Dekho
Mustafa Pyare Ki Qudrat Dekho, Kaise Ayjaz Hua Karte Hai

Tu Hai Khursheed E Risalat Pyare, Chup Gaye Teri Ziya Me Taare
Ambiya Aur Hai Sab Mah-Paare, Tujhse Hi Noor Liya Karte Hai

Ay Balaa Be Khirdi-E Kuffar Rakhte Hai Aise Ke Haq Se Inkaar
Ki Gawahi Ho Gar Usko Darkaar Be Zabaa(N) Bol Utha Karte Hai

Apne Maula Ki Hai Bas Shaan E Azeem, Jaanwar Bhi Kare Jinki Ta'azeem
Sang Karte Hai Adab Se Tasleem, Ped Sajde Me Gira Karte Hai

Rif'ate Zikr Hai Tera Hissa, Dono A'alam Me Hai Tera Charcha
Murge Firdous Pas Az Hamde Khuda Teri Hi Madho Sana Karte Hai

Ungliya Paayi Wo Pyari-Pyari, Jinse Dariya E Karam Hai Jaari
Josh Par Aati Hai Jab Gamkhwari, Tishne Sairaab Hua Karte Hai

Haa Yahi Karti Hai Chidiya(N) Fariyaad, Haa Yahi Chahti Hai Hirni Daad
Isi Darr Par Shutrane-Naashaad Gil-E Ranjo Ana Karte Hai

Aasti Rehmat E A'alam Ulte Kamare Paak Pe Daaman Baandhe
Girne Waalo Ko Kucha E Dohzakh Se Saaf Alag Kheench Liya Karte Hai

Jab Sabaa Aati Hai Taibah Se Idhar Khilkhila Padti Hai Kaliya(N) Yaksar
Phool Jaama Se Nikal Kar Baahar Rukhe Rangi Ki Sana Karte Hai

Tu Hai Wo Badshah E Kouno Makaa(N) Ki Malak Haft Falak Ke Har Aa(N)
Tere Maula Se Shahe Arsh Aywa(N) Teri Daulat Ki Dua Karte Hai

Jiske Jalwe Se Uhud Hai Taba(N) Ma'adane Noor Hai Uska Damaa(N)
Hum Bhi Us Chand Pe Ho Kar Kurbaa(N) Dil E Sangi Ki Jila Karte Hai

Kyo Na Zeba Ho Tujhse Taajwari Tere Hi Dam Ki Hai Sab Jalwa Gari
Malako Jinno Bashar Huuro Pari Jaan Sab Tujh Pe Fida Karte Hai

Toot Padti Hai Balaye Jin Par, Jinko Milta Nahi Koi Yaavar
Har Taraf Se Wo Pur Armaa(N) Fir Kar Unke Daaman Me Chupa Karte Hai

Lab Par Aa Jaata Hai Naam E Janaab Muh Me Ghul Jaata Hai Shahde Nayab
Wajd Me Ho Ke Hum Ay Ja(N) Betaab Apne Lab Choom Liya Karte Hai

Lab Pe Kis Muh Se Ghum E Ulfat Laye(N) Kya Bala Dil Hai Alam Jiska Sunaye
Hum To Unke Kafe Paa Par Mitt Jaye Unke Darr Par Jo Mita Karte Hai

Apne Dil Ka Hai Unhi Se Aaram Soupe Hai Apne Unhi Ko Sab Kaam
Lou Lagi Hai Ke Ab Us Darr Ke Ghulam Chara-E Dard E Raza Karte Hai

1: Wo Meri Jaan Bhi Jaan Ki Jaan Bhi
2:
Wo Meri Jaan Bhi Jaan Ki Jaan Bhi
Wo Iman Bhi Rooh E Iman Bhi
Mahbate Wahi-E-Aayate Quraan Bhi
Aur Quraan Bhi Ruhe Quraan Bhi

Kya Bataoon Qayamat Ka Main Majra
Rehmato Ghaflato Ka Hai Ik Marka
Dil Ko Unki Shafa'at Pe Iman Bhi
Aqal Apne Kiye Par Pashemana Bhi

Ik Din Naz Pe Aapne Yun Kaha
Tu Bata Ta-Ire Sidaratul Muntaha
Hai Tere Samne Aalame Kun-Faka
Tune Payi Kisi Main Meri Shan Bhi

Bole Yoon Hazrate Jibril Bhi
Aiy Nigahe Masiyat Ke Zohra Jabi
Ho Tera Misal Koi, Kabhi Aur Kahi
Rab Ne Rakhkha Nahi Iska Imkan Bhi

Unki Rehmat Pe Akhtar Dilo Jaa Fida
Jinko Kahta Hai Sara Jaha Mustafa
Go Meri Zindagi Unse Gafil Rahi
Wo Na Gafil Rahe Mujhse Aik Aan Bhi

1: Woh Mahe Farozan
2:
Woh Mahe Farozan Woh Nayyare Taaban
Mera Mustafa Hai Mera Mustafa Hai
Woh Bara Rabi Ul Awwal Ko Aya
Jo Awwal Bana Hai Mera Mustafa Hai

To Kya Tu Ne Dekha Woh Mausam Badalna
Woh Pathar Zameen Par Phoolon Ka Khilna
Woh Arsh-E-Ula Ka Zameen Par Utarna
Jo Haan Utra Hai Mera Mustafa Hai

To Kya Tu Ne Dekha Hai Quran Ko Chalte
Ke Sehra Mein Jaise Darya Hon Behte
Woh Tareek Raaton Mein Suraj Nikalte
Jo Haan Nikla Hai Mera Mustafa Hai

To Kya Tu Ne Dekhi Hai Aisi Qabaein
Ke Mah O Mahar Bhi Lein Jin Se Ziayein
Woh Paivand Ke Jaisi Saji Kehkashaein
Jo Yeh Pehnta Hai Mera Mustafa Hai

To Kya Tu Ne Dekha Woh Rahmat Ka Manzar
Idhar Se Dua’ein Udhar Se Hain Pathar
Woh Taif Ki Wadi Woh Dawar Ka Dilbar
Jo Tanha Kharra Hai Mera Mustafa Hai

To Kya Tu Ne Dekha Woh Ana Woh Jana
Ke Hairat Mein Hai Ab Talak Yeh Zamana
Woh Rab Ka Bulana To Sab Ko Batana
Yeh Jo Aa Raha Hai Mera Mustafa Hai

Qudsi Kharre Hain Hairaan Ho Ke
Ke Sidra Se Aage Bashar Jaa Raha Hai
Woh Ban Than Ke Apne Khaliq Se Milne
Sar-E-Arsh Woh Taajwar Jaa Raha Hai

Jaata Hai Dekho Woh Bekhauf Kaise
Keh Sab Jaanta Hai Yeh Raahein Woh Jaise
Woh Yoon Jaa Raha Hai Jaise Ke Koi
Ghar Wala Apne Hi Ghar Jaa Raha Hai

Aqsa Mein Jitne Bhi Mursal Kharre The
Hairat Mein Saare Ke Saare Parre The
Ke Hum Us Ke Peeche Yeh Kya Kar Rahe Hain
Namzein Hi Lene Agar Jaa Raha Hai

Woh Kissa Haleema Ke Aangan Ka Poocho
Jawwani Ko Chodo Tum Bachpan Ka Poocho
Abhi Mustafa Ne Uthai Hai Ungli
Qamar Se To Poocho Kidhar Jaa Raha Hai

Kisi Par Jo Guzre Use Fikr Kab Hai
Chale Su-E-Maghrib Use Hukm-E-Rab Hai
Magar Unki Ungli Pe Qurban Hone
Khurshid Su-E-Asr Jaa Raha Hai

To Kya Tune Dekha Wo Aana Wo Jaana
Ke Hairat Mein Hai Ab Talak Ye Zamana
Qudsi Kharre Hain Hairaan Ho Ke
Ke Sidra Se Aage Bashar Jaa Raha Hai

Kahan Tu Hai Shakir Kahan Unki Naatein
Kahan Apni Zaatein Kahan Unki Baatein
Yeh Kyoun Keh Rahe Ho Bashar Jaa Raha
Haqeeqat Mein Khayr-Ul-Bashar Jaa Raha Hai

1: Woh Nabiyon Main Rehmat Laqab Panay Wala
2:
-----------------------------------
Ya Rab-E-Mustafa Baligh Maqasidana
Waghfirlana Mata Ya Wasi Alkarami
Ya Bari An Nasami

Woh Nabiyon Main Rehmat Laqab Panay Wala
Muradein Ghareebon Ki Bar Lane Wala
Musibat Main Ghairon Ke Kaam Aane Wala
Woh Apne Paray Ka Gham Khane Wala

Faqeeron Ka Malja, Zaeefon Ka Mawa
Yatemoon Ka Wali, Ghulamon Ka Moula
Khatakar Se Darguzar Kerne Wala
Bad-Andesh Ke Dil Main Ghar Kerne Wala

Mafasid Ka Zair-O-Zabar Kerne Wala
Qabail Ko Sheer-O-Shakar Kerne Wala
Utar Ker Hira Se Suy-E-Qoum Aaya
Aur Ik Nuskha-E-Keemya Saath Laya

Mas-E-Kham Ko Jis Ne Kundan Banaya
Khara Aur Khota Alag Ker Dikhaya
Arab, Jis Pay Karno Se Tha Jehal Chahya
Palat Di Bas Ik Aan Main Un Ki Kaya

Raha Daar Na Bairay Ko Mouj-E-Bala Ka
Idher Se Udher Phir Huwa Rukh Hawa Ka
Woh Fakhr-E-Arab, Zaib-E-Mehrab-O-Mimbar
Tamam Alh-E-Makkah Ko Hamrah Le Ker

Gaya Eik Din Hasb-E-Farman-E-Dawar
Sooye Dasht Aur Charh Ke Koh-E-Safa Per
Yeh Fermaya Sab Se Ke Ah Aal-E-Ghalib!
Samajhte Ho Tum Mujh Ko Sadiq K Kazib?

Kaha Sab Ne Qoul Aaj Tak Koi Tera
Kabhi Hum Ne Jhoota Suna, Aur Na Dekha

Wahshate Dil Na Fira Koho Bayaabaa(N) Hum Ko

Tang Aaye Hain Do Aalam Teri Betaabi Se
Chain Lene De Tape Seenaye Sozaa(N) Hum Ko

Paau(N) Girbaal Huye Raahe Madina Na Mili
Aye Junoo(N)! Ab To Mile Rukhsate Zindaa(N) Hum Ko

Mere Har Zakhme Jigar Se Ye Nikalti Hai Sada
Aye Maleehe Arabi! Karde Namakdaa(N) Hum Ko

Saire Gulshan Se Aseerane Qafas Ko Kya Kaam
Na De Takleefe Chaman Bulbule Bustaa(N) Hum Ko

Jab Se Aankhon Me Samayi Hai Madine Ke Bahaar
Nazar Aate Hain Khazaa(N)-Deeda Gulistaa(N) Hum Ko

Gar Labe Paak Se Iqraare Shafa'at Ho Jaaye
Yu(N) Na Bechain Rakhe Joshishe Isyaa(N) Hum Ko

Nayyare Hashr Ne Ik Aag Laga Rakhi Hai!
Tez Hai Dhoop Mile Saaya E Daamaa(N) Hum Ko

Reham Farmaiye Ya Shah Ki Ab Taab Nahi(N)
Tabake Khoon Rulaye Ghame Hijraa(N) Hum Ko

Chaake Daamaa(N) Mein Na Thak Jaaiyo Aye Daste Junoo(N)
Purze Karna Hai Abhi Jebo(N) Gharibaa(N) Hum Ko

Parda Us Chehraye Anwar Se Utha Kar Ik Baar
Apna Aaina Bana Aye Mahe Taabaa(N) Hum Ko

Aye Raza Wasfe Rukhe Paak Sunane Ke Liye
Nazr Dete Hain Chaman! Murge Ghazal Khwaa(N) Hum Ko

1: Yaade Watan Sitam Kiya Dashte Haram Se Laayi Kyun
2:
Yaade Watan Sitam Kiya Dashte Haram Se Laayi Kyun
Baithe Bithaye Bad Naseeb Sar Pe Bala Uthayi Kyun

Dil Mein To Chot Thi Dabi Haaye Gazab Ubhar Gayi
Poocho To Aahe Sard Se Thandi Hawa Chalaye Kyun

Chhod Ke Us Haram Ko Aap Ban Me Thago(N) Ke Aa Baso
Phir Kaho Sar Pe Dhar Ke Haath Lut Gayi Sab Kamaayi Kyun

Baaghe Arab Ka Sarve Naaz Dekh Liya Hai Warna Aaj
Kumriye Jaane Ghamzada Goonj Ke Chah Chahayi Kyun

Naame Madina Le Diya Chalne Lagi Naseeme Khuld
Sozishe Gham Ko Hum Ne Bhi Kaisi Hawa Bataayi Kyun

Kis Ki Nigaah Ki Hayaa Firti Hai Meri Aankh Mein
Nargise Mast Naaz Ne Mujhse Nazar Churaayi Kyun

Tu Ne To Kar Diya Tabeeb Aatashe Seena Ka Ilaaj
Aaj Ke Doode Aah Mein Booye Kabaab Aaye Kyun

Fikre Ma’aash Bad Bala Hole Ma’aad Jaa(N) Guzaa
Laakhon Bala Mein Fasne Ko Rooh Badan Mein Aayi Kyun

Ho Na Ho Aaj Kuch Mera Zikr Huzoor Mein Hua
Warna Meri Taraf Khushi Dekh Ke Muskuraayi Kyun

Hoore Jinaa(N) Sitam Kiya Taiba Nazar Mein Fir Gaya
Ched Ke Pardaye Hijaaz Des Ki Cheez Gaayi Kyun

Gaflate Shaikho Shaab Par Hanste Hain Tifle Sheer Khwaar
Karne Ko Gudgudi Abas Aane Lagi Bahayi Kyun

Arz Karu(N) Huzoor Se Dil Ki To Meri Khair Hai
Peet-Tee Sar Ko Aarzoo Dashte Haram Se Aayi Kyun

Hasrate Nau Ka Saaniha Sunte Hi Dil Bigad Gaya
Aise Mareez Ko Raza Marge Jawaa(N) Sunai Kyun

1: Ye Kehti Thi Ghar Ghar Me Ja Kar Haleema
2:
Ye Kehti Thi Ghar Ghar Me Ja Kar Haleema
Mere Ghar Me Khairul Waraa Aa Gaye Hai
Bade Auj Par Hai Mera Ab Muqaddar
Mere Ghar Rasool E Khuda Aa Gaye Hai

Uthi Chaarsu Rehmato Ki Ghataye
Mu-Attar Mu-Attar Hai Saari Fazae
Khushi Me Ye Jibreel Nagme Sunaye
Wo Sha-Faye Rouze Jaza Aa Gaye Hai

Ye Zulmat Se Kehdo Andhere Uthale
Ke Hai Har Taraf Ab Ujale Ujale
Kaha Jinko Haq Ne Sirajammuneera
Mere Ghar Wo Noor E Khuda Aa Gaye Hai

Ye Sunkar Sakhee Aapka Aastaana
Hai Daaman Pasare Hue Sab Zamana
Nawaso Ka Sadqa Nigah E Karam Ho
Tere Dar Pe Tere Gada Aa Gaye Hai

Mukarrab Hai Be-Shaq Khaleelo Najee Bhi
Badi Shaan Waale Kaleemo Maseeh Bhi
Liye Arsh Ne Jinke Qadmo Ke Bouse
Wo Ummi Laqab Mustafa Aa Gaye Hai

Khuda Ke Karam Se Nakirain Aa Kar
Kahenge Ziyarat Ka Muzdah Suna Kar
Utho Behre Ta'azeem Noorul Hasan Ab
Lahad Me Rasool E Khuda Aa Gaye Hai

1: Ye Kis Shehenshah E Wala Ki Amad Amad Hai
2:
Ye Kis Shehenshah E Wala Ki Amad Amad Hai
Bolo Marhaba Bolo Marhaba
Ye Konse Shah E Bala Ki Amad Amad Hai
Bolo Marhaba Bolo Marhaba

Ye Aaj Taare Zameen Ki Taraf Hai Kyu Maayel
Ye Aasmaan Se Paiham Hai Noor Kyu Naazil
Ye Aaj Kya Hai Zamane Ne Rang Badla Hai
Ye Aaj Kya Hai Ke Aalam Ka Dhang Badla Hai

Ye Aaj Kaahe Ki Shadi Hai Arsh Kyu Jhooma
Labe Zameen Ko Labe Aasmaan Ne Kyu Chooma
Ye Aaj Kya Hai Ke Butt Aoudhe Ho Gaye Saare
Ye Aaj Kyu Hai Shayateen Bandhe Hue Kaare

Rusul Un Hi Ka To Musda Sunane Ae Hai
Unhi Ke Ane Ki Khushian Manane Ae Hai
Farishte Aj Jo Dhoomen Machane Ae Hai
Unhi Ke Ane Ki Shadi Rachane Ae Hai

Chamak Se Apni Jahan Jagmagane Ae Hai
Mehek Se Apni Ye Koochey Basane Ae Hai
Ye Seedha Rasta Haq Ka Batane Ae Hai
Ye Haq Ke Bandon Ko Haq Se Milane Ae Hai

Jo Gir Rahe Thay Unhe Naibon Ne Tham Lia
Jo Gir Chuke Hai Ye Un Ko Uthane Ae Hai
Rauf Aese Hai Aur Ye Raheem Hai Itne
Ye Girte Parton Ko Seeney Lagane Ae Hai

Inhe Khuda Ne Kia Apne Mulk Ka Malik
Aur Inhi Ke Qabzey Me Rab Ke Khazaney Ae Hai
Jo Chahen Ge Jisey Chahen Ge Ye Usey Den Ge
Karim Hai Ye Khazaney Lutane Ae Hai

Sab Rusul Ne Kaha Izhabu Ila Ghairi
Ana Laha Ka Ye Musda Sunane Ae Hai
Ajab Karam He Ke Khud Mujrimon Ke Hami Hai
Gunah Garon Ki Ye Bakhshish Karane Ae Hai

Suno Ge La Na Zaban E Karim Se Noori
Kiunke Ye Faiz O Jod Ke Daria Bahane Ae Hai
Naseeb Tera Chamak Utha Dekh To Noori
Arab Ke Chand Lehed Ke Sirhane Ae Hai

Ye Kis Shehenshah E Wala Ki Amad Amad He
Bolo Marhaba Bolo Marhaba
Ye Konse Shah E Bala Ki Amad Amad He
Bolo Marhaba Bolo Marhaba

1: Yeh Naaz Yeh Andaz Hamare Nahi Hote
2:
Yeh Naaz Yeh Andaz Hamare Nahi Hote
Jholi Me Agar Tukre Tumhare Nahin Hote

Jab Tak Madine Se Ishare Nahi Hote
Raushan Kabhi Kismat Ke Sitare Nahi Hote

Be Daam Hi Bik Jaye Bazar E Nabi Me
Is Shaan Ke Saude Me Khasare Nahi Hote

Daamaan E Shafa’at Me Hame Kaun Chupata
Sarkaar Agar Aap Hamare Nahi Hote

Milti Na Agar Bhik Huzoor Aap Ke Dar Se
Is Thaath Se Mangto Ke Guzaare Nahi Hote

Yeh Nisbat E Sarkaar Ka Aijaaz Hai Warna
Toofaan Se Namoodaar Kinare Nahi Hote

Khalid Yeh Tasaduq Hai Faqat Naat Ka Warna
Mehshar Me Tere Waare Niyaare Nahi

1: Yeh Sarwari Hai Bhala Kya Sikandari Kya Hai
2:
Yeh Sarwari Hai Bhala Kya Sikandari Kya Hai
Dare Nabi Ka Gada Hun Mujhe Kami Kya Hai

Fida Naho Jo Nabi Pe Woh Ummati Kya Hai
Jo Geet Gaye Na Unke Woh Admi Kya Hai

Dare Rasool Pe Le Chal Junoone Ishq Mujhe
Baghair Aqa Ke Guzrey Woh Zindagi Kya Hai

Tarap Raha Hai Jo Roze Ki Haazri Ke Liye
Usi Gharib Se Pucho Ke Be Basi Kya Hai

Nabi Ki Shaan-E-Karimi Na Maan Ne Walon
Mujhe Bas Itna Bata Do Ke Kaafri Kya Hai

Bara Karam Hai Niyazi Madiney Wale Ka
Karam Na Ho Jo Nabi Ka Woh Zindagi Kya Hai

1: Zaer E Koay Jinaah Aahista Chal
2:
Zaer-E-Koay Jinaah Aahista Chal
Dekh Aaya Hai Kahaan Aahista Chal

Jaisay Jee Chahay Jahan Mein Ghoom Phir
Ye Madina Hai Yahan Aahista Chal

Baargah-E-Naaz Mein Aahista Bol
Hoga Sab Kuch Rayegaan Aahista Chal

Haazri Mein Hai Malak Sattar Hazaar
Qudsiyon Ke Darmiyan Aahista Chal

Dekhloon Jee Bhar Ke Sheher-E-Mustafa
Mere Meer-E-Kaarwan Aahista Chal

Jaliyon Ke Saamnay Jaldi Na Kar
Woh Hai Naazish Meherbaan Aahista Chal

1: Zahe Bakht Mil Jaye Wo Aastana
2:
Zahe Bakht Mil Jaye Wo Aastana
Jaha Zuk Gayi Hai Jabine Zamana

Nahi Hu Talabgare Andaze Zahid
Hamara Ho Har Ik Qadam Haidrana

Falak Ko Bhi Rond Aye Mera Nasiba
Tera Ik Ishara Ho Shahe Zamana

Firake Muhammad Main Aansu Bahakar
Mujhe Aagaya Daimi Muskurana

Tere Dast Pe Chasma E Tishna-Laba Hai
Idhar Sakiya! Jame Rangi Barhana

Tere Ik Ishare Pe Ho Jaye Aasa
Khatarnak Tufa Se Bhi Khel Jana

Zuba Hai Meri Khugare Na'ate Ahmed
Yahi Hai Hamare Labo Ka Tarana

Aiy Akhtar! Chale Aao Taibah Ki Janib
Khuda Ka Karam Chahta Hai Bahana

1: Zahe Izzato Aetala E Muhammad
2:
Zahe Izzato Aetala-E Muhammad
Ke Hai Arsh E Haq Zere Paa-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Makaa(N) Arsh Unka Falak Farsh Unka
Malak Khaadimane Sara-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Khuda Ki Raza Chahte Hai Do Aalam
Khuda Chahta Hai Raza-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Ajab Kya Agar Raham Farma Le Hum Par
Khuda-E Muhammad Baraa-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Muhammad Baraa-E Janaab E Ilahi
Janaab E Ilahi Baraa-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Basi Itre Mahboobi-E Kibriya Se
A-Baye Muhammad Kabaa-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Baham Ahad Bandhe Hai Wasl E Abad Ka
Raza-E Khuda Aur Raza-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Dame Naz'a Jaari Ho Meri Zabaa(N) Par
Muhammad Muhammad Khuda-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Asaa-E Kaleem Azdahaye Ghazab Tha
Giro(N) Ka Sahara Asaa-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Main Kurbaan Kya Pyari Pyari Hai Nisbat
Ye Aan-E Khuda Wo Khuda-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Muhammad Ka Damm Khaas Bahre Khuda Hai
Siwaye Muhammad Bara-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Khuda Unko Kis Pyar Se Dekhta Hai
Jo Aankhei(N) Hai Mahve Lika-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Zulu Me Ijabat Khawasi Me Rehmat
Badhi Kis Tuzuk Se Dua-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Izabat Ne Jhuk Kar Gale Se Lagaya
Badhi Naaz Se Jab Dua-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Izabat Ka Sehra Inayat Ka Joda
Dulhan Banke Nikli Dua-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

Raza Pul Se Ab Wajd Karte Guzariye
Ki Hai Rabbe Sallim Sada-E Muhammad صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم

1: Zahe Muqaddar Huzure Haq Se
2:
Zahe Muqaddar Huzur-E-Haq Se Salaam Aaya Payam Aaya
Jhukao Nazren Bichao Palken Adab Ka Aala Maqam Aaya

Yeh Kon Sar Se Kafan Lapetey Chala Hai Ulfat Ke Raastey Par
Farishtey Hairat Se Tak Rahe Hain Yeh Kon Zi Ehteram Aaya

Faza Mein Labbaik Ki Sadain Za Farsh Ta Aarsh Goonjti Hain
Har Ek Qurban Ho Raha Hai Zaban Pe Yeh Kis Ka Naam Aaya

Yeh Rah-E-Haq Hai Sambhal Ke Chalna Yahan Hai Manzil Qadam Qadam Par
Pohunchna Dar Par To Kehna Aaqa Salaam Lijiye Ghulam Aaya

Yeh Kehna Aaqa Bohat Se Aashiq Taraptey Se Chhor Aaya Hoon Mein
Bulawe Ke Muntazir Hai Lekin Na Subah Aaya Na Sham Aaya

Dua Jo Nikli Thi Dil Se Aakhir Palat Ke Maqbool Ho Ke Aai
Woh Jazba Jis Mein Tarap Thi Sachi Woh Jazba Aakhir Ko Kaam Aaya

Khuda Tera Hafiz-O-Nigehban O Rahe Batha Ke Jaane Wale
Nabi De Saad In Bisat Ban Kar Payam Darood-O-Salaam Aaya

Zahe Muqaddar Huzur-E-Haq Se Salaam Aaya Payam Aaya
Jhukao Nazreen Bichao Palkeen Adab Ka Aala Maqam Aaya

1: Zairo Paas E Adab Rakhho Hawas Jaane Do
2:
Zairo Paas-E-Adab Rakhho Hawas Jaane Do,
Aankhein Andhi Huwi Hain Unnko Taras Jaane Do.

Sookhi Jaati Hay Ummeed-E-Gurba Ki Kheti,
Boondiya Lakka-E-Rehmat Ki Barras Jaane Do.

Palti Aati Hay Abhi Wajd Mein Jaane Sheereen,
Naghma-E-Qum Ka Zara Kaano Mein Ras Jaane Do.

Hum Bhi Chaltay Hay Zara Kaafile Waalo Thehro,
Gathriyaan Tosh-E-Ummeed Ki Kas Jaane Do.

Deed-E-Gul Aur Bhi Karti Hay Qiyamat Dil Par,
Hum-Safeero Humein Phir Sue Qafas Jaane Do.

Aatish-E-Dil Bhi To Bharkaawo Adab Daa(N) Naalo,
Kaun Kehta Hay Ki Tum Zabte Nafs Jaane Do.

Yoon Tane Zaar Key Dar Pe Huwe Dil Key Sho’lo,
Shewa-E-Khaanah Bar Andaziye Khas Jaane Do.

Aay Raza Aah Ki Yoon Sahl Katein Jurm Key Saal,
Do Ghari Ki Bhi Ibadat To Baras Jaane Do.

1: Zamana Haj Ka Hai Jalwa Diya Hai Shahide Gul Ko
2:
Zamana Haj Ka Hai Jalwa Diya Hai Shahide Gul Ko
Ilahi Taaqate Parwaaz De Parhaye Bulbul Ko

Bahare Aayi Joban Par Ghira Hai Abr Rehmat Ka
Labe Mushtaaq Bheege(N) De Ijazat Saaqiya Mul Ko

Mile Lab Se Woh Mushqee(N) Mohr Wali Dam Mein Dam Aaye
Tapak Sun Kar Qume Isaa Kahu Masti Mein Qulqul Ko

Machal Jaau Sawaale Mudda'aa Par Thaam Kar Daaman
Behekne Ka Bahana Paau Qasde Be Ta-Ammul Ko

Dua Kar Bakhte Khufta Jaag Hungame Ijaabat Hai
Hataya Subhe Rukh Se Shah Ne Shab-Haaye Kaakul Ko

Zabane Falsafi Se Amn Kharqo Iltiyaam Asara
Panahe Daure Rehmat Haaye Yak Saa-At Tasalsul Ko

Do Shamba Mustafa Ka Jum'aye Aadam Se Behtar Hai
Sikhana Kya Lihaaze Haisiyat Khoo E Ta'ammul Ko

Wufoore Shaane Rehmat Ke Sabab Jur'at Hai Aye Pyare
Na Rakh Bahare Khuda Sharminda Arze Be Ta-Ammul Ko

Pareshani Mein Naam Unka Dile Sad Chaak Se Nikla
Ijaabat Shana Karne Aayi Gesuye Tawassul Ko

Raza Nuh Sabzaye Gardoo(N) Hain Kotal Jiske Maukib Ke
Koi Kya Likh Sake Uski Sawari Ke Tajammul Ko

1: Zameen Maili Nahi Hoti
2:
Zameen Maili Nahi Hoti, Zaman Maila Nahin Hota
Muhammad Kay Gulamon Ka Kafan Maila Nahi Hota.

Mohabbat Kamli Wale Say, Woh Jazba Hai Suno Logo
Yeh Jis Man Main Sama Jaaye, Woh Mann Maila Nahi Hota.

Gulon Ko Choom Laite, Hain Seharnam Shabnami Qatre
Nabi Ki Naat Sun Lein Tu, Chaman Maila Nahi Hota.

Jo Naam-E-Mustafa Chumein, Nahi Dukhti Kabhi Ankhein
Pehen Le Pyaar Jo Unka, Badan Maila Nahi Hota.

Nabi Ka Daman-E-Rehmat Pakar Lo Aey Jahan Walo
Rahe Jab Tak Yeh Hathon Main, Chalan Maila Nahi Hota.

Main Nazan Tu Nahi Fanpan Magar Nasir Yeh Dawa Hai
Sana-E-Mustafa Karne Se Fan Maila Nahi Hota.

---------------------Other---------------------
--------------------Version--------------------

Mile Hai Khaak Se Lekin, Badan Maila Nahi Hota
Fidayan-E-Mohammad Ka, Kafan Maila Nahi Hota

Mohabbat Ahle Bait-E-Paak Ki Jis Dil Me Pinha Ho
Sada Shafaaf Rehta Hai Wo Man Maila Nahi Hota

Sana-E-Mustafa Likho Ke Unki Madha Karne Se
Qalam Maila Nahi Hota, Sukhan Maila Nahi Hota

Nabi Ke Deen Ki Qatir Jo Deta Hai Aqeedat Se
Wo Daulat Kam Nahi Hoti, Wo Dhan Maila Nahi Hota

Hamaare Jurm Ki Kaalak, Hai Hazir Banke Faryadi
Libaase Paak-E-Shahe Zul Minan Maila Nahi Hota

Zabaan Tar Jin Ki Rehti Hai Sana-E-Shahe Batha Se
Ubaid E Qadri Unka Dahan Maila Nahi Hota

1: Zamino Zamaan Tumhare Liye
2:
Zamino Zamaan Tumhare Liye
Makino Makan Tumhare Liye
Chunino Chuna Tumhare Liye
Bane Do Jahan Tumhare Liye

Dahan Me Zuban Tumhare Liye
Badan Me Hai Jaan Tumhare Liye
Hum Aye Yahan Tumhare Liye
Uthe Bhi Wahan Tumhare Liye

Farishte Khidam Rasoole Hashm
Tamame Umam Ghulame Karam
Wajoodo Adam Haduso Kidam
Jahan Me Aya Tumhare Liye

Kalimo Naji Masiho Safi
Khalilo Razi Rasoolo Nabi
Atiko Wasi Gani-O-Ali
Sana Ki Zuban Tumhare Liye

Asaalate Kul Imaamate Kul
Siyaadate Kul Imaarate Kul
Hukoomate Kul Wilayate Kul
Khuda Ke Yahan Tumhare Liye

Tumhari Chamak Tumhari Damak
Tumhari Jhalak Tumhari Mahak
Zamino Falak Simako Samak
Me Sikka Rawa Tumhare Liye

Ye Shamso Qamar Ye Shaamo Sahar
Ye Bargo Shajar Ye Baago Samar
Ye Tego Sipar Ye Taajo Kamar
Ye Hukme Rawan Tumare Liye

Na Roohe Ami Na Arshe Bari
Na Laohe Mubin Koyee Bi Kahin
Khabar Hi Nahin Jo Ramz Khile
Azal Ki Nihan Tumhare Liye

Jina Me Chaman Chaman Me Saman
Saman Me Phaban Phaban Me Dulhan
Sazaa’e Mahan Par Aise Minan
Ye Amno Amaa Tumhare Liye

Khalilo Naji Masiho Safi
Sabhi Se Kahin Kahin Bhi Banin
Ye Be-Khabari Ke Khalq Phiri
Kahan Se Kahan Tumhare Liye

Ishaare Se Chand Chir Diya
Chhipe Huwe Khur Ko Pher Liya
Gaye Huwe Din Ko Asr Kiya
Ye Taabo Tawaan Tumhare Liye

Sabah Woh Chale Ke Baag Phale
Wo Phool Khile Ke Din Ho Bhale
Liwa Ke Tale Sana Me Khule
Raza Ki Zuban Tumhare Liye

1: Zarey Zarey Pey Chaya Huwa Noor Hai
2:
Zarey Zarey Pey Chaya Huwa Noor Hai
Merey Meethey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai
Noor Sey Sab Fiza Iss Ki Ma’amoor Hai
Merey Meetey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai

Noor Phoolo Mai Hai Noor Galiyo Mai Hai
Noor Bazaar Mai Noor Galiyon Mai Hai
Dast O Kausaar Par Noor Hi Noor Hai
Merey Meethey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai

Har Taraf Rehmato Ki Hai Cha’i Gatah
Mehki Mehki Hai Kya Hoob Madni Fiza
Zarey Zarey Pey Qurbaan Yaha Tor Hai
Merey Meethey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai

Kya Byaa Dashtey Tayba Ki Ho Hoobiya
Phool To Phool, Kaantey Bi Dilkash Yaha
Pathey Pathey Pey Chaya Huwa Noor Hai
Merey Meethey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai

Kaif O Masti Mai Doobey Huwey Raat O Din
Bheeni Husboo Say Mehkey Huwey Raat Din
Jis Ko Dekho Yaha Aa Kai Masroor Hai
Merey Meethey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai

Baagey Thayba Mai Rehti Hai Har Dam Bahaar
Aa Kai Dekho Yaha Ka Samaa Hush’guaar
Sab Fiza Is Ki Hushboo Sai Bar’poor Hai
Merey Meethey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai

Gam’zado Jo Bi Darbaar May Aa Gya
Shah Ki Who Nigaa’e Karam Paa Gya
Saarah Ranj O A’lim Is Ka Kafoor Hai
Merey Meethey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai

Yai Madineh Hi Ko To Fazeelat Mili
Kai Issi Mai Bana Hai Mizzar E Nabi
Gunbade Sabz Har Aankh Ka Noor Hai
Merey Meethey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai

Sabz Gumbad Kai Jalwoh Pey Qurbaan Jaa
Balkey Qurbaan Hai Husn E Kon O Makaa
Har Minaar E Pey Chaya Huwa Noor Hai
Merey Meethey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai

Haak E Thayba Mai Rakhi Hai Rab Nai Shifa
Saari Bimaariyo Ki Hai Is Mai Shifa
Is Ki Barkat Sai Har Ik Marz Door Hai
Merey Meethey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai

Aas Nujh Ko Tumhaarai Karm Ki Shah
Beek Day Doh Mujhe Apne Gham Ki Shah
Keh Do Aqa Teri Arz Mazoor Hai
Merey Meethey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai

Phir Madineh Ka Rangeen Gulzaar Hai
Aur Muqadar Sai Attar E Bar Kaar Hai
Is Ka Naama Gunaaho Sai Bar’poor Hai
Merey Meethey Madineh Ki Kya Baat Hai

1: Zarrey Jhar Kar Teri Payzaron Ke
2:
Zarrey Jhar Kar Teri Payzaron Ke
Taj E Sar Bante Hain Sayyaro Ke

Hum Se Chooro Pe Jo Farmaye Karam
Khil’ate E Zarr Bane Pushtaaron Ke

Mere Aaqa Ko Wo Dar Hai Jis Par
Maathe Ghiss Jaate Hai Sardaaro Ke

Mere Ishaa Tere Sadqe Jaau
Tor Be Tor Hai Beemaaro Ke

Mujrim O Chashm-E-Tabassum Rakho
Phool Banjaate Hai Angaaro Ke

Tere Abroo Ke Tassaduq Pyare
Bandh Kule Hain Gar Iftaro Ke

Jaan O Dil Tere Qadam Par Waarey
Kya Naseebey Hai Tere Yaaro Ke

Sidq O Adl O Karam O Himmat Me
Chaar Soo Shohrey Hai In Chaaro Ke

Siddique Ki Sadaqat -Zindabad!
Farooq Ki Adalat – Zindabad!
Uthmaan Ki Sakhawat – Zindabad!
Haidar Ki Shujahat – Zindabad!

Behr E Tasleem Ali Maidaa’n Me
Sar Jhuke Rehte Hai Talwaro Ke

Kaise Aaqao Ka Banda Hoon Raza
Bol Baale Meri Sarkaro Ke

1: Zehaal E Miskeen Makun Taghaful
2:
Zehaal E Miskeen Makun Taghaful
Duraye Naina Banaye Batiyan
Ke Taab-E-Hijran Nadaram Ay Jaan
Na Leho Kahe Lagaye Chatiyan

Shaban-E-Hijran Daraz Chun Zulf
Wa Roz-E-Waslat Cho Umer Kotah
Sakhi Piya Ko Jo Main Na Dekhun
To Kaise Katun Andheri Ratiyan

Yakayak Az Dil Do Chashm-E-Jadu
Basad Farebam Baburd Taskin
Kisay Pari Hai Jo Ja Sunave
Piyare Pi Ko Hamari Batiyan

Cho Shama Sozan Cho Zaraa Hairan
Hamesha Giryan Be Ishq An Meh
Na Nind Naina Na Ang Chaina
Na Aap Aaven Na Bhejen Patiyan

Bahaq-E-Roz-E-Visaal-E-Dilbar
Ke Daad Mara Gharib Khusro
Sapet Man Ke Varaye Rakhun
Jo Jaye Paun Piya Ke Khatiyan

1: Zere Saya Ae Ghumbad Shaam Ka Basera Hai
2:
Zere Saya Ae Ghumbad Shaam Ka Basera Hai
Aur Sunahri Jali Mein Roohnuma Sawera Hai

Jaabaja Madine Me Hajioun Ka Dehra Hai
Mustafa Ke Kuche Mein Saailoun Ka Pehra Hai

Har Nazar Hi Raasa Hai Har Bashar Paresha Hai
Aasiyon Ne Mehshar Me Mustafa Ko Ghera Hai

Qabr Mein Farishtoun Se Jab Nabi Ne Farmaya
Jaao Is Ko Sohne Do Ye Ghulam Mera Hai

Kaash Hashr Ke Din Main Is Tarha Uthu Ya Rab
Khud Huzoor Farmadein Ummati Ye Mera Hai

Tahiroun Ki Jurmat Mein Wo Kalas Ka Nazara
Shama Ko Pathangoun Ne Har Taraf Se Geera Hai

Kitni Khuld Manzar Hai Raat Bhi Madine Ki
Aik Zara Ujala Hai Aik Zara Andhera Hai

Meri Khush Naseebi Par Rashq Aye Rizwan Ko
Mustafa Agar Keh De Ye Ghulam Mera Hai

1: Zikr E Kherulwara Bay Khatar Kijiay
2:

1: Zikr E Khuda Mein Harr Dum Rahna Sabke Bus Ki Baat Nahi
2:

Dushman Se Badle Lene Kaa

Sab Ke Bas Ki Bath Nahi

Pyaare Sahaaba Deen Ki Khaatir,

Sabke Bus Ki Bat Nahi,

2:
